Dɛn bin fɔgɛt fɔ kɛr plɛnti bred, na wan gren bred nɔmɔ dɛn bin gɛt na di bot.
Wɛn dɛn de go, Jizɔs wɔn dɛn. I se, “Una tek tɛm wit di yist we di Faresi dɛn ɛn Ɛrɔd de yus.”
Di lanin bɔy dɛn bigin tɔk to dɛn kɔmpin se, “Na bikɔs wi nɔ bring bred mek i tɔk so!”
Jizɔs bin no wetin dɛn de tɔk, so i aks dɛn se, “Wetin du una de tɔk se una nɔ gɛt bred? Una nɔ ɔnda stand yet? Una at nɔ opin?
Una gɛt yay, una nɔ de si? Una gɛt yes, una nɔ de yɛri? Una nɔ mɛmba
we a bin kɔt kɔt dɛn fayv bred fɔ gi fayv tawzin pipul? Ɔmɔs ful blay bred bin lɛf?” Dɛn ansa se, “Na bin twɛlv blay, sa!”
Jizɔs tɔk igen se, “Ɛn we a bin kɔt kɔt sɛvin bred fɔ gi fo tawzin pipul, ɔmɔs ful blay bred una bin gɛda?” Dɛn ansa se, “Na bin sɛvin blay, sa!”
Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Pan ɔl dat, una nɔ ɔnda stand yet?”
Wɛn dɛn rich Bɛtsa yda, sɔm pipul kɛr wan blɛnyay man go to Jizɔs.
Jizɔs ol di blɛnyay man in an, i waka wit di man kɔmɔt na di vilej. I pit pan di man in tu yay, dɔn i tɔch dɛn. I aks am se, “Yu si ɛni tin?”
Di man luk, i se, “Yɛs, sa, a si sɔm pipul de waka, bɔt dɛn tan lɛkɛ tik we de waka.”
Jizɔs tɔch di man in yay igen. Di man ebul si gud, i bigin si ɔltin klia wan.
Jizɔs se, “Go na yu os, bɔt nɔ go bak na di vilej yet!”
Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn go na di vilej dɛn we de na Siza ria Fili pay. Wɛn dɛn de na rod de go, Jizɔs aks di lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Wetin pipul de tɔk bɔt mi, udat dɛn se a bi?”
Sɔm pan di lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Sɔm pipul se yu na Jɔn we bin de baptayz pipul; sɔm se yu na Ila yja, ɛn sɔm ɔda wan dɛn se yu na wan pan dɛn prɔfɛt we bin de lɔntɛm.”
Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Bɔt udat una se a bi?” Pita ansa se, “Yu na di Mɛsaya, dat na di wan we Gɔd dɔn pik!”
I wɔn dɛn mek dɛn nɔ tɛl ɛnibɔdi se in na di wan we Gɔd dɔn pik.

I tɛl dɛn se, “Mɔta lman Pikin go sɔfa plɛnti. Di Ju bigman dɛn, di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn go se dɛn nɔ no am ɛn dɛn go kil am. I go de na di grev, bɔt i go rayz di de we mek tri.”
Jizɔs tɔk am plen wan, Pita kɔl Jizɔs na kɔna ɛn se, “Masta, nɔ tɔk lɛkɛ dat!”
Jizɔs luk di lanin bɔy dɛn, i tɔk to Pita, i se, “Pita, kɔmɔt biɛn mi, na Setan in wok yu de du so! Yu de tink lɛkɛ aw mɔta lman de tink, yu nɔ de tink lɛkɛ aw Gɔd de tink.”
Jizɔs kɔl di pipul dɛn ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn; i tɛl dɛn se, “If ɛnibɔdi want bi mi lanin bɔy, di pɔsin nɔ fɔ du wetin in want fɔ du nɔmɔ, i fɔ rɛdi fɔ sɔfa ɛn day fɔseka mi, ɛn du ɔl wetin a de du.
Ɛnibɔdi we de tray fɔ sev in layf, go lɔs am; bɔt ɛnibɔdi we lɔs in layf fɔseka mi ɛn di Gud Nyus, go gɛt di tru layf.
Wetin pɔsin go gen if i gɛt di ol wɔl, ɛn day go ɛl ɛn lɔs di tru layf? Natin!
Wetin pɔsin go gi fɔ gɛt in layf bak? Natin!

If ɛnibɔdi de shem fɔ tɔk bɔt mi ɛn wetin a dɔn lan am, tɛm lɛkɛ dis we pipul nɔ biliv Gɔd ɛn dɛn wikɛd, Mɔta lman Pikin go shem fɔ da pɔsin de wɛn i kam lɛkɛ King ɛn layt we kɔmɔt ɛvin de shayn pan am wit di enjɛl dɛn; di sem layt we de shayn pan in Papa Gɔd.”
Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “A de tɛl una se sɔm pan una we de ya naw, nɔ go day sote dɛn dɔn si Gɔd kam rul na dis wɔl wit pawa.”
Wɛn siks de pas, Jizɔs tek Pita, Jems ɛn Jɔn go na wan ay il, na dɛn nɔmɔ bin lib de. Wantɛm, Jizɔs in bɔdi chenj bifo di lanin bɔy dɛn yay;
in klos sɛf bin wayt pas sha tin ɛn i bin de shayn brayt brayt wan, nɔbɔdi na wɔl nɔ ebul bruk klos klin lɛkɛ dat.
Dɛn di tri lanin bɔy dɛn si Ila yja ɛn Mozis de tɔk wit Jizɔs.
Pita bigin tɔk to Jizɔs. I se, “Masta, i gud we wi de ya so! Lɛ wi bil tri bafa, wan fɔ yu, wan fɔ Mozis, ɛn wan fɔ Ila yja.”
Pita nɔ bin no wetin fɔ tɔk, bikɔs in ɛn di ɔda tu lanin bɔy dɛn bin de fred bad.
Wantɛm wan klawd kam kɔba di san, dɛn yɛri vɔys de tɔk na di klawd se, “Dis na mi Pikin we a lɛk bad, una lisin wetin i de tɛl una.”
Dɛn luk rawnd kwik, bɔt dɛn nɔ si nɔbɔdi pas Jizɔs in wan gren.
We dɛn kɔmɔt na di ay il go na di tɔng, Jizɔs wɔn dɛn nɔ fɔ tɛl ɛnibɔdi wetin dɛn si, bɔt dɛn fɔ wet sote Mɔta lman Pikin dɔn rayz frɔm di grev.
Dɛn nɔ tɛl ɛnibɔdi wetin bi, bɔt dɛn bin de aks dɛn kɔmpin wetin Jizɔs min wɛn i se, “Pɔsin we day go rayz frɔm di grev.”
Dɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Wetin mek di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn se Ila yja gɛt fɔ kam bak na wɔl bifo dɛn tin ya go bi?”
Jizɔs ansa se, “Ila yja mɔs kam ɛn rɛdi ɔltin. Bɔt wetin du dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se Mɔta lman Pikin go sɔfa plɛnti ɛn pipul nɔ go tek am mek natin?
A de tɛl una se, Ila yja bin dɔn kam, bɔt di pipul dɛn du am wetin dɛn lɛk, ɛn na so dɛn bin dɔn rayt bɔt am na Gɔd in Buk.”
Wɛn dɛn go mit di ɔda lanin bɔy dɛn, dɛn mit plɛnti pipul gɛda rawnd dɛn, ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn de agyu wit di lanin bɔy dɛn.
Wɛn di pipul dɛn si Jizɔs, dɛn ɔl wɔnda bad, dɛn rɔn go mit am ɛn tɛl am kabɔ.
Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Wetin una bin de tɔk wit di lanin bɔy dɛn?”
Wan pɔsin na di krawd se, “Ticha, a bring mi bɔy pikin we dɛbul dɔn tɔn mumu kam to yu.

Ɛnitɛm we di dɛbul kin kam pan am, i kin wap am dɔng na grɔn, frɔsh kin de kɔmɔt na in mɔt, i kin de cham in tit ɛn in bɔdi kin stif. A bin beg yu lanin bɔy dɛn fɔ drɛb di dɛbul, bɔt dɛn nɔ bin ebul drɛb am.”
Jizɔs se, “Una dɛn tide pipul ya, una nɔ biliv, aw lɔng una want mek a de wit una bifo una go biliv? Aw lɔng a fɔ bia wit una? Una bring di bɔbɔ kam to mi!” Dɛn kɛr di bɔbɔ go to Jizɔs.
Wɛn dɛn de kɛr am go to Jizɔs, di dɛbul wap am dɔng wit fiks wɛn i si Jizɔs. Di bɔbɔ fɔdɔm na grɔn, i bigin rol rol ɛn pul frɔsh na in mɔt.
Jizɔs aks di bɔbɔ in papa se, “Frɔm ustɛm di dɛbul kam insay yu pikin?” Di man se, “Frɔm we i smɔl.
Ɛn plɛnti tɛm di dɛbul kin mek i fɔdɔm na faya ɛn insay wata fɔ kil am. If yu ebul fɔ ɛp wi, duya, sɔri fɔ wi ɛn ɛp wi, sa.”
Jizɔs aks di man se, “Wetin du yu aks mi if a ebul mɛn yu pikin? Pɔsin we biliv pan Gɔd ebul fɔ du ɛni tin.”
Di pikin in papa ala wantɛm se, “A biliv, sa, duya, ɛp mi fɔ biliv mɔ ɛn mɔ!”

Wɛn Jizɔs si se mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul de rɔn kam gɛda rawnd dɛn, i tɔk pan di dɛbul; i se, “Yu dɛbul we de mek pɔsin tɔn mumu, ɛn mek pɔsin dɛf, a de tɛl yu fɔ kɔmɔt insay dis bɔbɔ, ɛn nɔ fɔ go insay am igen!”
Di dɛbul mek di bɔbɔ ala big wan, dɔn i wap am dɔng na grɔn wit fiks bifo i kɔmɔt insay am. Di bɔbɔ ledɔm na grɔn lɛkɛ dayman ɛn plɛnti pipul tɔk se i dɔn day.
Bɔt Jizɔs ol di bɔbɔ in an ɛn ɛp am fɔ grap, di bɔbɔ tinap.
Wɛn Jizɔs rich na os, di lanin bɔy dɛn go mit am ɛn aks am se, “Masta, wetin du wi nɔ bin ebul drɛb di dɛbul kɔmɔt insay di bɔbɔ?”
Jizɔs ansa se, “Una nɔ go ebul drɛb dɛn kayn dɛbul ya pas una pre.”
Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn kɔmɔt de ɛn pas insay Galili. Jizɔs nɔ bin want mek ɛnibɔdi no se in lib de,
bikɔs i bin de lan in lanin bɔy dɛn. I se, “Dɛn go ol Mɔta lman Pikin ɛn and am oba gi pipul we go kil am. I go rayz frɔm di grev di de we mek tri.”
Dɛn nɔ bin no wetin Jizɔs min, bɔt dɛn fred fɔ aks am.
Wɛn dɛn rich Kepanyɔm, dɛn go na wan os. Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Wetin una bin de tɔk we wi de kam na rod?”
Dɛn nɔ ansa, bikɔs wɛn dɛn bin de kam, dɛn bin de aks dɛn kɔmpin se uswan pan dɛn impɔtant pas dɛn ɔl.
Jizɔs sidɔm, i kɔl di twɛlv lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn tɛl dɛn se, “If ɛni wan pan una want fɔ bi una edman, i fɔ put in yay dɔng ɛn wok fɔ una.”
Jizɔs tek wan lili pikin, put am midul dɛn ɔl. I tot di pikin na in an ɛn tɛl dɛn se,
“Ɛnibɔdi we tɛl pikin lɛkɛ dis fɔ kam na in os fɔseka mi, na mi di pɔsin tɛl fɔ kam na in os; nɔto mi nɔmɔ di pɔsin tɛl fɔ kam na in os, i tɛl di wan we sɛn mi, insɛf fɔ kam na in os.”
Jɔn se, “Ticha, wi si wan man de tek yu nem drɛb dɛbul. Wi tɛl am mek i lɛf fɔ du dat, bikɔs i nɔ de wit wi.”
Jizɔs se, “Una nɔ tɛl am fɔ tap, bikɔs ɛnibɔdi we de tek mi nem du wɔnda ful wok, nɔ go tɔk bad bɔt mi wantɛm, wantɛm so.
Pɔsin we nɔ de mekɔp bad fɔ wi, de fɔ wi.
A de tɛl una fɔ tru se, if ɛnibɔdi gi una wan kɔp wata fɔ drink bikɔs una na mi lanin bɔy dɛn, di pɔsin go gɛt di pe fɔ dat.
“Ɛnibɔdi we go mek ɛni wan pan dɛn mi lili pikin ya sin, i go bɛtɛ fɔ am if dɛn tay big ston na in nɛk ɛn ib am na dip wata.
If yu an de mek yu sin, kɔt am kɔmɔt; i go bɛtɛ fɔ mek yu gɛt wan an ɛn gɛt layf we go de sote go na ɛvin, pas fɔ mek yu gɛt tu an ɛn go ɛl we di faya nɔ de ɔt. [
Da say we wɔrɔm we nɔ de day go it dɛn ɛn faya we nɔ de ɔt go bɔn dɛn.]
If yu fut de mek yu sin, kɔt am kɔmɔt, i go bɛtɛ fɔ mek yu gɛt wan fut ɛn gɛt layf we go de sote go na ɛvin, pas fɔ mek yu gɛt tu fut ɛn go ɛl. [
Da say we wɔrɔm we nɔ de day go it dɛn ɛn faya we nɔ de ɔt go bɔn dɛn.]
If yu yay de mek yu sin, pul am kɔmɔt, i bɛtɛ fɔ mek yu gɛt wan yay ɛn gɛt layf we go de sote go na ɛvin, pas fɔ mek yu gɛt tu yay ɛn go ɛl.
Da say we wɔrɔm we nɔ de day go it dɛn ɛn faya we nɔ de ɔt go bɔn dɛn.
“Faya go mek ɔlman klin lɛkɛ aw sɔl kin mek dɛn tin we dɛn de sakri fays, klin.
“Sɔl na gud tin, bɔt if i nɔ gɛt tes igen, wetin fɔ put pan am fɔ mek i gɛt tes? “Una fɔ mek sɔl de na una layf, so dat una ɔl go gɛt wanwɔd ɛn kol at.”
Jizɔs kɔmɔt Kepanyɔm go Judia, dɛn i krɔs Riva Jɔdan. Plɛnti pipul go gɛda rawnd am, ɛn i lan dɛn bɔt Gɔd lɛkɛ aw i kin de du.
Di Faresi dɛn aks am kwɛshɔn fɔ tray am; dɛn se, “I rayt fɔ mek man tɛl in wɛf se i nɔ want am fɔ bi in wɛf igen?”
Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Wetin Mozis bin tɛl una fɔ du?”
Dɛn se, “Mozis bin alaw man fɔ rayt pepa gi in wɛf fɔ sho se i want pat wit am.”
Jizɔs se, “Na we una at tra nga mek Mozis rayt da lɔ de fɔ una.
Bɔt frɔm we Gɔd mek di wɔl, na in ‘I mek tu kayn pipul, man ɛn uman;’ lɛkɛ aw dɛn rayt na in Buk.
‘Na dat mek man go lɛf in mama ɛn papa go mared in wɛf,
ɛn dɛn tu go de lɛkɛ wan pɔsin’. So dɛn nɔto tu pipul igen, dɛn tu dɔn bi lɛkɛ wan pɔsin.
So mek pɔsin nɔ pat man ɛn uman we Gɔd dɔn jɔyn lɛkɛ wan pɔsin.”
Wɛn dɛn rich na os, di lanin bɔy dɛn aks Jizɔs bɔt di tin we i tɔk.
Jizɔs se, “If ɛni man pat wit in wɛf, dɔn i grap go mared ɔda uman, da man de dɔn sin.
Ɛn if ɛni uman pat wit in man, dɔn i grap go mared to ɔda man, da uman de dɔn sin.”
Sɔm pipul bin kɛr dɛn pikin go to Jizɔs fɔ mek i put an pan dɛn ed ɛn blɛs dɛn, bɔt in lanin bɔy dɛn tɛl di pipul dɛn nɔ fɔ ambɔg Jizɔs.
Bɔt wɛn Jizɔs si wetin di lanin bɔy dɛn de du, i vɛks pan dɛn, i se, “Una mek di pikin dɛn kam to mi, una nɔ tap dɛn; na pipul lɛkɛ dɛn pikin ya, go kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul.
A de tɛl una fɔ tru se, ɛnibɔdi we nɔ gri fɔ mek Gɔd rul am lɛkɛ lili pikin, da pɔsin de nɔ go kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul.”
Jizɔs tot di pikin dɛn, put in an pan dɛn ed ɛn blɛs dɛn.
As Jizɔs de go, wan man rɔn go mit am ɛn nil dɔng bifo am ɛn se, “Ticha, yu we gud, wetin a fɔ du fɔ mek a gɛt layf we go de sote go?”
Jizɔs se, “Wetin du yu se a gud? Nɔbɔdi nɔ de we gud, na Gɔd in wan gren gud.

Yu no dɛn lɔ we se: ‘Yu nɔ fɔ kil yu kɔmpin mɔta lman; mared man nɔ fɔ lɛf in wɛf ɛn kip ɔda uman ɛn mared uman nɔ fɔ lɛf in man go kip ɔda man; yu nɔ fɔ tif; yu nɔ fɔ lay pan yu kɔmpin; yu nɔ fɔ rog; yu fɔ rɛspɛkt yu papa ɛn mama.’ ”
Di man ansa se, “A dɔn kip ɔl dɛn lɔ ya frɔm we mi na bin pikin.”
Jizɔs luk di man ɛn lɛk am, so i se, “Wan tin lɛf we yu nɔ du yet, go sɛl ɔl wetin yu gɛt ɛn sheb di kɔpɔ gi dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt natin, da tɛm de yu go jɛntri na ɛvin; dɛn, kam bi mi lanin bɔy.”
Wɛn di man yɛri wetin Jizɔs tɔk, in at pwɛl bikɔs na bin jɛntri man. I sɔri wɛn i lɛf Jizɔs de go.
Jizɔs tɔn luk in lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn se, “I tra nga fɔ mek pɔsin we jɛntri kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul.”
Di wɔd we Jizɔs tɔk mek di lanin bɔy dɛn wɔnda, bɔt Jizɔs tɔk igen se, “Mi pikin dɛn, i tra nga fɔ pɔsin fɔ kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul.
I tra nga fɔ mek da big bif we nem kamɛl pas insay nidul yay, bɔt i tra nga pas dat fɔ mek jɛntri pɔsin kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul.”
Di lanin bɔy dɛn wɔnda igen; dɛn aks dɛn kɔmpin se, “If na so i bi, wɛl, udat go sev?”
Jizɔs luk dɛn ɛn se, “Gɔd ebul du wetin mɔta lman nɔ ebul du; Gɔd ebul du ɔltin.”
Pita tɔk se, “Wɛl, wi dɔn lɛf ɔltin ɛn kam fala yu!”
Jizɔs se, “A de tɛl una fɔ tru se, ɛnibɔdi we dɔn lɛf os, ɔ brɔda, ɔ sista, ɔ mama, ɔ papa, ɔ pikin dɛn, ɔ fam fɔseka mi ɛn di Gud Nyus,
Gɔd go gi am ɔndrɛd tɛm pas wetin i bin gɛt: os, brɔda, sista, mama ɛn papa, pikin ɛn fam; ɛn pipul go mek i sɔfa bad wan na dis wɔl, bɔt Gɔd go gi am layf we go de sote go na di wɔl we gɛt fɔ kam.
Plɛnti pipul we de bifo dɛn kɔmpin naw go de biɛn, ɛn plɛnti pipul we de biɛn naw, go go bifo.”

Wɛn dɛn bin de go na Jerusɛlɛm, Jizɔs bin de waka bifo dɛn. Di lanin bɔy dɛn bin de wɔnda, ɛn di pipul dɛn we bin de fala Jizɔs bin de fred. Jizɔs kɔl in lanin bɔy dɛn wansay ɛn tɛl dɛn wetin pipul go du am.

Jizɔs se, “Una lisin mi, wi de go na Jerusɛlɛm, pipul go ol Mɔta lman Pikin ɛn and am oba gi di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn. Dɔn dɛn go and am oba gi dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju fɔ mek dɛn kil am.
Di pipul dɛn go makata am, dɛn go pit pan am ɛn kil am, bɔt i go rayz frɔm di grev di de we mek tri.”
Jems ɛn Jɔn, we na Zɛbidi in pikin dɛn, go mit Jizɔs ɛn se, “Ticha, wi want mek yu go du sɔntin fɔ wi.”
Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Wetin una want mek a du fɔ una?”
Dɛn se, “Wɛn yu sidɔm na yu chia de rul, wi go want fɔ sidɔm klos yu, wan na yu raytan, di ɔda wan na yu lɛfan.”
Jizɔs se, “Una nɔ no wetin una de tɔk; una go ebul drink na di kɔp we a go drink, ɛn baptayz lɛkɛ aw a go baptayz?”
Dɛn se, “Wi go ebul, sa!” Jizɔs se, “Una go drink na di kɔp we a go drink ɛn una go baptayz lɛkɛ aw a go baptayz,
bɔt a nɔ gɛt di pawa fɔ mek una sidɔm na mi lɛfan ɛn mi raytan. Gɔd dɔn kip dɛn ples de fɔ dɛn pipul we i dɔn mak fɔ lib de.”
Wɛn di ɔda lanin bɔy dɛn yɛri dat, dɛn vɛks pan Jems ɛn Jɔn fɔseka wetin dɛn aks Jizɔs fɔ du fɔ dɛn.
Jizɔs kɔl dɛn ɔl ɛn tɛl dɛn se, “Una no se dɛn pipul we de rul dɛn wan we nɔ biliv Gɔd gɛt pawa oba dɛn, ɛn dɛn de tɛl dɛn wetin dɛn fɔ du ɔltɛm.
Bɔt nɔto so i go bi fɔ una. If ɛni wan pan una want bi bigman, i fɔ wok fɔ una ɔl lɛkɛ se in na una bɔy.
Ɛni wan pan una we want fɔ de bifo, da pɔsin de fɔ wok fɔ una ɔl lɛkɛ se in na una slev.
Mɔta lman Pikin insɛf nɔ kam fɔ mek pipul bi in savant, i kam fɔ bi dɛn savant, ɛn fɔ gi in layf fɔ sev plɛnti plɛnti pipul.”
Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn rich Jɛriko. As dɛn de kɔmɔt de, plɛnti pipul fala dɛn. Wan blɛnyay man we nem Batimyɔs bin sidɔm klos di rod de beg; na bin Timeyɔs in pikin.
Wɛn i yɛri se na Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt de pas, i bigin ala se, “Jizɔs, yu we na Devid in pikin, sɔri fɔ mi, sa!”
Plɛnti pipul ala pan am fɔ sɛt in mɔt, bɔt na di mɔ i ala lawd wan se, “Yu, we na Devid in pikin, sɔri fɔ mi, sa!”
Jizɔs tinap, i tɛl di pipul dɛn se, mek dɛn kɔl di blɛnyay man. Di pipul dɛn tɛl di man se, “Nɔ wɔri igen, grap! Jizɔs de kɔl yu.”
Di man pul di klos we i bin wɛr pantap kɔmɔt, i grap kwik go mit Jizɔs.
Jizɔs aks am se, “Wetin yu want mek a du fɔ yu?” Di blɛnyay man se, “Ticha, a want mek yu mɛn mi yay, so dat a go ebul si.”
Jizɔs se, “Go, di biliv we yu biliv dɔn mek yu wɛl.” I bigin si wantɛm, i fala Jizɔs.
Wɛn dɛn bin dɔn de klos Jerusɛlɛm, ɛn dɛn dɔn rich Bɛtfej ɛn Bɛtani we de klos Mawnt Ɔliv, Jizɔs tɛl tu pan in lanin bɔy dɛn fɔ go na di vilej we de bifo dɛn.
I se, “Una go na di vilej we de bifo una. As una de rich de so, una go mit dɛn tay wan dɔnki pikin we pɔsin nɔ rayd wande. Una lus am ɛn bring am kam to mi.
If ɛnibɔdi aks una wetin du una de lus am, una fɔ se, ‘Di Masta want am, bɔt i go mek wi bring am kam bak as i dɔn wit am so.’ ”
Di tu lanin bɔy dɛn go na di ples we Jizɔs sɛn dɛn ɛn dɛn mit di dɔnki pikin tay na trit klos wan os domɔt. Dɛn bigin lus am, as dɛn de lus am,
di pipul dɛn we bin tinap de aks di lanin bɔy dɛn wetin mek dɛn de lus am.
Di lanin bɔy dɛn tɔk wetin Jizɔs bin tɛl dɛn fɔ tɔk, so di pipul dɛn gri fɔ mek dɛn kɛr di dɔnki pikin go.
Di lanin bɔy dɛn kɛr di dɔnki pikin go to Jizɔs; wɛn dɛn rich, dɛn prɛd dɛn klos pantap di dɔnki pikin in bak, Jizɔs sidɔm pantap am.
Plɛnti ɔda pipul prɛd dɛnsɛf yon klos na grɔn ɛn sɔm ɔda wan dɛn brok di an dɛn pan sɔm tik ɛn ib dɛn na di rod we Jizɔs de pas.
Di pipul dɛn we bin de bifo ɛn di wan dɛn we bin de biɛn bin de ala se, “Prez Gɔd! Gɔd blɛs di wan we i dɔn sɛn fɔ kam tinap fɔ am!
Lɛ Gɔd blɛs di gɔvmɛnt we wi gra npapa-papa Devid bin gɛt ɛn we go kam bak. Una lɛ wi prez Gɔd!”
Wɛn Jizɔs rich na Jerusɛlɛm, i go na Gɔd in Os ɛn luk ɔltin we lib de. Bɔt we nɛt bin dɔn de kam, in ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn go na Bɛtani.
Di ɔda de wɛn dɛn kɔmɔt Bɛtani, Jizɔs bin angri.
I si wan fig tik we bin gɛt plɛnti lif, so Jizɔs go luk di tik fɔ si if i de bia. Wɛn i rich klos di tik, i si se na soso lif nɔmɔ kɔba am, bikɔs nɔto bin di tɛm dat fɔ mek i bia.
Jizɔs swɛ di tik, i se, “Yu nɔ go bia natin igen.” Di lanin bɔy dɛn yɛri wetin Jizɔs tɔk.
Wɛn Jizɔs rich Jerusɛlɛm, i go na Gɔd in Os ɛn drɛb dɛn pipul we bin de bay ɛn sɛl insay de. I tɔn oba dɛn tebul we pipul bin de chenj kɔpɔ pan, ɛn dɛn bɛnch we pipul kin sidɔm pan fɔ sɛl pijin.
I nɔ gri fɔ mek ɛnibɔdi kɛr ɛni tin fɔ sɛl go insay Gɔd in Os.
I se, “Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, Gɔd se, ‘Pipul fɔ kɔl mi Os di ples we fɔ pre’. Bɔt una dɔn tɔn am to ples we tifman de ayd!”

Wɛn di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn yɛri wetin Jizɔs tɔk, dɛn bigin fɛn we fɔ kil am. Dɛn bin de fred am, bikɔs ɔl di pipul dɛn bin de wɔnda wɛn dɛn yɛri wetin i de tich ɛn dɛn bin gladi.
Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn kɔmɔt na di tɔng da sem ivintɛm de.
Na mɔnin wɛn dɛn de tɔn bak, dɛn si se di fig tik dɔn day frɔm bɔtɔm te go ɔp.
Pita mɛmba wetin bin bi, so i tɔn to Jizɔs ɛn se, “Ticha, luk, da fig tik we yu bin swɛ dɔn day!”
Jizɔs se, “Una fɔ biliv Gɔd gud.
A de tɛl una se, if ɛnibɔdi tɛl dis mawnten fɔ kɔmɔt naya ɛn go na di si, ɛn di pɔsin nɔ dawt se wetin i tɔk go bi, bɔt i biliv se wetin i tɔk go bi, na so i go bi.
Na dat mek a de tɛl una se, ɛni tin we una aks Gɔd fɔ, una fɔ biliv se una go gɛt am ɛn una go gɛt am.
Ɛnitɛm we una de pre to Gɔd, una fɔ padin ɛnibɔdi we du una bad, so dat una Papa Gɔd we de na ɛvin go padin una fɔ di bad tin dɛn we una du. [
If una nɔ padin una kɔmpin, una Papa Gɔd we de na ɛvin nɔ go padin una fɔ di bad tin dɛn we una du.]”
Wɛn dɛn go bak na Jerusɛlɛm, Jizɔs bin de waka insay Gɔd in Os, na in di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn, ɛn di ɔda Ju bigman dɛn go mit am.
Dɛn aks am se, “Us rayt yu gɛt fɔ du dɛn tin ya? Udat gi yu di rayt fɔ du dɛn?”
Jizɔs ansa se, “Mek a aks una wan kwɛshɔn, if una gi mi di rayt ansa, a go tɛl una udat gi mi di rayt fɔ du dɛn tin ya.
Na Gɔd ɔ na mɔta lman sɛn Jɔn fɔ kam baptayz pipul?”
Dɛn bigin tɔk to dɛn kɔmpin se, “If wi ansa se na Gɔd sɛn Jɔn fɔ kam baptayz pipul, i go aks wi se, ‘Wetin du una nɔ bin biliv am?’
Bɔt wi fɔ se ‘Na mɔta lman . . .’ ” (dɛn fred fɔ tɔk dat bikɔs ɔl di pipul dɛn bin biliv se Jɔn na tru prɔfɛt.)
So dɛn se, “Wi nɔ no!” Jizɔs se, “Misɛf nɔ go tɛl una udat gi mi di rayt fɔ du dɛn tin ya.”

Jizɔs pul wan pare bul; i se, “Wan man bin plant gre pvayn na in gadin, dɔn i mek ston wɔl rawnd di gadin. I dig ol fɔ mek di wayn ɛn bil wan ples ɔp di wɔl we pɔsin go sidɔm fɔ wach di gadin. I rɛnt di gadin gi sɔm pipul, dɔn i go patrol na ɔda kɔntri.
Wɛn di greps bigin bia, di man we gɛt di gadin sɛn in bɔy fɔ go aks di pipul dɛn we rɛnt di gadin fɔ gi am sɔm pan di greps.
Bɔt di pipul dɛn we rɛnt di gadin kech di bɔy, bit am ɛn drɛb am kɔmɔt na di gadin, dɛn nɔ gi am natin.
Di man we gɛt di gadin sɛn in ɔda bɔy, bɔt di pipul dɛn we rɛnt di gadin wund in ed ɛn disgres am.
Di man sɛn ɔda bɔy, dɛn kil da wan de; dɔn dɛn kil ɛn wund plɛnti ɔda bɔy dɛn we di man sɛn.
Di las pɔsin we di man sɛn na in bɔy pikin we i lɛk. I mɛmba se we di pipul dɛn si in pikin, dɛn go rɛspɛkt am.
Wɛn di pipul dɛn we rɛnt di gadin si di man in pikin, dɛn se, ‘Na dis pikin dis prɔpati ya go lɛf to, lɛ wi kil am, so dat di prɔpati go kam na wi an.’
Dɛn ol am ɛn kil am, ɛn drɛg am kɔmɔt na di gadin.”
Jizɔs aks in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Wetin una tink se di man we gɛt di gadin go du dɛn pipul ya? I go kil dɛn ɔl ɛn rɛnt di gadin gi ɔda pipul.
Una nɔ rid yet wetin rayt na Gɔd in Buk? Dɛn rayt se, ‘Di ston we dɛn pipul we de bil nɔ luk se bɛtɛ, na in dɔn bi di wan we impɔtant pas ɔl di ɔda wan dɛn.
Na di Masta mek dat bi; ɛn di tin we di Masta du, so wɔndaful!’ ”
Di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn tray fɔ ol Jizɔs, bikɔs dɛn bin no se na pan dɛn Jizɔs pul di pare bul. Bɔt dɛn fred di krawd, so dɛn lɛf Jizɔs go.
Dɛn sɛn sɔm Faresi dɛn ɛn sɔm pan Ɛrɔd in pati pipul dɛn to Jizɔs fɔ mek Jizɔs tɔk sɔntin we dɛn go tek kech am.

Dɛn go mit Jizɔs ɛn se, “Ticha, wi no se yu de tɔk tru ɛn yu nɔ tek ɛnibɔdi pas in kɔmpin, yu nɔ de luk if pɔsin jɛntri ɔ if i po. Yu de lan wi wetin Gɔd want mɔta lman fɔ du, fɔ tru, bɔt lɛ wi aks yu wan kwɛshɔn. I rayt fɔ mek wi pe taks to di king na Rom? Wi fɔ pe taks ɔ wi nɔ fɔ pe taks?”
Jizɔs no wantɛm se dɛn na ipo krit pipul, ɛn dɛn bin de sɛt trap fɔ kech am, so i se, “Wetin du una de tray fɔ tek wetin a tɔk kech mi? Una bring wan Roman kɔpɔ kam mek wi luk am.”
Wɛn dɛn bring di Roman kɔpɔ kam, Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Udat in pikchɔ ɛn nem de pan di kɔpɔ?” Dɛn se, “Na di king na Rom in yon.”
Jizɔs se, “Una gi di king na Rom wetin blant am ɛn una gi Gɔd wetin blant Gɔd.” Di pipul dɛn we kam fɔ tray Jizɔs wɔnda wɛn dɛn yɛri wetin Jizɔs tɔk.
Sɔm pan di Sadyusi dɛn kam mit Jizɔs; di Sadyusi dɛn bin biliv se pɔsin we dɔn day nɔ go rayz frɔm di grev.
Dɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Ticha, Mozis bin rayt se, ‘If pɔsin in brɔda day lɛf wɛf we nɔ bɔn pikin, di brɔda we lɛf fɔ mared di uman, mek dɛn go bɔn pikin fɔ di brɔda we dɔn day.’
Sɛvin brɔda dɛn bin de, di fɔs brɔda mared, dɛn i day, in wɛf nɔ bɔn pikin bifo di man day lɛf am.
Di sɛkɛn brɔda mared di uman we in brɔda bin mared bifo i day, insɛf day ɛn di uman nɔ bɔn fɔ am. Na di sem tin bi to di tɔd brɔda.
Ɔl di sɛvin brɔda dɛn mared di wan uman, bɔt di uman nɔ bɔn fɔ dɛn. Na di uman las day.
Di de we Gɔd go mek dɛn pipul we dɔn day rayz frɔm dɛn grev, uswan pan dɛn sɛvin brɔda ya go gɛt di uman fɔ in wɛf, we dɛn ɔl sɛvin bin dɔn mared am?”
Jizɔs se, “Una mistek bad, bikɔs una nɔ no wetin rayt na Gɔd in Buk, ɛn una nɔ no bɔt Gɔd in pawa.
Di tɛm we Gɔd go mek dɛn pipul we dɔn day rayz frɔm dɛn grev, mared nɔ go de igen, di pipul dɛn go tan lɛkɛ di enjɛl dɛn na ɛvin.

We una de aks if dɛn pipul we dɔn day go rayz frɔm dɛn grev, una nɔ rid yet wetin Gɔd bin mek Mozis rayt na in Buk, da say we tɔk bɔt di smɔl tik we bin de bɔn we Gɔd bin tɛl Mozis se, ‘Mi na Gɔd fɔ Ebraam, Ayzik, ɛn Jekɔb?’
Una dɔn mistek bad, bikɔs if Gɔd na Gɔd fɔ pɔsin dat min se da pɔsin de nɔto pɔsin we day, bɔt na pɔsin we gɛt layf.”
Wan Ju Lɔ ticha kam mit dɛn de agyu, i no se Jizɔs ansa dɛn wɛl, so i aks Jizɔs se, “Uswan pan di lɔ dɛn pas ɔl di ɔda wan dɛn?”
Jizɔs ansa am se, “Na di lɔ we se, ‘Una we na Izrɛl pipul, lisin! Di Masta na wi Gɔd, ɔda wan nɔ de.
Una fɔ lɛk di Masta we na una Gɔd wit ɔl una at, ɔl una layf, ɔl una maynd, ɛn ɔl una pawa.’
Di ɔda lɔ we impɔtant na in dis, ‘Una fɔ lɛk una kɔmpin mɔta lman lɛkɛ aw una lɛk unasɛf.’ Ɔda lɔ nɔ de we pas dɛn tu ya.”
Di Ju Lɔ ticha tɔk igen, i se, “Ticha, yu dɔn tɔk tru we yu se, na wan gren Gɔd de, ɔda wan nɔ de.

Ɛn we yu se, wi fɔ lɛk Gɔd wit ɔl wi at, ɔl wi maynd, ɛn ɔl wi pawa, ɛn wi fɔ lɛk wi kɔmpin mɔta lman lɛkɛ aw wi lɛk wisɛf. Dat bɛtɛ pas ɔl di sakri fays dɛn we wi de mek ɛn ɔl di bif dɛn we wi de bɔn we wi de sakri fays to Gɔd.”
Jizɔs no se di Ju Lɔ ticha ansa am wit sɛns, so i tɛl am se, “Di tɛm we yu go lɛ Gɔd rul yu dɔn kam klos.” Afta dat, ɔlman fred fɔ aks Jizɔs kwɛshɔn.
Wɛn Jizɔs bin de na Gɔd in Os de lan di pipul dɛn, i aks dɛn se, “Aw dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha ya go se di Mɛsaya na Devid in gra npi kin-pi kin?
Gɔd in Spirit mek Devid insɛf tɔk se, ‘Gɔd tɛl mi Masta se: Sidɔm na mi raytan, sote a mek yu mas dɛn pipul we nɔ lɛk yu.’
“Devid insɛf kɔl di Mɛsaya, ‘Masta,’ so aw di Mɛsaya go bi wan pan in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn?” Plɛnti pipul bin gladi fɔ yɛri wetin Jizɔs de tɔk.
Wɛn Jizɔs bin de lan di pipul dɛn mɔ, i se, “Una tek tɛm wit dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha, dɛn lɛk fɔ wɛr lɔng gawn ɛn waka ɔlɔbɔt ɛn dɛn lɛk fɔ mek pipul tɛl dɛn adu na dɛn ples we plɛnti pipul gɛda.
Dɛn na pipul we lɛk fɔ sidɔm na dɛn bɛnch we de bifo na di Ju mitin os, ɛn wɛn pipul kɔl dɛn na pati, dɛn kin lɛk fɔ go sidɔm na di ples we dɛn bigman de sidɔm.
Dɛn lɛk fɔ kapu dɛn uman dɛn prɔpati we dɛn man dɔn day, ɛn dɛn kin tinap de pre lɔng lɔng lɛkɛ se dɛn na gud pipul. Gɔd go pɔnish dɛn pas aw i go pɔnish ɔda pipul!”
Jizɔs bin sidɔm fesin di bɔks we dɛn de put kɔpɔ na Gɔd in Os de luk we di pipul dɛn de kam put dɛn kɔpɔ insay di bɔks. Plɛnti jɛntri pipul put plɛnti kɔpɔ insay di bɔks.
Dɛn wan po uman we in man bin dɔn day go put tu kɔpɔ nɔmɔ we na lɛkɛ wan sɛnt nɔmɔ, insay di bɔks.
Na in Jizɔs kɔl in lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn se, “A de tɛl una se, dis po uman we in man dɔn day put mɔ kɔpɔ pas ɔlman we kam put kɔpɔ na di bɔks.
Ɔlman we kam put kɔpɔ jɛs put kenkeni pan di plɛnti plɛnti kɔpɔ we dɛn gɛt, bɔt dis uman put ɔl wetin i bin gɛt fɔ tek manej in layf.”
We Jizɔs bin de kɔmɔt na Gɔd in Os, wan pan in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Ticha, luk dɛn fayn ston ɛn ɔl dɛn fayn fayn bildin ya!” I bin de tɛl Jizɔs bɔt Gɔd in Os.
Jizɔs se, “Una si dɛn big bildin ya? Tɛm de kam we dɛn ɔl go fɔdɔm, ɛn wan ston nɔ go lɛf pantap in kɔmpin.”
We Jizɔs sidɔm na Mawnt Ɔliv, we de fesin Gɔd in Os, na in Pita, Jems, Jɔn ɛn Andru kam mit am ɛn aks am se,
“Tɛl wi ustɛm dɛn tin we yu bin tɛl wi bɔt go bi? Us sayn go sho wi se i nɔ go te igen we ɔl dɛn tin ya go bi?”
Jizɔs ansa se, “Una tek tɛm mek nɔbɔdi nɔ mek una ful.
Plɛnti pipul go tek mi nem kam, dɛn go se dɛn na di Mɛsaya, dɛn go mek plɛnti pipul ful.
Ɛn una nɔ fɔ wɔri wɛn una yɛri bɔt wa we de klos una ɔ wɛn una yɛri bɔt wa we de fawe. Dɛn tin de mɔs bi, bɔt di wɔl nɔ go ɛnd yet!
Wan kɔntri go fɛt ɔda kɔntri, ɛn wan neshɔn go fɛt ɔda neshɔn. Di grɔn go tri mbul plɛnti say, natin nɔ go de fɔ it. Ɔl dɛn bad tin de na di fɔs waala dɛn we go fɔdɔm. Wɔs wan dɛn go de biɛn.

“Una bikya ful, pipul go ol una ɛn kɛr una go bifo dɛn pipul we de jɔj na kot. Pipul go bit una na dɛn Ju mitin os; dɛn go kɛr una go bifo dɛn pipul we de rul, bikɔs una biliv pan mi; da tɛm de una fɔ tɔk di tru tin we una no bɔt mi.
Bifo di wɔl dɔn, pipul ɔlɔbɔt na wɔl fɔ dɔn yɛri di Gud Nyus fɔs.

Ɛnitɛm we dɛn ol una ɛn kɛr una go kot, una nɔ fɔ wɔri bɔt wetin una go tɔk, una nɔ fɔ tink bɔt dat bifo di tɛm rich, bɔt wɛn di tɛm rich, ɛni tin we Gɔd in Spirit put na una mɔt, na in una go tɔk. Da tɛm de nɔto unasɛf go tɔk, na Gɔd in Spirit go tɔk fɔ una.
Brɔda go and brɔda oba gi pipul fɔ mek dɛn kil am, semwe, papa go and in pikin gi pipul fɔ mek dɛn kil am. Pikin go fɛt in papa ɛn mama, ɛn i go mek pipul kil dɛn.
Pipul nɔ go lɛk una bikɔs una biliv pan mi, bɔt ɛnibɔdi we bia sote i day, go sev.
“Una go si di bad bad tin tinap na di ples we i nɔ fɔ de.” (Una we de rid: una ɔnda stand wetin dis min.) “Da tɛm de di pipul dɛn na Judia fɔ rɔnawe go na dɛn il,
pɔsin we de pantap in os, nɔ fɔ kam dɔng ɛn go insay di os igen fɔ tek ɛni tin.
Pɔsin we de wok na fam nɔ fɔ tɔn bak go tek in klos.
Da tɛm de, i go bad fɔ bɛlɛ uman ɛn uman we de gi pikin bɔbi!
Una pre mek dɛn tin ya nɔ bi ren sizin!
Da tɛm de pipul go sɔfa pas aw dɛn dɔn sɔfa frɔm di tɛm we Gɔd mek di wɔl sote naw; ɛn afta dat, tin lɛkɛ dat nɔ go bi igen.
Bɔt di Masta dɔn mek da tɛm de shɔt, if nɔ so, nɔbɔdi nɔ bin go lɛf na di wɔl. Bɔt fɔseka dɛn pipul we i dɔn pik, di Masta dɔn mek da tɛm de shɔt.
“If ɛnibɔdi tɛl una se, ‘Luk di Mɛsaya naya!’ ɔ ‘Luk am yanda!’, una nɔ biliv am.

Bikɔs sɔm pipul go kam we go lay se dɛn na di Mɛsaya ɛn sɔm go kam we go lay se dɛn na prɔfɛt, ɛn dɛn go du plɛnti wɔnda ful wok ɛn sho plɛnti sayn, so dat da we de, dɛn kin mek dɛn pipul ful we Gɔd dɔn pik fɔ sev, if dɛn ebul du dat.
Una fɔ wayda wek; a dɔn tɛl una ɔltin bifo dɛn bi.
“Afta pipul dɔn sɔfa ɔl dɛn tin ya, di san go dak, di mun nɔ go shayn igen.
Di sta dɛn go fɔdɔm kɔmɔt na di klawd, ɛn di pawa dɛn we de na di klawd go muf kɔmɔt na di ples we dɛn bin de.
Da tɛm de, ɔlman na wɔl go si Mɔta lman Pikin de kɔmɔt na klawd kam dɔng wit pawa ɛn brayt brayt layt go de shayn rawnd am.
I go sɛn di enjɛl dɛn ɔlɔbɔt na wɔl frɔm wan ɛnd to di ɔda fɔ gɛda dɛn pipul we i dɔn pik fɔ bi in yon, bring dɛn kam to am.
“Una luk fig tik ɛn lan. Wɛn di an dɛn de pul nyu lif, una fɔ no se ren sizin de kam.
Semwe so, wɛn una si dɛn tin we a tɛl una, de bi, una go no se di tɛm we Mɔta lman Pikin fɔ kam dɔn de klos.
A de tɛl una se, ɔl dɛn tin ya mɔs bi, bifo dɛn pipul we de naw, day.
Natin nɔ go de ɔpklawd igen ɛn di wɔl sɛf nɔ go de igen, bɔt mi wɔd dɛn go de sote go wit ɔl dɛn pawa.
“Nɔbɔdi nɔ no di de ɔ di awa we dɛn tin ya go bi; Gɔd in enjɛl dɛnsɛf ɛn Gɔd in Pikin insɛf nɔ no di de ɔ di awa; na di Papa in wan gren no di tɛm.
Una fɔ wayda wek, una fɔ de wach, bikɔs una nɔ no ustɛm dɛn tin ya go bi.
I go jɛs tan lɛkɛ we pɔsin de go patrol, i lɛf in os to in savant dɛn. I gi ɔlman in yon wok, dɔn i tɛl di wachman fɔ de wach.
So una fɔ wayda wek, ɛn una fɔ de wach, bikɔs una nɔ no di tɛm we una masta go kam; una nɔ no if i go kam midul nɛt, ivintɛm, ali mɔnin, ɔ wɛn mɔnin dɔn go fa lili bit.
Una fɔ wayda wek, mek i nɔ kam tɛm we una nɔ mekɔp ɛn mit una de slip.
Di tin we a de tɔk so, nɔto fɔ una nɔmɔ, na fɔ ɔlman. Una fɔ wayda wek!”

I bin jɛs lɛf tu de bifo di Ju ɔlide we dɛn kɔl Pasova, we dɛn kin it bred we nɔ gɛt yist. Di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn bin de fɛn we fɔ ol Jizɔs ɛn kil am, mek plɛnti pipul nɔ no.
Dɛn se, “Wi nɔ fɔ ol am naw dis ɔlide, bikɔs if wi du so, di pipul dɛn go fɛt.”

Jizɔs bin de na Bɛtani na Saymɔn in os, da Saymɔn we bin gɛt bad sik na in skin. As Jizɔs de it, na in wan uman kam wit sɛnt insay wan bɔtul we dɛn tek ala ba sta ston mek. Di sɛnt we bin de insay di bɔtul na bin dia dia sɛnt we dɛn tek nad mek, dɛn nɔ bin miks am wit ɛni ɔda plant. Di uman brok di bɔtul in mɔt ɛn tɔn di sɛnt pan Jizɔs in ed.
Sɔm pan di pipul dɛn we bin lib de vɛks, dɛn se, “Wetin mek dis uman wes dis dia sɛnt?
Pɔsin bin fɔ gɛt lɛkɛ tri ɔndrɛd silva kɔpɔ so, if i bin sɛl di sɛnt ɛn sheb di kɔpɔ gi dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt natin.” Dɛn bigin tɔk pan di uman.
Jizɔs se, “Una lɛf fɔ tɔk pan di uman! Wetin du una de ambɔg am? Na gud wok i dɔn du fɔ mi so!
Dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt natin de wit una ɔltɛm, ɛn una kin du gud fɔ dɛn ɛnitɛm we una want. Bɔt mi nɔ go de wit una ɔltɛm.
Di uman dɔn du ɔl wetin i ebul du fɔ mi, i dɔn tɔn sɛnt pan mi fɔ mek mi bɔdi rɛdi fɔ di bɛr we dɛn go bɛr mi.
A de tɛl una se, ɛni say na wɔl we dɛn de tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus, dɛn mɔs mɛmba dis uman ɛn tɔk bɔt dis tin we i dɔn du so.”
Judas Iskariɔt we na wan pan di twɛlv lanin bɔy dɛn go mit di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin fɔ tɛl dɛn se in go sɛl Jizɔs gi dɛn.
Wɛn dɛn yɛri wetin i tɔk, dɛn gladi ɛn prɔmis fɔ gi am kɔpɔ. So Judas bigin fɛn chans fɔ sɛl Jizɔs gi dɛn.
Di fɔs de pan di Ju ɔlide we di Ju dɛn kin it bred we nɔ gɛt yist, ɛn kil ship fɔ mɛmba di Pasova, di lanin bɔy dɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Usay wi fɔ go rɛdi di Pasova it?”
Jizɔs kɔl tu pan in lanin bɔy dɛn fɔ sɛn dɛn, i se, “Una go insay di tɔng, una go mit wan man we ol wan big jɔg wata, una fala am go na di say we i de go.
Wɛn una rich de, una tɛl di man we gɛt di os se, ‘Wi Ticha se, usay di rum we tre nja de slip de we mi ɛn mi lanin bɔy dɛn go it di Pasova it?’
Di man go sho una wan big rum we de na di garɛt. I dɔn rɛdi am fɔ wi, ɔltin we wi want de insay de, na de una fɔ rɛdi di it fɔ mɛmba di Pasova.”
Di lanin bɔy dɛn go na di tɔng, dɛn mit ɔltin lɛkɛ aw Jizɔs bin dɔn tɛl dɛn; so dɛn rɛdi di it fɔ mɛmba di Pasova.
Ivintɛm, Jizɔs ɛn ɔl di twɛlv lanin bɔy dɛn go na di os.
Wɛn dɛn de it, Jizɔs se, “A de tɛl una se, wan pan una we de it wit mi naw go sɛl mi.”
Di lanin bɔy dɛn at pwɛl ɛn dɛn bigin aks Jizɔs wan bay wan se, “Na mi? Na mi?”
Jizɔs ansa se, “Na wan pan una twɛlv we de put an insay di sem dish wit mi.
Mɔta lman Pikin go day lɛkɛ aw dɛn rayt bɔt am na Gɔd in Buk; bɔt i go bad fɔ di pɔsin we go sɛl am. I bin fɔ bɛtɛ if da pɔsin de nɔ bin bɔn!”
Wɛn dɛn de it, Jizɔs tek bred, i pre ɛn tɛl Gɔd tɛnki. I kɔt kɔt am ɛn gi in lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn se, “Una tek am ɛn it am, dis na mi bɔdi.”
Dɛn i tek di kɔp ɛn pre ɛn tɛl Gɔd tɛnki. I gi in lanin bɔy dɛn; dɛn ɔl drink pan di wayn.
I tɛl dɛn se, “Dis na mi blɔd we a tek mek di agrimɛnt we Gɔd mek wit in pipul dɛn. A dɔn sakri fays am fɔ plɛnti plɛnti pipul.
A de tɛl una se, a nɔ go drink wayn igen sote di tɛm we a go drink di nyu wayn na di ples we Gɔd de rul.”
Dɛn sing wan Gɔd sing, dɔn dɛn go na Mawnt Ɔliv.
Jizɔs bigin tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn, i se, “Una ɔl go lɛf mi; bikɔs dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, ‘Gɔd go strayk di man we de mɛn di ship dɛn mek i day, ɛn di ship dɛn go skata.’
Bɔt wɛn a dɔn rayz frɔm di grev, a go go na Galili, una go go mit mi de.”
Pita se, “If ɔl di ɔda lanin bɔy dɛn go lɛf yu, mi nɔ go go lɛf yu, sa!”
Jizɔs se, “Pita, a de tɛl yu se, dis nɛt, bifo fɔl kro tu tɛm, yu go dɔn tɔk tri tɛm se yu nɔ no mi.”
Bɔt Pita se, “If a fɔ day sɛf, a go day wit yu, bɔt a nɔ go tɔk se a nɔ no yu!” Ɔl di lanin bɔy dɛn tɔk di sem tin.
Dɛn Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn rich na wan ples we nem Gɛtse mani. Jizɔs tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn, i se, “Una sidɔm naya, a de go pre.”
Jizɔs mek Pita, Jems ɛn Jɔn fala am go. In at bin ful, i bin ebi.
I se, “Mi at so ebi dat a fil fɔ day. Una sidɔm naya, una nɔ slip, una pre wit mi.”
Jizɔs lɛf Pita, Jems ɛn Jɔn, i go bifo lili bit, dɔn i ledɔm flat na grɔn ɛn bigin pre. I se, if we de, mek Gɔd nɔ mek di tɛm we i fɔ sɔfa kam.
I se, “Mi Papa, yu ebul du ɔltin, duya, nɔ mek a sɔfa dis sɔfa we a fɔ sɔfa, bɔt ɛniwe, nɔ du wetin a want, du wetin yu want.”
Wɛn Jizɔs go bak to di tri lanin bɔy dɛn, i mit dɛn de slip. I aks Pita se, “Saymɔn, yu de slip? Yu nɔ ebul wek ɛn pre wit mi wan awa sɛf?
Una fɔ wayda wek ɛn una fɔ pre mek una nɔ go sin wɛn Setan tray una. Una want du di rayt tin, bɔt una nɔ gɛt di pawa fɔ du am.”
Jizɔs lɛf dɛn go bak, i pre wit di sem wɔd dɛn we i bin pre wit di fɔs tɛm.
I go bak igen go mit Pita, Jems ɛn Jɔn de slip, dɛn nɔ bin ebul opin dɛn yay sɛf, bikɔs di slip bin de mɔna dɛn. Dɛn nɔ bin no wetin fɔ tɔk sɛf.
Wɛn Jizɔs kam bak di tɔd tɛm, i aks dɛn se, “Una stil de slip, una de blo te naw? I dɔn du so! Di tɛm dɔn rich; dɛn go sɛl Mɔta lman Pikin gi dɛn bad pipul.
Una grap, lɛ wi go; una luk, di pɔsin we go sɛl mi de kam naw!”

As Jizɔs de tɔk so, na in Judas we na wan pan in lanin bɔy dɛn kam wit sɔm pipul we ol sɔd ɛn ɔda tin dɛn fɔ tek fɛt. Na di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn, ɛn di ɔda Ju bigman dɛn bin sɛn di pipul dɛn.
Judas we bin want sɛl Jizɔs bin dɔn tɛl di pipul dɛn aw dɛn go no am. I se, “Di wan we a go kis, una grip am ɛn kɛr am go wit gyad dɛn rawnd am.”
Wɛn Judas kam, i go to Jizɔs wantɛm, i se, “Masta!” Dɛn i kis am.
Di pipul dɛn go grip Jizɔs.
Sɔmbɔdi we bin tinap klos de pul in sɔd ɛn kɔt di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin in bɔy yes kɔmɔt.
Jizɔs aks di pipul dɛn se, “Una kam fɔ ol mi wit sɔd ɛn dɛn ɔda tin fɔ tek fɛt lɛkɛ se mi na tifman?
Ɛvri de bin de wit una na Gɔd in Os de lan una bɔt Gɔd, bɔt una nɔ bin ol mi. Bɔt ɔl dis bi so dat wetin dɛn bin rayt na Gɔd in Buk go bi.”
Ɔl di lanin bɔy dɛn go lɛf Jizɔs in wan gren.
Wan yɔngman bin de fala Jizɔs, na wan lapa nɔmɔ i bin tay. Di pipul dɛn want grip di man,
bɔt di man rɔn go nekɛd; i lɛf in lapa na dɛn an.
Dɛn kɛr Jizɔs go bifo di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, in os. Ɔl di bigman dɛn we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, di ɔda Ju bigman dɛn, ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn bin gɛda de.

Pita bin de fawe lili bit de fala Jizɔs wɛn dɛn de kɛr am go te dɛn rich insay di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, in yad. Wɛn dɛn rich de, Pita go sidɔm klos di gyad dɛn, de wam insɛf klos di faya.

Di bigman dɛn we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn ɔl di Ju bigman dɛn we bin de jɔj na di Ju gran kot bin de luk fɔ pɔsin we go tɔk wetin Jizɔs du we bad, so dat dɛn kin kil am, bɔt dɛn nɔ fɛn ɛnibɔdi.
Plɛnti pipul go lay pan Jizɔs, bɔt dɛn ɔl nɔ tɔk di sem tin.
Sɔm ɔda pipul we go lay pan Jizɔs, se,
“Wi yɛri Jizɔs tɔk se, ‘A go brok Gɔd in Os we mɔta lman bil, ɛn a go tek tri de bil ɔda wan we mɔta lman nɔ go ɛp fɔ bil.’ ”
Bɔt dɛn pipul ya sɛf nɔ tɔk di sem tin.
Di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin tinap bifo di pipul dɛn ɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Yu nɔ gɛt natin fɔ se? Wetin mek dɛn man ya se yu du ɔl dɛn bad tin ya?”
Bɔt Jizɔs nɔ tɔk natin. Di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin aks am igen se, “Na yu na di Mɛsaya we na Gɔd, we wi de prez, in Pikin?”
Jizɔs se, “Yɛs, mi na di Mɛsaya. Una go si Mɔta lman Pikin sidɔm na Gɔd we gɛt pawa pas ɔl, in raytan, ɛn i go rayd pan di klawd wɛn i de kam!”
Di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin vɛks ɛn chɛr in klos ɛn se, “Wetin du wi want mɔ witnɛs?
Unasɛf dɔn yɛri di bad tin we i tɔk bɔt Gɔd, wetin una se?” Ɔl di bigman dɛn we bin de jɔj na di Ju gran kot kɔndɛm Jizɔs ɛn se i fɔ day.
Sɔm pan dɛn bigin fɔ pit pan Jizɔs; dɛn kɔba in fes, dɛn slap am, ɛn tɛl am se if in na prɔfɛt mek i tɛl dɛn udat slap am. Di gyad dɛnsɛf bigin slap Jizɔs.
Pita bin de dɔng na di yad we wan savant-gyal we bin de wok fɔ di edman pan dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, kam.
Wɛn i si Pita de wam faya, i luk am gud ɛn se, “Yusɛf bin de wit Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt!”
Bɔt Pita dinay, i se, “A nɔ no wetin yu de tɔk bɔt sɛf.” Pita grap ɛn go klos di get. [Da sem tɛm de fɔl kro.]
Di savant-gyal si Pita bak, i tɛl di pipul dɛn we bin tinap klos de, se, “Dis man na wan pan Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn!”
Bɔt Pita dinay bak. I nɔ tu te igen, di pipul dɛn we bin tinap de tɛl Pita se, “Yu na wan pan dis man in lanin bɔy dɛn, fɔ tru, bikɔs na Galili yusɛf kɔmɔt.”
Bɔt Pita bigin kɔs ɛn swɛ. I se, “A nɔ no dis man we una de tɔk bɔt!”
Wantɛm, fɔl kro sɛkɛn tɛm. Pita mɛmba wetin Jizɔs bin tɛl am. Jizɔs bin tɔk se, “Yu go se yu nɔ no mi tri tɛm bifo fɔl kro tu tɛm.” Pita bɔs kray.

Wɛn do klin, di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, di ɔda Ju bigman dɛn, di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn, ɛn ɔl di ɔda mɛmba dɛn na di Ju gran kot go ɛng ed. Dɛn mek dɛn tay Jizɔs ɛn kɛr am go bifo Paylet.
Paylet aks Jizɔs se, “Na yu na di Ju pipul dɛn king?” Jizɔs ansa se, “Na so yu se!”
Di bigman dɛn we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin tɔk se Jizɔs du plɛnti bad tin,
so Paylet aks Jizɔs igen se, “Yu nɔ gɛt natin fɔ se? Yɛri ɔl wetin dɛn tɔk se yu du!”
Bɔt Jizɔs nɔ gri fɔ tɔk ɛni tin, so Paylet wɔnda.
Wɛn di Pasova ɔlide kam, Paylet kin pul wan pɔsin we di Ju pipul dɛn want, kɔmɔt na jel.
Dis tɛm ya, wan man we nem Bara bas bin de na jel wit sɔm ɔda pipul we dɛn ɔl bin mek plɛnti pipul fɛt na di kɔntri ɛn kil pɔsin.
Plɛnti pipul go mit Paylet ɛn tɛl am mek i du lɛkɛ aw i kin du da Ju ɔlide de.
Paylet aks dɛn se, “Una want fɔ mek a fri di Ju pipul dɛn king?”
I bin no se di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin and Jizɔs oba gi am bikɔs dɛn jɛlɔs Jizɔs.
Dɛn tɛl di pipul dɛn fɔ tɛl Paylet se, na Bara bas i fɔ pul kɔmɔt na jel.
Paylet aks dɛn se, “Wɛl, wetin a fɔ du di man we una de kɔl di Ju pipul dɛn king?”
Dɛn ala big wan se, “Nel am pan di krɔs!”
Paylet se, “Wetin du? Wetin i du we bad?” Na da tɛm de dɛn ala big big wan pas aw dɛn bin ala fɔs, se, “Nel am pan di krɔs!”
So fɔ mek di pipul dɛn gladi, Paylet fri Barabas. I mek di soja man dɛn bit Jizɔs, dɔn i lɛf am gi dɛn fɔ mek dɛn nel am pan di krɔs.
Di soja man dɛn kɛr Jizɔs go insay Paylet in os, dɔn dɛn gɛda di ɔda soja man dɛn.
Dɛn drɛs Jizɔs wit dak rɛd klos, dɛn mek krawn wit chu kchuk ɛn wɛr am na in ed.
Dɔn dɛn bigin fɔ makata am ɛn se, “Mek di Ju pipul dɛn King gɛt lɔng layf!”
Dɛn bit am wit tik na in ed, dɛn pit pan am, dɔn dɛn nil dɔng bifo am lɛkɛ se dɛn de wɔship am.
Wɛn dɛn dɔn makata am dɔn, dɛn pul di dak rɛd klos kɔmɔt pan am, ɛn wɛr in yon klos pan am bak; dɔn dɛn kɛr am go fɔ go nel am pan di krɔs.

We dɛn de go, dɛn mit wan man we nem Saymɔn we bin kɔmɔt na wan vilej de go na di tɔng. Saymɔn na bin Alɛgza nda ɛn Rufɔs dɛn papa. I bin bɔn na Sayrini. Di soja man dɛn fos am fɔ tot di krɔs fɔ Jizɔs.
Dɛn kɛr Jizɔs go na wan ples we dɛn kɔl Gɔlgɔta, dat min “Ples we tan lɛkɛ mɔta lman ed.”
Dɛn miks wayn wit wan bita mɛrɛsin we nem ma, ɛn gi Jizɔs fɔ drink, bɔt i nɔ drink am.
Dɛn nel Jizɔs pan di krɔs, dɔn dɛn ib days fɔ sheb in klos dɛn.
Na bin nayn oklɔk mɔnin dɛn nel Jizɔs pan di krɔs.
Dɛn rayt di tin we mek dɛn kil am ɛn nel am oba Jizɔs in ed. Dɛn rayt “Di Ju Pipul Dɛn King.”
Da sem tɛm de dɛn nel tu tifman pan tu krɔs, wan na Jizɔs in raytan, wan na in lɛfan. [
So di tin we dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk we se, “Pipul dɛn min se insɛf na wikɛd man,” kam bi tru.]
Di pipul dɛn we bin de pas bin de shek dɛn ed ɛn ala pan Jizɔs. Dɛn se, “A min yu bin se yu go brok Gɔd in Os, ɛn yu go tek tri de fɔ bil am bak.
Wɛl, sev yusɛf naw, kɔmɔt na di krɔs, kam dɔng!”
Semwe so, dɛn bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn bigin jok bɔt Jizɔs to dɛnsɛf. Dɛn se, “I bin de sev ɔda pipul, bɔt i nɔ ebul sev insɛf!
Mek di Mɛsaya, we na di Ju pipul dɛn king kɔmɔt na di krɔs kam dɔng, so dat wi go si ɛn biliv pan am!” Di tu ɔda pipul dɛn we bin nel pan dɛn krɔs klos Jizɔs, dɛnsɛf tɔk bad bɔt Jizɔs.
Frɔm twɛlv oklɔk te tri oklɔk santɛm, di wan ol kɔntri dak.
Shap tri, Jizɔs ala, i se, “Ilay, Ilay, lama saba ktani?” dat min, “Mi Gɔd, mi Gɔd, wetin du yu fɔsek mi?”
Wɛn sɔm pan di pipul dɛn we bin tinap klos de yɛri wetin Jizɔs se, dɛn se, “I de kɔl Ila yja fɔ kam ɛp am.”
Wan pan dɛn rɔn go sok spɔnj wit viniga ɛn tay di spɔnj pan lɔng tik, dɔn i es di tik fɔ mek Jizɔs sɔk di spɔnj. Di pɔsin se, “Una lɛ wi si if Ila yja go kam pul am kɔmɔt na di krɔs!”
Jizɔs ala big wan, dɛn i day.
Di tik tik kɔtin we bin ɛng na Gɔd in Os chɛr tu, frɔm ɔp sote kam dɔng.
Wɛn di ami ɔfisa we bin tinap bifo di krɔs si se Jizɔs dɔn day, i se, “Dis man ya na bin Gɔd in Pikin, fɔ tru!”
Sɔm uman dɛn bin tinap fawe de luk. Sɔm pan di wan dɛn we bin lib de na Meri we kɔmɔt Magdala, Meri we na smɔl Jems ɛn in brɔda Josis dɛn mama, ɛn Salomi.
Wɛn Jizɔs bin de na Galili na dɛn uman ya bin de fala am go ɔlɔbɔt ɛn na dɛn bin de ɛp am. Plɛnti ɔda uman dɛn we bin fala Jizɔs kam na Jerusɛlɛm bin lib de.

Di tɛm bin dɔn rich fɔ di Ju pipul dɛn fɔ rɛdi fɔ di de fɔ pre ɛn blo. So ivintɛm, Josɛf we kɔmɔt na wan tɔng we nem Ari ma tia, nɔ fred fɔ go aks Paylet fɔ gi am Jizɔs in bɔdi. Josɛf na bin bigman na di Ju gran kot ɛn di pipul dɛn bin rɛspɛkt am; insɛf bin de luk fɔ di tɛm we Gɔd go kam rul di wɔl.
Paylet wɔnda if Jizɔs dɔn day kwik wan so, so i kɔl di soja ami ɔfisa ɛn aks am if i dɔn te we Jizɔs day.
Wɛn di ami ɔfisa tɛl am se Jizɔs dɔn day, Paylet gi Josɛf di bɔdi.
Josɛf go bay nyu linin klos, i pul Jizɔs in bɔdi pan di krɔs ɛn rap am, dɛn i go bɛr am insay wan ston grev we dɛn bin dig; dɔn i tek big ston kɔba di grev domɔt.
Meri we kɔmɔt Magdala ɛn Meri we na Josis in mama bin de luk usay dɛn de bɛr Jizɔs.
Wɛn di de fɔ pre ɛn blo pas, Meri we kɔmɔt Magdala, Meri we na Jems in mama, ɛn Salomi, bay spays we gɛt fayn sɛnt ɛn kɛr am go fɔ rɔb pan Jizɔs in bɔdi.
Ali Sɔnde mɔnin bifo san kɔmɔt, dɛn tri uman ya go na di ston grev.
Dɛn se, “Udat go pul di ston we dɛn tek kɔba di grev domɔt fɔ wi?”
(Na bin big big ston.) Bɔt wɛn dɛn luk di grev, dɛn si se di ston we dɛn bin tek kɔba di grev domɔt dɔn rol kɔmɔt de.
Wɛn dɛn de go insay di grev, dɛn si wan yɔng man we wɛr lɔng wayt klos, i bin sidɔm na di raytan say. Di uman dɛn fred!
Di man se, “Una nɔ fred! Na Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt, we dɛn bin nel pan di krɔs una kam luk fɔ. I nɔ de ya, i dɔn rayz frɔm di grev. Una luk di ples we dɛn bin le am.
Una go tɛl Pita ɛn di ɔda lanin bɔy dɛn se, ‘I dɔn go bifo una na Galili, una go mit am de, lɛkɛ aw i bin dɔn tɛl una fɔ du.’ ”
Di uman dɛn kɔmɔt na di grev ɛn rɔn go to di lanin bɔy dɛn; na so dɛn bin de tri mbul, bikɔs dɛn bin de fred. Di fred we dɛn bin de fred mek dɛn nɔn nɔ ebul tɔk sɛf we dɛn de go. [
Di uman dɛn go to Pita ɛn in kɔmpin dɛn ɛn tɛl dɛn ɔl wetin di yɔng man tɛl dɛn, dɛn nɔ tek lɔng fɔ du dat.
Afta dat, Jizɔs sɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn go ɔlɔbɔt na wɔl fɔ tɛl pipul di mɛsej bɔt aw Gɔd go sev dɛn, dat na di mɛsej we go de sote go ɛn we Gɔd insɛf sɛn kam na wɔl.
Dɛn nɔ biliv Meri wɛn i tɛl dɛn se Jizɔs dɔn gɛt layf bak ɛn in dɔn si am.
Wɛn dat pas, tu man dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs bin de go na wan vilej, na de Jizɔs sho insɛf difrɛn we to dɛn frɔm aw i bin sho insɛf to Meri.
Di tu man dɛn tɔn bak go tɛl dɛn kɔmpin wetin bi, bɔt dɛn nɔ biliv wetin dɛn tɛl dɛn.

Wɛn dat dɔn, Jizɔs sho insɛf to in ilɛvin lanin bɔy dɛn wɛn dɛn bin de it. I tɔk pan dɛn fɔ we dɛn nɔ bin biliv lɛkɛ aw dɛn fɔ biliv, ɛn fɔ we dɛn bin tra nga yes, ɛn we dɛn nɔ bin biliv dɛn pipul we si am afta i rayz frɔm di grev.
Jizɔs se, “Una go ɔlɔbɔt na di wɔl ɛn tɛl ɔlman di Gud Nyus bɔt mi.
Ɛnibɔdi we biliv di Gud Nyus ɛn gri fɔ mek dɛn baptayz am, Gɔd go sev am. Bɔt ɛnibɔdi we nɔ biliv di Gud Nyus, Gɔd go kɔndɛm am.
Dɛn pipul we biliv di Gud Nyus, a go gi dɛn pawa fɔ du wɔnda ful wok: dɛn go drɛb dɛbul fɔseka mi; dɛn go tɔk langwej we dɛn nɔ lan;
if dɛn ol snek ɔ if dɛn drink pɔyzin sɛf, natin nɔ go du dɛn; dɛn go put dɛn an pan pipul we sik ɛn pre fɔ dɛn, ɛn di pipul dɛn go wɛl.”
Wɛn Masta Jizɔs dɔn tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn, Gɔd tek am go ɔp na ɛvin, i go sidɔm na Gɔd in raytan.
Di lanin bɔy dɛn go ɔlɔbɔt na wɔl de tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus, ɛn di Masta bin de ɛp dɛn, ɛn mek dɛn du plɛnti wɔnda ful wok we fɔ mek pipul no se na tru dɛn de tɔk.]
Ɔna re bul Tio filɔs, yu no se plɛnti pipul dɔn bigin rayt ɔl dɛn wɔnda ful tin we dɔn bi naya.
Ɛn ɔl wetin dɛn de rayt na dɛn sem tin we dɛn pipul we bin de we dɛn tin ya fɔs bigin apin, ɛn we bin de tɔk Gɔd in wɔd, tɛl wi.
So, we misɛf dɔn tek tɛm luk insay ɔl dɛn tin ya we bi, a mekɔp fɔ rayt dɛn ɔl dɔng fɔ yu, sa, wan bay wan lɛkɛ aw dɛn apin,
fɔ mek yu no aw ɔl dɛn tin we yu dɔn yɛri bɔt, apin fɔ tru.
Da tɛm we Ɛrɔd na bin King na Judia, wan man we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin bin de. I bin nem Zaka raya; i bin de wok ɔnda Abija. In wɛf bin nem Ili zabɛt, i bin fambul to Erɔn.
Zaka raya ɛn Ili zabɛt bin de waka tret wit Gɔd. Dɛn bin de kip ɔl di Ju Lɔ ɛn dɛn bin de du ɔl wetin Gɔd tɛl dɛn fɔ du.
Dɛn bin dɔn ol ɛn Ili zabɛt na uman we nɔ bin de bɔn, so dɛn nɔ bin gɛt pikin.
Wan tɛm we na dɛn man we de na Abija in grup bin de wok na Gɔd in Os, Zaka raya bin de du in wok.

Wɛn dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin kin want pik di wan we go go insay insay Gɔd in Os go bɔn insɛns, dɛn kin rayt ɔlman nem dɔng, fol di pepa dɛn ɛn pik wan; dis tɛm ya na Zaka raya in nem kɔmɔt fɔ du da wok de.
Ɔl di pipul dɛn bin de na do de pre we Zaka raya de bɔn di insɛns.
Wantɛm, Zaka raya si enjɛl bifo am na di raytan say na di ples, we i de bɔn di insɛns.
We Zaka raya si di enjɛl, i wɔnda ɛn in at kɔt.
Di enjɛl se, “Zaka raya, nɔ fred! Gɔd dɔn yɛri ɛn i dɔn ansa di pre we yu de pre; yu wɛf Ili zabɛt go bɔn bɔy pikin; di nem we yu fɔ gi am na Jɔn.
Yu go gladi bad wɛn da pikin de bɔn ɛn plɛnti ɔda pipul go gladi!
Da pikin de go bi bigman pan Gɔd we na wi Masta in biznɛs. I nɔ fɔ drink wayn ɔ ɛni tin we de mek pɔsin drɔnk frɔm di de we i bɔn. Gɔd in Spirit go de insay am frɔm di tɛm we i de na in mama bɛlɛ.
I go mek plɛnti Izrɛl pipul kam bak to Gɔd we na dɛn Masta.

I go gɛt Gɔd in Spirit ɛn pawa lɛkɛ Ila yja, da prɔfɛt we bin de lɔntɛm. I go waka na di rod we Gɔd sho am ɛn yus in pawa fɔ mek dɛn dadi lɛk dɛn pikin; ɛn fɔ mek dɛn pipul we nɔ de du wetin Gɔd want bigin mɛmba Gɔd ɛn du wetin i want; i go mek di Masta in pipul dɛn rɛdi fɔ am.”
Zaka raya aks di enjɛl se, “Aw a go no se dɛn tin ya go bi, fɔ tru? Mi dɔn ol, ɛn mi wɛf insɛf na ol ol uman.”
Di enjɛl ansa se, “A nem Gebrɛl. Na mi tinap bifo Gɔd de sav am ɛn i sɛn mi fɔ kam tɛl yu dis gud nyus.
Dis tin we a tɛl yu so go bi, wɛn di rayt tɛm kam. Bɔt bikɔs yu nɔ biliv wetin a tɛl yu, yu go mumu sote ɔl wetin a tɛl yu dɔn bi.”
Ɔl da tɛm de, di pipul dɛn na do bin de wet Zaka raya ɛn dɛn bin de wɔnda wetin mek i te so insay Gɔd in Os.
Wɛn i kam na do, i nɔ bin ebul fɔ tɔk to di pipul dɛn, na dat dɛn tek no se i si sɔntin insay Gɔd in Os. I nɔ ebul tɔk wan wɔd sɛf, i bin jɛs de mek sayn wit in an.
Wɛn in yon tɛm fɔ wok na Gɔd in Os dɔn, Zaka raya go na in os.
Afta sɔm tɛm, in wɛf, Ili zabɛt gɛt bɛlɛ; wɛn i gɛt di bɛlɛ i ayd insay os fayv mɔnt.
I se, “Na Gɔd sɔri fɔ mi mek a gɛt bɛlɛ so, i dɔn pul mi kɔmɔt pan shem bifo mɔta lman.”

We Ili zabɛt in bɛlɛ dɔn siks mɔnt, Gɔd sɛn enjɛl Gebrɛl na wan tɔng we dɛn kɔl Nazarɛt we de na Galili fɔ kɛr mɛsej to wan yɔng uman we nem Meri. Meri na bin uman we nɔ no man yet. Wan man we nem Josɛf, we bin de na King Devid in fambul layn bin dɔn put stɔp fɔ am.
Wɛn di enjɛl go na Meri in os, i se, “Meri, kushɛ, o! Gɔd dɔn blɛs yu ɛn i de wit yu!”
Bɔt di wɔd we di enjɛl tɔk mek Meri in at wɔri, ɛn i bigin wɔnda wetin dat min.
Na in di enjɛl se, “Meri, nɔ fred, Gɔd dɔn blɛs yu.
Yu go gɛt bɛlɛ ɛn yu go bɔn bɔy pikin, ɛn yu fɔ kɔl di pikin, Jizɔs.
I go bi impɔtant pas ɔlman, dɛn i go kɔl am Gɔd we pas ɔl, in Pikin. Gɔd we na wi Masta go mek i rul oba di Izrɛl pipul dɛn lɛkɛ Devid we na wan pan in gra npapa-papa dɛn.
I go rul oba Jekɔb in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn sote go; i nɔ go tap fɔ rul!”
Na de Meri aks di ɛnjel wan kwɛshɔn. I se, “A nɔ no man yet. Aw dat go bi?”
Di enjɛl ansa am se, “Gɔd in Spirit go kam pan yu, Gɔd we pas ɔl in pawa go kɔba yu. Na dat mek pipul go kɔl di pikin we Gɔd go sɛn we yu go bɔn, Gɔd in Pikin.
Ɛn mek a tɛl yu sɔntin igen, yu fambul we nem Ili zabɛt, we dɔn ol, we se in nɔ go bɔn, dɔn gɛt siks mɔnt bɛlɛ naw.
Natin nɔ de we Gɔd nɔ ebul du!”
Wɛn Meri yɛri dat, i tɛl di enjɛl se, “Mi na Gɔd in savant, mek ɔl wetin yu dɔn tɔk se go bi to mi, bi.” Dɔn di enjɛl lɛf am go.
I nɔ tu te afta dat, Meri rɛdi ɛn go kwik na wan tɔng we de ɔp dɛn il we de na di kɔntri we nem Judia.
I go na Zaka raya in os ɛn tɛl Ili zabɛt adu.
Wɛn Ili zabɛt yɛri Meri in vɔys, di pikin we de na Ili zabɛt in bɛlɛ jomp. Gɔd in Spirit kam insay Ili zabɛt,
so i tɔk lawd wan to Meri. I se, “Yu na di uman we Gɔd dɔn blɛs pas ɔl dɛn ɔda uman ɛn di pikin we yu go bɔn gɛt wɔnda ful blɛsin!
Udat na mi we mi Masta in mama fɔ kam fɛn mi?
As a yɛri yu vɔys so, di pikin we de insay mi bɛlɛ jomp bikɔs i gladi.
Meri, Gɔd dɔn blɛs yu bikɔs yu biliv se Gɔd go du wetin i tɛl yu se in go du.”
Meri se, “Insay mi at a de sing se Gɔd we na wi Masta, big.
Gɔd we sev mi dɔn mek mi at gladi.
I dɔn mɛmba po uman lɛkɛ mi, we na in savant. Frɔm naw sote go ɔlman go de tɔk se mi na uman we gɛt blɛsin,
bikɔs Gɔd we gɛt pawa oba ɔltin dɔn du big wok fɔ mi. Gɔd oli, i nɔ gɛt bɔt at ɔl;
frɔm tɛm, i de sɔri fɔ ɔl dɛn wan we rɛspɛkt am.
I dɔn sho se in gɛt pawa, i dɔn kɔnfyus dɛn wan we prawd ɛn mek dɛn rɔnawe ɛn pwɛl ɔl wetin dɛn bin mekɔp fɔ du.
I pul dɛn wan we gɛt pawa kɔmɔt na di ples we dɛn de rul ɛn mek dɛn po pipul rul na dɛn ples.
I dɔn gi dɛn po pipul plɛnti tin we go mek dɛn satisfay, bɔt i dɔn sɛn dɛn jɛntri wan go, i nɔ gi dɛn natin.
I dɔn ɛp wi, di Izrɛl pipul dɛn, we de sav am, bikɔs i mɛmba se in bin dɔn prɔmis wi granpapa-papa dɛn,
Ebraam ɛn in granpikin-pikin dɛn se in go sɔri fɔ dɛn sote go!”
Meri de wit Ili zabɛt lɛkɛ tri mɔnt so bifo i go bak na in os.
Wɛn di tɛm kam fɔ mek Ili zabɛt bɔn, i bɔn bɔy pikin.
In neba dɛn ɛn in fambul dɛn yɛri se Gɔd dɔn sɔri fɔ Ili zabɛt ɛn ɔlman gladi wit am.
Di de we mek et afta di pikin bɔn, dɛn ɔl kam to Ili zabɛt dɛn; na da de de dɛn bin kam gɛda de fɔ sakɔmsayz di pikin. Dɛn bin want mek dɛn kɔl di pikin Zaka raya lɛkɛ in papa.
Bɔt Ili zabɛt se, “Una nɔ kɔl am Zaka raya, in nem fɔ bi Jɔn.”
Wɛn Ili zabɛt tɔk dat, di pipul dɛn se, “Nɔbɔdi nɔ de pan una fam bul we nem Jɔn!”
Dɛn mek sayn to di papa fɔ aks am wetin di pikin in nem fɔ bi.
Zaka raya mek sayn to dɛn fɔ aks fɔ sɔntin fɔ rayt pan, i rayt se, “In nem fɔ bi Jɔn!” Dɛn ɔl wɔnda!
As Zaka raya rayt dɔn so, in vɔys kam bak ɛn in tɔng lus ɛn i bigin fɔ tɔk klia wan. I bigin fɔ prez Gɔd.
Ɔl di pipul dɛn we yɛri Zaka raya de tɔk, fred. Pipul bigin tɔk bɔt ɔl wetin bi ɔlsay na Judia.
Ɔlman we yɛri bɔt di tin we bi, bigin tɔk na dɛn at se, “Uskayn pikin dis? Wetin i go bi bambay?” Gɔd in pawa bin de pan am.
Gɔd in Spirit kam insay Zaka raya we na Jɔn in papa, ɛn i bigin fɔ tɔk ɔl wetin go bi.
I se: “Lɛ wi prez wi Masta we na di Izrɛl pipul dɛn Gɔd, bikɔs i dɔn kam to in pipul dɛn fɔ fri dɛn.
I dɔn sɛn pɔsin we gɛt pawa we go sev wi ɛn dis pɔsin ya kɔmɔt na Devid in fambul layn.
Gɔd in prɔfɛt dɛn bin dɔn tɔk lɔntɛm se
dis pɔsin go pul wi na dɛn wan we de fɛt wi dɛn an, ɛn i nɔ go mek dɛn pipul we nɔ lɛk wi ebul wi.
So Gɔd stil de sɔri fɔ wi lɛkɛ aw i tɛl wi granpapa-papa dɛn se in go du ɛn i stil mɛmba di agrimɛnt we insɛf sɛf mek wit dɛn,
dat na we i prɔmis Ebraam ɛn tek oth se
in go pul wi na dɛn wan we nɔ lɛk wi, dɛn an, so wi nɔ go fred fɔ sav am,
wi go bi Gɔd in pipul dɛn ɛn wi go waka tret bifo am ɔl di tɛm we wi de na dis wɔl.
Yu, mi pikin, dɛn go kɔl yu Gɔd we pas ɔl, in prɔfɛt. Na yu go mek pipul rɛdi fɔ di tɛm we di Masta go kam;
yu go sho pipul aw dɛn go du, mek Gɔd go padin dɛn sin, mek dɛn sev.
Gɔd dɔn sɔri fɔ wi; i go mek di ali mɔnin san kam pan wi.
Da san de go shayn pan dɛn pipul we de na dak ɛn we want day, ɛn i go mek wi gɛt kol at.”
As di pikin de gro, na so i de kam klos Gɔd mɔ ɛn mɔ. I bin tap na di dɛzat sote di tɛm kam fɔ sho insɛf to pipul na Izrɛl.
Dɛn tɛm de, Ɔgɔstɔs we na bin di king na Rom sɛn tɔk ɔlɔbɔt se ɔlman we de na Roman kɔntri mɔs go mek dɛn rayt dɛn nem dɔng na rɛji sta.
Dis na bin di fɔs tɛm we ɔlman fɔ go put dɛn nem dɔng na rɛji sta. Da tɛm de, na wan man we nem Kwi rinyɔs na bin gɔvna na Sirya.
So ɔlman go na dɛn yon tɔng fɔ mek dɛn rayt dɛn nem dɔng na rɛji sta.
We Josɛf bin de na King Devid in fambul layn, i kɔmɔt Nazarɛt we de na Galili, go na Bɛtliɛm we de na Judia, di ples we King Devid bin bɔn.
Wɛn Josɛf de go, i kɛr Meri we i bin dɔn put stɔp fɔ go wit am fɔ mek insɛf go put in nem dɔng na rɛjista. Meri bin gɛt bɛlɛ da tɛm de.
Wɛn dɛn de na Bɛtliɛm, na in di tɛm rich fɔ mek Meri bɔn.
Meri bɔn in fɔs pikin we na bin bɔbɔ. I rap di pikin wit plɛnti pisis, ɛn le am pan di gras we dɛn bin kɔt fɔ dɛn ship ɛn dɛn got fɔ it, bikɔs ples nɔ bin de fɔ am insay di os we dɛn bin tap.
Na da sem pat de, sɔm shɛpad dɛn bin sidɔm de wach dɛn ship, na bin nɛt.
Dɛn si enjɛl we Gɔd, we na wi Masta, sɛn, tinap bifo dɛn. Na so ɔl di ples bin de shayn brayt wit Gɔd in layt, so dɛn bigin fred bad bad wan.
Di enjɛl se, “Una nɔ fred! A bring gud nyus fɔ una we go mek pipul gladi bad ɛn ɔl di Izrɛl pipul dɛn go gladi.
Tide na da tɔng we Devid bin bɔn, dɛn dɔn bɔn Wan Pikin we go sev una. Na di Mɛsaya we na wi Masta.
Di tin we go mek una no am, na in dis: una go mit dɛn rap di bebi wit pisis ɛn dɛn le am pan gras we dɛn kɔt fɔ dɛn ship ɛn got fɔ it.”
Wantɛm, aw di enjɛl tɔk dɔn so, na in dɛn si plɛnti plɛnti enjɛl de prez Gɔd, dɛn de sing se,
“Lɛ ɔlman prez ɛn ɔna Gɔd we de ɔp ɔp na ɛvin, mek ɔl mɔtalman we mek Gɔd gladi, gɛt kol at!”
Wɛn di enjɛl dɛn go bak na ɛvin, na in dɛn shɛpad bigin tɔk to dɛn kɔmpin, dɛn se, “Una lɛ wi go Bɛtliɛm go si dis tin we dɔn bi, we Gɔd dɔn mek wi no bɔt.”
So dɛn waka kwik kwik go Bɛtliɛm. Dɛn mit Meri ɛn Josɛf ɛn dɛn si di lili pikin we ledɔm na di gras we dɛn put fɔ dɛn ship ɛn got.
Wɛn dɛn si di pikin, dɛn tɔk ɔl wetin di enjɛl bin dɔn tɛl dɛn bɔt am.
Ɔlman we yɛri wetin dɛn tɔk, wɔnda.
Bɔt Meri nɔ se natin, i kip ɔl dɛn tin ya na in at ɛn i kin de tink bɔt dɛn ɔltɛm.
Wɛn di shɛpad dɛn bin de tɔn bak, dɛn bin de tɛl Gɔd tɛnki, dɛn bin de sing ɛn prez am fɔ ɔl wetin dɛn bin jɛs yɛri ɛn si. Ɔltin bin bi jɛs lɛkɛ aw di enjɛl bin dɔn tɛl dɛn.
Di de we mek et afta Jizɔs bɔn, dɛn sakɔmsayz am, ɛn nem am Jizɔs. Na bin di nem dat we di enjɛl bin gi am bifo in mama gɛt in bɛlɛ.

Wɛn di tɛm rich fɔ mek Josɛf ɛn Meri go na Gɔd in Os fɔ du dɛn tin we go mek dɛn klin na Gɔd in yay lɛkɛ aw di Lɔ we Gɔd gi Mozis se, dɛn kɛr di pikin go na Gɔd in Os na Jerusɛlɛm ɛn aks Gɔd fɔ blɛs am.
Na so Gɔd in lɔ se, “Ɔl fɔs bɔy pikin fɔ du Gɔd wok.”
Pantap dat, Josɛf ɛn Meri kɛr tu dɔv ɔ tu pijin pikin go gi di man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin fɔ mek sakri fays to Gɔd, bikɔs Gɔd in lɔ tɔk igen se fɔ sakri fays tu dɔv ɔ tu pijin pikin.

Da tɛm de, wan man bin de na Jerusɛlɛm we bin nem Simyɔn. Dis man ya bin lɛk Gɔd ɛn i bin de waka tret ɛn de du ɔl wetin Gɔd want. I bin de wet fɔ di tɛm we Gɔd go sɔri fɔ di Izrɛl pipul dɛn ɛn pul dɛn kɔmɔt pan waala. Gɔd in Spirit bin de insay am,
ɛn i bin dɔn tɛl am se i nɔ go day sote i si di Mɛsaya we Gɔd we na wi Masta go sɛn.
Da sem de de, di Spirit tɛl Simyɔn mek i grap ɛn go tret na Gɔd in Os. I nɔ tu te, Meri ɛn Josɛf kɛr Jizɔs go insay Gɔd in Os fɔ du dɛn tin we Gɔd in lɔ se.
Simyɔn tot di pikin ɛn bigin prez ɛn tɛl Gɔd tɛnki. I se:
“Gɔd, we na wi Masta, yu dɔn du wetin yu bin prɔmis mi, we na yu savant, so a kin day naw wit kol at.
A dɔn si di pɔsin insɛf we go sev ɔlman na wɔl.
Yu dɔn pik am ɛn mek ɔlman si am.
Na in na di layt we go mek dɛn wan we nɔ no yu na dis wɔl, no yu; i go mek yu pipul dɛn na Izrɛl gɛt plɛnti ɔna.”
Ɔl wetin Simyɔn tɔk bɔt Jizɔs mek in mama ɛn in papa dɛn wɔnda.

Simyɔn blɛs dɛn tri, dɔn i tɔk to Meri, i se, “Gɔd dɔn pik dis pikin ya ɛn sɛn am kam, ɛn di kam we i kam go mek plɛnti Izrɛl pipul lɛf fɔ biliv Gɔd ɛn mek plɛnti biliv am. Gɔd sɛn Jizɔs fɔ sho wi wetin Gɔd want, bɔt plɛnti pipul go tɔk se dɛn nɔ de fɔ am,
ɛn ɔda pipul go no wetin dɛn pipul de bin de tink we nɔbɔdi nɔ bin no. Meri, yusɛf at go blid wɛn ɔl dɛn tin ya bi.”

Wan uman prɔfɛt bin de we in papa na bin Fanyuɛl, na bin wan pan Asha in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn; Ana na bin ol ol uman we in man bin dɔn day. Frɔm di tɛm we i mared, in ɛn in man de sɛvin ia nɔmɔ bifo in man day. Frɔm di tɛm we in man day, i de te i ol eti-fo. De ɛn nɛt Ana bin de na Gɔd in Os de pre ɛn fast.
Insɛf kam na Gɔd in Os di sem tɛm we dɛn bring Jizɔs to Gɔd. I tɛl Gɔd tɛnki. I tɔk bɔt di Pikin to ɔl dɛn wan we bin de wet fɔ mek Gɔd fri di pipul dɛn na Jerusɛlɛm.
Wɛn Meri ɛn Josɛf dɔn du ɔltin we Gɔd in lɔ se, dɛn tɔn bak go na dɛn tɔng, dat na Nazarɛt we de na Galili.
Wɛn di pikin dɔn big ɛn i dɔn ebul tink, i bin gɛt plɛnti sɛns ɛn Gɔd bin blɛs am.
Ɛvri ia Jizɔs in mama ɛn papa kin go na Jerusɛlɛm wɛn di tɛm rich fɔ wan Ju ɔlide we nem Pasova.
Wɛn Jizɔs bin dɔn ol twɛlv ia, i fala in mama ɛn papa dɛn go Jerusɛlɛm fɔ di Pasova lɛkɛ aw dɛn kin du.
Wɛn di ɔlide dɔn, Meri ɛn Josɛf bin de tɔn bak go Nazarɛt, bɔt Jizɔs nɔ bin kɔmɔt Jerusɛlɛm yet. In mama ɛn papa nɔ bin no.
Dɛn bin min se Jizɔs de wit di ɔda pipul dɛn. Wɛn dɛn dɔn waka ol de, dɛn nɔ si am, dɛn bigin luk fɔ am to dɛn fambul ɛn dɛn pipul we dɛn no.
Bɔt dɛn nɔ si am; so dɛn tɔn bak go Jerusɛlɛm go luk fɔ am.
Di de we mek tri na in dɛn rich Jerusɛlɛm. Dɛn mit Jizɔs sidɔm na Gɔd in Os midul dɛn big Ju Lɔ ticha. Jizɔs bin de lisin wetin dɛn de tɔk ɛn insɛf bin de aks dɛn bɔt plɛnti tin.
Di we we i bin de ansa kwɛshɔn ɛn di sɛns we i bin gɛt bin mek ɔl di pipul dɛn wɔnda.
Wɛn in mama ɛn in papa si am, dɛn wɔnda. Na de in mama se, “Mi pikin, wetin mek yu du wi so? Mi ɛn yu papa bin de luk fɔ yu ɛn wi bin de wɔri we wi nɔ si yu.”
Jizɔs se, “Wetin mek una bin de luk fɔ mi? Una nɔ no se a fɔ de na mi Papa in Os?”
Bɔt dɛn nɔ bin ɔnda stand wetin i min.
Jizɔs go Nazarɛt bak wit in mama ɛn papa ɛn i yɛri dɛn wɔd. In mama kip ɔl dɛn tin ya we bi na in at.
As Jizɔs de big, na so i bin de gɛt mɔ ɛn mɔ sɛns. Gɔd bin lɛk am; ɛn mɔta lman bin lɛk am.

Di ia we mek fiftin we di king na Rom we nem King Taybiryɔs bin dɔn de na pawa, Pɔnchɔs Paylet na bin gɔvna na Judia ɛn Ɛrɔd bin de rul na Galili. Ɛrɔd in brɔda we nem Filip bin de rul na Itu riya ɛn Tra ko na ytis. Laysenyɔs bin de rul na Abi lini.
Anas ɛn Kaye fas dɛn na bin di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin. Da sem tɛm de, Gɔd gi Jɔn we na Zaka raya in pikin in mɛsej fɔ tɛl pipul. Wɛn dat bi, Jɔn bin tap na di dɛzat.
Jɔn bigin waka go ɔlsay na dɛn ples we de klos Riva Jɔdan de tɛl pipul se, if dɛn lɛf fɔ du bad ɛn mek i baptayz dɛn, Gɔd go padin dɛn fɔ di bad we dɛn de du.
Jɔn du jɛs lɛkɛ wetin di prɔfɛt we nem Ayzaya bin rayt na in buk, we i se: “Sɔmbɔdi de tɔk lawd na di dɛzat se, ‘Una klia di rod we di Masta go pas ɛn mek di rod tret fɔ am fɔ waka.
Ɔl dɛn vali go ful kam ɔp te dɛn lɛvul, ɔl dɛn ay il ɛn smɔl il go tɔn flat grɔn. Dɛn bɛn rod go tret, dɛn stonston rod go lɛbul.
Ɔlman na wɔl go si aw Gɔd de sev in pipul dɛn.’ ”
Plɛnti pipul kam to Jɔn fɔ mek i baptayz dɛn. Jɔn tɔk pan dɛn, i se, “Una dɛn snek ya, we de pɔyzin di wɔl, udat tɛl una fɔ rɔn kɔmɔt pan di trɔbul ɛn waala we Gɔd want bring fɔ pɔnish una?

Una fɔ lɛf fɔ du dɛn tin we nɔ rayt na Gɔd yay ɛn du dɛn tin we go sho se una dɔn lɛf fɔ du dɛn. Una lɛf fɔ se, ‘Wi na Ebraam in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn.’ Dat nɔ go sev una. A de tɛl una se Gɔd ebul fɔ tek pan dɛn ston ya ɛn tɔn dɛn to Ebraam in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn.
Di aks we fɔ tek kɔt di tik dɛn rut dɔn rɛdi naw; ɔl dɛn tik we nɔ de bia gud tin fɔ it, dɛn go kɔt dɛn ɛn trowe dɛn na faya.”
Di pipul dɛn se, “Wetin wi fɔ du naw?”
Jɔn ansa dɛn se, “Ɛnibɔdi we gɛt tu klos, fɔ gi pɔsin we nɔ gɛt, wan. Semwe so, pɔsin we gɛt tin fɔ it, fɔ sheb am wit in kɔmpin we nɔ gɛt.”
Sɔm pan dɛn pipul we de gɛda taks dɛnsɛf kam fɔ mek Jɔn baptayz dɛn. Dɛn aks Jɔn se, “Wetin wi fɔ du, sa, fɔ sho se wi dɔn lɛf fɔ du bad?”
Jɔn ansa dɛn se, “Una nɔ fɔ tek pas wetin di Roman gɔvmɛnt tɛl una fɔ tek.”

Dɛn soja man dɛnsɛf se, “We wi, wetin wi fɔ du, sa?” Jɔn ansa se, “Una nɔ fɔ fɛt pipul tek dɛn kɔpɔ, una nɔ fɔ lay pan pipul fɔ mek una gɛt mɔni. Una fɔ sati sfay wit di mɔni we dɛn pipul we una de wok fɔ de pe una.”
Ɔlman bin de wet fɔ mek di Mɛsaya kam ɛn dɛn bin de wɔnda if Jɔn na di Mɛsaya.
Jɔn se, “A de baptayz wit wata nɔmɔ, bɔt pɔsin we gɛt pawa pas mi de kam. A nɔ fit sɛf fɔ lus in sus. I go baptayz una wit Gɔd in Spirit ɛn wit faya.
I ol tin lɛkɛ lɔng fɔk na in an fɔ tek pul di cha fchaf kɔmɔt pan di wit. I go gɛda in wit put am na sto, bɔt i go bɔn di cha fchaf na faya we nɔ de tap fɔ bɔn.”
Jɔn lan dɛn plɛnti ɔda tin ɛn tɛl dɛn bɔt Jizɔs.
Jɔn bin tɔk pan Ɛrɔd we bin de rul Galili bikɔs i bin mared Ɛro dias, we na bin in brɔda wɛf, ɛn fɔ ɔl di plɛnti bad tin dɛn we i bin de du.
Pantap ɔl dɛn ɔda bad tin we Ɛrɔd bin de du, i mek dɛn ol Jɔn ɛn put am na jel!
Wɛn Jɔn bin dɔn baptayz ɔl di pipul dɛn dɔn, na in i baptayz Jizɔs insɛf. Wɛn Jizɔs bin de pre, ɛvin opin
ɛn Gɔd in Spirit tek dɔv shep kam dɔng pan am ɛn dɛn yɛri vɔys we kɔmɔt na ɛvin de tɔk se, “Yu na mi yon Pikin we a lɛk ɛn a gladi fɔ yu!”
Jizɔs bin dɔn ol lɛkɛ tati ia so we i bigin fɔ du di wok we Gɔd sɛn am fɔ du na dis wɔl. Pipul bin tink se Josɛf na bin Jizɔs in papa. Josɛf in papa bin nem Ilay, Ilay in papa bin nem Matat,
Matat in papa bin nem Livay, Livay in papa bin nem Mɛlkay, Mɛlkay in papa bin nem Jana, Jana in papa bin nem Josɛf,
Josɛf in papa bin nem Mata ta yas, Mata ta yas in papa bin nem Emɔs, Emɔs in papa bin nem Neɔm, Neɔm in papa bin nem Ɛslay, Ɛslay in papa bin nem Nagay,
Nagay in papa bin nem Meat, Meat in papa bin nem Mata ta yas, Mata ta yas in papa bin nem Sɛmɛin, Sɛmɛin in papa bin nem Josɛk, Josɛk in papa bin nem Joda,
Joda in papa bin nem Joe nan, Joe nan in papa bin nem Resa, Resa in papa bin nem Zɛru babɛl, Zɛru babɛl in papa bin nem Shiɛltiɛl, Shiɛltiɛl in papa bin nem Niray,
Niray in papa bin nem Mɛlkay, Mɛlkay in papa bin nem Aday, Aday in papa bin nem Kosam, Kosam in papa bin nem Ɛlmo dam, Ɛlmo dam in papa bin nem Ir,
Ir in papa bin nem Jɔshwa, Jɔshwa in papa bin nem Ɛlie zir, Ɛlie zir in papa bin nem Jorim, Jorim in papa bin nem Matat, Matat in papa bin nem Livay,
Livay in papa bin nem Simyɔn, Simyɔn in papa bin nem Juda, Juda in papa bin nem Josɛf, Josɛf in papa bin nem Jonam, Jonam in papa bin nem Ɛla ya kim,
Ɛla ya kim in papa bin nem Milɛa, Milɛa in papa bin nem Mina, Mina in papa bin nem Matata, Matata in papa bin nem Netan, Netan in papa bin nem Devid,
Devid in papa bin nem bin Jɛsi, Jɛsi in papa bin nem Obɛd, Obɛd in papa bin nem Boaz, Boaz in papa bin nem Salmɔn, Salmɔn in papa bin nem Nashɔn,
Nashɔn in papa bin nem Ami na dab, Ami na dab in papa bin nem Admin, Admin in papa bin nem Ani, Ani in papa bin nem Ɛzrɔn, Ɛzrɔn in papa bin nem Pɛrɛz, Pɛrɛz in papa bin nem Juda,
Juda in papa bin nem Jekɔb, Jekɔb in papa bin nem Ayzik, Ayzik in papa bin nem Ebraam, Ebraam in papa bin nem Tɛra, Tɛra in papa bin nem Naɔ,
Naɔ in papa bin nem Serug, Serug in papa bin nem Ru, Ru in papa bin nem Peleg, Peleg in papa bin nem Ibɔ, Ibɔ in papa bin nem Shila,
Shila in papa bin nem Kea ynan, Kea ynan in papa bin nem Afa ksad, Afa ksad in papa bin nem Shɛm, Shɛm in papa bin nem Noa, Noa in papa bin nem Lamɛk,
Lamɛk in papa bin nem Metusɛla, Metusɛla in papa bin nem Inɔk, Inɔk in papa bin nem Jerɛd, Jerɛd in papa bin nem Maa la lil, Maa la lil in papa bin nem Kea ynan,
Kea ynan in papa bin nem Inɔsh, Inɔsh in papa bin nem Sɛth, Sɛth in papa bin nem Adam, Adam in papa na Gɔd.
Wɛn Jizɔs kɔmɔt insay Riva Jɔdan, Gɔd in Spirit bin de insay am, di Spirit kɛr am go na di dɛzat we de na Judia ɛn i de wit am fɔti de, ɔl di tɛm we
Setan bin de tray fɔ mek Jizɔs du bad. Jizɔs bin angri bad we i dɔn de fɔti de, i nɔ it natin.
Setan tɛl am se, “If yu na Gɔd in Pikin, mek dis ston ya tɔn bred.”
Jizɔs ansa am se, “Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se nɔto tin fɔ it nɔmɔ de mek pɔsin liv.”
Setan kɛr Jizɔs go ɔp wan ay il ɛn sho am ɔl dɛn kɔntri na di wɔl, i nɔ te lɔng sɛf.
I se, “A go gi yu di rayt fɔ rul oba ɔl dɛn kɔntri ya ɛn mek yu ɛnjɔy ɔl dɛn gud tin we lib de we de mek pipul gladi. Dɛn tin ya dɔn kam na mi an naw ɛn a go pas am gi ɛnibɔdi we a lɛk.
A go gi yu ɔl dɛn tin ya if yu go se mi na yu masta.”
Jizɔs se, “Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, ‘Pɔsin fɔ nil dɔng bifo Gɔd we na in Masta nɔmɔ ɛn pre to am, ɛn na in wan gren i fɔ wok fɔ.’ ”
Setan kɛr Jizɔs go Jerusɛlɛm ɛn mek i tinap pantap di tawa we de na Gɔd in Os. I tɛl Jizɔs se, “If yu na Gɔd in Pikin, ib yusɛf dɔng.
Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, ‘Gɔd go mek in enjɛl dɛn gyad yu fɔ mek natin nɔ du yu,’
ɛn igen, ‘Yu go fɔdɔm insay dɛn an fɔ mek yu fut sɛf nɔ wund pan ston.’ ”
Jizɔs ansa am se, “Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, ‘Pɔsin nɔ fɔ tray fɔ mek Gɔd we na in Masta du wetin in want.’ ”
Wɛn Setan dɔn tray fɔ mek Jizɔs du bad ɔl kayn we, ɛn i nɔ ebul, i lɛf Jizɔs lili bit fɔs.
Jizɔs tɔn bak go Galili wit di pawa we Gɔd in Spirit gi am. Ɔlman bigin tɔk bɔt am ɔlsay na dɛn tɔng ɛn dɛn vilej we de klos Galili.
Jizɔs bin de lan di pipul dɛn na di Ju mitin os ɛn dɛn ɔl prez am.
Jizɔs go Nazarɛt. Na di tɔng dat we i de frɔm we i lili te i big. Wɛn di de fɔ pre ɛn blo, kam, i go na di Ju mitin os lɛkɛ aw i bin dɔn yus fɔ du. I tinap fɔ rid Gɔd in Buk to di pipul dɛn.
Dɛn gi am Ayzaya we na bin prɔfɛt in buk fɔ rid. Jizɔs opin di buk na di ples we Ayzaya rayt se:

“Gɔd in Spirit de wit mi, bikɔs Gɔd dɔn pik mi fɔ mek a tɛl dɛn po pipul di Gud Nyus. I sɛn mi fɔ mek a tɛl dɛn slev se dɛn go fri ɛn dɛn blɛnyay pipul se dɛn go si. I sɛn mi fɔ fri dɛn wan we de lɛkɛ slev,
ɛn fɔ mek a tɛl ɔlman se di tɛm dɔn kam we Gɔd go sev in pipul dɛn.”
Jizɔs lɔk di buk ɛn gi di man we de luk di ples; dɛn i sidɔm. Ɔlman we bin de na di Ju mitin os bin de luk Jizɔs gud, dɛn bin de lisin to am.
I se, “Dis pat pan Gɔd in Buk we a rid, dɔn bi, fɔ tru, tide, jɛs lɛkɛ aw una dɔn yɛri.”
Dɛn ɔl tɔk gud bɔt Jizɔs ɛn di fayn fayn wɔd dɛn we i tɔk mek dɛn wɔnda. Dɛn se, “Nɔto Josɛf in pikin dis?”
Jizɔs se, “A shɔ se una go pul pare bul pan mi se, ‘Dɔkta, mɛn yusɛf!’ Una go want tɛl mi se mek a du ɔl dɛn wɔnda ful wok we una yɛri se a du na Kepanyɔm, na mi yon tɔng.”
Jizɔs se, “A de tɛl una se prɔfɛt nɔ gɛt rɛspɛkt na di tɔng we i bɔn.”
“Una lisin mi; di tɛm we Ila yja bin de na Izrɛl, ren nɔ kam fɔ tri ia ɛn siks mɔnt ɛn bad angri bin de na di kɔntri, ɛn plɛnti uman we dɛn man bin dɔn day bin de na Izrɛl.
Gɔd nɔ sɛn Ila yja to ɛni wan pan dɛn uman ya, pas to Zare fat we bin de na Saydɔn.
Da tɛm we Ila ysha bin de na Izrɛl, plɛnti pipul we bin gɛt bad sik na dɛn skin bin de na Izrɛl, bɔt nɔto dɛn ɔl i mɛn, na Neman nɔmɔ we kɔmɔt Sirya, i mɛn.”
Wɛn di pipul dɛn we bin de na di Ju mitin os yɛri dat, dɛn ɔl vɛks.
Dɛn grap ɛn drɛb Jizɔs kɔmɔt na di tɔng. Dɛn drɔ am go ɔp ɔp di il we dɛn tɔng bin de pan ɛn dɛn bin want push am mek i fɔdɔm go dɔng di il.
Bɔt Jizɔs pas midul dɛn ɛn go.
Jizɔs go Kepanyɔm we de na Galili. I bin de lan di pipul dɛn di de fɔ pre ɛn blo.
Ɔl di pipul dɛn wɔnda bikɔs Jizɔs bin de lan dɛn lɛkɛ pɔsin we gɛt di rayt fɔ lan pipul dɛn tin ya.
Wan man bin tap na di Ju mitin os we bin gɛt dɛbul insay am. I ala big wan se,
“Jizɔs, we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt, us biznɛs yu gɛt wit wi? Yu kam ya fɔ kil wi? A no udat na yu, a no se yu kɔmɔt to Gɔd ɛn yu dɔn gi Gɔd yu layf fɔ tru.”
Jizɔs tɔk pan di dɛbul. I se, “Lɛf fɔ tɔk ɛn kɔmɔt insay dis man!” Di dɛbul ib di man na grɔn bifo di pipul dɛn ɛn kɔmɔt insay am, bɔt i nɔ du di man natin.
Dɛn ɔl wɔnda ɛn bigin tɔk se, “Uskayn wɔd dɛn wan ya? Dis man de tɔk lɛkɛ pɔsin we gɛt di rayt ɛn pawa fɔ tɛl di dɛbul dɛn wetin dɛn fɔ du ɛn dɛn de kɔmɔt wantɛm!”
Pipul bigin tɔk ɔlɔbɔt na dɛn tɔng ɛn dɛn vilej we de klos da eria de bɔt di wɔnda ful wok we Jizɔs du.
Jizɔs kɔmɔt na di Ju mitin os, i go na Saymɔn in os. Saymɔn in mɔdɛnlɔ bin gɛt ay fiva. Dɛn beg Jizɔs fɔ mɛn di sik uman.
Jizɔs go tinap klos di bed ɛn tɛl di fiva mek i kɔmɔt pan di uman. Di fiva kɔmɔt pan am ɛn di uman grap wantɛm ɛn go fɛn sɔntin fɔ dɛn fɔ it.
Da sem de de, ivintɛm, dɛn bin bring pipul we bin gɛt ɔl kayn sik kam to Jizɔs. I le in an pan ɔl di sik pipul dɛn ed, wan bay wan, ɛn dɛn ɔl wɛl.
Dɛbul dɛn bin kɔmɔt pan plɛnti pipul ɛn ala se, “Fɔ tru, yu na Gɔd in Pikin.” Jizɔs tɔk pan di dɛbul dɛn fɔ mek dɛn sɛt mɔt ɛn i nɔ gri mek dɛn tɔk natin, bikɔs dɛn bin no se in na di Mɛsaya.
Wɛn do klin, Jizɔs kɔmɔt na di tɔng go na wan ples we pipul nɔ de. Di pipul dɛn we i bin de wit bigin luk fɔ am ɔlɔbɔt. Wɛn dɛn si am, dɛn tɛl am mek i nɔ lɛf dɛn go igen.
Bɔt Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se in fɔ go na dɛn ɔda tɔng fɔ tɛl dɛn ɔda pipul di Gud Nyus bɔt Gɔd in rul bikɔs na dat Gɔd sɛn am fɔ kam du na wɔl.
Jizɔs bin de go na ɔl dɛn Ju mitin os, na Judia, de tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus.
Wan de, Jizɔs bin tinap nia di lek we dɛn kɔl Gɛnɛzarɛt. Di pipul dɛn bin de shub kam klos am fɔ yɛri Gɔd in wɔd we i bin de tɔk.
Jizɔs si tu bot klos di bich, bɔt di fisha man dɛn nɔ bin de insay, dɛn bin de was dɛn fishin nɛt na di bich.
Jizɔs go na Saymɔn Pita in bot ɛn tɛl am mek i mek di bot kɔmɔt klos di sho lili bit. Jizɔs sidɔm insay di bot ɛn bigin lan di pipul dɛn.
Wɛn i dɔn lan dɛn dɔn, i tɛl Saymɔn Pita se, mek dɛn go wit di bot na di dip say na di wata ɛn sɛn dɛn nɛt dɔng de mek dɛn go kech fish.
Saymɔn Pita se, “Masta, wi dɔn wok tra nga ol nɛt ɛn wi nɔ kech natin, bɔt as na so yu se, a go sɛn di nɛt.”
Dɛn sɛn di nɛt ɛn kech fish sote dɛn nɛt bin want chɛr,
so dɛn kɔl dɛn kɔmpin dɛn we bin de na di ɔda bot fɔ kam ɛp dɛn. Wɛn dɛn kam, dɛnsɛf ful dɛn bot. Ɔl tu di bot dɛn ful sote dɛn want sink.
Wɛn Saymɔn Pita si wetin bi, i butu bifo Jizɔs ɛn ol in fut. I se, “Masta, kɔmɔt klos mi bikɔs mi na man we de pan sin!”
Wɛn Saymɔn Pita ɛn in kɔmpin dɛn si aw di fish we dɛn kech plɛnti, dɛn wɔnda.
Jems ɛn Jɔn we na Zɛbidi in pikin dɛn we bin de wok wit Saymɔn, dɛnsɛf wɔnda. Jizɔs se, “Saymɔn, nɔ fred! Frɔm tide sote go, yu go bring pipul kam to mi lɛkɛ aw yu bin de kech fish.”
We dɛn dɔn drɔ dɛn bot kam na di bich, dɛn lɛf ɔltin we dɛn bin gɛt biɛn, ɛn fala Jizɔs.
Wan de, Jizɔs bin go na wan tɔng; i mit wan man we bin gɛt bad sik na in skin. Wɛn di man si Jizɔs, i fɔdɔm na grɔn ɛn beg am se, “Masta, if yu gri fɔ mɛn mi, yu ebul mɛn mi ɛn mek a klin.”
Jizɔs tret in an ɛn tɔch di man. I se, “A want mɛn yu. Wɛl naw!” Di bad sik kɔmɔt pan di man in skin wantɛm.
Jizɔs se, “Nɔ tɛl ɛnibɔdi se a dɔn mɛn yu! Go wantɛm to di man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin mek i luk yu ɛn mek di sakri fays we Mozis bin tɛl pipul fɔ mek. Dat go mek ɔlman no se yu dɔn wɛl.”
Ɔlman yɛri ɔl wetin Jizɔs de du. Plɛnti pipul kam fɔ yɛri Jizɔs ɛn fɔ mek i mɛn dɛn.
Bɔt plɛnti tɛm Jizɔs kin lɛf di pipul dɛn go fawe fɔ pre.
Wan de we Jizɔs bin de lan di pipul dɛn, sɔm dɛn Faresi ɛn sɔm dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha bin sidɔm de; dɛn bin kɔmɔt ɔlɔbɔt na Galili, Judia, ɛn Jerusɛlɛm. Gɔd in pawa bin de pan Jizɔs fɔ mɛn sik pipul.
Sɔm pipul tot wan man we para layz na mata. Dɛn kɛr am go na di os we Jizɔs bin de fɔ le am na grɔn bifo Jizɔs.

Dɛn bin want go insay di os wit di man, bɔt pipul bin plɛnti na di os, so di pipul dɛn nɔ bin ebul kɛr di sik man go insay. Dɛn klem pantap di os wit di sik man. Dɛn pul wan pat pan di ruf, dɔn dɛn sɛn di man go dɔng to Jizɔs midul di pipul dɛn.
Wɛn Jizɔs si se di pipul dɛn we bring di sik man biliv se in go mɛn di man, Jizɔs tɛl di sik man se, “Padi, Gɔd dɔn padin yu sin dɛn.”
Di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn ɛn di Faresi dɛn bigin grɔmbul se, “Udat na dis man we de pwɛl Gɔd in nem we i de mek insɛf lɛkɛ Gɔd? Nɔbɔdi nɔ de we ebul padin pɔsin in sin; na Gɔd wan gren ebul du dat!”
Jizɔs bin no wetin dɛn de tink, so i se, “Wetin mek una de tink se wetin a du nɔ rayt?
Pan dɛn tu tin ya, uswan tra nga fɔ tɔk pas ɔl, ‘Gɔd dɔn padin yu sin dɛn,’ ɔ ‘Grap, tek yu mata, waka go na yu os?’
A go sho una se Mɔta lman Pikin gɛt pawa na dis wɔl fɔ padin pɔsin sin.” So Jizɔs tɔk to di man we para layz. I se, “Grap, tek yu mata ɛn go na yu os.”
Aw ɔlman de luk, di man grap wantɛm, kapu in mata ɛn bigin waka go na in os, de prez Gɔd.
Ɔlman wɔnda, dɛn fred, so dɛnsɛf bigin fɔ prez Gɔd. Dɛn se, “Wi dɔn si wɔnda tide!”
We Jizɔs dɔn mɛn di man, i go na do. Na de i si wan man we de gɛda taks; i bin nem Livay. I bin sidɔm na in ɔfis. Jizɔs tɛl am mek i kam fala am.
Livay grap, i lɛf ɔltin ɛn fala Jizɔs.
Livay mek dɛn kuk big it na in os fɔ Jizɔs. Plɛnti pipul we bin de gɛda taks ɛn sɔm ɔda pipul dɛn bin de na di os ɛn dɛn ɔl bin sidɔm de it.

Sɔm Faresi ɛn sɔm pan dɛn yon Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn bigin grɔmbul pan Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn. Dɛn se, “Wetin mek una de it ɛn drink wit dɛn pipul we de gɛda taks ɛn dɛn ɔda pipul we nɔ fit fɔ miks wit Ju pipul?”
Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Nɔto dɛn pipul we wɛl gɛt fɔ go to dɔkta, na dɛn pipul we sik.
A nɔ kam fɔ tɛl dɛn pipul we de du wetin di Lɔ we Gɔd gi Mozis se fɔ chenj dɛn layf, a kam fɔ tɛl dɛn wan we de pan sin fɔ mek dɛn chenj dɛn layf.”
Sɔm pipul go tɔk to Jizɔs. Dɛn se, “Jɔn in lanin bɔy dɛn de kip fast ɛn pre ɔltɛm, ɛn na so di Faresi dɛn lanin bɔy dɛn de du, bɔt yu yon dɛn jɛs de it ɛn drink.”
Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Wɛn una kɔl pipul kam na mared pati, una go tɛl dɛn mek dɛn nɔ it di tɛm we di ɔkɔ de wit dɛn?
Di tɛm de kam we pipul go kɛr di ɔkɔ go ɛn i nɔ go de wit dɛn igen; na da tɛm de dɛn go fast.”

Jizɔs pul wan pare bul. I se: “Nɔbɔdi nɔ de tek pisis we i chɛr kɔmɔt pan nyu klos fɔ pach ol klos; if i du so, i go mek ol pan di nyu klos we go pwɛl am, ɛn pantap dat, di ol klos go luk bad pas aw i bin tan, bikɔs di pisis we i chɛr kɔmɔt pan di nyu klos nɔ go bi di sem lɛkɛ di ol wan.
Nɔbɔdi nɔ go tek ol tin we dɛn tek bif kanda mek lɛkɛ bɔtul, put nyu wayn insay, if i du dat, di nyu wayn go bɔs di bif kanda ɛn di wayn go wes.
Dɛn fɔ put nyu wayn insay nyu bɔtul.
Wɛn pɔsin dɔn drink ol wayn, i nɔ go want drink nyu wayn. I go se, ‘Di ol wan bɛtɛ!’ ”
Wan de we di Ju dɛn kin pre ɛn blo, Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn bin de pas midul wan kɔn fam. Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn brok sɔm pan di kɔn, pul dɛn kanda, ɛn it dɛn.
Sɔm pan di Faresi dɛn se, “Wetin mek una de du tin we di Ju Lɔ se wi nɔ fɔ du di de fɔ pre ɛn blo?”
Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Una nɔ rid wetin King Devid bin du wɛn in ɛn dɛn wan we bin de wit am bin angri?

I go insay Gɔd in Os, tek di bred we dɛn bin put bifo Gɔd, it am ɛn gi dɛn wan we bin de wit am sɔm fɔ it, pan ɔl we di Ju Lɔ se nɔbɔdi nɔ fɔ it da bred de pas dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin.”
Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Mɔta lman Pikin na Masta fɔ di de fɔ pre ɛn blo.”
Wan ɔda de fɔ pre ɛn blo, Jizɔs go insay wan Ju mitin os ɛn lan di pipul dɛn. Wan man bin lib de we in raytan bin day.
Sɔm dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha ɛn dɛn Faresi bin de wach Jizɔs fɔ si if i go mɛn di man di de fɔ pre ɛn blo, so dat dɛn kin blem am na kot.
Bɔt Jizɔs bin no wetin dɛn de mekɔp, so i tɛl di man we in an day se, “Kam, tinap naya!” Di man grap, go tinap midul di ples.
Jizɔs se, “Mek a aks una sɔntin. Wetin wi Lɔ want wi fɔ du di de fɔ pre ɛn blo? Fɔ du gud ɔ fɔ du bad? Fɔ sev layf ɔ fɔ kil?”
Jizɔs luk dɛn insay dɛn yay wan bay wan, dɛn i tɛl di man we in an day se, “Es yu an, tret am!” Di man du wetin Jizɔs tɛl am ɛn di an we bin day wɛl lɛkɛ di ɔda an.
Di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn ɛn di Faresi dɛn vɛks bad ɛn bigin tɛl dɛn kɔmpin wetin dɛn go du Jizɔs fɔ kech am.
Wan ɔda tɛm, Jizɔs bin go ɔp wan il fɔ pre. I pre ol nɛt to Gɔd.
Wɛn do klin, Jizɔs kɔl in lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn pik twɛlv pan dɛn we i kɔl apɔsul.
I pik: Saymɔn (we i gi nem Pita) ɛn in brɔda Andru; Jems ɛn Jɔn, Filip ɛn Bata lo myu,
Matyu ɛn Tɔmɔs, Jems we na bin Alfiɔs in pikin, ɛn Saymɔn we bin de fɛt fɔ fri in pipul dɛn,
Judas we na bin Jems in pikin, ɛn Judas Iskariɔt we sɛl Jizɔs.

Wɛn Jizɔs kɔmɔt ɔp di il kam dɔng wit in apɔsul dɛn, i go tinap na di lɛvul grɔn wit plɛnti in ɔda lanin bɔy dɛn. Plɛnti pipul bin kam gɛda de, sɔm pan dɛn pipul ya bin kɔmɔt Judia, sɔm bin kɔmɔt Jerusɛlɛm, ɛn sɔm bin kɔmɔt na dɛn tɔng we de klos di wata na Taya ɛn Saydɔn.
Dɛn bin kam fɔ yɛri Gɔd in wɔd ɛn fɔ mek Jizɔs mɛn dɛn. Jizɔs mɛn dɛn wan we dɛbul bin de insay.
Ɔl di pipul dɛn bin de tray fɔ tɔch Jizɔs bikɔs pawa bin de kɔmɔt pan am we mɛn dɛn ɔl.
Jizɔs luk in lanin bɔy dɛn, dɛn i bigin tɔk to dɛn. I se: “Una gɛt blɛsin, una dɛn po pipul, bikɔs Gɔd de rul una!
“Una gɛt blɛsin, una we angri naw, bikɔs una go gɛt ɔl wetin una fɔ gɛt! “Una gɛt blɛsin, una we de kray naw, bikɔs wan de una go laf!
“Una gɛt blɛsin wɛn mɔta lman nɔ lɛk una ɛn dɛn nɔ want gɛt ɛni tin fɔ du wit una, ɛn wɛn dɛn de kɔs una ɛn tɔk bad bɔt una, bikɔs una biliv Mɔta lman Pikin ɛn una de fala am!
Una fɔ gladi wɛn dat bi, una fɔ dans ɛn jomp bikɔs una go gɛt big pe we Gɔd dɔn kip fɔ una na ɛvin! Dɛn pipul we de du una dɛn tin ya, na so dɛn gra npapa-papa dɛn bin du di prɔfɛt dɛn.
“Bɔt waala go kam pan una we jɛntri naw, una dɔn gɛt ɔl di tin dɛn we dɔn mek una gladi!
“Waala go kam pan una we gɛt ɔl wetin una want naw, bikɔs tɛm de kam we una go angri! “Waala go kam pan una we de laf naw, bikɔs tɛm de kam we una go kray bita wan!
“Waala go kam pan una wɛn ɔlman de tɔk gud bɔt una; na so dɛn gra npapa-papa dɛn bin du di lay prɔfɛt dɛn.
“Bɔt a de tɛl una we de lisin mi se, una fɔ lɛk dɛn wan we de fɛt una ɛn una fɔ du gud to dɛn wan we nɔ lɛk una.
Una fɔ blɛs dɛn wan we de kɔs una ɛn pre fɔ dɛn wan we de trit una bad.
If ɛnibɔdi slap yu na wan jɔ, yu fɔ tɔn di ɔda wan gi am fɔ mek i slap insɛf. If ɛnibɔdi tek yu klos we yu wɛr pantap, yu fɔ gi am di wan we de bɔtɔm, mek i tek insɛf.
If ɛnibɔdi aks yu fɔ ɛni tin, yu fɔ gi am, ɛn if ɛnibɔdi tek tin we na yu yon, yu nɔ fɔ aks am fɔ gi yu bak.
Dɛn tin we una want mek ɔda pipul du to una, na in una fɔ du to dɛn.
“If na dɛn wan we lɛk una nɔmɔ una lɛk, una fɔ gɛt prez fɔ dat? Dɛn pipul we bad sɛf, lɛk dɛn wan we lɛk dɛn!
If una du gud to dɛn pipul nɔmɔ we de du una gud, wetin du una fɔ gɛt prez fɔ dat? Dɛn bad pipul sɛf de du dat.
If una de lɛn dɛn wan we una no se go pe una, wetin du una fɔ gɛt prez fɔ dat? Dɛn bad pipul sɛf de lɛn dɛn kɔmpin bikɔs dɛn abop se dɛn go gɛt wetin dɛn lɛn, bak!

Una fɔ lɛk dɛn wan we nɔ lɛk una ɛn du dɛn gud. Wɛn una de lɛn pɔsin sɔntin, una nɔ fɔ abop se i go gi una bak; da tɛm de una go gɛt big blɛsin fɔ dat ɛn una go bi Gɔd we pas ɔl, in pikin dɛn. Gɔd gud to pɔsin we nɔ de tɛl tɛnki ɛn to pɔsin we wikɛd.
Una fɔ sɔri fɔ pipul lɛkɛ aw una Papa Gɔd de sɔri fɔ ɔlman.
“Una nɔ jɔj ɔda pipul ɛn Gɔd insɛf nɔ go jɔj una. Una nɔ kɔndɛm ɔda pipul ɛn Gɔd insɛf nɔ go kɔndɛm una. Una padin ɔda pipul ɛn Gɔd insɛf go padin una.

Una gi ɛn Gɔd insɛf go gi una, ɛn dɛn tin we i gi una, go so plɛnti, i go jɛs tan lɛkɛ wɛn dɛn ful kitul wit sɔntin, dɛn prɛs am, dɛn shek am ɛn i rɔnoba. If una gi plɛnti, Gɔd go gi una plɛnti; if una nɔ gi plɛnti, Gɔd nɔ go gi una plɛnti.”
Jizɔs pul wan pare bul, i se: “Blɛnyay pɔsin nɔ go ebul sho in kɔmpin rod, dɛn ɔl tu go fɔdɔm insay gɔta.
Pɔsin we de lan nɔ pas di wan we de lan am, bɔt ɛnibɔdi we lan ɔl wetin i fɔ lan, gud, go sabi lɛkɛ di pɔsin we lan am.
“Wetin mek yu de si smɔl tik we fiba lɛkɛ di wan we de go insay pɔsin finga na yu kɔmpin in yay, bɔt yu nɔ de si da big tik we fiba bod we dɛn de tek bil os na yu yon yay?

Aw yu go tɛl yu kɔmpin se, ‘Padi, kam mek a pul da smɔl tik de na yu yay’ we yusɛf nɔ de si di big tik na yu yon yay? Yu ipo krit! Go pul di big tik we de na yu yon yay fɔs, so dat yu go ebul si klia wan fɔ pul di smɔl tik we de na yu kɔmpin in yay.
