“Gud tik nɔ de bia bad tin fɔ it ɛn tik we nɔ gud nɔ de bia gud tin fɔ it.
Yu go no if tik gud ɔ i nɔ gud bay di tin we i de bia. Pɔsin nɔ go pik fig pan tik we gɛt chu kchuk, ɛn pɔsin nɔ go pik greps pan bush we gɛt chu kchuk.
Gud pɔsin de du gud bikɔs gud de na in at ɛn bad pɔsin de du bad bikɔs na bad ful na in at. Wetin de na pɔsin in at, we i de mɛmba ɔltɛm, na in de kɔmɔt na in mɔt.
“Wetin mek una de kɔl mi ‘Masta, Masta,’ bɔt una nɔ de du wetin a tɛl una?
Ɛnibɔdi we kam to mi ɛn yɛri mi wɔd ɛn du wetin a tɛl am, tan lɛkɛ di pɔsin we a de kam tɛl una bɔt naw.

I tan lɛkɛ pɔsin we de bil os. I dig di grɔn go dɔng dɔng ɛn le di fawndeshɔn pan akpata bifo i bigin bil. Plɛnti plɛnti wata kam ɔp te i rich di os, agbara bɔs pan di os, bɔt natin nɔ du di os bikɔs dɛn bin bil di os gud.

Bɔt di pɔsin we yɛri mi wɔd ɛn i nɔ du wetin a tɛl am fɔ du, tan lɛkɛ wan man we bil in os, i nɔ le fawndeshɔn; i nɔ bɔda fɔ dig bifo i bigin bil. Wɛn plɛnti plɛnti wata kam ɔp te i rich di os ɛn agbara bɔs pan di os, di os fɔdɔm ɛn brok pata pata!”
Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn tɔk to di pipul dɛn dɔn, i go na Kepanyɔm.
Wan bigman we na bin ɔfisa na di Roman ami bin gɛt lɛkɛ wan ɔndrɛd soja man ɔnda am. In bɔy we i bin lɛk bad bin sik sote i want day.
Wɛn di Roman ɔfisa yɛri bɔt Jizɔs, i go mit sɔm Ju big man dɛn ɛn sɛn dɛn to Jizɔs fɔ lɛ dɛn beg am fɔ kam mɛn in bɔy.
Wɛn dɛn Ju bigman ya mit Jizɔs, dɛn bigin beg am, dɛn se, “Duya, wi beg, sa, kam mɛn dis ɔfisa in bɔy bikɔs na gud man.
I lɛk wi Ju pipul dɛn ɛn na insɛf bil wi Ju mitin os fɔ wi.”
Jizɔs fala dɛn go te i rich klos di Roman ɔfisa in os. Na in di ɔfisa sɛn in padi dɛn wit mɛsej fɔ Jizɔs; i se, “Masta, nɔ wɔri fɔ kam na mi os igen, bikɔs a nɔ fit fɔ mek yu kam insay mi os;
a nɔ fit fɔ go klos yu. If yu jɛs tɔk wan wɔd nɔmɔ, mi bɔy go wɛl.

Misɛf na pɔsin we gɛt bigman dɛn we gɛt pawa oba mi ɛn a gɛt soja man dɛn we de ɔnda mi. A kin tɛl wan se, ‘Go!’ ɛn i kin go; a kin tɛl ɔda wan se, ‘Kam!’ ɛn i kin kam; ɛn a kin tɛl mi bɔy se, ‘Du dis wok!’ ɛn i kin du am.”
Wɛn Jizɔs yɛri ɔl wetin di ɔfisa tɔk, i wɔnda. Na in i tɔn to di pipul dɛn we bin de fala am ɛn se, “A de tɛl una, a nɔ si pɔsin na Izrɛl wande we biliv Gɔd tra nga wan so lɛkɛ dis man.”
Wɛn di mɛse nja dɛn tɔn bak go na di Roman ɔfisa in os, dɛn mit di bɔy dɔn wɛl.
I nɔ te afta dat, Jizɔs go na wan tɔng we dɛn de kɔl Nen. Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn plɛnti ɔda pipul bin fala am go na di tɔng.

As dɛn rich na di get dɛn mit plɛnti pipul de go bɛr wan man. Di dayman in mama na uman we in man bin dɔn day ɛn na da wan gren bɔy pikin de i bin gɛt. Plɛnti pipul na di tɔng bin de fala di uman we gɛt di bɛrin.
Wɛn di Masta si di uman, i sɔri fɔ am, i se, “Nɔ kray ya!”
Wɛn Jizɔs tɔch di kɔfin, di man dɛn we bin tot di kɔfin tinap. Jizɔs tɛl di dedebɔdi se, “Bɔbɔ, grap!”
Di bɔbɔ we bin dɔn day grap sidɔm ɛn bigin tɔk. Jizɔs se, “Mami, luk yu pikin!”
Ɔl di pipul dɛn fred ɛn bigin prez Gɔd. Dɛn se, “Wi dɔn si prɔfɛt we gɛt pawa! Gɔd dɔn kam fɔ sev in pipul dɛn!”
Dis nyus bɔt Jizɔs prɛd ɔlsay na Judia ɛn dɛn kɔntri we de klos Judia.
Jɔn in lanin bɔy dɛn go tɛl Jɔn ɔl wetin bi.
Jɔn kɔl tu pan in yon lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn sɛn dɛn go to di Masta fɔ aks am if in na di pɔsin we in bin de tɔk se go kam ɔ if dɛn fɔ luk rod fɔ ɔda pɔsin.
Wɛn dɛn man ya kam to Jizɔs, dɛn se, “Jɔn we de baptayz sɛn wi fɔ aks yu if yu na di pɔsin we i bin de tɔk se go kam ɔ if wi fɔ luk rod fɔ ɔda pɔsin, sa?”
Da sem tɛm de, Jizɔs bin de mɛn plɛnti pipul; i mek dɛn wan we sik wɛl, i drɛb dɛbul kɔmɔt insay sɔm pipul, ɛn i mek plɛnti dɛn blɛnyay pipul si.

I tɛl Jɔn in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Una tɔn bak go tɛl Jɔn ɔl wetin unasɛf dɔn si ɛn wetin una dɔn yɛri; dɛn blɛnyay pipul de si, dɛn pipul we nɔ bin ebul waka, de waka, dɛn wan we gɛt bad sik na dɛn skin dɔn wɛl, dɛn dɛf pipul dɔn yɛri, dɛn dayman dɔn gɛt layf bak, ɛn dɛn po pipul dɔn yɛri di Gud Nyus.
Dɛn wan we nɔ de dawt mi gɛt blɛsin!”
Wɛn di mɛse nja dɛn we Jɔn sɛn tɔn bak, Jizɔs bigin fɔ tɛl di pipul dɛn bɔt Jɔn. I se, “Wɛn una bin go to Jɔn na di dɛzat, wetin una bin want si? Una bin want si gras we de tri mbul we briz de blo?
If nɔto dat, wetin una bin go fɛn? Na pɔsin we wɛr fayn klos? Nɔ; pipul we wɛr fayn klos we gɛt ɔl wetin dɛn want de na dɛn king os!
Una tɛl mi sɔntin, wetin una bin want si? Na prɔfɛt? Ɛn una si pɔsin we pas prɔfɛt fawe, fɔ tru.
Dɛn rayt bɔt Jɔn na Gɔd in Buk se, Gɔd se, ‘A go sɛn mi mɛse nja go bifo yu fɔ klia di rod rɛdi fɔ yu!’
A de tɛl una se Jɔn pas ɔl mɔta lman, bɔt di pɔsin we gɛt lili rɛspɛkt pas ɔl dɛn wan we Gɔd de rul, pas Jɔn!”
Wɛn ɔl di pipul dɛn ɛn dɛn pipul we de gɛda taks yɛri wetin Jɔn tɔk, dɛn gri se wetin Gɔd want, rayt, ɛn dɛn mek Jɔn baptayz dɛn.
Bɔt di Faresi dɛn ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn nɔ gri fɔ du wetin Gɔd tɛl dɛn fɔ du ɛn dɛn nɔ gri mek Jɔn baptayz dɛn.
Jizɔs se, “Wetin a go tek kɔmpia dɛn tide pipul ya? Aw dɛn tan?

Dɛn tide pipul ya tan lɛkɛ pikin dɛn we sidɔm na makit os de ple, ɛn ala kɔl dɛn kɔmpin ɛn tɛl dɛn se, ‘Wi dɔn bit drɔm fɔ una, bɔt una nɔ gri dans! Wi dɔn sing bɛrin sing fɔ una, bɔt una nɔ pul wata na una yay!’
Wɛn Jɔn we de baptayz bin kam, i bin de fast ɛn i nɔ bin de drink wayn, bɔt una se, ‘Jɔn gɛt dɛbul.’
Naw we Mɔta lman Pikin kam, i de it ɛn drink ɛn una se, ‘Luk da awangɔt ɛn drɔnk man! I mek padi wit dɛn pipul we de gɛda taks ɛn dɛn Ju pipul we nɔ de kip di Ju Lɔ aw dɛn fɔ kip am!’
Dɛn wan we de du wetin Gɔd tɛl dɛn fɔ du go sho se na Gɔd gɛt sɛns fɔ tru.”
Wan Faresi kɔl Jizɔs fɔ go it na in os. Jizɔs gri ɛn fala di Faresi go na in os.
Wan uman bin de na di tɔng we bin liv fri layf. Wɛn di uman yɛri se Jizɔs de it na di Faresi in os, i kɛr wan wayt ston bɔtul we bin ful wit fayn fayn dia sɛnt, go na di os.

Di uman go butu klos Jizɔs in fut ɛn bigin kray bita wan saful saful. Di wata we kɔmɔt na in yay sok Jizɔs in fut. I tek in ia wep Jizɔs in fut, dɔn i kis Jizɔs in fut fɔ sho se in rɛspɛkt am, dɔn i tek di sɛnt na di bɔtul ɛn rɔb ɔl na Jizɔs in fut.
Wɛn di Faresi we kɔl Jizɔs kam na in os fɔ kam it si wetin bi, i wɔnda, i tɔk na in at se, “If dis man na bin prɔfɛt, fɔ tru, i bin fɔ no uskayn uman de ol am so, bikɔs na uman we de pan fri layf.”
Jizɔs tɔk to di Faresi. I se, “Saymɔn, a gɛt sɔntin fɔ tɛl yu.” Di man ansa Jizɔs se, “Masta, wetin yu want tɛl mi, sa?”
Jizɔs se, “Wan man we bin de lɛn pipul kɔpɔ bin de; tu pipul bin gɛt fɔ pe am. Wan bin gɛt fɔ pe am fayv ɔndrɛd silva kɔpɔ ɛn di ɔda wan bin gɛt fɔ pe am fifti silva kɔpɔ.
Dɛn ɔl tu nɔ bin ebul fɔ pe am, so i lɛf di mɔni gi dɛn ɔl tu. Pan dɛn tu pipul ya, uswan go lɛk di man we bin lɛn dɛn mɔni pas in kɔmpin?”
Saymɔn ansa Jizɔs se, “A tink se na di man we i bin lɛn plɛnti kɔpɔ pas in kɔmpin.” Jizɔs se, “Yu rayt.”

Jizɔs luk to di uman in pat wɛn i stil de tɔk to Saymɔn. I se, “Yu si wetin dis uman de du fɔ mi, nɔto so? A kam na yu os, yu nɔ gi mi wata sɛf fɔ was mi fut, bɔt dis uman ya dɔn kray pan mi fut te dɛn dɔn sok ɛn na in ia i tek wep dɛn.
Wɛn a kam na yu os, yu nɔ kis mi sɛf, bɔt frɔm we a kam, dis uman jɛs de kis mi fut.
Yu nɔ rɔb gris sɛf na mi ed, bɔt dis uman dɔn rɔb fayn sɛnt pan mi fut.
A de tɛl yu se, di tin we dis uman du we sho se i lɛk mi bad pruv se Gɔd dɔn padin in plɛnti sin dɛn. Pɔsin we nɔ sin plɛnti, we Gɔd dɔn padin, nɔ go lɛk mi bɛtɛ.”
Jizɔs tɔn to di uman. I se, “Gɔd dɔn padin yu sin dɛn!”
Dɛn pipul we bin de it wit Jizɔs bigin tɔk se, “Uskayn man dis we de padin pɔsin fɔ in sin?”
Jizɔs se, “Uman, bikɔs yu biliv pan mi, Gɔd dɔn sev yu. Saful ya, go wit kol at!”
I nɔ tu te, Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn go na dɛn tɔng ɛn dɛn vilej go tɛl di pipul dɛn di Gud Nyus bɔt Gɔd in rul.
Sɔm uman dɛn bin de wit Jizɔs; na uman dɛn we Jizɔs bin dɔn mɛn, sɔm bin sik ɛn sɔm bin gɛt dɛbul. Sɔm pan dɛn uman ya na bin Meri we kɔmɔt Magdala, da uman we Jizɔs pul sɛvin dɛbul kɔmɔt pan;
Joana, we in man we nem Chuza, bin de wok fɔ Ɛrɔd; wit Suzana ɛn plɛnti ɔda uman dɛn we bin de pul pan wetin dɛn gɛt gi Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn.
Bɔku pipul kɔmɔt na ɔl dɛn tɔng fɔ kam yɛri Jizɔs. Na de Jizɔs pul wan pare bul, i se:
“Wan fama bin de plant sid. Wɛn i de skata di sid dɛn, sɔm fɔdɔm na di rod; pipul mas sɔm ɛn dɛn bɔd it sɔm.
Sɔm fɔdɔm pan sto nston. Dɛn bɔs ɛn bigin fɔ gro bɔt dɛn wida ɛn day bikɔs di grɔn nɔ bin gɛt wata.
Sɔm fɔdɔm pan chu kchuk bush. Di chu kchuk bush gro ɛn kɔba di tin we bɔs.
Sɔm sid fɔdɔm na gud grɔn, dɛn gro ɛn bia plɛnti plɛnti.” Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn pul dis pare bul dɔn, i se, “Udat gɛt yes fɔ yɛri, mek i yɛri.”
Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn aks am wetin di pare bul we i pul, min.
Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Gɔd dɔn gi una di chans fɔ no dɛn sikrit tin bɔt Gɔd in rul, bɔt fɔ dɛn ɔda pipul na pare bul a de pul, so dat dɛn go luk bɔt dɛn nɔ go si; dɛn go yɛri, bɔt dɛn nɔ go ɔnda stand.
“Na di pare bul in minin dis: Di sid dɛn na Gɔd in wɔd.
Dɛn sid we fɔdɔm na di rod na dɛn pipul we yɛri Gɔd in wɔd; Setan kam pul di wɔd kɔmɔt na dɛn at fɔ mek dɛn nɔ go biliv Gɔd we de sev dɛn.

Dɛn sid we fɔdɔm pan sto nston na dɛn pipul we yɛri Gɔd in wɔd; dɛn gladi ɛn biliv am, bɔt dɛn tan lɛkɛ tin we fɔ gro bɔt we nɔ gɛt rut; dɛn kin biliv fɔs, bɔt wɛn Setan tray dɛn lili bit nɔmɔ, dɛn nɔba biliv igen.
Dɛn wan we fɔdɔm pan chu kchuk bush na dɛn pipul we yɛri Gɔd in wɔd bɔt waala, jɛntri, ɛn ɛnjɔymɛnt na wɔl kil di wɔd na dɛn at ɛn mek dɛn nɔ ebul du plɛnti tin fɔ Gɔd.
Dɛn sid we fɔdɔm na gud grɔn na dɛn pipul we yɛri Gɔd in wɔd; dɛn kip di wɔd na dɛn at ɛn du wetin Gɔd in wɔd se. Dɛn nɔ tap fɔ biliv pan ɔl we Setan tray dɛn ɛn dɛn mek plɛnti ɔda pipul biliv.
“Nɔbɔdi nɔ de layt lamp ɛn kɔba am ɔ put am ɔnda tebul. I de put am pantap tebul fɔ mek ɔlman we de kam insay di os go si.
“Natin nɔ de we ayd we pɔsin nɔ go no bɔt ɛn natin nɔ de we pɔsin du na dak, we nɔ go kɔmɔt na layt.
“Una tek tɛm lisin. Ɛnibɔdi we gɛt sɔntin, Gɔd go gi am mɔ; bɔt pɔsin we nɔ gɛt, di lili bit sɛf we i tink se in gɛt, Gɔd go tek am.”
Jizɔs in mama ɛn in brɔda dɛn kam to am bɔt dɛn nɔ bin ebul go klos am bikɔs pipul bin plɛnti rawnd am.
Sɔmbɔdi tɛl Jizɔs se, “Yu mama ɛn yu brɔda dɛn de na do, dɛn want si yu.”
Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Na dɛn wan we yɛri Gɔd in wɔd ɛn du wetin i tɛl dɛn fɔ du, na dɛn na mi mama ɛn mi brɔda dɛn.”
Wan de, Jizɔs go insay wan bot wit in lanin bɔy dɛn. I tɛl dɛn mek dɛn krɔs di wata go oba say.
Wɛn di bot de go, Jizɔs bin de slip insay di bot. Wantɛm, big briz bigin blo we mek wata ful insay di bot te i want sink.

Na in di lanin bɔy dɛn go wek Jizɔs. Dɛn ala se, “Masta, Masta, na day wi de day so!” Jizɔs grap, i tɛl di big briz ɛn di swɛlin dɛn fɔ stɛdi; na de di briz tap fɔ blo wantɛm ɛn di swɛlin dɛn go dɔng.
Jizɔs aks in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Wetin mek una nɔ biliv pan Gɔd?” Ɔl di lanin bɔy dɛn wɔnda, dɛn fred, dɛn bigin tɔk saful se, “Uskayn man dis? I de tɛl briz ɛn wata wetin dɛn fɔ du ɛn dɛn de du am!”
Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn tek bot krɔs go oba na wan kɔntri we dɛn Gara zi nis pipul bin de. Dis kɔntri ya fesin Galili.
Wɛn dɛn rich de, wan man we kɔmɔt na di tɔng kam mit Jizɔs. Di man bin gɛt dɛbul insay am. I bin dɔn te we i nɔ wɛr klos. I nɔ bin de na os, na bɛri ngrɔn i bin de slip.
As di man si Jizɔs, i ala big wan ɛn fɔdɔm na Jizɔs in fut. I ala se, “Jizɔs, yu we na Gɔd we pas ɔl, in Pikin, wetin yu want du mi? A de beg yu, duya, nɔ mek a sɔfa!”

Di man tɔk so bikɔs Jizɔs bin dɔn tɛl di dɛbul we bin de insay am fɔ kɔmɔt insay am. Plɛnti tɛm di dɛbul kin fos di man fɔ rɔnawe go na ples we pipul nɔ de. Ilɛk aw dɛn tay in fut ɛn in an dɛn wit ayɛn chen ɛn gyad am, i kin kɔt di chen dɛn ɛn di dɛbul kin mek i rɔnawe.
Jizɔs aks am se, “Wetin na yu nem?” I ansa Jizɔs se, “A nem Plɛnti, Plɛnti Soja man;” i tɔk dat bikɔs plɛnti dɛbul bin de insay am.
Di dɛbul dɛn beg Jizɔs fɔ mek i nɔ drɛb dɛn go na di Big Ol.
Plɛnti ɔg dɛn bin de it na wan il, di dɛbul dɛn beg Jizɔs fɔ mek i sɛn dɛn go insay di ɔg dɛn; Jizɔs gri.
Di dɛbul dɛn kɔmɔt insay di man ɛn rɔn go insay di ɔg dɛn. Di ɔg dɛn tek spid rɔn dɔng di il go fɔdɔm insay di wata ɛn drawn.
Wɛn dɛn pipul we bin de mɛn di ɔg dɛn si wetin bi, dɛn rɔn go tɛl ɔlman na di kɔntri.
Plɛnti pipul rɔn go fɔ go luk. Dɛn mit di man we di dɛbul dɛn kɔmɔt insay sidɔm de lisin to Jizɔs. I wɛr klos ɛn i soba. We di pipul dɛn si dat, dɛn fred.
Dɛn pipul we bin de we Jizɔs de drɛb di dɛbul dɛn kɔmɔt insay di man, tɛl di ɔda wan dɛn aw Jizɔs drɛb di dɛbul dɛn.
Ɔl di pipul dɛn na Gara zi nis fred bad, so dɛn tɛl Jizɔs fɔ kɔmɔt na dɛn kɔntri. So Jizɔs go insay di bot ɛn go bak na di ples we i bin kɔmɔt.
Di man we Jizɔs mɛn beg fɔ fala Jizɔs go. Jizɔs nɔ gri fɔ mek i fala am go. I tɛl am mek
i go to in pipul dɛn ɛn tɛl dɛn wetin Gɔd dɔn du fɔ am. Di man go ɔlɔbɔt na di tɔng ɛn tɛl ɔlman wetin Jizɔs du fɔ am.
Wɛn Jizɔs rich na di ɔda say, di pipul dɛn kam mit am wit gladi. Dɛn ɔl bin dɔn de wet fɔ mek i kam.
Wan bigman na di Ju mitin os we nem Jayrɔs, kam fɔdɔm na Jizɔs in fut ɛn beg am fɔ fala am go na in os.
Jayrɔs in wan gren gyal pikin we bin ol twɛlv ia, bin dɔn de day. Jizɔs fala Jayrɔs go. Wɛn Jizɔs de go, plɛnti pipul bin de rawnd am, dɛn ɔl bin de go wit am.
Wan uman bin de na di krawd we bin de blid fɔ twɛlv ia ɛn nɔbɔdi nɔ bin ebul mɛn am.
Di uman go biɛn Jizɔs ɛn tɔch di bɔtɔm pat pan in klos. Wantɛm, wantɛm so, di blid we i de blid, tap.
Jizɔs aks di pipul dɛn se, “Udat tɔch mi klos?” Nɔbɔdi nɔ ansa am. Na in Pita tɔk se, “Masta, yusɛf si ɔl dɛn pipul ya we de klos yu de push, yu de aks u ol yu?”
Bɔt Jizɔs se, “Sɔmbɔdi tɔch mi klos. A no dat bikɔs pawa dɔn kɔmɔt pan mi!”
Di uman we tɔch Jizɔs si se Jizɔs no wetin i du. I bigin tri mbul ɛn kam fɔdɔm na Jizɔs in fut, ɛn tɔk bifo ɔlman wetin du i tɔch Jizɔs ɛn aw i wɛl as i tɔch Jizɔs so.
Jizɔs tɛl di uman se, “Mi pikin, bikɔs yu biliv, yu dɔn wɛl. Go naw wit kol at, ya!”
Wɛn Jizɔs bin de tɔk, Jayrɔs in bɔy kam mit Jayrɔs ɛn tɛl am se in pikin dɔn day so mek i nɔ wɔri Jizɔs igen.
We Jizɔs yɛri se di pikin dɔn day, i se, “Jayrɔs, nɔ fred, yu jɛs biliv nɔmɔ, yu pikin go grap bak!”
Wɛn dɛn rich na di os, Jizɔs nɔ gri fɔ mek ɔlman go insay; i kɔl Pita, Jɔn, Jems ɛn di pikin in mama ɛn in papa mek dɛn go insay di os wit am.
Ɔl di pipul dɛn na di os bin de kray lawd wan fɔ di pikin. Jizɔs se, “Una nɔ kray, di pikin nɔ day, i jɛs de slip.”
Di pipul dɛn laf Jizɔs bikɔs dɛn bin no se di pikin dɔn day.
Jizɔs ol di pikin in an ɛn se, “Mi pikin, grap!”
Wantɛm, wantɛm, layf kam insay di pikin bak ɛn i grap. Jizɔs tɛl dɛn fɔ gi di pikin it.
Di pikin in mama ɛn in papa wɔnda! Jizɔs tɛl dɛn mek dɛn nɔ tɛl ɛnibɔdi wetin bi.
Jizɔs kɔl in twɛlv lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn gi dɛn pawa fɔ drɛb dɛbul ɛn fɔ mɛn ɔl kayn sik.
I sɛn dɛn go ɔlsay fɔ tɔk bɔt Gɔd in rul ɛn fɔ mɛn sik pipul.
Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “We una de go so, una nɔ kɛr natin. Una nɔ kɛr wɔki nstik, bag, it, mɔni, ɛn ɔda klos.
Ɛni os we dɛn gi una fɔ tap, na de una fɔ de sote una kɔmɔt na da tɔng de.
If una go na ɛni tɔng we di pipul dɛn nɔ gri lisin to una, una kɔmɔt na da tɔng de, ɛn shek di dɔti we de ɔnda una fut fɔ mek dɛn no se dɛn dɔn du bad.”
Di lanin bɔy dɛn lɛf Jizɔs go ɔlɔbɔt na dɛn vilej de tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus ɛn mɛn sik pipul.
Wɛn Ɛrɔd we bin de rul na Galili yɛri ɔl wetin de bi, i kɔnfyus bikɔs pipul bin de tɔk se Jɔn we bin de baptayz we bin dɔn day, dɔn kam bak!
Sɔm pipul se na Ila yja kam bak, ɔda wan dɛn se sɔntɛm na wan pan dɛn lɔntɛm prɔfɛt kam bak.
Ɛrɔd se, “Amin a bin dɔn kil Jɔn, udat na dis pɔsin we a de yɛri bɔt so igen?” I tray fɔ si Jizɔs.
Wɛn Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn kam bak, dɛn tɛl am ɔl wetin dɛn du. Jizɔs kɛr dɛn go na wan tɔng we nem Bɛtsa yda fɔ mek dɛn go de to dɛnsɛf.
Wɛn di pipul dɛn yɛri se Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn de na Bɛtsa yda, dɛn go mit dɛn de. Jizɔs gladi fɔ si dɛn. I tɛl dɛn bɔt Gɔd in rul ɛn i mɛn dɛn pipul we sik.

Wɛn di ples dɔn de dak, Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn go mit am ɛn tɛl am se, “Masta, mek dɛn pipul ya go na dɛn vilej, ɛn dɛn fam we nɔ fa fɔ fɛn it ɛn ples fɔ slip bikɔs natin nɔ de naya fɔ it ɛn dis na ples we pipul nɔ tap.”
Jizɔs se, “Una gi dɛn it.” Dɛn ansa Jizɔs se, “Wi nɔ gɛt pas fayv bred ɛn tu fish. Aw wi go manej bay it fɔ ɔl dɛn pipul ya?”
Na fayv tawzin man dɛn bin lib de. Jizɔs tɛl in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Una mek di pipul dɛn sidɔm fifti fifti.”
Di lanin bɔy dɛn mek di pipul dɛn sidɔm lɛkɛ aw Jizɔs tɛl dɛn.
Jizɔs tek di fayv bred ɛn di tu fish, i luk ɔp na ɛvin ɛn tɛl Gɔd tɛnki fɔ di bred ɛn di fish, dɔn i kɔt kɔt di bred ɛn di fish ɛn gi in lanin bɔy dɛn fɔ sheb dɛn gi di pipul dɛn.
Dɛn ɔl it te dɛn bɛlful, dɔn di lanin bɔy dɛn gɛda twɛlv blay pan dɛn af af we lɛf.
Wan de wɛn Jizɔs in wan bin de pre, in lanin bɔy dɛn bin de wit am. Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Udat pipul dɛn se a bi?”
Dɛn ansa am se, “Sɔm pipul se yu na Jɔn we bin de baptayz. Ɔda pipul de se yu na Ila yja, sɔm se yu na wan pan dɛn lɔntɛm prɔfɛt we bin dɔn day we dɔn kam bak.”
Jizɔs aks dɛn bak se, “Wɛl, udat una se a bi?” Pita ansa se, “Yu na di Mɛsaya we Gɔd sɛn!”
Jizɔs wɔn dɛn tra nga wan mek dɛn nɔ tɛl ɛnibɔdi udat i bi.

I se, “Dɛn Ju bigman, dɛn bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha go mek Gɔd in Pikin sɔfa plɛnti ɛn dɛn go mek lɛkɛ se dɛn nɔ sabi am sɛf. Dɛn go kil am ɛn bɛr am. Bɔt i go rayz frɔm di grev di de we mek tri.”
Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “If ɛnibɔdi want bi mi lanin bɔy, da pɔsin de nɔ fɔ du wetin in want fɔ du nɔmɔ, i fɔ rɛdi fɔ sɔfa ɛn day fɔseka mi ɛvri de ɛn du ɔl wetin a de du.
Ɛnibɔdi we de tray fɔ sev in layf, go lɔs am; bɔt ɛnibɔdi we lɔs in layf fɔseka mi, go gɛt di tru layf.
Wetin pɔsin go gen, if i gɛt di ol wɔl ɛn day go ɛl ɛn lɔs di tru layf?

If ɛnibɔdi de shem fɔ tɔk bɔt mi ɛn wetin a dɔn lan am, Mɔta lman Pikin go shem fɔ da pɔsin de wɛn i kam lɛkɛ King ɛn layt we kɔmɔt ɛvin de shayn pan am; di sem layt we de shayn pan in Papa Gɔd, ɛn pan di enjɛl dɛn.
A de tɛl una se, sɔm pan di wan dɛn we tinap ya naw nɔ go day sote dɛn no se Gɔd de rul di wɔl, fɔ tru.”
Wɛn wan wik dɔn pas afta Jizɔs tɔk dɛn wɔd ya, Jizɔs kɔl Pita, Jems ɛn Jɔn fɔ fala am go pre na wan ay il.
Aw Jizɔs de pre, na in, wantɛm in fes chenj ɛn in klos in kɔla chenj to wayt, we wayt pas sha tin sɛf, ɛn i bin de shayn brayt.
Aw dɛn de luk, wantɛm dɛn si Jizɔs ɛn tu man de tɔk. Dɛn man ya na bin Mozis ɛn Ila yja.
Brayt layt bin de rawnd Mozis ɛn Ila yja dɛnsɛf; dɛn bin de tɔk bɔt di day we Jizɔs gɛt fɔ day se na Jerusɛlɛm i go bi.
Slip bin dɔn kech Pita ɛn in kɔmpin dɛn, so dɛn slip, wɛn dɛn wek dɛn si di brayt layt rawnd Jizɔs ɛn di tu man dɛn we bin tinap wit am.
Wɛn Mozis ɛn Ila yja want lɛf Jizɔs go, na in Pita se, “Masta, i gud we wi de naya. Lɛ wi bil tri bafa naya; wan fɔ yu, wan fɔ Mozis ɛn wan fɔ Ila yja.” Bɔt Pita nɔ bin tink bɔt wetin i de tɔk.
Aw Pita de tɔk, na in, wantɛm klawd kam kɔba dɛn so di ples dak; di lanin bɔy dɛn fred.
Na in dɛn yɛri vɔys de tɔk na di klawd se, “Dis na mi Pikin we a dɔn pik; una lisin wetin i de tɛl una!”

Wɛn di vɔys dɔn tɔk dɔn, dɛn nɔ si di tu man dɛn igen; na Jizɔs in wan gren bin lɛf de. Di lanin bɔy dɛn kip ɔl dɛn tin ya we bi na dɛn at. Dɛn nɔ tɛl ɛnibɔdi wetin dɛn si, dɛn wet te sɔm tɛm dɔn pas.
Di ɔda de, Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn kɔmɔt ɔp di ay il go na di tɔng. Plɛnti pipul go mit am fɔ tɛl am, kabɔ.
Wan pan di man dɛn we go mit Jizɔs bigin ala se, “Masta, a beg yu kam luk mi pikin, na in wan gren a gɛt!
Dɛbul kin kam pan am ɛn i kin ala wantɛm. Di dɛbul kin mek di pikin gɛt fiks so i kin fɔdɔm ɛn frɔsh kin de kɔmɔt na in mɔt, dɔn i kin de fɛt fɛt na grɔn. I kin at fɔ mek di dɛbul lɛf am.
A bin beg yu lanin bɔy dɛn fɔ drɛb di dɛbul we de ambɔg di bɔbɔ, bɔt dɛn nɔ bin ebul.”
Jizɔs se, “Una dɛn tide pipul ya, una nɔ biliv ɛn una tra nga yes! Aw lɔng una want fɔ mek a de wit una ɛn bia wit una?” I tɛl di man mek i bring in pikin kam.
As di pikin de kam to Jizɔs, na in di dɛbul wap di pikin dɔng na grɔn wit fiks. Jizɔs drɛb di dɛbul kɔmɔt pan am, i and am gi in papa bak.
Ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin lib de, wɔnda pan Gɔd in pawa. Ɔl wetin Jizɔs du bin mek di pipul dɛn wɔnda, na in Jizɔs bigin tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn. I se,
“A want mek una lisin gud wetin a de kam tɛl una. Una nɔ fɔgɛt am! Dɛn go and ova Mɔta lman Pikin gi sɔm pipul.”
Di lanin bɔy dɛn nɔ bin ɔnda stand wetin Jizɔs min bikɔs Gɔd bin ayd di minin frɔm dɛn mek dɛn nɔ no yet wetin go bi. Di lanin bɔy dɛn bin fred fɔ aks Jizɔs wetin di wɔd we i tɛl dɛn min.
Di lanin bɔy dɛn bigin fɔ agyu bɔt uswan pan dɛn impɔtant pas dɛn ɔl.
Jizɔs bin no wetin dɛn de tink, so i tek wan pikin put am klos insɛf.

I tɛl in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Ɛnibɔdi we tɛl lili pikin lɛkɛ dis wan ya fɔ kam na in os fɔseka mi, na mi da pɔsin de dɔn tɛl fɔ kam na in os; ɛnibɔdi we tɛl mi fɔ kam na in os, dɔn tɛl di Wan we sɛn mi fɔ kam na in os. Di pɔsin we una nɔ tek bɛtɛ yay luk, na in go bi impɔtant pas una ɔl.”
Jɔn go tɔk to Jizɔs. I se, “Masta, wi si wan man de tek yu nem drɛb dɛbul. Wi tɛl di man mek i nɔ du dat bikɔs i nɔ de wit wi.”
Jizɔs se, “Una nɔ tɛl di man fɔ tap igen bikɔs pɔsin we nɔ de mekɔp bad fɔ wi, de fɔ wi.”
Wɛn di tɛm we Gɔd bin dɔn plan fɔ tek Jizɔs go ɛvin bin dɔn de rich, Jizɔs mekɔp fɔ go Jerusɛlɛm.
Jizɔs sɛn mɛse nja dɛn fɔ go bifo insɛf lɛf fɔ go. Di mɛse nja dɛn go na wan vilej na Same ria ɛn du ɔltin we Jizɔs tɛl dɛn fɔ du fɔ mek dɛn fɛn ples fɔ am fɔ slip.
Di pipul dɛn na Same ria nɔ gri fɔ mek Jizɔs tap na Same ria bikɔs dɛn bin no se na Jerusɛlɛm Jizɔs de go.

Wɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn, dat na Jems ɛn Jɔn, si se di pipul dɛn na Same ria nɔ gri fɔ mek Jizɔs tap de, dɛn go mit Jizɔs ɛn aks am se, “Masta, yu want fɔ lɛ wi mek Gɔd sɛn faya kɔmɔt ɛvin kam dɔng kam bɔn dɛn pipul ya [lɛkɛ aw Ila yja bin du?]”
Jizɔs tɔn rawnd ɛn tɔk pan Jems ɛn Jɔn. [I se, “Una nɔ no wetin de na una at. Mɔta lman Pikin nɔ kam fɔ pwɛl pipul dɛn layf, i kam fɔ sev pipul.”]
Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn kɔmɔt Sama ria go na ɔda tɔng.
As dɛn de go, wan man kam mit Jizɔs ɛn se, “A go fala yu go ɛni say we yu de go, sa!”
Jizɔs ansa am se, “Padi, dɛn bush kyat gɛt ples fɔ tap ɛn dɛn bɔd gɛt say fɔ tap, bɔt Mɔta lman Pikin nɔ gɛt ples fɔ le in ed sɛf.”
Jizɔs tɛl wan ɔda man se, “Kam fala mi!” Di man ansa am se, “Masta, mek a go bɛr mi papa fɔs.”
Jizɔs se, “Lɛf dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt di layf we Gɔd de gi fɔ bɛr dɛn fambul we dɔn day, yu fɔ go tɛl ɔda pipul bɔt Gɔd in rul.”
Wan ɔda man tɛl Jizɔs se, “Masta, a go fala yu, bɔt duya, wet mek a go tɛl mi pipul dɛn na mi os se a de go.”
Jizɔs se, “Pɔsin we de dig ol fɔ plant sid ɛn de tɔn luk biɛn am, tan lɛkɛ pɔsin we de wok we lɛf am af we; i nɔ fit fɔ de ɔnda Gɔd in rul.”
Jizɔs pik sɛvi nti-tu ɔda man dɛn ɛn sɛn dɛn tu tu fɔ go ɔl di say dɛn we insɛf bin want fɔ go.

Bifo di man dɛn go, Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Dɛn pipul we Gɔd dɔn pik fɔ mek i rul dɛn tan lɛkɛ plɛnti, plɛnti plant dɛn we dɔn du fɔ kɔt, bɔt di wokman dɛn we fɔ gɛda dɛn fɔ kam to Gɔd, nɔ plɛnti. Una pre mek Gɔd we na di Masta sɛn mɔ pipul fɔ kam gɛda dɛn pipul we i dɔn pik fɔ rul, ɛn bring dɛn kam to am.”
I se, “Una go! A de sɛn una lɛkɛ ship pikin midul wulf.
We una de go so, una nɔ fɔ kɛr pɔs, una nɔ fɔ kɛr bag, ɛn una nɔ fɔ kɛr sus. Una nɔ fɔ wes tɛm fɔ tɛl pipul lɔng adu na rod.
Ɛni os we una go, una fɔ se fɔs, ‘Mek Gɔd blɛs ɔlman na dis os!’
If pɔsin de we want di blɛsin, i go gɛt di blɛsin we una pre mek i gɛt; bɔt if pɔsin nɔ de we want di blɛsin, di blɛsin we una dɔn gi am go kam bak to una.

Di fɔs os we una go we dɛn gri fɔ mek una tap, na de una fɔ de sote una tɔn bak; una nɔ fɔ kɔmɔt na wan os go tap na ɔda wan. Una fɔ it ɛn drink ɛni tin we dɛn gi una bikɔs wokman fɔ gɛt pe fɔ in wok.
If una go na ɛni tɔng we di pipul dɛn gladi fɔ una, una fɔ it ɛni tin we dɛn gi una.
Una fɔ mɛn di sik pipul dɛn we lib de, ɛn una fɔ tɛl di pipul dɛn we lib de se, ‘Gɔd in rul dɔn kam klos una.’
If una go na ɛni tɔng we di pipul dɛn nɔ gladi fɔ una, una fɔ go na trit ɛn tɛl dɛn se,
‘Wi de wep di dɔti sɛf we wi mas na una tɔng kɔmɔt ɔnda wi fut fɔ sho una se una dɔn du bad. Ɛniwe, una nɔ fɔgɛt se Gɔd in rul dɔn kam klos!’
A de tɛl una se wɛn di tɛm rich fɔ mek Gɔd jɔj ɔlman, i go bɛtɛ fɔ Sɔdɔm pas da tɔng de.

“Bad tin go mit una ɔl we de na Kora zin ɛn Bɛtsa yda. If pɔsin bin du dɛn wɔnda ful wok we a bin du fɔ una, na Taya ɛn Saydɔn, dɛn pipul de bin fɔ dɔn lɛf fɔ du bad lɔntɛm; dɛn bin fɔ wɛr bag ɛn rɔb asis na dɛn bɔdi fɔ mek ɔlman no se dɛn dɔn lɛf fɔ du bad.
Di de we Gɔd go jɔj ɔlman na wɔl, i go sɔri fɔ Taya ɛn Saydɔn pas una.
Una we de na Kepanyɔm, una min se una de go ɛvin? Na ɛl una go go!”

Jizɔs tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn. I se, “Ɛnibɔdi we lisin una, na mi da pɔsin de lisin. Ɛnibɔdi we nɔ gri fɔ du wetin una tɛl am fɔ du, na wetin a tɛl am fɔ du, na in i nɔ gri fɔ du; ɛn ɛnibɔdi we nɔ gri fɔ du wetin a tɛl am fɔ du, na wetin di pɔsin we sɛn mi tɛl am fɔ du, i nɔ gri fɔ du.”
Di sɛvi nti-tu man dɛn kam bak wit gladi ɛn tɛl Jizɔs se, “Masta, dɛn dɛbul sɛf du wetin wi tɛl dɛn fɔ du wɛn wi kɔl yu nem!”
Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “A si we Setan fɔdɔm kɔmɔt na ɛvin lɛkɛ laytin.
A dɔn gi una pawa: una go mas snek, dɛn nɔ go du una natin; una go mas kɔktel, dɛn nɔ go bɛt una. A dɔn gi una pawa oba ɔl Setan in pawa so natin nɔ go du una.
Una nɔ fɔ gladi bikɔs dɛn dɛbul du wetin una tɛl dɛn fɔ du, bɔt una fɔ gladi bikɔs una nem dɔn rayt na ɛvin.”

Da sem tɛm de, Gɔd in Spirit mek Jizɔs gladi, na in Jizɔs se, “Papa, yu we na Masta na ɛvin ɛn dis wɔl! A tɛl yu tɛnki bikɔs yu dɔn sho dɛn pikin we nɔ sabi natin, dɛn tin we yu ayd pan di wan dɛn we gɛt sɛns ɛn we lan plɛnti tin. Lɛ i bi so Papa, bikɔs na so yu want.
“Mi Papa dɔn gi mi pawa oba ɔltin. Nɔbɔdi nɔ sabi Gɔd in Pikin pas di Papa wan gren; nɔbɔdi nɔ sabi di Papa pas in Pikin wan gren, ɛn ɛnibɔdi we di Pikin pik fɔ tɛl bɔt di Papa.”
Jizɔs kɔl in lanin bɔy dɛn to insɛf ɛn tɛl dɛn se, “Dɛn pipul we de si dɛn tin we una de si, gɛt blɛsin!
A de tɛl una se plɛnti prɔfɛt ɛn plɛnti king bin want fɔ si dɛn tin we una de si, bɔt dɛn nɔ si dɛn. Plɛnti bin want yɛri dɛn tin we una de yɛri, bɔt dɛn nɔ yɛri dɛn.”
Wan Ju Lɔ ticha aks Jizɔs wan kwɛshɔn fɔ tɛst am; i se, “Ticha, aw a go manej fɔ gɛt layf we go de sote go?”
Jizɔs ansa am se, “Wetin dɛn rayt na di Ju Lɔ? Wetin yu kin si de wɛn yu rid am?”
Di Ju Lɔ ticha ansa Jizɔs se, “Di Lɔ se, ‘Una fɔ lɛk di Masta we na una Gɔd wit ɔl una at, wit ɔl una layf, wit ɔl una pawa, ɛn wit ɔl una maynd’ ɛn ‘Una fɔ lɛk una neba lɛkɛ aw una lɛk unasɛf.’ ”
Jizɔs se, “Yu ansa rayt. Go du ɔl wetin yu jɛs tɔk so ɛn yu go gɛt di layf we go de sote go.”
Di Ju Lɔ ticha bin want fɔ sho Jizɔs se in rayt fɔ tɔk wetin i tɔk, so i aks Jizɔs se, “Udat na mi neba?”
Jizɔs ansa am se, “Wan man bin kɔmɔt Jerusɛlɛm de go Jɛriko. As i de go tifman dɛn fɔdɔm pan am tek ɔl wetin i gɛt, bit am ɛn lɛf am na di rod af day wan.
Wan man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin apin fɔ pas na da sem rod de. I si di man we tifman bit ledɔm na grɔn, i pas na di ɔda say na di rod ɛn go in we.
Semwe so, wan pan dɛn Livayt we de ɛp dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin fɔ du Gɔd wok, pas na di ples we di man bin ledɔm. Wɛn i si di man na grɔn, i krɔs go na di ɔda say na di rod ɛn go.
Wan man we kɔmɔt Same ria kam pas na di sem rod. Wɛn i rich na di sem ples ɛn si di man we tifman bit, i sɔri fɔ am.

I go mit di man na di say we i ledɔm, i put mɛrɛsin pan di wund dɛn, dɔn i tay dɛn wit bandej. I put di man pan di ɔs we i bin de rayd. I kɛr am go na wan os we tre nja kin tap na nɛt ɛn mɛn am ol nɛt.

Di ɔda de wɛn di man we kɔmɔt Same ria want fɔ go, i kɔl di man we gɛt di os. I gi am kɔpɔ ɛn tɛl am se, ‘Padi, duya, mɛn dis man fɔ mi ya! If dis kɔpɔ we a gi yu nɔ du, wɛn a kam bak mɔs tɛl mi ɔmɔs yu put de, a go gi yu bak.’ ”
“Pan dɛn tri pipul ya we a jɛs tɔk bɔt so, uswan sho se di man we tifman bit, na in neba?”
Di Ju Lɔ ticha ansa Jizɔs se, “Na di man we sɔri fɔ am.” Jizɔs se, “Yusɛf go ɛn du lɛkɛ am.”
Wɛn Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn de go, dɛn rich na wan vilej. Dɛn go na wan uman we nem Mata in os. Mata tɛl Jizɔs adu ɛn tɛl am fɔ sidɔm.
Mata in sista bin nem Meri. Meri go sidɔm klos Jizɔs fɔ yɛri wetin i de tɔk.
Bɔt di os wok bin de mɔna Mata, so i go mit Jizɔs ɛn se, “Masta, yu nɔ si se Meri lɛf mi wan pan di wok? Tɛl am mek i kam ɛp mi!”
Jizɔs se, “Mata, Mata, yu put plɛnti tin na yu ed ɛn dat de wɔri yu,
na wan tin yu fɔ du we yu nɔ de du; na da tin de we gud na in Meri de du ɛn nɔbɔdi nɔ go pul am pan am.”
Wan de Jizɔs bin de pre na wan ples; wɛn i dɔn pre dɔn, wan pan in lanin bɔy dɛn kam mit am ɛn se, “Masta, lan wi aw fɔ pre lɛkɛ aw Jɔn lan in lanin bɔy dɛn.”
Jizɔs se, “Wɛn una want pre, una fɔ se: ‘Papa Gɔd, na yu wan gren na Gɔd, mek ɔlman pre to yu ɛn ɔna yu. Wi de pre mek yu rul wi.
Gi wi wetin wi fɔ it ɛvri de.
Padin wi fɔ di bad tin dɛn wi de du, bikɔs wisɛf de padin dɛn wan we de du wi bad. Mek wi nɔ lɛf fɔ biliv yu ɛnitɛm we Setan tray wi.’ ”
Jizɔs se, “If ɛni wan pan una go mit in padi midul nɛt ɛn tɛl am se, ‘Padi, duya, lɛn mi tri bred.
A gɛt tre nja ɛn a nɔ gɛt natin fɔ gi am.’
Dɔn di padi ansa se, ‘Bo, nɔ ambɔg mi ya, a dɔn lɔk mi do ɛn a dɔn ledɔm. Mi pikin dɛn ɔl de slip. A nɔ ebul grap naw fɔ lɛn yu wetin yu want.’
A shɔ se if i nɔ grap ɛn gi di pɔsin di bred bikɔs dɛn ɔl tu na padi, i go grap ɛn gi am ɔmɔs i want bikɔs i de beg beg am.”
Jizɔs se, “Una aks Gɔd fɔ ɛni tin, i go gi una. Una luk gud, una go fɛn wetin una de luk fɔ. Una kɔnk na do, Gɔd go opin am fɔ una.
Ɛnibɔdi we aks, go gɛt wetin i want. Ɛnibɔdi we luk gud, go gɛt wetin i de luk fɔ. Ɛnibɔdi we kɔnk na do, Gɔd go opin am fɔ am.
Una dɛn papa, if una pikin aks una fɔ fish, una go tek snek gi am?
If una pikin aks una fɔ eg, una go gi am kɔktel?
If una we bad so sabi fɔ gi una pikin dɛn gud tin, Gɔd we na una Papa we de na ɛvin go gi una gud tin pas dat; i go gi dɛn wan we aks am in Spirit!”
Jizɔs bin de drɛb di dɛbul we mek wan man mumu kɔmɔt insay di man. As di dɛbul kɔmɔt insay di man so, di man bigin tɔk; dat mek di pipul dɛn ɔl wɔnda.
Sɔm pipul se, “Na Biɛlzibɔb, dat na dɛn dɛbul dɛn edman, na in de gi am di pawa fɔ drɛb dɛbul.”
Sɔm ɔda pipul kam fɔ tray Jizɔs; dɛn tɛl am fɔ mek i du wɔnda ful wok we go sho se in na di Mɛsaya, fɔ tru.

We Jizɔs no wetin di pipul dɛn de tink we mek dɛn aks am fɔ du wɔnda ful wok, i tɛl dɛn se, “If pipul de na wan kɔntri, dɛn de fɛt dɛnsɛf, da kɔntri de nɔ go las. Semwe so, if fambul dɛn de fɛt dɛnsɛf, da fambul de go skata.
If Setan in wokman dɛn de fɛt dɛnsɛf, aw Setan in rul go go bifo? Una dɔn tɛl mi se na Biɛlzibɔb a de tek drɛb dɛbul.
If na Biɛlzibɔb a de tek drɛb dɛbul, wɛl, wetin una yon pipul dɛn de tek drɛb dɛbul? Na wetin una pipul de du de sho se una nɔ rayt.
Bɔt if na Gɔd in pawa a de tek drɛb dɛbul, dat sho se fɔ tru Gɔd in rul dɔn kam to una.
“If pɔsin we gɛt trɛnk ɛn ɔltin we fɔ tek fɛt de gyad in os, nɔbɔdi nɔ go tif in tin dɛn.

Bɔt if pɔsin we gɛt trɛnk pas am go fɛt am ɛn bit am, di wan we bit am go tek ɔltin we di wan we gɛt di os bin abop pan fɔ tek fɛt, ɛn i go tif ɔl in tin dɛn ɛn kɛr dɛn go sheb dɛn wit in kɔmpin tifman dɛn.
“Ɛnibɔdi we nɔ de fɔ mi de fɛt mi, ɛn ɛnibɔdi we nɔ de ɛp mi gɛda pipul fɔ mek dɛn kam to mi, na skata i de skata dɛn.
“Wɛn dɛbul dɔn kɔmɔt insay pɔsin, i kin de pas pas na dɛn dray ples fɔ fɛn ples fɔ blo. If i nɔ ebul fɛn ples fɔ blo, i go se, ‘A go tɔn bak go tap insay di os we a bin de.’
Wɛn di dɛbul kam bak, i nɔ go mit natin insay de, i go mit di ples klin ɛn fayn.
I go go bak go bring ɔda sɛvin dɛbul we bad pas insɛf. Dɛn ɔl go tap insay de ɛn di man in kɔndishɔn go kam bad naw pas aw i bin tan fɔs.”
Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn tɔk dɔn, wan uman we bin de na di krawd se, “Di uman we bɔn yu ɛn mɛn yu gɛt blɛsin!”
Jizɔs se, “Yɛs, dat na tru, bɔt mɔ blɛsin de fɔ di pipul dɛn we yɛri Gɔd in wɔd ɛn du wetin Gɔd tɛl dɛn.”

Wɛn di pipul dɛn dɔn plɛnti, Jizɔs bigin tɔk to dɛn. I se, “Dɛn tide pipul ya bad! Dɛn de aks mi fɔ du wɔnda ful wok, bɔt a nɔ go du am. Dɛn nɔ go si ɛni wɔnda ful tin pas di wan we bin dɔn bi to prɔfɛt Jona.
Lɛkɛ aw Jona na bin sayn fɔ dɛn pipul na Ninivɛ, na so Mɔta lman Pikin go bi sayn fɔ dɛn tide pipul ya.
Wɛn Gɔd go jɔj di wɔl, da kwin we de rul na Shiba go grap ɛn tɔk se dɛn tide pipul ya dɔn du bad; i kɔmɔt fa fawe fɔ kam yɛri di sɛns we Sɔlɔmɔn de tɔk wit; ɛn pɔsin we pas Sɔlɔmɔn dɔn kam.

Di de we Gɔd go jɔj ɔlman na wɔl, dɛn pipul we bin de na Ninivɛ di tɛm we Jona bin de, go grap ɛn tɛl una se, una dɔn du bad; bikɔs dɛn bin lɛf fɔ du bad wɛn prɔfɛt Jona tɛl dɛn Gɔd in wɔd; ɛn a de tɛl una se, pɔsin de naya we pas Jona.
“Pɔsin nɔ de layt lamp put am na kɔna ɔ kɔba am wit blay, i de put am na ples we ɔlman na di os go si layt.
Yu yay tan lɛkɛ lamp na yu bɔdi. If yu gɛt gud yay, ɔl yu bɔdi go gɛt layt, bɔt if yu yay nɔ gud, ɔl yu bɔdi go de na dak.
Na dat mek yu fɔ tek tɛm mek di layt we de pan yu nɔ ɔt.
If ɔl yu bɔdi gɛt layt ɛn nɔ pat pan am nɔ dak, di layt we de pan yu go tan lɛkɛ lamp we brayt we de mek pipul si.”
Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn tɔk dɔn, wan pan dɛn man we dɛn kɔl Faresi aks Jizɔs fɔ go it to am; Jizɔs fala am go.
Di Faresi wɔnda fɔ si se Jizɔs nɔ was in an bifo i bigin it.
Jizɔs tɛl am se, “Una dɛn Faresi de was kɔp ɛn plet bak klin, bɔt na soso wikɛd tin de insay una at ɛn una bigyay.
Una nɔ gɛt sɛns! Nɔto di sem Gɔd we mek una bɔdi mek una at?
Una fɔ ɛp dɛn po pipul wit ɔl una at, dɛn ɔltin go klin fɔ una.

“Bɔt una dɛn Faresi, i go bad fɔ una! Una de gi wan pat pan tɛn pat pan ɔltin we una gɛt, ivin dɛn tin we una plant, bɔt una nɔ de du wetin rayt to pipul ɛn una nɔ lɛk Gɔd. Na dɛn tin ya una bin fɔ de du wit di ɔda tin dɛn we una de du.
“Una dɛn Faresi, i go bad fɔ una! Wɛn una de na di Ju mitin os, una kin lɛk fɔ sidɔm na dɛn bɛnch we de bifo, ɛn una lɛk fɔ mek dɛn tɛl una adu na dɛn ples we pipul de plɛnti.
I go bad fɔ una dɛn Faresi! Una tan lɛkɛ grev we pipul nɔ de si so dɛn de waka pan am ɛn dɛn nɔ no sɛf se na grev dɛn de mas.”
Wan pan di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn ansa Jizɔs se, “Masta, we yu tɔk so, yu dɔn blem wisɛf!”
Jizɔs se, “I go bad fɔ una dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha, bikɔs una de gi ɔda pipul ebi lod fɔ tot bɔt una nɔ de put wan finga sɛf fɔ ɛp dɛn tot di lod.
I go bad fɔ una! Na una dɔn bil sɔntin pan dɛn ston grev fɔ mɛmba dɛn prɔfɛt we una gra npapa-papa dɛn bin kil.
Ɛn una sho se una gri fɔ wetin una gra npapa-papa dɛn bin du we dɛn kil di prɔfɛt dɛn, we una dɔn bil sɔntin pan dɛn ston grev fɔ mɛmba dɛn.
Na dat mek di wan we dɛn kɔl ‘Gɔd in Sɛns’ se, ‘A go sɛn mi prɔfɛt dɛn ɛn mi mɛse nja dɛn to dɛn, bɔt dɛn go kil sɔm ɛn dɛn go mek di ɔda wan dɛn sɔfa.’
So una dɛn tide pipul ya go sɔfa fɔ ɔl dɛn prɔfɛt ya we dɛn dɔn kil frɔm we Gɔd mek di wɔl sote tide.

Una dɛn tide pipul ya go sɔfa fɔ di pipul dɛn we dɛn kil frɔm Ebɛl sote rich Zaka raya we day midul Gɔd in Os ɛn di ples we dɛn de bɔn sakri fays. Fɔ tru, a de tɛl una dɛn tide pipul ya, se una go pe fɔ di prɔfɛt dɛn blɔd!
“I go bad fɔ una dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha, bikɔs una dɔn lɔk di ples we pipul fɔ go fɔ lan bɔt Gɔd ɛn kɛr di ki go. Una nɔ de go insay ɛn una nɔ gri fɔ mek ɔda pipul go insay.”
Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn tɔk dɛn tin ya, dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha ɛn dɛn Faresi bigin fos am fɔ tɔk mɔ, dɛn bigin aks am ɔl kayn kwɛshɔn;
we dɛn bin de aks Jizɔs dɛn kwɛshɔn ya na trap dɛn bin de sɛt fɔ mek i tɔk wɔd we go mek dɛn ol am.

Di pipul dɛn we bin gɛda bin plɛnti te nɔbɔdi nɔ ebul kɔnt dɛn, dɛn bin so plɛnti dat dɛn bin de mas mas dɛn kɔmpin, ples nɔ bin de fɔ put fut. Jizɔs tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn, i se, “Una tek tɛm mek unasɛf nɔ go ipo krit lɛkɛ dɛn Faresi; di ipo krit we dɛn ipo krit tan lɛkɛ aw yist kin prɛd insay flawa.
Natin nɔ de we ayd naw we nɔ go kɔmɔt na do ɛn natin nɔ de we na sikrit we pɔsin nɔ go no.
Na dat mek, ɛni tin we pɔsin tɔk na nɛt, dɛn go yɛri am na mɔnin ɛn ɛni tin we una tu tɔk kwayɛt wan insay rum, una go yɛri ɔlman de tɔk am na trit.
“Mi padi dɛn, a de tɛl una, una nɔ fɔ fred dɛn pipul we de kil pɔsin, bɔt dɛn nɔ ebul du natin pas dat.
Bɔt a de tɛl una naw se una fɔ fred Gɔd bikɔs wɛn i dɔn mek pɔsin day, i gɛt pawa fɔ trowe di pɔsin in sol na ɛl. A de tɛl una igen se una fɔ fred Gɔd!
“Nɔto tu sɛnt nɔmɔ dɛn de sɛl fayv smɔl bɔd? Pan ɔl dat Gɔd nɔ fɔgɛt ɛni wan pan dɛn.
Gɔd no ɔmɔs ia de na una ed sɛf. Na dat mek una nɔ fɔ fred; una ɔl bɛtɛ pas plɛnti smɔl bɔd na Gɔd in yay!
“Mek a tɛl una sɔntin; ɛnibɔdi we tɛl ɔda pipul se dɛn biliv mi, Mɔta lman Pikin go tɛl Gɔd in enjɛl dɛn bɔt da pɔsin de.
Bɔt ɛnibɔdi we nɔ tɛl ɔda pipul se dɛn biliv mi, Mɔta lman Pikin nɔ go tɛl Gɔd in enjɛl dɛn bɔt da pɔsin de.
“Ɛnibɔdi we tɔk sɔntin bɔt Mɔta lman Pikin we nɔto tru, Gɔd go padin am, bɔt Gɔd nɔ go padin ɛnibɔdi we tɔk bad bɔt in Spirit.
“Wɛn dɛn kɛr una go na di Ju mitin os ɛn bifo dɛn jɔj ɛn dɛn wan we de na pawa, una nɔ wɔndrin aw una fɔ ansa dɛn ɔ wetin una fɔ tɔk.
Wɛn da tɛm de rich, Gɔd in Spirit go tɛl una wetin una fɔ tɔk.”
Wan pan di pipul dɛn se, “Masta, tɛl mi brɔda mek i gi mi mi yon pan di prɔpati we wi papa lɛf fɔ wi.”
Jizɔs ansa di man se, “Padi, udat gi mi pawa fɔ jɔj fɔ una ɛn fɔ sheb una prɔpati?”
Jizɔs tɔn to ɔl di pipul dɛn ɛn se, “A de wɔn una, una nɔ put at pan jɛntri. Nɔto di plɛnti tin dɛn we pɔsin gɛt go mek di pɔsin gɛt di tru layf.”
Dɛn Jizɔs pul wan pare bul. I se: “Plɛnti, plɛnti tin bin bia na wan jɛntri man in fam.
Di jɛntri man bigin tɔk na in at se, ‘Wetin a fɔ du naw bikɔs a nɔ gɛt ples fɔ kip ɔl dɛn tin ya?’
I se, ‘A dɔn no wetin fɔ du. A go brok ɔl dɛn sto ya ɛn bil big wan pas dɛn. Na de a go kip ɔl dɛn tin ya we bia ɛn ɔl dɛn tin we a gɛt.
Wɛn a dɔn du dat, a go de tɔk to misɛf se, yu dɔn gɛt plɛnti it ɛn plɛnti ɔda tin na sto ɛn i go te bifo dɛn dɔn, so naw, nɔ wɔri bɔt ɛni tin, jɛs de it, drink ɛn ɛnjɔy yusɛf!’
Gɔd tɛl di jɛntri man se, ‘Yu fulman! Dis nɛt ya, a go tek yu layf. Udat go gɛt ɔl dɛn tin ya we yu dɔn gɛda?’ ”
Jizɔs se, “Na so i go bi fɔ dɛn pipul we jɛs de gɛda prɔpati nɔmɔ, bɔt Gɔd no se dɛn nɔ gɛt natin.”
Jizɔs tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn. I se, “Na dat mek a de tɛl una se, una nɔ fɔ wɔri bɔt wetin una fɔ it fɔ mek una gɛt layf ɛn wetin una fɔ wɛr pan una bɔdi so dat una nɔ go de nekɛd.
Una fɔ mɛmba se layf bɛtɛ pas di tin we pɔsin de it ɛn di bɔdi bɛtɛ pas di klos we pɔsin de wɛr.
Una luk dɛn bɔd, dɛn nɔ de plant rɛs ɛn dɛn nɔ de kɔt rɛs. Dɛn nɔ gɛt sto ɛn dɛn nɔ gɛt blay fɔ kip rɛs. Pan ɔl dat, Gɔd de gi dɛn it. Una bɛtɛ pas bɔd fawe.
Uswan pan una ebul put wan de pantap di tɛm we i fɔ liv bikɔs i de wɔri fɔ in layf?
If una nɔ ebul du smɔl tin lɛkɛ dat, wetin mek una fɔ de wɔri fɔ dɛn ɔda tin?
Una mɛmba aw dɛn flawa na bush kin fayn wɛn dɛn dɔn opin; dɛn nɔ de wok, dɛn nɔ de mek klos fɔ dɛnsɛf, bɔt Sɔlɔmɔn pan ɔl di fayn we i kin fayn wɛn i drɛs, i nɔba fayn lɛkɛ dɛn flawa ya.
If Gɔd de mek gras we de na bush fayn ɛn di gras kin de tide, bɔt tumara dɛn dɔn bɔn am, Gɔd mɔs mek unasɛf gɛt fayn klos fɔ wɛr. Fɔ tru, una nɔ biliv Gɔd wit ɔl una at!
“Una nɔ put una at pan wetin una go it ɛn wetin una go drink, ɛn una nɔ wɔri bɔt dat!
Na dɛn tin de dɛn pipul we nɔ no Gɔd put dɛn at pan. Gɔd we na una Papa no se una mɔs gɛt dɛn.
Bifo dat, una fɔ put una at pan dɛn tin we impɔtant na di say we Gɔd de rul, dɛn, Gɔd go gi una ɔl dɛn ɔda tin ya.
“Una we de fala mi nɔ plɛnti, bɔt una nɔ fred; Gɔd we na una Papa go mek una rul lɛkɛ aw insɛf de rul.

Una fɔ sɛl ɔl wetin una gɛt ɛn sheb di kɔpɔ gi dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt natin; una tray fɔ gɛt dɛn pɔs we nɔ de ol, dat na dɛn plɛnti gud gud tin we nɔ go dɔn na ɛvin, bikɔs tifman nɔ go tif dɛn de ɛn bɔgbɔg nɔ go it dɛn.
Bikɔs ɔltɛm una at go de di say we una kip una jɛntri.
“Una fɔ rɛdi fɔ wetin de kam, una tay una bɛlt tayt, layt una lamp, ɛn nɔ mek dɛn ɔt.
Una fɔ tan lɛkɛ dɛn wokman we de wet fɔ dɛn masta we bin go mared fɔ kam bak na os so dat dɛn go opin di do as di masta nak so.
If di bɔy dɛn nɔ slip yet wɛn dɛn masta kam bak, dɛn go gɛt blɛsin. A de tɛl una fɔ tru se, di masta go drɛs ɛn i go kɔl in bɔy dɛn mek dɛn kam sidɔm, dɔn i go gi dɛn it.
Dɛn bɔy ya go gɛt blɛsin if dɛn masta kam midul nɛt ɔ bifo do klin ɛn mit dɛn nɔ de slip.
Bɔt una no se if pɔsin we gɛt in os no di tɛm we tifman go kam, i nɔ go slip lɛf in os mek tifman brok am go insay ɛn klia in prɔpati.
Unasɛf fɔ rɛdi ɔltɛm bikɔs Mɔta lman Pikin go kam tɛm we una nɔ mekɔp.”
Pita se, “Masta, dis pare bul we yu jɛs pul so, na fɔ wi we na yu lanin bɔy dɛn nɔmɔ ɔ na fɔ ɔlman?”
Jizɔs ansa se, “Udat na di bɔy we tru to in masta ɛn we gɛt sɛns? Na di bɔy dat we di masta go mek edman oba di ɔda bɔy dɛn fɔ de gi dɛn it ɛn fɔ de sho dɛn ɔl wetin dɛn fɔ du.
Ɛni bɔy we in masta go kam bak kam mit de du dɛn tin ya go gɛt blɛsin.
A de tɛl una fɔ tru se in masta go put am oba ɔl di tin dɛn we i gɛt.
Bɔt if di bɔy tɔk na in at se, ‘Mi masta nɔ go kam jisnɔ’ dɔn i bigin bit ɔl di ɔda man ɛn uman dɛn we de wok ɛn i jɛs de it, ɛn drink drɔnk,
in masta go kam de we di bɔy nɔ mekɔp ɛn tɛm we i nɔ no. I go mek dɛn pɔnish di bɔy bad wan mek i sɔfa lɛkɛ dɛn pipul we nɔ biliv Gɔd.
“Ɛni wokman we no wetin in masta want fɔ mek i du, bɔt i nɔ du am ɛn i nɔ rɛdi sɛf fɔ du am, in masta go mek dɛn wip am gud.

Bɔt ɛni wokman we nɔ no wetin in masta want fɔ mek i du, we du tin we fɔ mek dɛn bit am, in masta nɔ go mek dɛn bit am tumɔs. Wɛn Gɔd dɔn mek pɔsin gɛt big pos, Gɔd go luk ɔp to am fɔ du big wok. Wɛn Gɔd dɔn mek pɔsin gɛt big pos pas di wan we i bin gɛt, Gɔd go luk ɔp to am fɔ du big big wok pas wetin i bin de du fɔs.
“A kam fɔ sɛn faya pan dis wɔl ɛn a op se dɛn dɔn layt di faya.
Bɔt bifo da faya de bigin bɔn, a gɛt fɔ baptayz difrɛn we, dat na di sɔfa we A fɔ sɔfa ɛn mi at nɔ go kol te a dɔn sɔfa dɔn.
Una min se a kam fɔ bring kol at kam na wɔl? Nɔto so i bi; a de tɛl una se, a kam fɔ mek pipul skata.
Frɔm naw, fayv pipul go de insay wan os so, dɛn nɔ go gɛt wanwɔd. Tri pipul go fɛt tu pipul ɛn tu pipul go fɛt tri pipul.
Papa go fɛt in bɔy pikin ɛn di bɔy pikin go fɛt in papa. Mama go fɛt in gyal pikin ɛn di gyal pikin go fɛt in mama. Mɔdɛnlɔ go fɛt dɔtɛnlɔ ɛn dɔtɛnlɔ go fɛt mɔdɛnlɔ.”
Jizɔs tɔk to di pipul dɛn. I se, “Wɛn una luk da say we di san de go dɔng ɛn si se de dak, una kin tɔk wantɛm se, ‘Ren want kam!’ ɛn ren kin kam fɔ tru.
Wɛn di dray briz tap fɔ blo, una kin se, ‘Di ples de kam ɔt bad bad!’ ɛn na so i kin bi.
Una dɛn ipo krit pipul ya, una no wetin dɛn tin we una de si na wɔl ɛn ɔpklawd, min, bɔt wetin mek una nɔ no wetin dɛn tin we de bi na wɔl naw, min?
“Wetin mek una nɔ ebul fɔ no wetin rayt?

Bifo yu mek dɛn kɛr yu go kot fɔ ɛni bad tin we yu du, yu fɔ tray fɔ tɔk di kes to unasɛf mek yu nɔ go rich kot, if nɔ so, dɛn go drɛg yu go bifo di jɔj, di jɔj go and yu gi di gyad ɛn di gyad go ib yu na sɛl.
Ɛn yu nɔ go kɔmɔt insay jel sote yu dɔn pe ɔl di dɛt we yu fɔ pe.”
Da sem tɛm de, sɔm pipul we bin de wit Jizɔs tɛl am bɔt dɛn pipul we kɔmɔt Galili we Paylet kil wɛn dɛn de mek sakri fays to Gɔd.
Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Una mɛmba se dɛn pipul we Paylet kil day so bikɔs dɛn bin sin pas ɔlman na Galili?
Nɔto so i bi; a de tɛl una se if una nɔ lɛf fɔ du bad, unasɛf go day lɛkɛ dɛn.
Ɔ igen una mɛmba se dɛn etin pipul we da tawa na Saylom bin fɔdɔm pan, we day, bin sin pas ɔlman na Jerusɛlɛm we mek dɛn day so?
Nɔto so i bi; a de tɛl una se if una nɔ lɛf fɔ du bad, unasɛf go day lɛkɛ dɛn.”
Jizɔs pul wan pare bul we se: “Wan man bin plant fig tik na in gadin. Wɛn di man go fɔ pik di fig dɛn natin nɔ bin de na di tik.
Di man tɛl di man we de luk di tik dɛn se, ‘Dis ia mek tri we a de kam fɔ pik fig, bɔt a nɔ de gɛt natin fɔ pik. Kɔt dis tik! Wetin mek i de mek di grɔn wes?’
Di man we de luk di tik dɛn se, ‘Masta, lɛf di tik fɔs dis ia. A go dig rawnd am ɛn put maniɔ pan di dɔti.
If i bia nɛks ia, i go gud fɔ wi, bɔt if i nɔ bia, da tɛm de wi go kɔt am.’ ”
Wan de fɔ pre ɛn blo, Jizɔs bin de lan di pipul dɛn na wan Ju mitin os.
Wan uman bin de na di Ju mitin os we bin gɛt dɛbul insay am we mek i sik fɔ etin ia. Di sik bin mek di uman bɛn ɛn i nɔ bin ebul tinap tret igen.
Wɛn Jizɔs si di uman, i kɔl am ɛn tɛl am se, “Uman, frɔm tide yu dɔn wɛl!”
Jizɔs tɔch di uman ɛn wantɛm wantɛm so di uman in bak tret ɛn i bigin tɛl Gɔd tɛnki ɛn prez am.

Bɔt di bigman na di Ju mitin os bin vɛks bikɔs Jizɔs mɛn di sik uman di de we fɔ pre ɛn blo, so i tɛl di pipul dɛn we bin go fɔ pre se, “Na siks de pɔsin fɔ wok, so una fɔ kam wan pan dɛn de ya fɔ mek Jizɔs mɛn una; bɔt una nɔ fɔ kam di de fɔ pre ɛn blo fɔ mek i mɛn una.”
Jizɔs ansa am se, “Una dɛn ipo krit pipul ya! Una nɔ kin pul una ship ɛn kaw dɛn na do di de fɔ pre ɛn blo ɛn kɛr dɛn go mek dɛn go drink wata?
Dis uman we Setan dɔn tay dis etin ia, we na wan pan Ebraam in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn, a nɔ fɔ mɛn am di de fɔ pre ɛn blo?”
Jɛs Jizɔs tɔk dis wɔd ya, di pipul dɛn we bin go pre gladi fɔ ɔl wetin Jizɔs du, ɛn dɛn wan we nɔ bin lɛk Jizɔs, shem.
Wɛn dat dɔn, Jizɔs se, “Aw Gɔd in rul tan ɛn wetin a go tek fɔ sho aw i tan?
Gɔd in rul tan lɛkɛ mɔstad sid we pɔsin plant na in gadin, di sid bɔs fayn ɛn gro te i tɔn to tik, dɔn plɛnti bɔd kam mek nɛst pan di an dɛn.”
Jizɔs aks igen se, “Wetin a go tek fɔ sho aw Gɔd in rul tan?
I tan lɛkɛ we uman tek smɔl yist ɛn miks am wit tri kɔp flawa sote di do fɔ mek bred rayz.”
Wɛn Jizɔs de go Jerusɛlɛm, i bin de lan di pipul dɛn na ɔl dɛn tɔng ɛn dɛn vilej we i bin de pas.
Sɔmbɔdi aks Jizɔs se, “Masta, dɛn pipul we Gɔd go sev nɔ go plɛnti?” Jizɔs tɛl di pipul dɛn we bin de wit am se,
“Una tray mek una go pas na di do we smɔl fɔ pas ɛn go insay di ples we Gɔd de rul. A de tɛl una se, plɛnti pipul go tray fɔ go insay de, bɔt dɛn nɔ go ebul.
Wɛn di pɔsin we gɛt di ples dɔn grap ɛn lɔk di do, una go tinap na do de nak ɛn se, ‘Masta, opin fɔ wi, sa!’ Di masta go ansa una se, ‘A nɔ no usay una kɔmɔt.’
Dɛn una go se, ‘Masta, na wi ɔl bin de it wan ples ɛn yu bin de lan pipul na trit na wi tɔng.’
Di masta go se, ‘A de tɛl una se a nɔ no usay una kɔmɔt, una go, una kɔmɔt to mi; a nɔ no una, una dɛn wikɛd pipul ya!’
Una go si Ebraam, Ayzik, Jekɔb ɛn ɔl dɛn prɔfɛt insay di ples we Gɔd de rul, bɔt una go kray bita wan ɛn bɛt una tɔng bikɔs dɛn lɔk una na do.
Pipul dɛn go kɔmɔt ɔlsay na wɔl ɛn kam sidɔm fɔ it na di ples we Gɔd de rul.
Sɔm pipul we de biɛn naw go de bifo ɛn sɔm pipul we de bifo naw go de biɛn.”
Sɔm Faresi dɛn kam tɔk to Jizɔs, dɛn se, “Duya, sa, kɔmɔt naya naw bikɔs Ɛrɔd dɔn mekɔp fɔ kil yu.”
Jizɔs se, “Una go tɛl da man de we de mek pipul ful se, ‘A de drɛb dɛbul ɛn mɛn sik pipul fɔ shɔt tɛm fɔs, wɛn da tɛm de dɔn pas, a go dɔn mi wok.’
Bɔt a de tɛl una se, a mɔs du mi wok dis shɔt tɛm fɔs ɛn wɛn da tɛm de dɔn pas sɛf, bikɔs prɔfɛt nɔ fɔ day nɔ ɔda say pas Jerusɛlɛm!

“Jerusɛlɛm, Jerusɛlɛm; una dɔn kil dɛn prɔfɛt ɛn una dɔn ston dɛn wan we Gɔd sɛn to una! Ɔmɔs tɛm a dɔn want gɛda una pikin dɛn lɛkɛ aw kombra fɔl de gɛda in pikin dɛn ɔnda in fɛda dɛn, bɔt una nɔ gri mek a du dat!
Mek a tɛl una, Gɔd dɔn lɛf di ples we una de, gi una. Una nɔ go si mi igen sote unasɛf se, ‘Gɔd blɛs di pɔsin we i dɔn sɛn fɔ kam tinap fɔ am!’ ”
Wan de we fɔ pre ɛn blo, Jizɔs bin go it na wan dɛn Faresi dɛn bigman in os; di pipul dɛn na di os bin de wach am.
Wan sikman we in an ɛn fut bin swɛl kam to Jizɔs.
Jizɔs aks dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha ɛn dɛn Faresi se, “Di Lɔ se fɔ mɛn pɔsin ɔ nɔ fɔ mɛn pɔsin di de fɔ pre ɛn blo?”
Bɔt di Ju Lɔ ticha ɛn di Faresi dɛn nɔ se fing! Jizɔs mɛn di sik man ɛn mek i go.
Jizɔs aks di pipul dɛn se, “Uswan pan una we in bɔy pikin ɔ in kaw fɔdɔm insay wɛl di de fɔ pre ɛn blo nɔ go pul am kɔmɔt insay de wantɛm?”
Di pipul dɛn nɔ ebul ansa Jizɔs in kwɛshɔn.
Wɛn Jizɔs si se sɔm pan di pipul dɛn na di os lɛk fɔ sidɔm na dɛn chia we de bifo we dɛn bigman kin sidɔm, i pul pare bul se:
“Wɛn dɛn kɔl yu na mared, yu nɔ fɔ sidɔm na dɛn chia we de bifo we dɛn bigman fɔ sidɔm pan, bikɔs sɔntɛm dɛn dɔn kɔl pɔsin we impɔtant pas yu na di mared,
ɛn wɛn da pɔsin de kam, di pɔsin we kɔl yu na di mared go kam mit yu tɛl yu se, ‘Mi padi, grap mek dis man ya sidɔm!’ Da tɛm de na shem yu go tek grap go sidɔm na di chia we de biɛn biɛn.

Wɛn dɛn kɔl yu na mared, go sidɔm na di chia we de biɛn, so wɛn di pɔsin we kɔl yu kam si usay yu sidɔm, na in go se, ‘Mi padi, grap kam sidɔm bifo ya!’ Da tɛm de ɔl dɛn pipul we de na di mared go si se yu gɛt ɔna.
Da pɔsin we put insɛf ɔp, Gɔd go put am dɔng; ɛn da pɔsin we put insɛf dɔng, Gɔd go es am ɔp.”

Jizɔs tɛl di Ju bigman we bin kɔl am fɔ go it na in os se, “Wɛn yu de kɔl pipul fɔ kam it, nɔ kɔl yu padi dɛn, nɔ kɔl yu brɔda dɛn, nɔ kɔl yu fambul dɛn ɔ yu jɛntri neba dɛn, bikɔs dɛnsɛf go kɔl yu fɔ go it bak, so i go bi se dɛnsɛf go pe yu bak.
Bɔt wɛn yu de kɔl pipul fɔ kam it, kɔl dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt natin, dɛn wan we nɔ gɛt sɔm pat pan dɛn bɔdi, dɛn wan we nɔ ebul waka, ɛn dɛn wan we blɛn.
If yu du so, yu go gɛt blɛsin bikɔs dɛn kayn pipul de nɔ go ebul fɔ tɔn di gud we yu du fɔ dɛn gi yu bak. Gɔd go gi yu di pe bak fɔ di gud we yu du, da de we in pipul dɛn go rayz frɔm dɛn grev.”
Wɛn wan pan dɛn pipul we bin de it wit Jizɔs yɛri wetin Jizɔs tɔk, di pɔsin tɛl Jizɔs se, “Blɛsin de pan da pɔsin we go it bred na di ples we Gɔd de rul!”
Jizɔs tɛl di pɔsin se, “Wan man bin mek big kuk ɛn kɔl plɛnti pipul fɔ kam it.
Wɛn di tɛm rich we di it dɔn rɛdi, i sɛn in bɔy fɔ go tɛl dɛn pipul we i bin dɔn kɔl fɔ kam it, se, ‘Una kam, di it dɔn rɛdi!’
Bɔt ɔlman we di bɔy mit ɛn tɛl fɔ kam it se dɛn nɔ go kam ɛn dɛn tɔk wetin du. Wan se, ‘A dɔn bay grɔn ɛn a jɛs gɛt fɔ go luk am. Go tɛl yu masta se a nɔ go ebul go it to am.’
Wan ɔda wan se, ‘A dɔn bay tɛn kaw ɛn a want fɔ go luk dɛn fɔ si aw dɛn de wok, so, duya, tɛl yu masta se na dat mek a nɔ go ebul go it to am.’
Wan ɔda wan se, ‘A jɛs mared, na dat mek a nɔ go ebul go it to am.’

“Di bɔy tɔn bak go tɛl in masta wetin dɛn ɔl tɔk. In masta vɛks, so i tɛl am se, ‘Rɔn go na dɛn trit ɛn dɛn kɔna na di tɔng ɛn bring dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt natin, dɛn blɛnyay pipul, dɛn wan we nɔ ebul waka ɛn dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt sɔm pat pan dɛn bɔdi!’
Wɛn di bɔy kam bak, i tɛl in masta se, ‘Masta, a dɔn du ɔl wetin yu tɛl mi fɔ du, bɔt ples lɛf fɔ mɔ pipul, sa.’
Di masta se, ‘Go na dɛn big rod ɛn dɛn bush rod na dɛn vilej say ɛn beg di pipul dɛn de fɔ kam, so dat di ples go ful.
A de tɛl una fɔ tru se, ɔl dɛn pipul we a bin kɔl fɔs fɔ kam it nɔ go tes natin pan di it we dɛn dɔn kuk!’ ”
Wɛn Jizɔs de go, plɛnti plɛnti pipul fala am. Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se,
“If ɛnibɔdi want fɔ fala mi, da pɔsin de fɔ lɛk mi pas in papa ɛn in mama, i fɔ lɛk mi pas in pikin dɛn ɛn in brɔda ɛn sista dɛn ɛn i fɔ lɛk mi pas in yon layf sɛf. If nɔ so, i nɔ go bi mi lanin bɔy.
Ɛnibɔdi we nɔ ebul tot in krɔs, na pɔsin we nɔ ebul fɔ sɔfa ɛn day fɔseka Mi ɛn du ɔl wetin a de du; da pɔsin de nɔ go bi mi lanin bɔy.
“Uswan pan una go want bil os, we nɔ go sidɔm tink if di kɔpɔ we i gɛt go du fɔ bil di os?
If di pɔsin jɛs grap ɛn bigin bil, bɔt i nɔ ebul dɔn di os, dɛn pipul we go si di os we nɔ dɔn go laf di man we de bil.
Pipul dɛn go se, ‘Dis man bin bigin bil os, bɔt i nɔ ebul fɔ dɔn am!’
“Us king we gɛt tɛn tawzin soja man nɔ go sidɔm mekɔp if i go ebul fɔ fɛt in kɔmpin king we gɛt twɛnti tawzin soja man?
If i nɔ go ebul fɛt ɛn i dɔn yɛri se in kɔmpin we gɛt soja man pas am de kam fɛt am, bifo dɛn rich klos in kɔntri i go sɛn mɛse nja go beg fɔ mek dɛn go mek agrimɛnt mek wa nɔ go bi.
Na dat mek, ɛnibɔdi we nɔ lɛf ɔltin na wɔl fɔseka mi, nɔ go bi mi lanin bɔy.
“Sɔl gud, bɔt if i lɔs in tes, aw fɔ du fɔ mek i gɛt tes bak?
I nɔ gud fɔ put na grɔn wɛn dɛn de plant ɛn i nɔ gud fɔ maniɔ sɛf, i jɛs bɛtɛ mek dɛn trowe am. Ɛnibɔdi we gɛt yes fɔ yɛri, mek di pɔsin lisin!”
Dɛn pipul we de gɛda taks ɛn dɛn ɔda pipul we di Ju pipul dɛn nɔba miks wit bikɔs dɛn tink se dɛn nɔ de kip di Ju Lɔ aw dɛn fɔ kip am, bin de kam fɔ yɛri wetin Jizɔs de tɔk.
Dat mek dɛn Faresi ɛn dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha bigin grɔmbul, dɛn se, “Dis man de mek padi wit dɛn bad pipul we wi nɔ de miks wit, ɛn i de it wit dɛn.”
So Jizɔs pul pare bul. I se:
“If pɔsin gɛt wan ɔndrɛd ship, wan lɔs, da pɔsin de nɔ go lɛf di ɔda naynti-nayn ship dɛn na fil go luk fɔ di wan we lɔs sote i fɛn am?
Wɛn i fɛn in ship we bin lɔs, i go tot am, put am pan in sho lda, ɛn i go de gladi.
Wɛn i rich na in os, i go kɔl in padi dɛn ɛn in neba dɛn kam ɛn tɛl dɛn se, ‘Una kam ɛp mi gladi bikɔs a dɔn fɛn mi ship we bin lɔs!’
Semwe so, di gladi we go de na ɛvin fɔ wan pɔsin we bin de pan sin we sɔri fɔ di bad we i du ɛn tɔn to Gɔd pas di gladi we de fɔ naynti-nayn pipul we fil se dɛn tret na Gɔd yay.
“If wan uman gɛt tɛn silva kɔpɔ ɛn wan pan dɛn lɔs, i nɔ go layt lamp, swip ɔl in os, ɛn tek tɛm luk fɔ di silva kɔpɔ we lɔs sote i si am?
Wɛn i dɔn fɛn am, i go kɔl ɔl in padi dɛn ɛn in neba dɛn kam ɛn tɛl dɛn se, ‘Una kam gladi wit mi bikɔs a dɔn fɛn mi silva kɔpɔ we bin lɔs!’
Semwe so, Gɔd in enjɛl dɛn go gladi bikɔs wan pɔsin we bin de pan sin sɔri fɔ di bad we i du ɛn tɔn to Gɔd.”
Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Wan man bin de we bin gɛt tu bɔy pikin.
Di smɔl brɔda kam to in papa ɛn tɛl am se, ‘Papa, gi mi mi yon pat pan yu prɔpati we a fɔ gɛt.’ So di papa sheb di prɔpati ɛn gi di tu brɔda dɛn yon pat.
I nɔ lɔng igen afta dat, di lili brɔda sɛl ɔl in yon pat pan di prɔpati, gɛda di kɔpɔ ɛn go na wan kɔntri we de fawe. Na de i wes ɔl wetin i bin gɛt pan fulish layf.
Wɛn ɔltin dɔn dɔn na in an, natin nɔ bin de fɔ it na di kɔntri we i de, so i bin angri ɛn i nɔ bin gɛt ɛni tin we i want.
So i beg wan pan dɛn bigman na di tɔng fɔ mek i fɛn wok fɔ am. Di man sɛn am go na in fam fɔ go luk in ɔg dɛn ɛn gi dɛn it.
I bin so angri bad dat i bin want it di it sɛf we di ɔg dɛn de it, bɔt nɔbɔdi nɔ gi am pan am.
Wɛn i si wetin bi, i tɔk na in at se, ‘Mi papa in lebra dɛn de it te dɛn bɛlful, ɛn it kin lɛf, bɔt mi de day wit angri!
A nɔ go sidɔm igen, a go go to mi papa ɛn tɛl am se, Papa, a dɔn sin to Gɔd ɛn a dɔn sin to yu.
A nɔ fit fɔ bi yu pikin igen, duya, tek mi lɛkɛ wan pan yu lebra dɛn.’
I kɔmɔt na di kɔntri we i bin de ɛn go bak to in papa. “Wɛn i de go, i bin stil de fawe wɛn in papa si am. In papa sɔri fɔ am, so i rɔn go mit am, i grip am ɛn kis am.
Di pikin tɛl in papa se, ‘Papa, a dɔn sin to Gɔd ɛn a dɔn sin to yu. A nɔ fit fɔ mek yu kɔl mi yu pikin igen.’
Bɔt di papa tɛl in bɔy dɛn se, ‘Una rɔn go bring da klos we fayn pas ɔl dɛn ɔda klos kam wɛr am pan dis mi pikin ya, una put ring na in finga ɛn wɛr sus na in fut.
Una bring da lili kaw we fat pas ɔl, kam; una kil am, lɛ wi it ɛn gladi!
Dis mi pikin ya bin dɔn day, bɔt i dɔn gɛt layf bak. I bin lɔs, bɔt a dɔn fɛn am.’ Dɛn bigin sing ɛn dans.
“Di big brɔda bin de wok na fam ɔl da tɛm de. Wɛn i dɔn kɔmɔt na di fam de kam klos dɛn os, i yɛri dɛn de sing ɛn dans.
I kɔl wan pan di bɔy dɛn ɛn aks am wetin mek dɛn de sing ɛn dans.
Di bɔy tɛl am se, ‘Yu smɔl brɔda dɔn kam ɛn yu papa dɔn kil da lili kaw we fat pas ɔl, bikɔs yu brɔda dɔn kam bak wit in layf ɛn i wɛl.’
“Wɛn di big brɔda yɛri dat, i vɛks ɛn i nɔ gri fɔ go insay di os, so in papa go mit am na do ɛn koks am fɔ go insay.
I tɛl in papa se, ‘Papa, luk ɔmɔs ia naw we a de wok fɔ yu, wande a nɔ jomp yu wɔd, bɔt yu nɔ wande tek wan lili got sɛf gi mi fɔ mek mi ɛn mi padi dɛn go kam it ɛn mek wi ɔl gladi.
Wɛn dis yu pikin ya we dɔn go wes yu prɔpati pan dɛn trit uman, kam, yu kil di lili kaw we fat pas ɔl fɔ am!’
In papa tɛl am se, ‘Bɔbɔ, yu de naya wit mi ɔltɛm ɛn ɔl wetin a gɛt na yu yon.
Aw wi nɔ fɔ ɛnjɔy wisɛf ɛn gladi, dis yu brɔda bin dɔn day, bɔt i dɔn gɛt layf bak; i bin lɔs, bɔt wi dɔn fɛn am.’ ”
Jizɔs tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn. I se, “Wan jɛntri man bin gɛt klak we de luk oba ɔl in biznɛs. Pipul kam tɛl di jɛntri man se di klak de wes in prɔpati.
Di man sɛn kɔl di klak ɛn i aks am se, ‘Wetin a de yɛri bɔt yu so? Gi mi di buk we yu de rayt ɔl wetin yu dɔn yus ɛn wetin lɛf na yu an, bikɔs yu nɔ go du dis wok ya igen.’
Di klak tɔk na in at se, ‘Wetin a go du naw we mi masta de kam pul mi kɔmɔt na dis wok? A nɔ go ebul mek fam bikɔs a nɔ go gɛt trɛnk fɔ dig. A nɔ go go bigin beg bikɔs a go shem fɔ beg.
A dɔn no wetin a go du so dat pipul go gladi fɔ mek a go na dɛn os naw we a nɔ de wok igen.’
“So di klak bigin fɔ kɔl ɔl dɛn pipul we bin gɛt fɔ pe in masta wan bay wan. I aks di fɔs wan se, ‘Ɔmɔs yu gɛt fɔ pe mi masta?’
Di pɔsin ansa se, ‘A fɔ pe am wan ɔndrɛd galɔn pamayn.’ Di klak tɛl am se, ‘Ya dis pepa we dɛn rayt ɔmɔs yu gɛt fɔ pe; sidɔm kwik ɛn chenj di ɔndrɛd we rayt de to fifti.’

Dɔn di klak aks wan ɔda wan se, ‘Ɔmɔs yu gɛt fɔ pe mi masta?’ Di pɔsin ansa se, ‘A gɛt fɔ pe am wan ɔndrɛd bag rɛs.’ Di klak tɛl di pɔsin se, ‘Ya di pepa we dɛn rayt ɔmɔs yu fɔ pe; chenj di wan ɔndrɛd we rayt de to eti.’

“Di masta se di klak we tif du wɛl bikɔs i tink gud bifo i du ɔl wetin i du. Dɛn pipul we tek dɛn tin na wɔl mek gɔd, de tink fa wɛn dɛn de dil wit pipul lɛkɛ dɛnsɛf pas dɛn pipul we de waka na Gɔd in layt.”
Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Una fɔ tek mɔni fɔ du gud ɛn mek padi, so wɛn di mɔni dɔn, Gɔd go gi una ples fɔ tap na di say we go de sote go.
Da pɔsin we yu kin trɔs pan lili tin na pɔsin we yu kin trɔs pan big tin, ɛn da pɔsin we nɔ tret wit lili tin nɔ go tret wit big tin.
If pɔsin nɔ kin trɔs una wit mɔni we dɛn nɔ waka tret fɔ gɛt, udat go lɛf di tru jɛntri na una an?
If dɛn nɔ trɔs una wit ɔda pɔsin prɔpati, udat go gi una prɔpati we go bi una yon?

“Wan slev nɔ go de wok fɔ tu masta. If i bi so, i go lɛk wan masta, i nɔ go lɛk di ɔda wan. I go wok gud fɔ wan masta, bɔt i nɔ go wok gud fɔ di ɔda wan. Una nɔ go de du Gɔd wok ɛn bi slev to mɔni, di sem tɛm.”
Wɛn di Faresi dɛn yɛri wetin Jizɔs tɔk, dɛn laf am bikɔs dɛn na pipul we lɛk mɔni.
Bɔt Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Una de mek pipul fil se una nɔ de du bad, bɔt Gɔd no wetin de na una at. Di tin we mɔta lman luk se impɔtant, na in Gɔd nɔ lɛk at ɔl.

“Pipul bin de tɔk bɔt di Lɔ we Gɔd gi Mozis ɛn wetin dɛn prɔfɛt bin rayt sote di tɛm we Jɔn we bin de baptayz pipul, kam. Frɔm da tɛm de te naw dɛn de tɔk di Gud Nyus bɔt Gɔd in rul ɛn ɔlman de fɛt fɔ go insay di ples we Gɔd de rul.
Bɔt i go izi fɔ mek ɛvin ɛn dis wɔl pwɛl, pas fɔ mek di wɔd we lili pas ɔl na di Lɔ, lɔs in minin.

“Ɛni man we dɔn kɛr in wɛf go kot ɛn pat wit am dɛn i go mared ɔda uman, dɔn sin lɛkɛ man we go gɛt ɔda uman pan ɔl we in ɛn in wɛf de na os; ɛn ɛni man we go mared uman we in ɛn in man dɔn go kot ɛn pat, dɔn sin lɛkɛ man we go gɛt ɔda uman pan ɔl we in ɛn in wɛf nɔ pat.
“Wan jɛntri man bin de we kin de wɛr dɛn dia klos lɛkɛ silk ɛn satin. I kin de kuk plɛnti it ɛn kɔl pipul kam it ɛvri de.
Ɛvri de, wan po man we nem Lazarɔs kin de go ledɔm na di jɛntri man in get. So bin kɔba di po man in bɔdi.
I kin want fɔ it dɛn it we lɛf we di jɛntri man in bɔy dɛn de trowe. Pantap dat, dɛn dɔg kin de kam lik di po man in so dɛn.
“Tɛm kam we di po man day ɛn enjɛl kam kɛr am go put am klos Ebraam na ɛvin. Di jɛntri man insɛf day, dɛn bɛr am.
Wɛn i de na ɛl de sɔfa pen, i es in yay luk, na de i si Ebraam fawe klos Lazarɔs.
Di jɛntri man ala se, ‘Papa Ebraam, sɔri fɔ mi! Sɛn Lazarɔs fɔ put in finga na wata ɛn kam tɔch mi tɔng so dat i go kol, bikɔs a de sɔfa bad insay dis faya ya!’
“Bɔt Ebraam tɛl am se, ‘Mi pikin, mɛmba se yu bin jɛntri ɛn yu ɛnjɔy yusɛf di tɛm we yu bin de na wɔl ɛn da tɛm de Lazarɔs bin po ɛn i bin de sɔfa. Bɔt naw Gɔd de blɛs Lazarɔs bɔt yu de sɔfa.
Ɛn pantap dat, big big ol divayd di ples we wi de ɛn di ples we una de, so nɔbɔdi nɔ go kɔmɔt ya go to una, ɛn nɔbɔdi nɔ go kɔmɔt to una yanda kam to wi.’
Di jɛntri man se, ‘A beg yu, Papa Ebraam, duya, sɛn Lazarɔs go na mi papa in os bikɔs a gɛt fayv brɔda dɛn de, mek i go wɔn dɛn mek dɛnsɛf nɔ go kam sɔfa na dis ples.’
“Bɔt Ebraam tɛl am se, ‘Yu brɔda dɛn gɛt Mozis ɛn dɛn prɔfɛt fɔ wɔn dɛn, mek dɛn lisin wetin dɛn de tɔk.’
Di jɛntri man se, ‘Papa Ebraam, dɛn nɔ go lisin dɛn; bɔt if pɔsin kɔmɔt na di say we dɛn dayman de, go tɔk to dɛn, dɛn go tap fɔ du di bad tin dɛn we dɛn de du.’
Ebraam tɛl am se, ‘If yu brɔda dɛn nɔ lisin wetin Mozis ɛn dɛn prɔfɛt de tɛl dɛn, dɛn nɔ go fil se dɛn de du bad, if pɔsin we bin dɔn day sɛf go bak na wɔl go tɔk to dɛn.’ ”
Jizɔs tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn. I se, “Na tru se tin dɛn mɔs bi we go mek pipul want du bad, bɔt waala go mit di pɔsin we go mek dɛn bi.
I bin go bɛtɛ fɔ da pɔsin de mek dɛn ɛng big ston na in nɛk ɛn trowe am na big wata pas fɔ mek i mek dɛn pipul we jɛs bigin fɔ biliv Gɔd du bad.
So una tek tɛm aw una de du. “If yu brɔda du yu bad, yu fɔ tɔk pan am; if i sɔri fɔ di bad we i du, yu fɔ padin am.
If i du yu bad sɛvin tɛm wan de, ɛn i kam mit yu se, ‘A beg, a sɔri fɔ wetin a du,’ ɛnitɛm we i du yu bad, yu fɔ padin am.”
Jizɔs in apɔsul dɛn tɛl am se, “Masta, duya, ɛp wi, mek wi go biliv Gɔd gud gud.”
Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “If una biliv, ilɛk di biliv we una biliv tan lɛkɛ wan lili sid lɛkɛ mɔstad sid, una kin tɛl ɛni big tik se, ‘Kɔmɔt naya go tinap na wata’ ɛn i go muf go na di wata.
“Ɛni wan pan una we gɛt lebra we de dig fɔ am na in fam ɔ we de mɛn ship fɔ am, go jɛs go mit di lebra wɛn i kɔmɔt wok ɛn tɛl am se, ‘Kam it wantɛm?’
I go tɛl di lebra se, ‘Go kuk fɔ mi, wɛr di klos we yu fɔ wɛr fɔ sav, put di it na tebul ɛn wet sote a dɔn it dɔn bifo yusɛf go it.’
Di masta fɔ tɛl di lebra tɛnki bikɔs i du wetin i tɛl am fɔ du?
Semwe so, wɛn una dɔn du ɔl wetin una masta tɛl una fɔ du, una fɔ se, ‘Wi nɔto bɛtɛ wokman; wi jɛs du wetin wi bin gɛt fɔ du nɔmɔ.’ ”
Wɛn Jizɔs bin de go na Jerusɛlɛm, i pas na di sho midul Same ria ɛn Galili.
As i rich na wan vilej, i mit tɛn pipul we gɛt bad sik na dɛn skin. Dɛn tinap fawe,
dɛn ala se, “Masta! Jizɔs! Duya, sɔri fɔ wi!”
Wɛn Jizɔs si dɛn, i se, “Una go to dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin mek dɛn luk una.” Aw dɛn de na rod de go, na in dɛn ɔl wɛl.
Wan pan dɛn, wɛn i si se in dɔn wɛl, i tɔn bak go mit Jizɔs. I bin de ala big wan de prez Gɔd ɛn tɛl am tɛnki.
Wɛn i mit Jizɔs, i fɔdɔm na Jizɔs in fut ɛn tɛl am plɛnti tɛnki. Da man de na bin man we kɔmɔt Same ria.
Jizɔs se, “Nɔto tɛn pipul a mɛn, we di ɔda nayn?
Nɔbɔdi nɔ kam bak fɔ kam tɛl Gɔd tɛnki pas dis tre nja in wan gren nɔmɔ?”
Jizɔs tɛl di man se, “Grap, go na yu os; bikɔs yu biliv, yu dɔn wɛl.”
Di Faresi dɛn aks Jizɔs ustɛm Gɔd go kam fɔ rul di wɔl. Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Wɛn Gɔd de kam fɔ rul di wɔl una nɔ go si sayn fɔ sho una se Gɔd de kam fɔ rul di wɔl.
Ɛn pipul nɔ go se, ‘Naya Gɔd de rul’ ɔ ‘Na yanda i de rul;’ bikɔs naw, naw Gɔd de rul insay una.”
Jizɔs tɛl in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Di tɛm go kam we una go want si Mɔta lman Pikin bad bad, wan de sɛf wɛn i kam bak na wɔl, bɔt una nɔ go si am.
Sɔm pipul go tɛl una se, ‘Luk Mɔta lman Pikin naya!’ ɔda pipul go se ‘Luk Mɔta lman Pikin yanda!’ Una nɔ fɔ fala dɛn go de.
Di tɛm we Mɔta lman Pikin go kam bak na wɔl, go kam kwik wan lɛkɛ wɛn laytin kin flash na di klawd frɔm wan pat to di ɔda pat.
Bɔt bifo ɔl dis bi, Mɔta lman Pikin fɔ sɔfa plɛnti tin ɛn dɛn tide pipul nɔ go want si am.
Lɛkɛ aw i bin bi wɛn Noa bin de, na so i go bi wɛn Mɔtalman Pikin go kam bak.
Da tɛm de pipul bin de it, drink, ɛn mared. Dɛn bin de pan dis kayn layf sote Noa go insay di bot we i bil fɔ di ren. Big big ren bin fɔdɔm ɛn ɔlman day na di plɛnti plɛnti wata we kɔba di grɔn.
Semwe so, di tɛm we Lɔt bin de, pipul bin de it ɛn drink, dɛn bin de bay ɛn sɛl, ɛn dɛn bin de mek fam ɛn bil os.
Bɔt di de we Lɔt kɔmɔt na Sɔdɔm, Gɔd mek faya ɛn ston we de bɔn lɛkɛ faya fɔdɔm pan Sɔdɔm lɛkɛ ren ɛn kil ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin lib de.
Na so i go bi di de we Mɔta lman Pikin go kam bak na wɔl.
“Da de de, ɛnibɔdi we de pantap ruf nɔ fɔ kam dɔng ɛn go insay in os fɔ gɛda in prɔpati. Semwe so, ɛnibɔdi we de na fam, nɔ fɔ go bak na in os.
Una mɛmba wetin bin bi to Lɔt in wɛf.
Ɛnibɔdi we de tray fɔ sev in layf, go lɔs am; bɔt ɛnibɔdi we lɔs in layf fɔseka mi, go gɛt di tru layf.
A de tɛl una se, da de we Mɔta lman Pikin go kam bak, tu pipul go de slip na wan bed; enjɛl go kam tek wan go ɛn lɛf di ɔda wan.
Tu uman dɛn go de bit rɛs na wan mataodo; enjɛl go kam tek wan pan dɛn tu ɛn lɛf di ɔda wan. [
Tu man dɛn go de wok na fam; enjɛl go tek wan go ɛn lɛf di ɔda wan.]”
Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn aks am se, “Masta, usay dɛn tin ya go bi?” Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Ɛni say we bif we dɔn day de, na de yuba dɛn de go gɛda.”
Jizɔs pul pare bul fɔ in lanin bɔy dɛn fɔ sho dɛn se dɛn fɔ de pre ɔltɛm ɛn dɛn at nɔ fɔ pwɛl.
Jizɔs se: “Wan jɔj bin de na wan tɔng we nɔ bin fred Gɔd ɔ rɛspɛkt mɔta lman.
Wan uman we in man bin dɔn day bin de na da sem tɔng de. Dis uman kin go to di jɔj ɔltɛm ɛn tɛl am se, ‘Pa, a kɛr sɔmbɔdi go kot, duya, fɛt mi kes fɔ mi.’
Plɛnti tɛm di uman kin beg di jɔj, bɔt di jɔj nɔ kin gri fɔ tek in kes. Bɔt wan de, na in di jɔj se, ‘Na tru se, a nɔ de fred Gɔd ɛn a nɔ rɛspɛkt nɔbɔdi,
bɔt we dis uman dɔn de beg mi plɛnti tɛm, a go tek di kes. If a nɔ du so, i go de kam to mi sote misɛf go taya!’ ”
Jizɔs se, “Una yɛri wetin dis jɔj we nɔ tret se?
Una min se Gɔd in pipul dɛn we i dɔn pik ɛn we de kray to am de ɛn nɛt fɔ mek i ɛp dɛn, Gɔd nɔ go tek dɛn kes? Una min se Gɔd go te fɔ ansa in pipul dɛn?
A de tɛl una se, i nɔ go te, Gɔd go tek in pipul dɛn kes ɛn fɛt fɔ dɛn! Pan ɔl dat, wɛn Mɔta lman Pikin go kam bak, a wɔnda if i go mit pipul na di wɔl we biliv pan am!”
Jizɔs pul pare bul fɔ dɛn pipul we biliv se dɛn de waka tret wit Gɔd ɛn dɛn luk se di ɔda pipul dɛn nɔ de waka tret. I se:
“Tu man dɛn bin go pre na Gɔd in Os wan de; wan na bin Faresi, di ɔda wan na pɔsin we bin de gɛda taks.

“Di Faresi tinap ɛn pre kwayɛt wan se, ‘Gɔd, a tɛl yu tɛnki bikɔs a nɔ tan lɛkɛ dɛn ɔda pipul; dɛn de rog, dɛn nɔ de du rayt, ɛn dɛn de lɛf dɛn mared wɛf ɔ man go fɛn ɔda pɔsin na trit. A tɛl yu tɛnki we a nɔ tan lɛkɛ dis man ya sɛf we de gɛda taks.
A de fast tu tɛm ɛvri wik, a de sheb ɔltin we a gɛt tɛn ɛn gi yu wan pat.’
“Bɔt di man we de gɛda taks tinap fawe, i nɔ es in yay ɔp sɛf. I jɛs de nak in chɛst fɔ sho se in at ebi ɛn se, ‘Gɔd, sɔri fɔ mi, mi na pɔsin we de pan sin!’
A de tɛl una se, bifo dis man we de gɛda taks go bak na in os, Gɔd padin am; bɔt Gɔd nɔ padin di Faresi. Ɛnibɔdi we put insɛf ɔp, Gɔd go put am dɔng, bɔt pɔsin we put insɛf dɔng, Gɔd go es am ɔp.”
Sɔm pipul bring dɛn lili pikin kam fɔ mek Jizɔs blɛs dɛn. Wɛn Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn si dat, dɛn tɔk pan di pipul dɛn.
Jizɔs kɔl di pikin dɛn, i tɛl in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Una mek dɛn pikin kam to mi, una nɔ tap dɛn; na pipul dɛn lɛkɛ dɛn wan ya so go kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul.
Fɔ tru, a de tɛl una se, ɛnibɔdi we nɔ gri fɔ mek Gɔd rul am lɛkɛ lili pikin, nɔ go kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul.”
Wan bigman kam aks Jizɔs se, “Ticha, yu we gud, wetin a fɔ du fɔ mek a gɛt layf we go de sote go?”
Jizɔs aks am se, “Wetin mek yu se a gud? Nɔbɔdi nɔ de we gud, na Gɔd in wan gren gud.

Yu sabi di Lɔ we se, ‘mare dman nɔ fɔ lɛf in wɛf ɛn kip ɔda uman ɛn mare du man nɔ fɔ lɛf in man ɛn kip ɔda man, yu nɔ fɔ kil yu kɔmpin mɔta lman, yu nɔ fɔ tif, yu nɔ fɔ lay pan yu kɔmpin ɛn yu fɔ rɛspɛkt yu papa ɛn yu mama.’ ”
Di bigman se, “A dɔn kip ɔl dɛn lɔ ya frɔm we mi na bin pikin.”

Wɛn Jizɔs yɛri wetin di man tɔk, Jizɔs tɛl am se, “Na wan tin lɛf we yu nɔ du yet. Go, sɛl ɔl wetin yu gɛt ɛn sheb di kɔpɔ gi dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt natin. Wɛn yu dɔn du dat, yu go jɛntri na ɛvin. Afta dat kam bi mi lanin bɔy.”
Wɛn di bigman yɛri wetin Jizɔs se, in at pwɛl bikɔs na bin jɛntri man.
Jizɔs si se di man in at pwɛl, so i se, “I tra nga fɔ mek jɛntri pipul kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul.
I tra nga fɔ mek da big bif we nem kamɛl pas insay nidul yay, bɔt i go tra nga pas dat fɔ mek jɛntri pɔsin kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul.”
Dɛn pipul we yɛri wetin Jizɔs tɔk, aks am se, “Wɛl, udat go sev?”
Jizɔs se, “Gɔd ebul du wetin mɔta lman nɔ ebul du.”
Na de Pita se, “Wi dɔn lɛf ɔltin fɔ fala yu.”
Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Mek a tɛl una, ɛnibɔdi we dɔn lɛf os, ɔ wɛf, ɔ brɔda dɛn, ɔ mama, ɔ papa, ɔ pikin dɛn fɔseka Gɔd in rul,
Gɔd go mek i gɛt bɔku pas wetin i lɛf fɔ fala mi yon we, ɛn i go gi am layf we go de sote go na di wɔl we gɛt fɔ kam.”
Jizɔs tek in lanin bɔy dɛn go na kɔna ɛn tɛl dɛn se, “Wi de go Jerusɛlɛm naw ɛn ɔltin we dɛn prɔfɛt bin rayt bɔt Mɔta lman Pikin go bi.
Dɛn go and Mɔta lman Pikin gi dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju. Dɛn pipul de go laf am, dɛn go du am tin we go mek i shem, ɛn dɛn go pit pan am.
Dɛn go bit am, dɔn dɛn go kil am, bɔt Mɔta lman Pikin go rayz frɔm di grev di de we mek tri.”
Bɔt Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn nɔ bin no wetin Jizɔs de tɔk bɔt bikɔs Gɔd bin ayd di minin.
Wɛn Jizɔs rich klos Jɛriko, i mit wan blɛnyay man sidɔm klos di rod de beg.
Wɛn di blɛnyay man yɛri plɛnti pipul de pas, i aks dɛn wetin de bi.
Dɛn tɛl am se, “Na Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt de pas.”
Wɛn di blɛnyay man yɛri dat, i ala se, “Jizɔs we na Devid in pikin, sɔri fɔ mi!”
Dɛn pipul we bin de waka bifo Jizɔs tɔk pan di man, dɛn tɛl am fɔ sɛt in mɔt, bɔt na di mɔ i de ala se, “Jizɔs we na Devid in pikin, sɔri fɔ mi!”
Jizɔs tinap. I tɛl dɛn fɔ bring di blɛnyay man kam to am; wɛn di man kam klos Jizɔs, Jizɔs aks am se,
“Wetin yu want mek a du fɔ yu?” Di man ansa se, “Masta, a want mek yu mek a si.”
Jizɔs tɛl di man se, “A de mek yu si naw, bikɔs yu biliv, yu dɔn wɛl!”
Di man bigin si wantɛm ɛn fala Jizɔs de prez Gɔd. Wɛn ɔl di pipul dɛn si wetin bi, dɛnsɛf prez Gɔd.
Wɛn Jizɔs bin pas na Jɛriko, i bin mit wan man we nem Zakiɔs.
Zakiɔs na bin di edman fɔ dɛn pipul we bin de gɛda taks ɛn na bin jɛntri man.
I tray fɔ si Jizɔs bɔt i nɔ bin ebul si am bikɔs pipul bin plɛnti rawnd Jizɔs, ɛn i bin shɔt.
So i rɔn go bifo say na di rod we Jizɔs fɔ pas ɛn klem pan wan big tik.
Wɛn Jizɔs rich nia di tik we Zakiɔs bin de, i luk ɔp di tik ɛn se, “Zakiɔs, kam dɔng wantɛm bikɔs a mɔs slip na yu os.”
So Zakiɔs kam dɔng kwik, i gladi fɔ kɛr Jizɔs go na in os.
Wɛn di pipul dɛn si wetin bi, dɛn bigin grɔmbul se, “Jizɔs dɔn go slip na man we de pan sin, in os.”

Zakiɔs tɛl Jizɔs bifo ɔlman se, “Masta, a go sheb mi prɔpati tu ɛn gi dɛn po pipul wan pat, ɛn ɛni tin we a bin tek na pɔsin an we a nɔ bin fɔ tek a go gi di pɔsin fo tɛm pas wetin a bin tek na in an.”
Jizɔs tɛl am se, “Frɔm tide, Gɔd dɔn sev yu ɛn yu fambul dɛn bikɔs yusɛf na wan pan Ebraam in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn.
Mɔta lman Pikin dɔn kam fɔ luk fɔ dɛn pipul we dɔn lɔs dɛn we, ɛn sev dɛn.”
As di pipul dɛn de bin de lisin, Jizɔs pul wan ɔda pare bul bikɔs i bin de klos Jerusɛlɛm ɛn di pipul dɛn bin min se Gɔd go kam dɔng kam rul wantɛm.
Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Wan man we fambul to sɔm king dɛn bin go na wan fawe kɔntri fɔ mek dɛn go gi am di pawa fɔ bi king na in kɔntri; dɔn i go go bak na in kɔntri.
Di man kɔl in tɛn wokman dɛn ɛn gi dɛn ɔl wan, wan gold kɔpɔ. I se, ‘Una tek dis kɔpɔ ɛn du biznɛs wit am sote a kam bak.’
Bɔt di pipul dɛn na di kɔntri nɔ bin lɛk di man, so dɛn sɛn mɛse nja go na di ɔda kɔntri we di man go fɔ go tɛl di wan we de rul de se dɛn nɔ want di man fɔ rul dɛn.
“Wɛn di man tɔn bak kam na in kɔntri afta dɛn dɔn gi am di pawa fɔ bi king, i sɛn kɔl in wokman dɛn we i bin gi kɔpɔ fɔ mek dɛn kam tɛl am ɔmɔs dɛn dɔn gen.
Wɛn di fɔs wokman kam, i se, ‘Masta, a dɔn gen tɛn gold kɔpɔ pantap da wan we yu bin gi mi.’
In masta tɛl am se, ‘Yu du wɛl, yu na gud wokman! Bikɔs a ebul trɔs yu pan smɔl tin, a go mek yu rul oba tɛn tɔng.’
Wɛn di sɛkɛn wokman kam, i se, ‘Masta, a dɔn gen fayv gold kɔpɔ pantap da wan we yu bin gi mi.’
In masta tɛl am se, ‘Yu go rul oba fayv tɔng.’
“Wan ɔda wokman kam tɛl di masta se, ‘Masta, ya da wan gold kɔpɔ we yu bin gi mi, a bin tay am ɛn kip am.
A bin de fred yu bikɔs yu gɛt na an. Yu lɛk fɔ tek wetin nɔto yu yon ɛn yu lɛk fɔ pik wetin yu nɔ plant!’
In masta tɛl am se, ‘Yu na bad wokman! Na wetin yu yon mɔt tɔk, na in a de tek jɔj yu! Yu bin no se a gɛt na an; a kin tek wetin nɔto mi yon ɛn a kin pik wetin a nɔ plant,
wetin du yu nɔ bin go put mi kɔpɔ na bank so dat bay di tɛm we a kam bak dɛn bin fɔ dɔn gi mi intrɛst pan am?’
“Na in di masta tɛl in savant dɛn we bin tinap de se, ‘Una tek di wan gold kɔpɔ na in an ɛn gi di man we gɛt tɛn gold kɔpɔ.’
In savant dɛn se, ‘Masta, di man gɛt tɛn gold kɔpɔ, yu de gi am mɔ?’
I se, ‘A de tɛl una se, pɔsin we gɛt sɔntin, Gɔd go gi am mɔ; bɔt pɔsin we nɔ gɛt, di lili bit sɛf we i gɛt, Gɔd go tek am na in an.
Dɛn pipul we nɔ lɛk mi, we nɔ want fɔ mek a rul dɛn, una bring dɛn kam na ya ɛn kil dɛn bifo mi.’ ”
Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn tɔk dɔn, i kɔnti nyu fɔ waka go Jerusɛlɛm.
Wɛn i rich klos Bɛtfej ɛn Bɛtani, we de na da big il we dɛn kɔl Mawnt Ɔliv, i kɔl tu pan in lanin bɔy dɛn kam fɔ sɛn dɛn;
i se, “Una go na da vilej we de bifo wi so. Una go mit dɛn tay wan dɔnki pikin na di get, nɔbɔdi nɔ sidɔm pan am yet. Una lus am ɛn bring am kam to mi.
If ɛnibɔdi aks una wetin mek una de lus am, una jɛs ansa se, ‘Wi Masta want am.’ ”
Wɛn di lanin bɔy dɛn go na di vilej, dɛn mit ɔltin lɛkɛ aw Jizɔs tɛl dɛn.
As dɛn de lus di dɔnki pikin, di pɔsin we gɛt am aks dɛn se, “Wetin mek una de lus am?”
Dɛn ansa se, “Na wi Masta want am.”
Di lanin bɔy dɛn kɛr di dɔnki pikin go to Jizɔs, dɛn prɛd dɛn klos pan di dɔnki pikin fɔ mek Jizɔs sidɔm pan am.
As Jizɔs de rayd go Jerusɛlɛm, di pipul dɛn prɛd dɛn klos na di rod we i de pas.
Wɛn Jizɔs kɔmɔt Mawnt Ɔliv de go dɔng di il, i kam klos Jerusɛlɛm ɛn ɔl dɛn pipul we bin de fala am bigin gladi ɛn ala prez Gɔd fɔ ɔl dɛn big wok we i du we dɛn si.
Dɛn se, “Gɔd blɛs di King we i dɔn sɛn fɔ kam tinap fɔ am! Kol at de na ɛvin ɛn wi de prez Gɔd!”
Sɔm pan dɛn Faresi we bin de na di krawd tɛl Jizɔs se, “Ticha, tɛl yu lanin bɔy dɛn mek dɛn sɛt dɛn mɔt.”
Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “A de tɛl una se, if dɛn pipul ya sɛt dɛn mɔt, dɛn ston ya go ala wantɛm!”
Wɛn Jizɔs rich klos Jerusɛlɛm, as i si di tɔng so, i bigin kray fɔ am.
I se, “Aya, if una we de na Jerusɛlɛm bin sabi naw sɛf dɛn tin we go gi una kol at bɔt una yay nɔ go si dɛn tin de naw.
Tɛm de kam we dɛn wan we nɔ lɛk una go bil ston wɔl rawnd una tɔng, ɛn tinap rawnd am so dat una nɔ go gɛt ples fɔ pas kɔmɔt.
Dɛn go ib una ɛn una pikin dɛn na grɔn ɔlɔbɔt ɛn dɛn nɔ go lɛf wan ston pan in kɔmpin insay una tɔng, bikɔs una nɔ bin no wɛn Gɔd bin kam fɔ sev una.”
Jizɔs go insay Gɔd in Os ɛn bigin fɔ drɛb dɛn pipul we bin de bay ɛn sɛl insay de.
I se, “Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, Gɔd se, ‘Mi Os na ples fɔ pre,’ bɔt una dɔn tɔn am to ples we tifman de ayd!”
Jizɔs bin de tich na Gɔd in Os ɛvri de. Dɛn edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha, ɛn di ɔda Ju bigman dɛn tray fɔ fɛn we fɔ kil Jizɔs,
bɔt dɛn nɔ bin no wetin fɔ du bikɔs ɔl di pipul dɛn bin want yɛri wetin Jizɔs de tich, dɛn nɔ bin want mis wan wɔd sɛf.
Wan ɔda de, we Jizɔs bin de lan pipul ɛn tɛl dɛn di Gud Nyus na Gɔd in Os, na in dɛn edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha, ɛn di ɔda Ju bigman dɛn kam mit am
ɛn se, “Tɛl wi, us rayt yu gɛt fɔ du dɛn tin ya ɛn udat gi yu di rayt fɔ du dɛn?”
Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Mek misɛf aks una wan kwɛshɔn; una tɛl mi,
udat bin sɛn Jɔn fɔ baptayz pipul, na Gɔd ɔ na mɔta lman?”
Dɛn se, “If wi ansa se, ‘Na Gɔd sɛn am,’ Jizɔs go se, ‘Wɛl, wetin mek una nɔ bin biliv am?’
If wi se, ‘Na mɔta lman sɛn am’ ɔl di pipul dɛn go ston wi bikɔs dɛn biliv se Jɔn na bin prɔfɛt.”
So dɛn ansa Jizɔs se dɛn nɔ no udat sɛn Jɔn fɔ baptayz pipul.
Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Wɛl, misɛf nɔ go tɛl una udat gi mi di rayt fɔ du dɛn tin ya.”
Jizɔs pul pare bul fɔ di pipul dɛn, i se: “Wan man plant gre pvayn na in gadin ɛn rɛnt am gi sɔm pipul, dɔn i go patrol na ɔda kɔntri. I lib de lɔng.

Wɛn di tɛm rich fɔ pik di greps na in gadin, i sɛn in bɔy to di pipul dɛn we rɛnt di gadin fɔ aks dɛn fɔ gi am sɔm pan di greps, bɔt di pipul dɛn bit di bɔy we i sɛn, dɔn dɛn drɛb am kɔmɔt na di gadin, dɛn nɔ gi am natin.
Di man sɛn ɔda bɔy; dɛn bit insɛf, disgres am, ɛn drɛb am. Dɛn nɔ gi insɛf natin.
Di man sɛn ɔda bɔy igen, dɛn wund am ɛn drɛb am kɔmɔt na di gadin.
Di man we gɛt di gadin se, ‘Wetin a fɔ du naw? A go sɛn mi bɔy pikin we a lɛk, sɔntɛm dɛn go rɛspɛkt am wɛn dɛn si se na mi pikin.’
Wɛn di pipul dɛn we rɛnt di gadin si di pikin, dɛn se, ‘Na dis pikin dis prɔpati ya go lɛf to. Lɛ wi kil am so dat di prɔpati go kam na wi an.’
Dɛn drɛb di man in pikin kɔmɔt na di gadin dɔn dɛn kil am.” So Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Wetin una tink se di man we gɛt di gadin go du dɛn pipul ya?
I go kam kil dɛn ɔl ɛn rɛnt di gadin gi ɔda pipul.” Wɛn di pipul dɛn yɛri wetin Jizɔs tɔk, dɛn se, “Lɛ Gɔd nɔ mek dat bi!”
Bɔt Jizɔs luk dɛn ɛn aks dɛn se, “Aw una go ɛksplen wetin rayt na Gɔd in Buk we se, ‘Da ston we dɛn pipul we de bil nɔ tek mek natin, na in dɔn kam bi di wan we impɔtant pas ɔl di ɔda wan dɛn.’
Ɛnibɔdi we fɔdɔm pan dis ston ya go brok in bon dɛn ɛn if di ston fɔdɔm pan ɛnibɔdi, i go gren di pɔsin.”

Da sem tɛm de, dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha ɛn dɛn bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin tray fɔ ol Jizɔs bikɔs dɛn kechɔp se na fɔ dɛn Jizɔs pul di pare bul, bɔt dɛn nɔ ol am bikɔs dɛn bin de fred di pipul dɛn we bin lib de.

So dɛn bigin wach Jizɔs, ɛn dɛn sɛn ɔda pipul fɔ wach am. Dɛn tɛl di pipul dɛn we dɛn sɛn, fɔ mek lɛkɛ se dɛn na gud pipul, so dat dɛn go tek di wɔd dɛn we Jizɔs de tɔk kech am ɛn dɛn go kɛr am go bifo di bigman we de rul fɔ mek i go jɔj am.
Di pipul dɛn we go fɔ wach Jizɔs tɛl am se, “Ticha, wi no se ɔl wetin yu de tɔk ɛn lan wi na tru ɛn yu nɔ tek ɛnibɔdi pas in kɔmpin. Wetin Gɔd want mɔta lman fɔ du, na in yu de lan wi, fɔ tru.”
Dɛn aks am se, “I rayt fɔ mek wi pe taks to di king na Rom ɔ i nɔ rayt?”
Bɔt Jizɔs bin no se na sɛns dɛn want pul pan am fɔ kech am, so i se,
“Una go bring wan Roman kɔpɔ kam. Udat in pikchɔ de pan dis kɔpɔ ya ɛn udat in nem rayt de?” Dɛn se, “Na di king na Rom in yon.”
Jizɔs se, “Una gi di king na Rom wetin blant am ɛn una gi Gɔd wetin blant Gɔd.”
Dɛn nɔ ebul kech Jizɔs fɔ wetin i tɔk we di pipul dɛn bin de; di wɔd we Jizɔs tɔk mek dɛn wɔnda ɛn dɛn nɔ ebul tɔk natin igen.
Sɔm Sadyusi dɛn kam mit Jizɔs; di Sadyusi dɛn bin biliv se pɔsin we dɔn day nɔ go rayz frɔm in grev.
Dɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Ticha, Mozis bin rayt se, ‘If pɔsin in brɔda day ɛn lɛf wɛf we nɔ bɔn pikin, di man fɔ mared di uman fɔ mek dɛn bɔn pikin fɔ di brɔda we dɔn day.’
Sɛvin brɔda bin de, di fɔs wan mared, i day, i nɔ lɛf pikin.
Di ɔda brɔda mared di wɛf we i day lɛf, insɛf day, i nɔ lɛf pikin.
Di brɔda we mek tri insɛf mared di uman, insɛf day, na di sem tin bi wit ɔl di sɛvin brɔda dɛn. Dɛn ɔl mared di uman wan afta dɛn kɔmpin, dɛn ɔl day, dɛn nɔ lɛf pikin.
Di uman insɛf kam day.
Di tɛm we dɛn pipul we dɔn day go rayz frɔm dɛn grev, udat go gɛt di uman fɔ in wɛf we dɛn ɔl sɛvin bin dɔn mared am?”
Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Dɛn pipul na dis wɔl de mared;
bɔt dɛn pipul we Gɔd si se fit fɔ rayz frɔm dɛn grev go na ɛvin, nɔ de mared.
Dɛn nɔ go day igen bikɔs dɛn tan lɛkɛ enjɛl naw ɛn dɛn na Gɔd in pikin dɛn bikɔs dɛn bin dɔn day, bɔt naw dɛn dɔn gɛt layf bak na ɛvin.

Mozis insɛf sho se dɛn dayman de rayz frɔm dɛn grev go ɛvin bikɔs na da say we rayt na Gɔd in Buk bɔt da tɛm we i bin tinap bifo da smɔl tik we de bɔn, i bin se di Masta we na Gɔd, na Gɔd fɔ Ebraam, fɔ Ayzik, ɛn fɔ Jekɔb.
If Gɔd na Gɔd fɔ wan pɔsin, dat min se da pɔsin de nɔto pɔsin we day bɔt na pɔsin we gɛt layf, ɛn di layf we wi gɛt we go de sote go na fɔ Gɔd.”
Sɔm pan di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn tɛl Jizɔs se, “Masta, yu ansa fayn.”
Dɛn fred fɔ aks Jizɔs ɔda kwɛshɔn.
Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Aw dɛn pipul ya go se di Mɛsaya na wan pan Devid in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn?
Devid insɛf rayt na di Sambuk se, ‘Gɔd tɛl mi Masta se: Sidɔm na mi raytan
sote a mek yu mas dɛn pipul we nɔ lɛk yu.’
If Devid kɔl am Masta, aw i go bi wan pan in gran pi kin-pi kin dɛn?”
Jizɔs tinap bifo ɔl di pipul dɛn ɛn tɛl in lanin bɔy dɛn se,

“Una fɔ tek tɛm wit dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha ya. Dɛn na pipul we lɛk fɔ wɛr dɛn lɔng gawn fɔ mek ɔlman no se dɛn na big man ɛn dɛn lɛk fɔ mek pipul tɛl dɛn adu na dɛn ples we plɛnti pipul gɛda. Wɛn dɛn go na di Ju mitin os, dɛn kin lɛk fɔ sidɔm na dɛn bɛnch we de bifo ɛn wɛn dɛn go pati, dɛn kin lɛk fɔ sidɔm na dɛn ples we dɛn bigman de sidɔm.
Na dɛn pipul ya kin tek dɛn uman, we dɛn man dɔn day, dɛn prɔpati, ɛn dɛn kin tinap de pre lɔng lɔng lɛkɛ se dɛn na gud pipul. Gɔd go pɔnish dɛn pas aw i go pɔnish ɔda pipul.”
Jizɔs bin de luk, na de i si dɛn jɛntri pipul de kam put mɔni insay di mɔni bɔks we bin de na Gɔd in Os.
Jizɔs si wan po mami we in man bin dɔn day, kam put tu kɔpɔ we na lɛkɛ wan sɛnt so insay di mɔni bɔks.
Na in Jizɔs se, “A de tɛl una se, fɔ tru, dis po mami ya put pas wetin ɔl dɛn ɔda pipul ya put insay dis mɔni bɔks.
Ɔl dɛn pipul we kam put mɔni insay dis bɔks ya jɛs pul kenkeni pan di plɛnti plɛnti mɔni we dɛn gɛt, bɔt dis uman dɔn put ɔl wetin i gɛt fɔ tek manej in layf.”
Sɔm pan di lanin bɔy dɛn bin de tɔk bɔt aw Gɔd in Os fayn, di fayn ston dɛn we dɛn tek bil am, ɛn ɔl dɛn tin we pipul gi fɔ put insay de.
Bɔt Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Tɛm de kam we ɔl dɛn tin ya we una de si ɛn tɔk bɔt so nɔ go de igen. Ɔl dɛn ston ya go skata, wan ston sɛf nɔ go lɛf pantap in kɔmpin.”
Di lanin bɔy dɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Masta, ustɛm ɔl dɛn tin ya go bi ɛn wɛn di tɛm fɔ mek dɛn bi dɔn de kam nia, us sayn wi go si?”
Jizɔs se, “Una tek tɛm mek nɔbɔdi nɔ mek una ful bikɔs plɛnti pipul go tek mi nem kam, dɛn go se dɛn na di Mɛsaya ɔ di tɛm we i go kam bak dɔn de klos. Una nɔ fɔ fala dɛn.
