Jizɔs aks Mata se, “A nɔ bin tɛl yu se, yu go si Gɔd in pawa, if yu biliv pan mi?”
Dɛn pul di ston kɔmɔt na di grev domɔt. Jizɔs luk ɔp ɛn pre se, “Papa, a de tɛl yu tɛnki bikɔs yu de ansa mi wɛn a pre.
A no se yu de ansa mi ɔltɛm, bɔt a de tɔk dis wɔd fɔseka dɛn pipul ya we tinap so, fɔ mek dɛn biliv se, na yu sɛn mi.”
Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn tɔk dat, i ala lawd wan, “Lazarɔs, kam na do!”

As Jizɔs tɔk dat so nɔmɔ, Lazarɔs kɔmɔt insay di grev. In tu an ɛn tu fut bin tay wit wayt pisis, ɛn wayt pisis bin rap rawnd in fes. Jizɔs tɛl di pipul dɛn se, “Una lus di pisis dɛn we dɛn tek tay am, mek i go waka.”
Wɛn plɛnti pan di pipul dɛn we bin kam fɛn Meri ɛn Mata si wetin Jizɔs du, dɛn biliv pan am.
Bɔt sɔm tɔn bak go tɛl di Faresi dɛn wetin Jizɔs du.
So di Faresi dɛn ɛn dɛn bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin kɔl mitin wit di ɔda Ju bigman dɛn. Dɛn se, “Wetin wi fɔ du? Una luk ɔl di wɔnda ful wok dɛn we dis man ya de du!
If wi lɛf am fɔ de du dɛn wɔnda ful wok ya, ɔlman go biliv pan am, ɛn wɛn dat bi, di Roman pipul dɛn go kam pwɛl Gɔd in Os ɛn kil wi pipul dɛn.”
Wan man we nem Kaye fas, we na bin di edman da ia de fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, se, “Una nɔ sabi natin!
Una nɔ no se, i bɛtɛ fɔ lɛ una mek wan gren man day fɔseka ɔl di pipul dɛn na di kɔntri, pas fɔ mek dɛn pwɛl di wan ol kɔntri?”
Kaye fas nɔ jɛs tɔk dɛn wɔd ya bay insɛf, bɔt we in na bin di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, da ia de, i bin de tɛl pipul se Jizɔs go day fɔ ɔl dɛn Ju pipul,
ɛn i nɔ go jɛs day fɔ di Ju pipul dɛn nɔmɔ, bɔt i go day fɔ gɛda ɔl Gɔd in pipul dɛn we skata ɔlɔbɔt ɛn bring dɛn kam insay di wan fambul.
Frɔm di de we Kaye fas tɔk dat, di Ju bigman dɛn bigin tay bagin fɔ kil Jizɔs.
Na dat mek Jizɔs nɔ waka igen na Judia mek ɔlman si am. I kɔmɔt Judia go na wan ples we de klos di dɛzat, na wan tɔng we nem Ifraim, na de i go sidɔm wit in lanin bɔy dɛn.

Di tɛm fɔ di ɔlide we dɛn kɔl Pasova bin dɔn de rich, so plɛnti pipul na dɛn ɔda tɔng ɛn vilej go na Jerusɛlɛm, fɔ du di tin dɛn we fɔ mek dɛn klin na Gɔd yay lɛkɛ aw di Ju Lɔ se, bifo di tɛm fɔ di Pasova rich.
Di Ju bigman dɛn bin de luk fɔ Jizɔs; wɛn dɛn gɛda na Gɔd in Os, dɛn bigin de aks dɛn kɔmpin se, “Una min se Jizɔs go kam na di Pasova?”
Dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn di Faresi dɛn bin dɔn tɔk se, if ɛnibɔdi no di say we Jizɔs de, di pɔsin fɔ tɛl dɛn, so dat dɛn go go ol am.
Siks de bifo di Pasova ɔlide bigin, Jizɔs go Bɛtani, na Lazarɔs in os. Lazarɔs na bin di man we bin dɔn day, we Jizɔs bin wek.
Sɔm pan Jizɔs in padi dɛn na Bɛtani bin kuk fɔ am. Mata bin de ɛp fɔ sheb di it, ɛn Lazarɔs na bin wan pan di pipul dɛn we bin sidɔm na tebul wit Jizɔs.
Wɛn dɛn de it, na in Meri tek wan bɔtul sɛnt tɔn am pan Jizɔs in fut, dɛn i wep dɛn wit in ia; di sɛnt na bin dia dia sɛnt, we dɛn tek wan plant we nem nad mek. Ɔlman na di os smɛl di fayn sɛnt.
Wan pan Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn, Judas Iskariɔt we bin gɛt fɔ sɛl Jizɔs, se,
“Wetin du dɛn nɔ bin sɛl dis sɛnt ya fɔ tri ɔndrɛd silva kɔpɔ, ɛn gi dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt natin, di kɔpɔ?”
Judas nɔ tɔk dat bikɔs i bin want ɛp di pipul dɛn we nɔ gɛt natin, i tɔk dat bikɔs na bin tifman. Na in bin de kip di kɔpɔ fɔ Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn, ɛn i kin de tek pan di kɔpɔ.
Bɔt Jizɔs se, “Lɛf di uman, nɔ ambɔg am! I gud we i du dis bifo di de we dɛn go bɛr mi.
Dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt natin go de wit una ɔltɛm, bɔt mi nɔ go de wit una ɔltɛm.”
Bɔku pipul yɛri se Jizɔs de na Bɛtani, so dɛn go de. Dɛn nɔ go de fɔ go mit Jizɔs nɔmɔ, dɛn go de fɔ si Lazarɔs insɛf, di man we bin dɔn day we Jizɔs wek bak.
So dɛn bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin tay bagin fɔ kil Lazarɔs insɛf,
bikɔs we Jizɔs mek i rayz frɔm in grev, plɛnti Ju pipul bin de kɔmɔt biɛn dɛn ɛn biliv pan Jizɔs.
Di ɔda de, di pipul dɛn we bin go na Jerusɛlɛm fɔ di Pasova ɔlide, yɛri se Jizɔs de kam na Jerusɛlɛm.
So dɛn kɔt plɛnti pam tik ɛn waka go mit Jizɔs na rod. Dɛn bin de ala se, “Prez Gɔd! Gɔd blɛs di wan we i sɛn kam na wɔl! Gɔd blɛs di King we go rul na Izrɛl!”
Jizɔs tek wan dɔnki pikin ɛn rayd pan am. Ɔl dis bi lɛkɛ aw dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se,
“Una nɔ fred, una we de na Zayɔn, una king we go rul una de na rod de kam, i de rayd pan wan dɔnki pikin.”

Di tɛm we ɔl dis de bi, Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn nɔ bin ɔnda stand wetin dat min, bɔt wɛn Gɔd mek Jizɔs rayz frɔm in grev ɛn sho aw i wɔnda ful, di lanin bɔy dɛn mɛmba se, dis wɔd we bin rayt na Gɔd in Buk na bin bɔt Jizɔs, ɛn dɛn si se ɔl wetin rayt de, na in bi.
Di pipul dɛn we bin de wɛn Jizɔs kɔl Lazarɔs kɔmɔt insay in grev ɛn gi am layf, bin dɔn tɔk wetin bi.
Na dat mek plɛnti pipul go mit Jizɔs, bikɔs dɛn bin dɔn yɛri se na in bin du di wɔnda ful wok.
Di Faresi dɛn bigin tɔk to dɛn kɔmpin, dɛn se, “Una si, wi nɔ ebul du natin! Luk, ɔlman de fala am.”
Sɔm Grik pipul bin de wit dɛn pipul we go pre na Jerusɛlɛm, wɛn di tɛm fɔ di Pasova ɔlide rich.
Di Grik pipul dɛn go to Filip ɛn se, “Wi want si Jizɔs, sa.” Filip bin kɔmɔt na Bɛtsa yda we de na Galili.
Filip go tɛl Andru, na in dɛn tu go mit Jizɔs ɛn tɛl am wetin di Grik pipul dɛn se.
Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Di tɛm dɔn rich we Gɔd go sho aw Mɔta lman Pikin wɔnda ful.
A de tɛl una se: wan kɔn sid nɔ go pas wan if pɔsin nɔ plant am. Bɔt if pɔsin plant am na grɔn, i go day, da tɛm de i go gro ɛn bia plɛnti sid.
Ɛnibɔdi we lɛk in yon layf pas Gɔd yon, go lɔs am; bɔt ɛnibɔdi na dis wɔl we nɔ lɛk in yon layf go gɛt layf we go de sote go.
Ɛnibɔdi we want wok fɔ mi, fɔ du wetin a tɛl am fɔ du, so dat i go de wit mi ɛni say we a de. Pantap dat mi Papa go mek ɛnibɔdi we de wok fɔ mi gɛt ɔna.
“Mi at wɔri naw, ɛn wetin a go se? Mek a se, ‘Papa, duya, nɔ mek da awa de mit mi?’ Bɔt na dat mek a kam na wɔl, a kam na wɔl fɔ sɔfa lɛkɛ aw a go sɔfa.
Papa, sho pipul aw yu wɔnda ful!” Na de vɔys we kɔmɔt na ɛvin tɔk se, “A bin dɔn sho pipul aw a wɔnda ful ɛn a go du dat bak.”
Di pipul dɛn we bin tinap de, yɛri di vɔys. Sɔm pan dɛn se na tɛnda krak, bɔt sɔm ɔda wan dɛn se, “Na enjɛl tɔk to am!”
Bɔt Jizɔs se, “Nɔto fɔ mi dis vɔys ya tɔk dɛn wɔd ya, na fɔ una.
Na di tɛm dis we Gɔd go jɔj mɔta lman, ɛn na di tɛm dis we i go pul di wan we de rul dis wɔl kɔmɔt na in chia.
Wɛn dɛn put mi pan di krɔs ɛn es mi ɔp, a go mek ɔlman kam to mi.”
(Wɛn Jizɔs tɔk dat, i bin de tɔk bɔt aw i go day).
Di pipul dɛn se, “Wi Lɔ se, di Mɛsaya nɔ go day. Aw yu se dɛn go put Mɔta lman Pikin pan di krɔs ɛn es am ɔp? Udat na dis Mɔta lman Pikin?”
Jizɔs se, “Di layt go de wit una lili bit mɔ. Una fɔ stil de waka naw we di layt de, so dat daknɛs nɔ go mit una wɛn una de waka, bikɔs pɔsin we de waka na dak nɔ no usay i de go.
Una fɔ biliv pan di layt ɔl di tɛm we di layt de wit una, so dat una go bi pipul we de na di layt ɔltɛm.” Afta Jizɔs tɔk dat, i lɛf di pipul dɛn go na ples we dɛn nɔ go fɛn am.
Pan ɔl we Jizɔs bin dɔn du ɔl dɛn wɔnda ful wok ya we di pipul dɛn si fɔ dɛnsɛf, dɛn nɔ biliv pan Jizɔs.
Ɔl dis bi so dat di wɔd we di prɔfɛt we nem Ayzaya bin dɔn tɔk go kam bi tru. I bin se: “Gɔd, we na wi Masta, udat biliv wetin wi de tɛl pipul? Udat di Masta sho in pawa?”
Di pipul dɛn nɔ biliv bikɔs Ayzaya bin dɔn tɔk igen se,
“Gɔd se, a dɔn blɛn di pipul dɛn yay ɛn a dɔn sɛt dɛn ed, so dat dɛn nɔ go si, ɛn dɛn nɔ go ɔndastand, ɛn dɛn nɔ go kam to mi fɔ mek a sev dɛn.”
Ayzaya bin tɔk dɛn wɔd ya bɔt Jizɔs bikɔs i bin dɔn si aw Gɔd go mek Jizɔs wɔnda ful.
Na tru se, plɛnti Ju bigman dɛn bin biliv pan Jizɔs, bɔt bikɔs dɛn bin de fred di Faresi dɛn, dɛn nɔ bin de tɛl ɔda pipul se dɛn biliv pan Jizɔs, so dat dɛn nɔ go drɛb dɛn kɔmɔt na di Ju mitin os.
Dɛn bin lɛk fɔ bay gudfes to mɔta lman pas fɔ du dɛn tin we go mek Gɔd sati sfay wit dɛn.
Jizɔs tɔk lawd wan se, “Ɛnibɔdi we biliv pan mi, nɔto mi nɔmɔ i biliv pan, i biliv pan di wan we sɛn mi.
Ɛnibɔdi we no mi, dɔn no di wan we sɛn mi.
A dɔn kam na di wɔl lɛkɛ layt, so dat ɛnibɔdi we biliv pan mi, nɔ go lɛf na dak.
If ɛnibɔdi yɛri mi wɔd ɛn du wetin a tɛl am, a nɔ go jɔj am. A nɔ kam fɔ jɔj mɔta lman, a kam fɔ sev dɛn.
Jɔj de we go jɔj ɛnibɔdi we tɔn in bak pan mi ɛn we nɔ gri biliv di wɔd dɛn we a de tɔk. Di wɔd dɛn we a dɔn tɔk go kɔndɛm di pɔsin di las de.
Na so i bi, bikɔs a nɔ jɛs de tɔk wetin mi want tɔk, na mi Papa we sɛn mi tɛl mi wetin a fɔ tɔk.
Ɛn di wɔd we mi Papa tɛl mi fɔ tɔk de mek pipul gɛt layf we go de sote go. So na wetin mi Papa tɛl mi fɔ tɔk, a de tɔk.”

Di de bifo di Pasova ɔlide bigin, Jizɔs bin no se di tɛm dɔn rich fɔ mek i kɔmɔt na dis wɔl ɛn go to in Papa. Frɔm tɛm, Jizɔs bin dɔn lɛk di pipul dɛn na wɔl we biliv pan am, ɛn i sho dɛn se di lɛk we i lɛk dɛn go de sote go.
Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn bin de it. Setan bin dɔn go na Judas in at fɔ mek i sɛl Jizɔs. Dis Judas ya na bin Saymɔn Iskariɔt in pikin.
Jizɔs bin no se in yon Papa bin dɔn gi am ɔl di pawa we i fɔ gɛt oba ɔltin, ɛn i bin no se na Gɔd i kɔmɔt to ɛn na Gɔd i de tɔn bak go to.
So Jizɔs grap na di tebul we dɛn bin sidɔm de it. I pul di klos we i wɛr pantap ɛn tay tawɛl rawnd in wes.
Dɛn i put wata na pan, ɛn bigin fɔ was in lanin bɔy dɛn fut, wan bay wan, dɔn i wep dɛn wit di tawɛl we bin tay rawnd in wes.
Wɛn Jizɔs rich to Saymɔn Pita, Saymɔn Pita aks Jizɔs se, “Masta, na yu de kam was mi fut?”
Jizɔs se, “Yu nɔ ɔnda stand wetin a de du naw, bɔt yu go ɔnda stand am bambay.”
Saymɔn Pita ansa se, “Dat nɔ go bi, a nɔ go gri mek yu was mi fut, sa!” Jizɔs se, “If a nɔ was yu fut, yu nɔ go bi mi lanin bɔy igen.”
So Saymɔn Pita se, “Masta, wɛl, if na so, nɔ jɛs was mi fut nɔmɔ, was mi an ɛn mi ed sɛf.”
Jizɔs se, “Ɛnibɔdi we dɔn was in bɔdi, nɔ fɔ was in bɔdi igen, bikɔs i dɔn klin, na in fut dɛn nɔmɔ i fɔ was. Una ɔl klin, na wan pɔsin nɔmɔ de wit una we nɔ klin,”
(Jizɔs bin dɔn no udat go sɛl am, na dat mek i se, “Una ɔl klin, na wan pan una nɔmɔ nɔ klin.”)
Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn was ɔl di lanin bɔy dɛn fut dɔn, i wɛr in pantap klos bak, dɔn i go sidɔm bak na di tebul, we dɛn bin de it. I aks di lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Una ɔnda stand wetin a jɛs du so?
Una de kɔl mi Ticha ɛn Masta, ɛn na di rayt tin una de tɔk, bikɔs mi na Ticha ɛn Masta.
If mi, we na una Masta ɛn Ticha, dɔn was una fut, unasɛf fɔ was una kɔmpin dɛn fut.
A du dat fɔ sho una wetin una fɔ du, so dat unasɛf go du di sem tin.
A de tɛl una se: Slev nɔ pas in masta, ɛn mɛse nja nɔ pas di pɔsin we sɛn am.
Naw we una dɔn no dat, una go gɛt big blɛsin if una du wetin a tɛl una fɔ du.
“A nɔ de tɔk bɔt una ɔl; a no di wan dɛn we a dɔn pik. Bɔt wetin dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk mɔs bi. Dɛn rayt se, ‘Di pɔsin we wi ɔl tu bin de it wan ples, dɔn de fɛt mi naw.’
A de tɛl una naw wetin gɛt fɔ bi, bifo i bi, so dat wɛn i bi, una go biliv se, ‘Mi na di pɔsin we a bi.’

A de tɛl una se, ɛnibɔdi we gri fɔ mek pɔsin we a sɛn, kam na in layf, dɔn gri fɔ mek misɛf kam na in layf; ɛn ɛnibɔdi we gri fɔ mek a kam na in layf, dɔn gri fɔ mek di wan we sɛn mi, kam na in layf.”
Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn tɔk dɔn, in at bin ebi, na in i tɔk plen wan se, “A de tɛl una fɔ tru se, wan pan una go sɛl mi.”
Di lanin bɔy dɛn ɔl kɔnfyus, dɛn bigin luk dɛn kɔmpin, bikɔs dɛn nɔ bin no udat Jizɔs de tɔk bɔt.
Wan pan di lanin bɔy dɛn we Jizɔs lɛk bad bin sidɔm klos Jizɔs.
Saymɔn Pita mek sayn to di lanin bɔy we bin sidɔm klos Jizɔs ɛn se, “Aks Jizɔs udat i de tɔk bɔt.”
So di lanin bɔy ling in ed pan Jizɔs ɛn aks am se, “Masta, udat na di pɔsin we yu de tɔk bɔt?”
Jizɔs se, “Di pɔsin we a go gi di bred we a go put insay di sup, na in dat.” So Jizɔs kɔt af bred put am insay di sup, pul am ɛn gi Judas we na bin Saymɔn Iskariɔt in pikin, fɔ it.
Jɛs Judas tek di bred so, Setan go na in at. Jizɔs tɛl am se, “Go kwik, go du wetin yu de go du!”
Nɔn pan di ɔda lanin bɔy dɛn we bin de it na di tebul wit Jizɔs, nɔ bin ɔnda stand wetin du Jizɔs tɛl Judas dat.

We na Judas bin de kip di kɔpɔ fɔ Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn, sɔm pan di lanin bɔy dɛn bin mɛmba se Jizɔs bin de tɛl am fɔ go bay dɛn tin we dɛn bin want yus fɔ di Pasova ɔlide ɔ fɔ go gi dɛn po pipul sɔntin.
Jɛs Judas tek di bred so, i go na do wantɛm. Nɛt bin dɔn kam.
Afta Judas dɔn go, Jizɔs tɛl di ɔda lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Naw na di tɛm we pipul go si aw Mɔta lman Pikin wɔnda ful; ɛn naw na di tɛm we Mɔta lman Pikin go mek pipul si aw Gɔd wɔnda ful.
Ɛn if i mek pipul si aw i wɔnda ful, Gɔd insɛf go sho pipul aw Mɔta lman Pikin wɔnda ful, ɛn Gɔd de kam du dat naw.
Mi pikin dɛn, a nɔ go de lɔng wit una igen, una go luk fɔ mi, bɔt a de tɛl una wetin a bin dɔn tɛl dɛn Ju bigman, ‘Una nɔ go go na di ples we a de go.’
Ɛn naw a de gi una nyu lɔ we se: Una fɔ lɛk una kɔmpin. Una fɔ lɛk dɛn lɛkɛ aw a lɛk una.
If una lɛk una kɔmpin, ɔlman go no se una na mi lanin bɔy dɛn.”
Saymɔn Pita aks Jizɔs se, “Masta, usay yu de go?” Jizɔs ansa se, “Una nɔ go fala mi go na di say we a de go naw, bɔt wɛn mi dɔn go, unasɛf go go de.”
Pita aks Jizɔs igen se, “Masta, wetin du wi nɔ kin fala yu go de naw? A rɛdi fɔ day fɔ yu!”
Jizɔs se, “Yu rɛdi fɔ day fɔ mi, fɔ tru? A de tɛl yu se, bifo fɔl kro tumara mɔnin, yu go dɔn tɔk tri difrɛn tɛm se yu nɔ no mi.”
Jizɔs tɛl in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Una put una at dɔng, una nɔ wɔri. Una biliv pan Gɔd, ɛn una biliv pan misɛf.
Plɛnti ples de ɔp to mi Papa na ɛvin; a de go rɛdi ples de fɔ una. If nɔto bin so, a bin fɔ tɛl una.
Ɛn afta a dɔn rɛdi di ples fɔ una, a go kam bak fɔ kam tek una go na di ples we a de, so dat unasɛf go lib de.
Una no di rod we fɔ pas fɔ go na di ples we a de go.”
Tɔmɔs aks Jizɔs se, “Masta, wi nɔ no usay yu de go, so aw wi go no di rod we fɔ pas fɔ go de?”
Jizɔs se, “Mi na di rod we fɔ pas go to Gɔd, na mi de tɛl pipul wetin tru bɔt Gɔd, na mi de gi pipul di tru layf; nɔbɔdi nɔ go kam to mi Papa pas di pɔsin pas tru mi.”
Jizɔs tɔk igen se, “Naw we una dɔn no mi, una go no mi Papa insɛf, ɛn frɔm naw una dɔn no am ɛn una dɔn si am.”
Filip tɔn to Jizɔs ɛn se, “Masta, sho wi yu Papa, na dat nɔmɔ go bɛtɛ fɔ wi.”
Jizɔs aks Filip se, “Pan ɔl we a dɔn de wit una ɔl dis tɛm, yu nɔ no mi? Ɛnibɔdi we dɔn si mi, dɔn si mi Papa. Wetin du yu se, ‘Sho wi yu Papa?’ ”

Jizɔs aks Filip se, “Filip, yu nɔ biliv se a de insay mi Papa ɛn mi Papa de insay mi?” Jizɔs bigin tɔk to ɔl in lanin bɔy dɛn. I se, “Nɔto misɛf mekɔp di wɔd dɛn we a dɔn tɛl una, na mi Papa, we de insay mi, de du in wok.
Una fɔ biliv mi wɛn a tɛl una se mi Papa de insay mi ɛn misɛf de insay mi Papa. If una nɔ biliv mi we a tɔk se a de insay mi Papa ɛn mi Papa de insay mi, una biliv mi fɔseka di tin dɛn we a dɔn du.
A de tɛl una se, ɛnibɔdi we biliv pan mi, go du di wɔnda ful wok dɛn we a dɔn du, ɛn i go du wɔnda ful wok dɛn pas dɛn wan de sɛf, bikɔs a de go to mi Papa.
Ɛn if una tek mi nem pre fɔ ɛni tin, a go du di tin we una want, so dat pipul go si aw mi Papa wɔnda ful.
If una tek mi nem pre fɔ ɛni tin, a go du di tin we una want mek a du.
“If una lɛk mi, una go de du ɔl wetin a tɛl una fɔ du.
A go aks mi Papa fɔ gi una ɔda pɔsin we go de ɛp una fɔ du wetin Gɔd want ɛn i go sɛn di pɔsin kam. Da pɔsin go de wit una sote go.

Di wan we go de ɛp una fɔ du wetin Gɔd want, na di Spirit we go mek pipul no ɔltin we tru bɔt Gɔd. Di pipul dɛn na di wɔl nɔ go mek di Spirit kam na dɛn layf, bikɔs dɛn nɔ de si am ɛn dɛn nɔ no am. Bɔt una no am, bikɔs i de wit una ɛn i go de insay una.
“Wɛn a go, una nɔ go lɛf lɛkɛ pipul we nɔ gɛt nɔbɔdi fɔ ɛp dɛn, a go kam bak to una.
I nɔ go te igen, di pipul dɛn na wɔl nɔ go si mi igen, bɔt una go si mi; ɛn bikɔs a gɛt layf, unasɛf go gɛt di tru layf.
Wɛn da tɛm de rich, una go no se a de insay mi Papa ɛn una de insay mi lɛkɛ aw a de insay una.
“Ɛnibɔdi we du wetin a tɛl am fɔ du, na pɔsin we lɛk mi bad. Mi Papa go lɛk am ɛn misɛf go lɛk am; ɛn a go mek i no mi gud.”
Judas, nɔto Judas Iskariɔt, se, “Masta, wetin du na wi nɔmɔ yu go mek no udat yu bi; wetin du yu nɔ go mek ɔlman na wɔl no udat yu bi?”
Jizɔs ansa am se, “Ɛnibɔdi we lɛk mi go du wetin a lan am fɔ du. Mi Papa go lɛk di pɔsin, ɛn mi ɛn mi Papa go kam to am, ɛn tap wit am.
Ɛnibɔdi we nɔ lɛk mi nɔ go du wetin a lan am fɔ du. Dɛn tin ya we a de lan una, nɔto tin dɛn we misɛf mekɔp fɔ lan una, na tin dɛn we mi Papa sɛn mi fɔ lan una.
“A dɔn tɛl una dɛn wɔd ya naw we a stil de wit una.
Di wan we de ɛp pipul fɔ du wetin Gɔd want, dat na Gɔd in Spirit, we mi Papa go sɛn to una bikɔs a aks am, go lan una ɔltin ɛn mek una mɛmba ɔl wetin a dɔn tɛl una.

“A nɔ de gi una di kayn kol at we di pipul dɛn ɛn di tin dɛn na dis wɔl ya de gi, bɔt a de gi una mi yon kol at. A nɔ de gi mi yon kol at lɛkɛ aw di pipul dɛn na wɔl de gi kol at. Una nɔ ɛng at fɔ ɛni tin, una nɔ mek ɛni tin wɔri una.
Una bin yɛri we a tɛl una se, ‘A de go, bɔt a go kam bak to una’. If una lɛk mi, una fɔ gladi we a de go to mi Papa, bikɔs mi Papa pas mi.
A dɔn tɛl una dat naw bifo i bi, so dat wɛn i bi, una go biliv se na tru a bin tɔk.
I nɔ lɛf lɔng igen we a go ebul tɔk to una, bikɔs Setan we de rul dis wɔl de kam, bɔt i nɔ gɛt pawa oba mi.
Bɔt pipul mɔs no se a lɛk mi Papa; na dat mek a de du ɔl wetin i tɛl mi fɔ du. “Una kam lɛ wi go, mek wi kɔmɔt na dis ples.
“Mi na di tik we ɔlman kin abop pan ɛn na mi Papa de wok pan di gadin.
Ɛni an we de pan mi we nɔ de bia, i de kɔt am kɔmɔt, ɛn ɛni an we de bia, i de trim am, so dat i kin bia mɔ.
Wetin a dɔn lan una dɔn mek una klin.
Una fɔ de wit mi ɔltɛm, ɛn misɛf go de wit una. Jɛs lɛkɛ aw ɛni an we de bay insɛf nɔ go bia pas i de pan di tik, semwe so, una nɔ go du natin pas una de wit mi ɔltɛm.
“Mi na di tik, una na di an dɛn. Ɛnibɔdi we de wit mi ɔltɛm ɛn misɛf de wit am ɔltɛm, da pɔsin de go ebul du plɛnti wok fɔ Gɔd; una nɔ go ebul du natin if a nɔ ɛp una.
Ɛnibɔdi we nɔ de wit mi ɔltɛm, Gɔd go ib am na do; i go tan lɛkɛ an pan tik, we dray we dɛn kin kɔt trowe; dɛn go gɛda dɛn an ya ib dɛn na faya, we dɛn go bɔn insay.
If una de wit mi ɔltɛm ɛn mi wɔd dɛn de na una at ɔltɛm, una kin aks mi Papa fɔ ɛni tin we una want, ɛn i go gi una.
If una du plɛnti gud tin, una go sho pipul aw mi Papa wɔnda ful; ɛn una go sho se una na mi lanin bɔy dɛn.
A lɛk una lɛkɛ aw mi Papa lɛk mi. Una fɔ de wit mi ɔltɛm, so dat una go stil de ɛnjɔy ɔl di gud tin dɛn we a de du fɔ una bikɔs a lɛk una.

If una du wetin a tɛl una fɔ du, una go stil de ɛnjɔy di gud tin dɛn we a de du fɔ una bikɔs a lɛk una, jɛs lɛkɛ aw misɛf du wetin mi Papa tɛl mi fɔ du so a stil de ɛnjɔy di gud we i de du fɔ mi bikɔs i lɛk mi.
“A dɔn tɛl una dɛn tin ya so dat una go gladi lɛkɛ aw a gladi, ɛn ɔl di gladi we fɔ de na una at go lib de.
Di tin we a de tɛl una fɔ du na in dis: Una fɔ lɛk una kɔmpin lɛkɛ aw a lɛk una.
If pɔsin day fɔ in padi, nɔ lɛk nɔ pas da wan de.
Una na mi padi dɛn if una du wetin a tɛl una fɔ du.
A nɔ de kɔl una bɔy igen, bikɔs bɔy nɔ no wetin in masta de du, bɔt a de kɔl una mi padi dɛn, bikɔs a dɔn tɛl una ɔl wetin mi Papa dɔn tɛl mi.
Nɔto una pik mi, na mi pik una; ɛn a pik una fɔ du plɛnti big wok we go mek ɔda pipul gɛt blɛsin sote go. Da tɛm de, mi Papa go gi una ɛni tin we una tek mi nem pre fɔ.
Na dat mek a de tɛl una se: Una fɔ lɛk una kɔmpin.
“If di pipul dɛn na wɔl nɔ lɛk una, una fɔ jɛs mɛmba se na mi fɔs dɛn nɔ bin lɛk.
If una bin gɛt wanwɔd wit di pipul dɛn na wɔl, da tɛm de dɛn bin fɔ lɛk una lɛkɛ aw dɛn lɛk dɛn yon pikin dɛn. Bɔt a dɔn pik una kɔmɔt pan dɛn, una ɛn dɛn nɔ de si wan we, na dat mek dɛn nɔ lɛk una.
Una fɔ mɛmba wetin a bin tɛl una we a se: ‘Slev nɔ pas in masta’. If pipul dɔn mek a sɔfa, dɛn go mek unasɛf sɔfa; if dɛn du wetin a lan dɛn, dɛn go du wetin unasɛf lan dɛn.
Bɔt dɛn go du una ɔl dɛn tin ya bikɔs una na mi yon pipul, ɛn dɛn nɔ no di wan we sɛn mi.
Dɛn nɔ bin fɔ no se Gɔd go mak dɛn fɔ dɛn sin, if a nɔ bin kam tɔk to dɛn, bɔt naw we a dɔn kam, dɛn nɔ go se dɛn nɔ bin no se dɛn sin.
Ɛnibɔdi we nɔ lɛk mi, nɔ lɛk mi Papa.
Dɛn nɔ bin fɔ no se Gɔd go mak dɛn fɔ dɛn sin if, di tɛm we a bin de wit dɛn, a nɔ bin du ɔl dɛn tin we nɔbɔdi nɔ du wande; bɔt dɛnsɛf dɔn si wetin a du, ɛn pan ɔl dat, dɛn nɔ lɛk mi ɛn mi Papa.
Bɔt na so i fɔ bi, so dat di tin we rayt na dɛn yon Lɔ we se: ‘Dɛn nɔ lɛk mi, bɔt a nɔ du dɛn natin we fɔ mek dɛn nɔ lɛk mi,’ kin bi jɛs lɛkɛ aw i rayt.
“Wɛn di wan we de ɛp pipul fɔ du wetin Gɔd want, kam, dat na di Spirit we kɔmɔt to mi Papa, i go mek pipul no di tru tin bɔt Gɔd. A go mek mi Papa sɛn am kam to una ɛn i go tɛl una bɔt mi.
Ɛn unasɛf go tɔk bɔt mi, bikɔs una dɔn de wit mi frɔm di tɛm we a bin bigin lan pipul.
“A dɔn tɛl una dis wɔd ya so dat una nɔ go tap fɔ biliv pan mi.
Dɛn go drɛb una kɔmɔt na dɛn Ju mitin os, ɛn tɛm de kam we ɛnibɔdi we kil una sɛf go tink se i de du wetin Gɔd want am fɔ du.
Pipul go du una ɔl dɛn tin ya bikɔs dɛn nɔ no Gɔd we na mi Papa ɛn dɛn nɔ no mi.

Bɔt a dɔn tɛl una dɛn tin ya naw, so dat wɛn di tɛm rich we dɛn go du dɛn ɔl to una, una go mɛmba wetin a bin tɛl una. “A nɔ bin tɛl una ɔl dɛn tin ya wɛn a bin bigin lan una, bikɔs a bin de wit una da tɛm de.
Bɔt naw a de kam go to di wan we sɛn mi kam na wɔl, bɔt una nɔn nɔ aks mi usay a de go.
Naw we a dɔn tɛl una ɔl dɛn tin ya, una at ebi.
Bɔt a de tɛl una se, i go bɛtɛ fɔ una if a go, bikɔs if a nɔ go, di wan we go ɛp una fɔ du wetin Gɔd want nɔ go kam to una. Bɔt if a go, a go sɛn am kam to una.
Ɛn wɛn i kam i go mek mɔta lman no se dɛn nɔ sabi wetin sin min; i go mek dɛn no se dɛn tin we dɛn tink se rayt, nɔ rayt; ɛn i go mek dɛn no se Gɔd go jɔj ɔlman.
I go mek pipul no se dɛn nɔ sabi wetin sin min, bikɔs dɛn nɔ gri fɔ biliv pan mi.
I go mek pipul no se na dɛn tin we dɛn tink se rayt, nɔ rayt, bikɔs a de kam go to mi Papa ɛn una nɔ go si mi igen.
Ɛn i go mek pipul no se Gɔd go jɔj ɔlman, bikɔs Gɔd dɔn kɔndɛm di dɛbul we de rul di wɔl.
“A gɛt plɛnti mɔ tin dɛn fɔ tɛl una, bɔt una nɔ go ebul fɔ kip dɛn ɔl na una at naw.

Bɔt wɛn Gɔd in Spirit we de mek pipul no wetin tru bɔt Gɔd kam, i go mek una no ɔltin we tru. Gɔd in Spirit nɔ go tɔk wetin in want tɔk, i go tɔk wetin di Papa yɛri ɛn i go tɛl una bɔt dɛn tin we go kam bambay.
I go sho una se a wɔnda ful, bikɔs i go tɛl una wetin a se.
Ɔl wetin mi Papa gɛt na mi yon, na dat mek a se Papa Gɔd in Spirit go tɛl una wetin a tɛl am.
“I nɔ go te igen, una nɔ go si mi, bɔt afta dat, i nɔ go tu te, una go si mi bak.”

Sɔm pan in lanin bɔy dɛn bigin de aks dɛn kɔmpin se, “Wetin i de tray fɔ tɛl wi? I se, i nɔ go te, wi nɔ go si am igen, dɔn i se, i nɔ go tu te, wi go si am bak; ɛn i tɔk igen se, ‘Na bikɔs i de go to in Papa’.
Wetin i min bay ‘i nɔ go te?’ Wi nɔ no wetin i de tɔk bɔt!”

Jizɔs bin no se di lanin bɔy dɛn bin want aks am kwɛshɔn, so i tɛl dɛn se, “A se, ‘I nɔ go te igen una nɔ go si mi igen, bɔt i nɔ go tu te, afta dat, una go si mi bak’. Na dat una de aks una kɔmpin bɔt?
A de tɛl una se: Una go kray bita bita wan, bɔt dɛn ɔda pipul na wɔl go gladi.
Wɛn uman kin want bɔn pikin, i kin sɔri, bikɔs di tɛm dɔn rich fɔ am fɔ sɔfa; bɔt wɛn i dɔn bɔn di pikin, i kin fɔgɛt di pen we i sɔfa bikɔs i gladi we i dɔn bɔn pikin kam na wɔl.
Semwe so, una sɔri naw, bɔt tɛm de kam we a go si una bak, ɛn dat go mek una gladi bad bad ɛn nɔbɔdi kin pwɛl da gladi de.
“Wɛn da tɛm de rich, una nɔ go aks mi fɔ ɛni tin. A de tɛl una se: Mi Papa go gi una ɛni tin, if una tek mi nem aks am.
Te naw una nɔ tek mi nem aks Gɔd fɔ ɛni tin yet; una aks Gɔd fɔ ɛni tin i go gi una wetin una aks fɔ, ɛn ɔl di gladi we fɔ de na una at go lib de.
“Wɛn a de lan una dɛn tin ya, a kin pul pare bul. Bɔt di tɛm de kam we a nɔ go pul pare bul igen, a go tɔk plen wan bɔt mi Papa.
Wɛn da tɛm de rich, una go tek mi nem aks am fɔ ɛni tin, ɛn mi nɔ go gɛt fɔ aks mi Papa fɔ ɛp una,
bikɔs mi Papa insɛf lɛk una. I lɛk una bikɔs una lɛk mi ɛn una biliv se a kɔmɔt to Gɔd.
Na mi Papa a kɔmɔt to kam na wɔl, ɛn naw a de kɔmɔt na di wɔl go bak to mi Papa.”
In lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Yu de tɔk plen wan naw, yu nɔ de pul pare bul igen.
Wi no naw se yu sabi ɔltin, yu nɔ gɛt fɔ aks pɔsin wetin i de tink; na dat mek wi biliv se na Gɔd sɛn yu.”
Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Una dɔn biliv mi gud naw?
Di tɛm de kam ɛn i dɔn kam sɛf, we dɛn go mek una ɔl lɛf mi go; ɔlman go rɔnawe go na in os, una go lɛf mi wan gren. Bɔt nɔto mi wan gren go lɛf, bikɔs mi Papa de wit mi.
A de tɛl una ɔl dɛn tin ya so dat una we gɛt wanwɔd wit mi go gɛt kol at. Mɔta lman go mek una sɔfa, bɔt una nɔ fred! A dɔn win di wɔl!”
Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn tɔk dɔn, i luk ɔp na ɛvin ɛn pre se, “Papa, di tɛm dɔn kam; sho pipul aw yu Pikin wɔnda ful, so dat i go sho pipul aw yu wɔnda ful.
Yu gi am pawa fɔ rul mɔta lman, so dat i kin gi ɔl dɛn wan we yu gi am, layf we go de sote go.
Fɔ gɛt da layf de, we go de sote go, dɛn fɔ no yu, we na di wan gren tru Gɔd, ɛn dɛn fɔ no Jizɔs Krays, we yu sɛn kam to dɛn.
A dɔn mek ɔlman na wɔl si aw yu wɔnda ful, a dɔn du ɔl di wok we yu gi mi fɔ du.
Papa, ɔna mi naw na di ples we yu de, wit da sem ɔna we a bin gɛt bifo di wɔl mek!
“A dɔn mek dɛn pipul we yu pul kɔmɔt to di ɔda pipul dɛn na wɔl ɛn we yu gi mi, no yu. Dɛn na bin yu yon pipul dɛn we yu gi mi. Dɛn dɔn du ɔl wetin yu tɛl dɛn fɔ du.
Ɛn naw dɛn no se ɔl wetin a gɛt na yu gi mi.
A dɔn tɛl dɛn ɔl wetin yu tɛl mi fɔ tɛl dɛn, ɛn dɛn lisin. Dɛn no se na to yu a kɔmɔt, fɔ tru, ɛn dɛn biliv se na yu sɛn mi kam na wɔl.
“A de pre fɔ di pipul dɛn we yu dɔn gi mi, bikɔs dɛn na yu yon pipul dɛn. A nɔ de pre fɔ di ɔda pipul dɛn na di wɔl we nɔto yu yon.
Ɔl mi yon pipul dɛn na yu yon, ɛn ɔl yu yon pipul dɛn na mi yon; ɛn dɛn de mek ɔda pipul no aw a wɔnda ful.

Ɛn naw a de kam bak to yu; a nɔ go de na di wɔl igen, bɔt dɛn go stil de na di wɔl. Duya, Papa, yu we na Gɔd ɛn yu we nɔ gɛt natin fɔ du wit sin, kip dɛn mek natin nɔ du dɛn, bay di pawa we de na yu nem, di nem we yu gi mi, so dat dɛn ɔl go bi wan ɛn gɛt wan at lɛkɛ aw mi ɛn yu gɛt wan at.

Wɛn a bin stil de wit dɛn, a bin kip dɛn wit di pawa we de na yu nem we yu gi mi mek natin nɔ du dɛn. A bin kip dɛn mek natin nɔ du dɛn ɛn dɛn nɔn nɔ lɔs, pas di man we Gɔd bin dɔn mak fɔ go ɛl so dat wetin bin dɔn rayt na Gɔd in Buk go bi.
Naw a de kam bak to yu, ɛn a de tɔk ɔl dɛn tin ya naw we a de na di wɔl, so dat mi lanin bɔy dɛn go gladi lɛkɛ aw misɛf de gladi, ɛn ɔl di gladi we fɔ de na dɛn at go lib de.
A dɔn tɛl dɛn ɔl wetin yu tɛl mi fɔ tɛl dɛn, dat mek di ɔda pipul dɛn na wɔl nɔ lɛk dɛn, bikɔs dɛn ɔl nɔ de si wan we, lɛkɛ aw misɛf nɔ de si wan we wit di ɔda pipul dɛn.
A nɔ de aks yu fɔ pul dɛn kɔmɔt to di ɔda pipul dɛn na wɔl, a de aks yu fɔ kip dɛn mek Setan nɔ du dɛn natin.
Jɛs lɛkɛ aw mi ɛn dɛn ɔda pipul na wɔl nɔ de si wan we, na so dɛnsɛf ɛn di ɔda pipul dɛn na wɔl nɔ de si wan we.
Lɛ yu wɔd dɛn, we na tru mek dɛn bi yu yon pipul.
A dɔn sɛn dɛn ɔlɔbɔt na wɔl fɔ du mi wok, jɛs lɛkɛ aw yu bin sɛn mi kam na di wɔl fɔ du yu wok.
Ɛn a gi yu mi layf fɔseka dɛn so dat dɛnsɛf go gi yu dɛn layf wit ɔl dɛn at.
“A nɔ de pre fɔ mi lanin bɔy dɛn nɔmɔ, a de pre fɔ dɛn wan we go biliv pan mi fɔseka wetin mi lanin bɔy dɛn go tɛl dɛn bɔt mi.

A de pre mek dɛn ɔl gɛt wanwɔd. Papa! Mek dɛn gɛt wan at wit wi, jɛs lɛkɛ aw yu de insay mi ɛn mi de insay yu. Mek dɛn ɔl gɛt wanwɔd, so dat di ɔda pipul dɛn na wɔl go no se na yu sɛn mi kam na wɔl fɔ du ɔl wetin a de du.
A dɔn mek dɛnsɛf wɔnda ful lɛkɛ aw yu mek misɛf wɔnda ful, so dat dɛn ɔl go gɛt wan at lɛkɛ aw mi ɛn yu gɛt wan at.
A de insay dɛn, yu de insay mi; a de pre mek dɛn de lɛkɛ wan pɔsin, so dat dɛn ɔda pipul na wɔl go no se na yu sɛn mi, ɛn yu lɛk dɛn lɛkɛ aw yu lɛk mi.
“Papa! Yu dɔn gi mi dɛn, ɛn a want mek dɛn de wit mi na di say we a go de, so dat dɛn go si aw a wɔnda ful fɔ tru. Yu mek a wɔnda ful so, bikɔs yu bin dɔn lɛk mi bifo yu mek di wɔl.
Papa, yu we de du wetin rayt ɔltɛm, dɛn ɔda pipul na wɔl nɔ no yu, bɔt mi no yu, ɛn dɛn wan ya we biliv pan mi no se na yu sɛn mi.
A dɔn mek dɛn no yu, ɛn a go stil de mek dɛn no yu, so dat dɛn go lɛk mi ɛn dɛn kɔmpin mɔta lman, lɛkɛ aw yu lɛk mi, ɛn misɛf go de insay dɛn.”
Afta Jizɔs dɔn pre dɔn, in ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn kɔmɔt na di ples we dɛn bin de, dɛn krɔs wan watasay we dɛn kɔl Kidrɔn. Dɛn go insay wan gadin we bin lib de.
Judas, we sɛl Jizɔs, bin no di ples gud gud, bikɔs Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn bin dɔn go de plɛnti tɛm.

So Judas go mit Jizɔs ɛn di ɔda lanin bɔy dɛn na di gadin. I go wit sɔm Roman soja man dɛn ɛn sɔm pan dɛn pipul we bin de gyad Gɔd in Os. Na dɛn bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn di Faresi dɛn sɛn di gyad dɛn go wit Judas. Dɛn bin ol lamp, faya tik layt, ɛn tin fɔ tek fɛt.
Jizɔs bin dɔn no ɔl wetin gɛt fɔ bi to am, so i go mit di pipul dɛn we go fɔ ol am, ɛn aks dɛn se, “Udat una de luk fɔ?”
Dɛn se, “Wi de luk fɔ Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt.” Jizɔs se, “Na mi dis.” Judas, we go fɔ sɛl Jizɔs, bin tinap de wit di pipul dɛn.
Wɛn Jizɔs se, “Na mi dis,” di pipul dɛn kip bak ɛn fɔdɔm na grɔn.
Jizɔs aks dɛn igen se, “Udat una de luk fɔ?” Dɛn se, “Wi de luk fɔ Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt.”
Jizɔs se, “A bin dɔn tɛl una se, ‘Na mi dis,’ if na mi una de luk fɔ, una mek mi lanin bɔy dɛn go.”
Jizɔs tɔk dat, so dat wetin i bin dɔn tɔk we i se: “Papa, a nɔ lɔs wan sɛf pan dɛn wan we yu gi mi,” go bi.
Saymɔn Pita we bin gɛt sɔd, pul di sɔd ɛn kɔt di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin in bɔy rayt yes kɔmɔt. Di bɔy bin nem Malkɔs.
Jizɔs tɔn to Saymɔn Pita, i se, “Put yu sɔd bak na di ples we i bin de! Yu tink se a nɔ go sɔfa di sɔfa we mi Papa dɔn mak fɔ mi?”
Di Roman sojaman dɛn, di soja man dɛn bigman, ɛn di gyad dɛn ol Jizɔs ɛn tay am,
dɔn, fɔs dɛn kɛr am go bifo Anas we na bin Kaye fas in fadɛnlɔ, ɛn Kaye fas na bin di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, da ia de.
Na Kaye fas bin dɔn advays di Ju bigman dɛn se i bɛtɛ fɔ mek wan man day, pas fɔ mek ɔl di pipul dɛn day.

Saymɔn Pita ɛn wan ɔda lanin bɔy bin de go wit Jizɔs. Di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin bin no di ɔda lanin bɔy gud, so di lanin bɔy fala Jizɔs go insay di yad we bin de na di edman in os.
Bɔt Saymɔn Pita bin lɛf na do klos di get. Di ɔda lanin bɔy, we bin go insay wit Jizɔs, kɔmɔt na do bak, i tɔk to wan titi we bin tinap na di get, ɛn mek Pita kam insay di yad.
Di titi we bin de na di get aks Saymɔn Pita se, “Yusɛf nɔto wan pan da man de in lanin bɔy dɛn?” Saymɔn Pita se, “Nɔ-o, mi nɔto in lanin bɔy!”
Di ples bin so kɔl, dat di bɔy dɛn ɛn di gyad dɛn mek faya wit kol, dɔn dɛn go tinap rawnd di faya fɔ wam dɛnsɛf. So Saymɔn Pita go tinap wit dɛn fɔ wam insɛf na di faya.
Di edman fɔ dɛn man we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin aks Jizɔs bɔt in lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn di tin dɛn we i bin de lan pipul.
Jizɔs ansa am se, “Na bifo ɔlman a kin tɔk, ɛn na dɛn Ju mitin os ɛn Gɔd in Os, we ɔlman kin gɛda, a kin lan pipul. A nɔ ayd fɔ tɛl ɛnibɔdi ɛni tin wande.
So, wetin du yu de aks mi kwɛshɔn? Aks dɛn pipul we yɛri wetin a tɔk, bikɔs dɛn no wetin a bin tɔk.”
Wɛn Jizɔs tɔk dat, wan pan di gyad dɛn we bin lib de slap am ɛn se, “Na so yu fɔ tɔk to di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin?”
Jizɔs ansa se, “If a tɔk ɛni tin we nɔ rayt, tɛl ɔlman we de naya di tin we a tɔk we nɔ rayt. Bɔt if a rayt fɔ tɔk di tin we a tɔk, wetin du yu slap mi?”
Anas mek dɛn kɛr Jizɔs go bifo Kaye fas we na bin di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin. Dɛn nɔ bin lus Jizɔs yet.
Saymɔn Pita bin stil de klos di faya de wam in bɔdi. Di ɔda pipul dɛn we bin de wam dɛn bɔdi aks am se, “Yusɛf nɔto wan pan da man de in lanin bɔy dɛn?” Saymɔn Pita se, “Nɔ-o, mi nɔto in lanin bɔy!”
Wan bɔy we bin de wok to di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin we bin fambul to di man we Pita bin kɔt in yes kɔmɔt, se, “Nɔto yu a si wit am insay di gadin?”
Pita dinay bak. I ansa se, “Nɔ!” Da sem tɛm de na in fɔl kro.

Ali mɔnin di gyad dɛn go pul Jizɔs na Kaye fas in os kɛr am go na di gɔvna in os. Di Ju bigman dɛn nɔ go insay di gɔvna in os, bikɔs dɛn Ju Lɔ se if dɛn go insay os we pipul we nɔto Ju tap, dɛn nɔ go klin na Gɔd yay, ɛn dat go mek dɛn nɔ fit fɔ it pan di it we dɛn mek fɔ di Pasova.
So Paylet go mit di pipul dɛn na do ɛn aks dɛn se, “Wetin dis man du?”
Dɛn ansa Paylet se, “Wi nɔ bin fɔ bring dis man ya kam bifo yu if i nɔ bin du bad.”
Paylet se, “Una kɛr am go jɔj am bay una yon lɔ.” Di pipul dɛn se, “Una lɔ se wi nɔ fɔ ɛng pɔsin.”
(Ɔl dis bi fɔ mek wetin Jizɔs bin dɔn tɔk bɔt di kayn day we i go day, kam bi tru.)
Paylet go insay di ples we dɛn de jɔj ɛn mek dɛn kɛr Jizɔs go mit am insay de. I aks Jizɔs se, “Na yu na di Ju pipul dɛn King?”
Jizɔs se, “Na yusɛf mekɔp fɔ aks mi dis kwɛshɔn ɔ na ɔda pipul tɛl yu bɔt mi?”
Paylet se, “Mi na Ju? Na yu yon Ju pipul dɛn ɛn dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin bring yu kam bifo mi. Wetin yu du?”
Jizɔs se, “Mi nɔto King na dis wɔl, if mi na bin King na dis wɔl, dɛn pipul we de fala mi bin fɔ fɛt fɔ mi mek pipul nɔ bring mi kam bifo di Ju bigman dɛn fɔ mek dɛn jɔj mi. Mi nɔto King na dis wɔl.”
Paylet aks am se, “Wɛl, yu na King?” Jizɔs se, “Na yu se mi na King. A bɔn kam na wɔl fɔ tɔk wetin tru. Ɛnibɔdi we lɛk wetin tru de yɛri mi wɔd.”
Paylet aks am se, “Wetin na di tru wɔd?” Paylet go mit di pipul dɛn bak na do ɛn tɛl dɛn se, “Dis man ya nɔ du natin we fɔ mek a kɔndɛm am.
Bɔt as a kin mek dɛn pul wan pɔsin kɔmɔt na jel ɛvri ia wɛn di Pasova ɔlide kam, una want mek a lɛf una King?”
Dɛn ansa lawd wan se, “Nɔ, nɔ lɛf da man de! Pul Bara bas kɔmɔt na jel.” (Bara bas na bin bad bad tifman.)
Paylet tɛl di soja man dɛn fɔ kɛr Jizɔs go bit am.
Di soja man dɛn tek chu kchuk mek krawn ɛn wɛr am pan Jizɔs in ed, dɔn dɛn wɛr lɔng dak rɛd klos pan am.
Dɛn slap slap am, dɔn dɛn laf am ɛn se, “Yu we na di Ju pipul dɛn King nɔ tap fɔ rul igen.”
Paylet go mit di pipul dɛn wan tɛm mɔ ɛn tɛl dɛn se, “Una lisin, a dɔn mek dɛn bring am kam to una bak, so dat una go no se a nɔ si natin bad we i du, we fɔ mek a kɔndɛm am.”
Jizɔs kɔmɔt na do, i wɛr di krawn we dɛn tek chu kchuk mek, ɛn di lɔng dak rɛd klos. Paylet se, “Una luk di man.”

Wɛn dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn di gyad dɛn si Jizɔs, dɛn ala big wan se, “Nel am pan di krɔs! Nel am pan di krɔs!” Paylet se, “Una tek am, go nel am pan di krɔs. A nɔ si ɛni tin we i du fɔ mek a kɔndɛm am.”
Di pipul dɛn ansa se, “Wi lɔ se i fɔ day, bikɔs i se in na Gɔd in Pikin.”
Wɛn Paylet yɛri wetin dɛn tɔk, i fred mɔ.
I go bak insay di ples we dɛn de jɔj kes ɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Usay yu kɔmɔt?” Bɔt Jizɔs nɔ gri ansa.
Paylet se, “Yu nɔ de tɔk to mi? Yu nɔ no se a gɛt di pawa fɔ fri yu ɛn a gɛt di pawa fɔ mek dɛn nel yu pan di krɔs?”
Jizɔs se, “Yu nɔ bin fɔ gɛt pawa oba mi if Gɔd nɔ bin gi yu da pawa de. Na dat mek, da man we mek dɛn bring mi kam bifo yu in sin bad pas yu yon.”

Wɛn Paylet yɛri wetin Jizɔs tɔk, i bigin tray fɔ fɛn we fɔ fri Jizɔs. Bɔt di pipul dɛn ala se, “If yu fri dis man ya, yu nɔ lɛk di man we de rul ɔl dɛn kɔntri we de ɔnda Rom. Ɛnibɔdi we se in na King, nɔ de fɔ di Roman rula.”
Wɛn Paylet yɛri wetin di pipul dɛn tɔk, i mek Jizɔs kam na do, dɛn i sidɔm na di chia we dɛn kin sidɔm fɔ jɔj pɔsin, na di ples we dɛn kɔl “Ston Platfɔm”. (Dɛn kɔl am “Gabata” na Ibru.)
Na bin di de bifo di Pasova bigin, bay dɛn twɛlv oklɔk. Paylet tɛl di Ju pipul dɛn se, “Una luk una King!”

Di pipul dɛn ala se, “Kil am! Kil am! Nel am pan di krɔs!” Paylet aks dɛn se, “Una want mek a nel una king pan di krɔs?” Di man dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin se, “Wi nɔ gɛt ɔda king pas di wan na Rom in wan gren.”
Na in Paylet and Jizɔs gi dɛn, mek dɛnsɛf go nel am pan di krɔs. So dɛn tek Jizɔs kɛr am go ɔda say.
Jizɔs insɛf tot in krɔs na in sho lda, sote i rich na wan ples we dɛn kɔl “Di ples we tan lɛkɛ mɔta lman ed”. (Di Ibru pipul dɛn de kɔl da ples de “Gɔlgɔta”.)
Na de dɛn nel Jizɔs pan di krɔs, dɔn dɛn nel tu ɔda man dɛn pan tu ɔda krɔs; wan na Jizɔs in lɛfan, di ɔda wan na in raytan, Jizɔs bin de midul dɛn tu.
Paylet mek dɛn rayt sɔntin we dɛn put pan Jizɔs in krɔs. Dɛn rayt se, “Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt, di Ju pipul dɛn King.”
Plɛnti pipul rid am, bikɔs di ples we dɛn nel Jizɔs pan di krɔs bin de klos di tɔng, ɛn dɛn bin rayt am na tri langwej: Ibru, Latin ɛn Grik.
Di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin tɛl Paylet se, “Mek i nɔ rayt, ‘Dis na di Ju pipul dɛn King’, bɔt mek i rayt, ‘Dis man se, mi na di Ju pipul dɛn King.’ ”
Paylet se, “Wetin a dɔn rayt, na in a dɔn rayt.”
Afta di sojaman dɛn dɔn nel Jizɔs pan di krɔs, dɛn tek in klos sheb am fo say ɛn tek wan wan pat. Dɔn dɛn tek di klos we i wɛr pantap we nɔ stich ɛni say.

Di soja man dɛn se, “Lɛ wi nɔ kɔt am, una lɛ wi ib days fɔ pik udat go gɛt am.” Dis bi, so dat wetin bin rayt na Gɔd in Buk, we se, “Dɛn sheb mi klos to dɛnsɛf, dɔn dɛn ib days fɔ pik udat go gɛt di klos we a bin wɛr pantap,” go kam bi tru. Ɛn na dat di soja man dɛn du.
Di pipul dɛn we bin tinap klos Jizɔs in krɔs na: in mama, in mama in sista, Meri we na bin Klo pas in wɛf, ɛn Meri we bin kɔmɔt Magdala.
Wɛn Jizɔs si in mama ɛn in lanin bɔy we i lɛk tinap de, i se, “Mama, na yu pikin dis.”
Dɔn i tɛl di lanin bɔy we i lɛk se, “Na yu mama dis.” Da sem tɛm de, di lanin bɔy kɛr Jizɔs in mama go na in yon os ɛn mek i tap de.
Wɛn dat bi, Jizɔs bin no se in wok na dis wɔl dɔn dɔn, ɛn fɔ mek wetin rayt na Gɔd in Buk kam bi tru, i se, “A tɔsti.”
Wan jɔg viniga bin lib de; dɛn tay spɔnj pan isɔp tik ɛn sok di spɔnj insay di viniga, dɔn dɛn es di isɔp tik ɛn put di spɔnj pan Jizɔs in mɔt.
Jizɔs sɔk di viniga ɛn se, “A dɔn dɔn mi wok!”

Na bin Fra yde; di Ju bigman dɛn nɔ bin want di bɔdi dɛn fɔ de pan dɛn krɔs di de fɔ pre ɛn blo, bikɔs da de de na bin big de, so dɛn go aks Paylet fɔ mek dɛn brok di man dɛn fut ɛn pul dɛn kɔmɔt na dɛn krɔs.
So di soja man dɛn go to di fɔs man we bin nel pan in krɔs, dɛn brok in fut; dɔn dɛn brok di ɔda man in yon fut.
Bɔt wɛn dɛn rich to Jizɔs, dɛn si se i dɔn day, so dɛn nɔ brok in yon fut.
Wan pan di soja man dɛn tek lɔng nɛf ɛn chuk Jizɔs in sayd, blɔd ɛn wata bɔs kɔmɔt de wantɛm.
(Wan pan di pipul dɛn we bin de wɛn dɛn tin ya de bi, na in tɛl wi ɔl dis fɔ mek una biliv, ɛn wetin i tɔk na tru ɛn insɛf no se ɔl wetin i tɔk dɔn bi, fɔ tru.)
Ɔl dis bi so dat wetin bin dɔn rayt na Gɔd in Buk go kam bi tru. Dat na: “Dɛn nɔ go brok nɔn pan in bon dɛn.”
Ɛn dɛn rayt ɔda say na Gɔd in Buk se, “Pipul go luk di pɔsin we dɛn chuk wit lɔng nɛf.”

Afta dɛn tin ya dɔn bi, Josɛf we kɔmɔt Ari ma tia go aks Paylet fɔ gi am Jizɔs in bɔdi. Paylet gri, so i tek di bɔdi go. (Dis Josɛf ya na man we bin biliv pan Jizɔs, bɔt i nɔ bin mek ɔda pipul no dat bikɔs i bin de fred di Ju bigman dɛn.)
Niko dimɔs insɛf bin fala Josɛf go fɔ Jizɔs in bɔdi. I bin kɛr spays we dɛn kɔl alos ɛn ma wɛn i de go. Di spays bin we bɔt wan ɔndrɛd pawn. (Na Niko dimɔs bin dɔn go to Jizɔs fɔs wan nɛt.)
Di tu man dɛn tek Jizɔs in bɔdi, dɔn dɛn tek di difrɛn kayn spays dɛn put am pan wayt klos we dɛn tek rap di bɔdi lɛkɛ aw di Ju pipul dɛn kin rap bɔdi wɛn dɛn want bɛr am.
Wan gadin bin de na di ples we dɛn nel Jizɔs pan di krɔs. Insay da gadin de wan ston grev bin de we dɛn nɔ bɛr pɔsin wande.
Dɛn bɛr Jizɔs in bɔdi de, bikɔs di de we dɛn nel Jizɔs pan di krɔs na bin di de bifo di de fɔ pre ɛn blo, ɛn di ston grev nɔ bin de fa.
Ali Sɔnde mɔnin, di ples bin stil dak, na in Meri we kɔmɔt Magdala go na di grev. I si se di ston we dɛn bin tek kɔba di domɔt nɔ bin lib de igen.
I tɔn bak rɔn go mit Saymɔn Pita ɛn di lanin bɔy we Jizɔs lɛk ɛn tɛl dɛn se, “Dɛn dɔn pul wi Masta kɔmɔt na di grev ɛn wi nɔ no usay dɛn dɔn kɛr am go!”
So Pita ɛn di ɔda lanin bɔy go na di grev.
Dɛn tu bin de rɔn, bɔt di ɔda lanin bɔy rɔn fas pas Pita, so na in fɔs rich na di grev.
I bɛn luk insay di grev, i si di wayt klos we dɛn bin tek rap Jizɔs in bɔdi, bɔt i nɔ go insay di grev.
Wɛn Saymɔn Pita rich de, in go insay di grev. I si di wayt klos we dɛn bin tek rap Jizɔs in bɔdi,
ɛn di klos we bin rap rawnd Jizɔs in ed, i bin fol wansay na ɔda kɔna.
Na da tɛm de di ɔda lanin bɔy, we fɔs rich na di grev, insɛf go insay. Wɛn i si ɔltin, i biliv fɔ tru se Jizɔs rayz frɔm di grev.
(Bɔt pan ɔl dat dɛn nɔ bin stil ɔnda stand di tin we rayt na Gɔd in Buk we se, i fɔ rayz frɔm di grev.)
Na in di lanin bɔy dɛn tɔn bak go na dɛn os.
Meri bin tinap de kray klos di grev; wɛn i de kray, i bɛn luk insay di grev.
Na de i si tu enjɛl we wɛr wayt sidɔm na di ples we dɛn bin le Jizɔs, wan to di ed say, di ɔda wan to di fut say.
Di enjɛl dɛn aks am se, “Wetin du yu de kray?” I ansa dɛn se, “Dɛn dɔn kɛr mi Masta go, ɛn a nɔ no usay dɛn dɔn go put am.”
Wɛn Meri dɔn tɔk dat dɔn, i si sɔmbɔdi tinap de, na bin Jizɔs, bɔt i nɔ bin no se na Jizɔs dat.
Jizɔs aks am se, “Wetin du yu de kray? Udat yu de luk fɔ?” Meri bin min se na di man we de luk di gadin, so i se, “Pa, if na yu kɛr am go, tɛl mi usay yu put am, mek a go go tek am.”
Jizɔs se, “Meri.” Meri tɔn luk Jizɔs ɛn se “Rabo nay.” (Dat na Ibru wɔd we min “Ticha”.)
Jizɔs se, “Nɔ tɔch mi, bikɔs a nɔ go bak to mi Papa yet. Bɔt go tɛl mi lanin bɔy dɛn se, a de tɔn bak go ɔp to mi Papa we na unasɛf yon Papa. Na mi Gɔd ɛn na unasɛf yon Gɔd.”
So Meri we kɔmɔt Magdala tɔn bak go tɛl di lanin bɔy dɛn se in dɔn si di Masta, ɛn i tɛl dɛn ɔl wetin Jizɔs tɛl am.
Na bin Sɔnde ivin, di lanin bɔy dɛn bin gɛda wan ples ɛn lɔk ɔl di do dɛn, bikɔs dɛn bin de fred di Ju bigman dɛn. Aw dɛn lib de, na de Jizɔs jɛs bɔs pan dɛn ɛn se, “Mek Gɔd gi una kol at.”
Wɛn i dɔn tɔk dat dɔn, i sho dɛn di wund dɛn na in an ɛn in sayd. Di lanin bɔy dɛn gladi bad wɛn dɛn si se na dɛn Masta.
Jizɔs tɔk bak se, “Mek Gɔd gi una kol at. Jɛs lɛkɛ aw mi Papa sɛn mi kam na dis wɔl, na so a de sɛn unasɛf fɔ go du mi wok.”
Dɔn i blo pan dɛn ɛn se, “Una mek Gɔd in Spirit kam insay una.
If una padin ɛnibɔdi we sin, Gɔd go padin da pɔsin de; if una nɔ padin pɔsin we sin, Gɔd nɔ go padin da pɔsin de.”
Wan pan di twɛlv lanin bɔy dɛn we nem Tɔmɔs, we dɛn kɔl “Twin”, nɔ bin de wɛn Jizɔs kam to di ɔda lanin bɔy dɛn.
So di ɔda lanin bɔy dɛn tɛl am se dɛn jɛs si di Masta. Tɔmɔs se, “A nɔ go biliv, pas a si ɛn tɔch di say we di nel dɛn bin wund am na in an, ɛn put mi finga insay di wund na in sayd.”
Afta wan wik dɔn pas, di lanin bɔy dɛn bin gɛda bak na wan ples, ɛn lɔk ɔl di do dɛn. Tɔmɔs insɛf bin de wit dɛn. Pan ɔl we di do bin lɔk, Jizɔs jɛs kam midul dɛn bak ɛn se, “Mek Gɔd gi una kol at.”
Dɛn Jizɔs tɔn to Tɔmɔs ɛn se, “Tek yu finga tɔch mi tu an dɛn ɛn luk dɛn gud. Dɛn, tret yu an put am insay mi sayd. Lɛf fɔ dawt, biliv!”
Tɔmɔs se, “Yu na mi Masta ɛn yu na mi Gɔd!”
Jizɔs aks am se, “Yu dɔn biliv pan mi bikɔs yu dɔn si mi? Gɔd go blɛs dɛn wan we biliv pan ɔl we dɛn nɔ si mi.”
Jizɔs du plɛnti ɔda wɔnda ful wok dɛn we in lanin bɔy dɛn si, bɔt dɛn nɔ rayt bɔt dɛn na dis buk.
Dɛn rayt dɛn tin we de na dis buk fɔ mek una biliv se Jizɔs na di Mɛsaya, Gɔd in Pikin; ɛn if una biliv pan am, una go gɛt tru layf.
Afta dat, Jizɔs sho insɛf bak to in lanin bɔy dɛn, wɛn dɛn bin de klos Lek Taybiryɔs. Na di tin dis we bi:
Saymɔn Pita; Tɔmɔs, we dɛn kɔl “Twin”; Natanyɛl we kɔmɔt Kena we de na Galili; Zɛbidi in pikin dɛn; ɛn tu ɔda wan pan Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn ɔl bin de wan ples.
Saymɔn Pita tɛl dɛn se, in de go fishin. Dɛn se, “Wi go fala yu go.” So dɛn tek bot go fishin ol nɛt, bɔt dɛn nɔ kech natin.
Na mɔnin bifo san kɔmɔt, Jizɔs go tinap na di bich, bɔt di lanin bɔy dɛn nɔ bin no se na Jizɔs.
Na in Jizɔs se, “E padi! Una nɔ kech natin?” Dɛn ansa se, “Wi nɔ kech natin.”
Jizɔs se, “Una sɛn una chen na una raytan say, una go kech fish.” So dɛn sɛn di chen na di say we Jizɔs tɛl dɛn; dɛn nɔ ebul drɔ di nɛt kam insay di bot, bikɔs di fish dɛn bin tu plɛnti.

Di lanin bɔy we Jizɔs lɛk tɛl Pita se, “Na di Masta tinap yanda so na di bich!” Pita bin dɔn pul in klos we i wɛr pantap, so wɛn i yɛri se na di Masta, i jɛs rap am bak rawnd insɛf, ɛn jomp na di wata.
Di ɔda lanin bɔy dɛn tek di bot go na di bich, ɛn wɛn dɛn de go, dɛn bin de drɛg di nɛt wit di fish. Di bich nɔ bin de fa, i bin jɛs de lɛkɛ wan ɔndrɛd yad so frɔm di say we dɛn bin de.
Wɛn dɛn rich na di bich, dɛn si fish de ros pan faya kol, ɛn sɔm bred.
Jizɔs tɛl dɛn fɔ go bring sɔm pan di fish we dɛn bin jɛs kech.
Saymɔn Pita go bak insay di bot ɛn ɛp fɔ drɔ di nɛt kam na di bich. Na wan ɔndrɛd ɛn fifti-tri big big fish bin ful di nɛt. Pan ɔl dat, di nɛt nɔ chɛr.
Jizɔs kɔl dɛn fɔ go it. Nɔn pan di lanin bɔy dɛn nɔ bin gɛt di maynd fɔ aks am se, “Udat na yu?” bikɔs dɛn bin no se na di Masta.
Jizɔs go tek di bred gi dɛn, dɔn i gi dɛn di fish.
Na di tɔd tɛm dat we Jizɔs sho insɛf to in lanin bɔy dɛn, afta i rayz frɔm di grev.
Wɛn dɛn dɔn it dɔn, Jizɔs se, “Saymɔn, yu we na Jɔn in pikin, yu lɛk mi pas aw ɔl dɛn ɔda lanin bɔy ya lɛk mi?” Pita ansa se, “Yɛs, Masta, yu no se a lɛk yu.” Jizɔs se, “Mɛn mi ship pikin dɛn.”
Jizɔs aks Pita sɛkɛn tɛm se, “Saymɔn, yu we na Jɔn in pikin, yu lɛk mi?” Pita se, “Yɛs, Masta, yu no se a lɛk yu.” Jizɔs se, “Mɛn mi ship dɛn.”

Jizɔs aks Pita di tɔd tɛm se, “Saymɔn, yu we na Jɔn in pikin, yu lɛk mi?” Pita in at pwɛl bikɔs Jizɔs aks am tri tɛm se if i lɛk am, so i ansa di Masta se, “Masta, yu no ɔltin, yu no se a lɛk yu!” Jizɔs se, “Mɛn mi ship dɛn.
A de tɛl yu se, wɛn yu bin yɔng, yu kin jɛs rɛdi ɛn go ɛni say we yu want go, bɔt wɛn yu dɔn ol, yu go tret yu an dɛn, ɛn ɔda pɔsin go tay dɛn ɛn kɛr yu go say we yu nɔ want go.”
(Wɛn Jizɔs tɔk dat, i bin de sho aw Pita go day, ɛn ɔna Gɔd.) Dɛn Jizɔs tɛl am se, “Du wetin a tɛl yu fɔ du.”
Pita tɔn rawnd ɛn si di lanin bɔy we Jizɔs lɛk biɛn am. Na da lanin bɔy de bin sidɔm klos Jizɔs wɛn dɛn bin de it, ɛn na in bin aks Jizɔs se, “Masta, udat go sɛl yu?”
Wɛn Pita si am, i aks Jizɔs se, “Masta, wetin go bi to dis man ya?”
Jizɔs ansa se, “If a want mek i de na wɔl sote a kam bak, uswan na yu yon de? Yu du wetin a tɛl yu fɔ du.”

Di wɔd go rawnd to ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs se, di lanin bɔy we Jizɔs lɛk nɔ go day. Bɔt Jizɔs nɔ bin se di lanin bɔy nɔ go day, i bin jɛs se, “If a want mek i de na wɔl sote a kam bak, uswan na yu yon de?”
Na di lanin bɔy dat we si ɛn yɛri ɔl dɛn tin ya, na in rayt dɛn na dis buk, ɛn wi no se ɔl wetin i rayt na tru.
Plɛnti ɔda tin dɛn de we Jizɔs du. If dɛn bin rayt dɛn ɔl wan bay wan, a tink se di wɔl nɔ bin fɔ gɛt ples fɔ ɔl di buk dɛn we dɛn bin fɔ yus fɔ rayt dɛn.
Mista Tio filɔs, na di fɔs lɛta we a bin rayt yu, a bin tɔk bɔt ɔl wetin Jizɔs bin lan pipul frɔm di tɛm we i bigin in wok
sote di de we Gɔd tek am go ɛvin. Bifo Jizɔs go ɛvin, Gɔd in Spirit we bin de pan am mek i tɛl dɛn apɔsul we i pik wetin dɛn fɔ du.

Afta Jizɔs day, fɔ fɔti de i bin de sho insɛf to in apɔsul dɛn; ɛn bay aw i kin sho insɛf ɔltɛm, in apɔsul dɛn nɔ dawt se i bin stil de layf wan. Ɛnitɛm we Jizɔs sho insɛf to dɛn, i kin tɛl dɛn bɔt Gɔd in rul.
Di tɛm we Jizɔs bin stil de wit dɛn, i bin tɛl dɛn fɔ du sɔntin; i bin se, “Una nɔ fɔ kɔmɔt na Jerusɛlɛm, una fɔ wet te una gɛt wetin mi Papa dɔn prɔmis una, we a bin dɔn tɛl una bɔt.
Jɔn bin de baptayz pipul wit wata, bɔt i nɔ go te igen Gɔd go baptayz una wit in Spirit.”
Wɛn di apɔsul dɛn bin gɛda na wan mitin, dɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Masta, na naw yu go mek di Izrɛl pipul dɛn rul bak?”
Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Na mi Papa nɔmɔ gɛt rayt fɔ tɔk ustɛm ɔl dɛn tin de go bi, nɔto una.
Wɛn Gɔd in Spirit kam pan una, i go gi una pawa fɔ mek una tɔk bɔt mi na Jerusɛlɛm, na Judia, na Same ria ɛn ɔlɔbɔt na wɔl.”
Wɛn Jizɔs tɔk dɔn, aw di apɔsul dɛn de luk am, na in Gɔd tek am go ɔp na ɛvin. Di apɔsul dɛn luk Jizɔs sote i lɔs na di klawd.
We di apɔsul dɛn bin de luk fɔ Jizɔs na di klawd, na de dɛn si tu man we wɛr wayt kam tinap klos dɛn.
Di tu man dɛn tɛl dɛn se, “Una we kɔmɔt Galili, wetin du una de luk na di klawd? Dis sem Jizɔs ya we Gɔd tek go ɔp na ɛvin go kam bak na wɔl lɛkɛ aw una si am de go ɔp na ɛvin.”
Di apɔsul dɛn kɔmɔt na di ay il we nem Mawnt Ɔliv, go bak na Jerusɛlɛm. (Na af mayl frɔm Mawnt Ɔliv to Jerusɛlɛm. Di Ju Lɔ se pɔsin nɔ fɔ waka pas af mayl di de we fɔ pre ɛn blo.)

Wɛn dɛn rich na Jerusɛlɛm, dɛn go na wan rum ɔp di garɛt na di os we dɛn bin tap. Di pipul dɛn we bin tap de na Pita, Jɔn, Jems, Andru, Filip, Tɔmɔs, Bata lo myu, Matyu, Jems we na Alfiɔs in pikin, Saymɔn we bin de fɛt fɔ fri in kɔntri, Judas we na bin Jems in pikin.
Dɛn apɔsul ya, Jizɔs in brɔda dɛn, sɔm uman dɛn, ɛn Meri we na Jizɔs in mama, dɛn ɔl bin de mit de ɛn pre wit wan at.
Wan de, dɛn wan we biliv pan Jizɔs bin gɛt mitin; na bɔt wan ɔndrɛd ɛn twɛnti pipul bin go di mitin. Pita tinap midul di pipul dɛn
ɛn bigin tɔk to dɛn se, “Mi pipul dɛn, Gɔd in Spirit bin mek Devid rayt lɔntɛm na Gɔd in Buk bɔt Judas, da man we bin de bifo dɛn pipul we go ol Jizɔs; ɔl wetin i bin dɔn rayt bin jɛs gɛt fɔ bi.
Judas na bin wan pan wi ɛn na wi ɔl bin de wok fɔ Gɔd.”
(Wɛn Judas sɛl Jizɔs, i tek di kɔpɔ go bay grɔn. Na da grɔn de Judas fɔdɔm kam dɔng, in bɛlɛ plit ɛn in gɔt kɔmɔt na do.
Ɔlman na Jerusɛlɛm bin yɛri bɔt wetin bi to Judas ɛn dɛn kɔl di ples we Judas day, Akɛldama, we min “Grɔn we Pɔsin Blɔd Wes”.)
“Dɛn rayt na di Sambuk se, ‘Mek natin nɔ lɛf na in os ɛn mek nɔbɔdi nɔ sidɔm de.’ Dɛn rayt igen se, ‘Mek ɔda pɔsin du di wok we i bin de du.’
“Na dat mek wi fɔ pik wan man we fɔ tɛl ɔda pipul se Jizɔs rayz frɔm di grev. Di pɔsin we wi go pik fɔ dɔn de wit wi frɔm di tɛm we Jɔn bin de baptayz pipul sote di tɛm we Gɔd tek Jizɔs go ɛvin.”
Dɛn pik tu pɔsin: Josɛf Basa bas (we nem Jɔstɔs) ɛn Mata yas.
Dɛn pre se, “Masta, yu we sabi ɔlman at, duya, sho wi pan dɛn tu man ya, di pɔsin we yu dɔn pik
fɔ du di wok we Judas dɔn lɛf. Judas dɔn go na di say we i fɔ go.”
Dɛn Ju pipul gɛt we fɔ no wetin Gɔd want, so di ilɛvin apɔsul dɛn trowe sɔntin na grɔn fɔ pik di wan pɔsin. Na Mata yas nem kɔmɔt so dɛn mek i bi wan pan di apɔsul dɛn.
Di de we dɛn kɔl Pɛntikɔst, we na di de we mek fifti frɔm di tɛm we dɛn mek di Ju ɔlide we dɛn kɔl Pasova, ɔl dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs bin gɛda wan ples fɔ pre.
Wantɛm, dɛn yɛri nɔys lɛkɛ big briz de blo ɛn di nɔys bin de ɔlɔbɔt insay di os we dɛn bin de.
Dɛn si tin dɛn lɛkɛ lili lili faya na di ples we dɛn bin de, ɛn di lili lili faya dɛn kam pan dɛn ɔl.
Gɔd in Spirit kam insay dɛn ɔl we bin lib de ɛn mek dɛn ɔl bigin tɔk langwej we dɛn nɔ lan; ɛni tin we Gɔd in Spirit want mek dɛn tɔk, na in dɛn tɔk.
Ɔl dɛn Ju pipul we fred Gɔd, we kɔmɔt ɔlɔbɔt na dɛn ɔda kɔntri, bin de na Jerusɛlɛm da tɛm de.
Wɛn dɛn yɛri di briz de blo na di os, big big krawd kam gɛda de luk; dɛn mɔt ful wɛn dɛn ɔl yɛri dɛn pipul we biliv Jizɔs de tɔk dɛn difrɛn difrɛn langwej. Ɔlman yɛri pipul de tɔk in yon langwej.
Di pipul dɛn ɔl wɔnda, dɛn mɔt ful; dɛn se, “Dɛn man ya we wi de yɛri so, nɔto Galili dɛn kɔmɔt?
Aw wi yɛri dɛn de tɔk dɛn difrɛn difrɛn langwej we wi de tɔk sins wi bɔn?
Sɔm pan wi kɔmɔt Patia, Midya, Ilam, Mɛso po te mya, Judia, Kapa do shya, Pɔntɔs, ɛn Eshya.
Sɔm pan wi kɔmɔt Fri jya, Pamfi lya, Ijipt ɛn ɔlsay na Libya we de klos Sayrini; sɔm pan wi kɔmɔt Rom.

Wi ɔl miks: Ju pipul ɛn dɛn pipul we gri fɔ tɔn to Ju, ɛn sɔm pan wi kɔmɔt Krit ɛn Are bia; bɔt pan ɔl dat wi ɔl de yɛri dɛn pipul ya we kɔmɔt Galili de tɔk na wi yon difrɛn langwej dɛn bɔt dɛn big wok we Gɔd de du.”
Di pipul dɛn bin wɔnda, dɛn nɔ bin no wetin de bi, so dɛn bigin fɔ aks dɛn kɔmpin se, “Wetin dis min?”
Bɔt sɔm pan dɛn bin de laf, de tɔk se, “Dɛn man ya dɔn drɔnk!”
Wɛn dɛn tɔk so, na in Pita ɛn di ɔda ilɛvin apɔsul dɛn tinap; Pita bigin fɔ tɔk to di pipul dɛn lawd wan. I se, “Mi Ju pipul dɛn ɛn una ɔl we de na Jerusɛlɛm, una lisin wetin a de kam tɛl una.
Una de tɔk se dɛn man ya drɔnk, bɔt dɛn nɔ drɔnk, i jɛs nayn oklɔk na mɔnin.
Na di tin dis we da prɔfɛt we nem Joɛl bin de tɔk bɔt wɛn i se:

‘Gɔd se, “Na di tin dis we a go du wɛn di wɔl want dɔn, a go gi ɔlman mi Spirit. Una gyal pikin ɛn una bɔy pikin dɛn go tɛl pipul mi mɛsej; una yɔng man dɛn go si tin we a sho dɛn, ɛn una ol man dɛn go drim plɛnti tin.
Yɛs, wɛn di wɔl want dɔn, a go gi ɔl dɛn wan we de du mi wok mi Spirit, ɛn dɛn go tɔk wetin go bi.
A go sho sayn na di klawd ɛn ɔlsay na wɔl. Una go si blɔd, faya, ɛn plɛnti smok.
Bifo di big de we di Masta go kam bak, di san go dak lɛkɛ nɛt ɛn di mun go rɛd lɛkɛ blɔd.
Ɛn ɛnibɔdi we go kɔl di Masta go sev.” ’
“Una dɛn pipul na Izrɛl, una opin una yes gud ɛn lisin wetin a de tɔk. Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt na Man we Gɔd sɛn to wi.Unasɛf no bɔt ɔl dɛn tin ya bikɔs naya dɛn bi.
Una sɛl Jizɔs gi dɛn wikɛd pipul. Gɔd bin dɔn no bɔt dat ɛn i bin dɔn gri fɔ mek dat bi. Una gi dɛn wikɛd pipul pawa fɔ nel Jizɔs na di krɔs.
Bɔt Gɔd wek Jizɔs we bin dɔn day ɛn mek am rayz frɔm di grev; i nɔ mek day mek i sɔfa igen bikɔs day nɔ bin gɛt pawa fɔ mek i nɔ rayz igen.
Devid bin tɔk bɔt Jizɔs se, ‘A de si mi Masta bifo mi ɔltɛm; i de wit mi, so a nɔ go wɔri.
Na dat mek mi at gladi, ɛn a prez am wit mi mɔt. Pan ɔl we mi na mɔtalman, a de abop pan wetin Gɔd dɔn prɔmis.
Yu nɔ go lɛf mi na grev; Yu nɔ go gri fɔ mek di wan we na yu yon ɛn we de wok fɔ yu rɔtin na di grev.
Yu dɔn sho mi aw a go gɛt layf. We yu de wit mi, yu go mek a gladi.’
“Mi pipul dɛn, a de tɛl una tru wɔd bɔt Devid, we na wan pan wi gra npapa-papa dɛn. I day, dɛn bɛr am ɛn in grev de sote tide.
We Devid na bin prɔfɛt, i bin no se Gɔd bin dɔn prɔmis am siryɔs wan se in go mek wan pan in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn bi king lɛkɛ insɛf, ɛn dat na Krays.
Devid bin dɔn no bifo di tin bi, na dat mek i tɔk bɔt aw di Mɛsaya go rayz frɔm di grev, i se, ‘Dɛn bɛr am, bɔt in bɔdi nɔ rɔtin.’
Gɔd dɔn mek Jizɔs rayz frɔm di grev ɛn wi, we na in apɔsul dɛn de tɛl una bɔt wetin bin bi we wisɛf si.
Gɔd dɔn mek Jizɔs rayz frɔm di grev ɛn mek i sidɔm na in raytan. Papa Gɔd dɔn gi Jizɔs in Spirit we i bin prɔmis ɛn ɔl wetin una de si ɛn wetin una de yɛri, na Jizɔs de mek dɛn bi.
Devid nɔ bin go ɔp na ɛvin, bɔt i tɔk se, ‘Gɔd tɛl mi Masta se, Kam sidɔm na mi raytan
wet sote a mek dɛn pipul we nɔ lɛk yu kam ɔnda yu fut mek yu go mas dɛn.’
“Mek ɔlman na Izrɛl no se Gɔd dɔn mek Jizɔs we una bin nel na di krɔs, rayz frɔm di grev. Gɔd dɔn kɔl am di Masta ɛn di Mɛsaya!”
Wɛn di pipul dɛn yɛri ɔl wetin Pita tɔk, dɛn at kɔt; dɛn aks Pita ɛn di ɔda apɔsul dɛn se, “Wi brɔda dɛn, wetin wi fɔ du?”
Pita ansa dɛn se, “Una ɔl fɔ lɛf dɛn bad tin we una de du ɛn kam to Gɔd. Mek dɛn baptayz una wit Jizɔs Krays in nem; Gɔd go padin una fɔ di bad tin dɛn we una de du ɛn i go gi una in Spirit.
Di prɔmis we Gɔd bin prɔmis, na fɔ una, fɔ una pikin dɛn, fɔ ɔl dɛn wan we nɔ bɔn yet, ɛn ɔl dɛn pipul we Gɔd dɔn kɔl fɔ kam to am.”
Pita tɔk to dɛn ɛn wɔn dɛn se, “Una du dɛn tin we go mek una nɔ sɔfa, lɛkɛ aw dɛn wikɛd pipul na dis neshɔn go sɔfa.”
Plɛnti pipul we yɛri wetin Pita tɔk biliv pan Jizɔs ɛn di apɔsul dɛn baptayz tri tawzin pipul.
Di apɔsul dɛn bin de lan dɛn Gɔd in wɔd. Dɛn bin de lɛkɛ brɔda ɛn sista ɛn dɛn bin de it ɛn pre na wan ples.
Wit Gɔd in pawa di apɔsul dɛn bin de du big ɛn wɔnda ful tin dɛn we bin de mek ɔlman wɔnda.
Ɔl dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs bin de na wan ples wit wan at ɛn ɔlman bin de bring wetin i gɛt fɔ sheb am.
Sɔm pipul sɛl dɛn prɔpati ɛn sheb di kɔpɔ mek ɔlman gɛt wetin i want.
Di pipul dɛn kin mit na Gɔd in Os ɔltɛm fɔ pre ɛn wɛn dɛn dɔn, dɛn kin go na dɛn kɔmpin os fɔ it, ɛn ɔlman kin gladi fɔ sheb in it wit in kɔmpin.
Dɛn kin de prez Gɔd, ɛn pipul bin rɛspɛkt dɛn. Masta Jizɔs mek mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul we fɔ sev, biliv pan am.
Wan de, bay tri oklɔk santɛm, di tɛm we dɛn Ju pipul kin go pre, Pita ɛn Jɔn bin go na Gɔd in Os fɔ go pre.
Pipul bin de kɛr wan man we nɔ bin ebul waka frɔm we in mama bɔn am, go lɛf am na di get we dɛn kɔl Fayn Get, fɔ mek i beg to dɛn pipul we bin de go pre na Gɔd in Os.
Wɛn di man si Pita ɛn Jɔn de go insay Gɔd in Os fɔ go pre, i bigin beg dɛn fɔ mek dɛn gi am mɔni.
Pita ɛn Jɔn luk gud insay di man in yay, na de Pita tɛl am se, “Es yay, luk wi!”
So di man luk dɛn bikɔs i bin min se dɛn go gi am sɔntin.
Na de Pita tɛl am se, “A nɔ gɛt kɔpɔ, bɔt a go gi yu wetin a gɛt. Bay Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt in pawa, grap, waka!”
Pita ol di man in raytan ɛn ɛp am fɔ tinap. Di man in fut dɛn tra nga wantɛm.
I grap ɛn bigin fɔ waka go insay Gɔd in Os. I bigin de waka, de jomp, de prez Gɔd.
Ɔlman si am we i de waka, de prez Gɔd.
Wɛn di pipul dɛn no se na di man dat we bin de sidɔm klos Fayn Get na Gɔd in Os fɔ beg, dɛn wɔnda, dɛn mɔt ful we dɛn si wetin bi to di man.
Di man we bin jɛs wɛl go grip Pita ɛn Jɔn; ɔl di pipul dɛn wɔnda, dɛn rɔn go na di ples we dɛn kɔl Sɔlɔmɔn in Vira nda.
Wɛn Pita si di pipul dɛn, i se, “Mi kɔntri man dɛn, wetin mek una de wɔnda fɔseka wetin dɔn bi ɛn wetin mek una de luk wi so? Una min se na wi yon pawa ɔ na bikɔs wi gud mek dis man wɛl?

Na di Gɔd we wi gra npapa-papa dɛn, Ebraam, Ayzik, ɛn Jekɔb bin de pre to, na dis sem Gɔd dɔn gi Jizɔs we na in savant, di pawa fɔ mɛn dis man. Wɛn una bin kɛr Jizɔs go bifo Paylet ɛn Paylet bin want mek Jizɔs fri, una bin tɔk bad bɔt am.
Jizɔs na bin man we tret ɛn i bin gi insɛf to Gɔd. Una bin tɔk bad bɔt Jizɔs ɛn una beg Paylet se mek i kil Jizɔs ɛn lɛf wan man we kil pɔsin.
So, una kil Jizɔs we gɛt pawa fɔ gi tru layf, bɔt Gɔd mek i rayz frɔm di grev. Wi, we na in apɔsul dɛn, si Jizɔs wit wi yon yay afta i rayz frɔm di grev.
Na Jizɔs in pawa ɛn we wi biliv pan am mek dis man wɛl gud gud wan.
“Mi pipul dɛn, a no se una ɛn una bigman dɛn nɔ bin no wetin una bin de du wɛn una kil Jizɔs.
Bɔt na so Gɔd mek ɔl wetin i bin mek dɛn prɔfɛt tɔk lɔntɛm bɔt di Mɛsaya, kam bi tru.
Una fɔ lɛf fɔ du bad ɛn kam to Gɔd, ɛn Gɔd go padin una fɔ ɔl una sin.
Da tɛm de, Gɔd we na wi Masta go mek in Spirit wok insay una at fɔ mek una tinap tra nga, ɛn i go sɛn Jizɔs we na di Mɛsaya we i dɔn pik fɔ sev una.
Jizɔs fɔ de na ɛvin sote Gɔd dɔn du ɔltin lɛkɛ aw in prɔfɛt dɛn bin dɔn tɔk lɔntɛm.
Mozis bin tɔk se, ‘Gɔd we na una Masta go sɛn prɔfɛt to una lɛkɛ aw i sɛn mi ɛn da prɔfɛt de go kɔmɔt na una yon neshɔn. Una fɔ lisin ɛn du ɔl wetin i tɛl una fɔ du.
Ɛnibɛdi we nɔ tek wetin di prɔfɛt tɔk, Gɔd go pul am kɔmɔt to in pipul dɛn ɛn kil am!’
Na so ɔl di prɔfɛt dɛn, frɔm Samyɛl sote rich dɛn prɔfɛt we de naw, bin tɔk.

Di tin we Gɔd prɔmis wi we dɛn prɔfɛt tɔk bɔt na fɔ wi ɔl, ɛn una gɛt pan da blɛsin we Gɔd bin prɔmis wi gra npapa-papa dɛn, wɛn i tɛl Ebraam se, ‘Na yu gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn a go tek fɔ blɛs ɔl di pipul dɛn na di wɔl.’
Wɛn Gɔd sɛn Jizɔs lɛkɛ savant kam na wɔl, Gɔd mek i kam to una we na Izrɛl pipul fɔs, kam tɔk bɔt Gɔd fɔ mek bɛtɛ go fala una ɛn mek una go lɛf fɔ du bad.”
Wɛn Pita ɛn Jɔn bin de tɔk to di pipul dɛn, dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin wit di bigman fɔ dɛn wan we bin de gyad Gɔd in Os, ɛn dɛn Sadyusi, kam mit dɛn.

Dɛn pipul ya bin vɛks bad bad bikɔs Pita ɛn Jɔn bin de tɛl di pipul dɛn se we pɔsin day, i go rayz bak. Dɛn tɛl di pipul dɛn se Jizɔs bin rayz frɔm di grev, so wɛn ɛnibɔdi day, di pɔsin go rayz frɔm in grev.
Dɛn ol Pita ɛn Jɔn, bɔt we ivintɛm bin dɔn kam, dɛn go kip dɛn na jel sote do klin.
Plɛnti pipul we yɛri wetin Pita ɛn Jɔn bin de tɔk biliv wetin dɛn yɛri, ɛn ɔl di man dɛn bin rich bɔt fayv tawzin.
Di ɔda de, ɔl dɛn bigman we de rul na di kɔntri wit ɔl di ɔda bigman dɛn, ɛn dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha go mit na wan ples na Jerusɛlɛm.
Dɛn mit Anas we na bin di edman pan dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, ɛn Kaye fas, wit Jɔn, Alɛgza nda, ɛn di ɔda man dɛn we fambul to Anas.
Dɛn pul Pita ɛn Jɔn kɔmɔt na jel, kɛr dɛn go bifo ɔl di man dɛn we bin dɔn gɛda de. Di man dɛn aks Pita ɛn Jɔn se, “Usay una gɛt di pawa fɔ mek dis man ya waka? Udat gi una?”
Gɔd in Spirit bin de pan Pita, so Pita tɛl dɛn se, “Una we de rul ɛn una dɛn bigman we de naya!
Una bring wi kam naya tide ɛn aks wi bɔt di gud we wi du fɔ da man we nɔ bin ebul waka ɛn udat in pawa wi tek mɛn am;

wɛl, a gladi fɔ tɛl una ɛn ɔl di pipul dɛn na Izrɛl se una bin kil Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt ɛn una nel am na di krɔs, bɔt Gɔd mek i rayz frɔm di grev. Na in pawa mek dis man ya we nɔ bin ebul waka, wɛl gud fashin.
Na bɔt Jizɔs, Gɔd bin tɔk se, ‘Da ston we una we de bil bin se nɔ bɛtɛ, na in dɔn kam bi di ston we bɛtɛ pas ɔl di ɔda ston dɛn na di os.’
Nɔbɔdi nɔ de na wɔl we ebul sev pɔsin; na Jizɔs nɔmɔ ebul sev pɔsin.”

Di bigman dɛn na di Ju gran kot si se Pita ɛn Jɔn nɔ bin sabi rid ɛn rayt, ɛn dɛn na bin ɔdi nari pipul, bɔt dɛn nɔ bin de fred fɔ tɔk. Na dat mek dɛn wɔnda; ɛn dɛn kam gɛt fɔ no se dɛn bin de wit Jizɔs.
Di bigman dɛn nɔ bin ebul fɔ tɔk bad bɔt Pita ɛn Jɔn bikɔs di man we dɛn mɛn bin tinap klos dɛn.
Di bigman dɛn na di Ju gran kot bin want ɛng ed so dɛn tɛl Pita ɛn Jɔn fɔ go na do.
Dɛn aks dɛn kɔmpin se, “Wetin wi fɔ du wit Pita ɛn Jɔn? Ɔlman na Jerusɛlɛm dɔn si se na dɛn dɔn mɛn da man we nɔ bin ebul waka; nɔto kɔna dis tin bi ɛn wi nɔ go se na lay.
Wɛl, fɔ mek dis kayn nyus nɔ prɛd, una lɛ wi kɔl dɛn ɛn wɔn dɛn tra nga wan mek dɛn nɔ tɛl nɔbɔdi igen bɔt Jizɔs.”
So dɛn kɔl Pita ɛn Jɔn kam insay di ples bak. Dɛn wɔn dɛn tra nga wan se dɛn nɔ fɔ tɔk to ɛnibɔdi bɔt Jizɔs igen ɛn dɛn nɔ fɔ tich ɛnibɔdi bɔt Jizɔs in wok.
Pita ɛn Jɔn aks dɛn se, “Una tɛl wi, wetin na di rayt tin we Gɔd want: wi fɔ gri fɔ du wetin mɔta lman want ɔ wi fɔ du wetin Gɔd want?
Wi nɔ go ebul sɛt mɔt ɛn nɔ tɔk bɔt wetin wi dɔn si ɛn yɛri.”
Di bigman dɛn na di Ju gran kot wɔn dɛn tra nga wan bak ɛn lɛf dɛn fɔ go. Dɛn nɔ du dɛn natin, bikɔs ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin lib de bin de tɛl Gɔd tɛnki fɔ wetin bin jɛs bi.
Di man we Gɔd mɛn bin dɔn ol pas fɔti ia.
Wɛn dɛn fri Pita ɛn Jɔn, dɛn go mit di ɔda Kristiɛn dɛn ɛn tɛl dɛn wetin bi to dɛn ɛn wetin di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn ɔl di ɔda bigman dɛn tɛl dɛn.
Wɛn di Kristiɛn dɛn yɛri wetin Pita ɛn Jɔn tɔk, dɛn ɔl pre to Gɔd se, “Yu we na Masta, na yu mek ɔl dis wɔl ɛn ɔltin we lib de.
Na yu Spirit tɛl yu savant Devid we na wan pan wi gra npapa-papa dɛn se, ‘Wetin mek dɛn neshɔn we nɔto Ju de vɛks bad wan? Wetin du dɛn mekɔp fɔ du wetin di Masta nɔ want ɛn dɛn nɔ go ebul du am?
Dɛn pipul we de rul na dis wɔl want fɔ fɛt Gɔd we na di Masta ɛn di pɔsin we Gɔd dɔn pik, dat na di Mɛsaya.’
Fɔ tru, Ɛrɔd ɛn Pɔnchɔs Paylet ɛng ed na Jerusɛlɛm wit dɛn Roman pipul ɛn dɛn pipul na Izrɛl fɔ bagin fɔ du Jizɔs bad. Dis Jizɔs ya gi insɛf fɔ wok fɔ yu ɛn na in yu dɔn mek bi di Mɛsaya.
Dɛn bigman bin gɛda fɔ du ɔltin we yu bin dɔn mekɔp se fɔ bi. Na dat yu bin ebul du bikɔs yu gɛt pawa ɛn na dat yu bin want mek bi.
So, Masta, yu dɔn yɛri ɔl wetin dɛn bigman na di Ju gran kot tɛl wi, bɔt wi de beg yu fɔ ɛp wi we na yu savant dɛn lɛ wi nɔ fred fɔ tɔk yu mɛsej.
Sho yu pawa ɛn mɛn dɛn sik pipul. Gi wi pawa so dat wi go du plɛnti wɔnda ful wok wɛn wi kɔl yu Savant Jizɔs, we nɔ gɛt sin, in nem.”
Wɛn dɛn dɔn pre dɔn, di ples we dɛn bin de, shek. Gɔd in Spirit kam pan dɛn ɛn dat mek dɛn nɔ fred fɔ tɔk Gɔd in mɛsej.
Ɔl dɛn wan we bin biliv Jizɔs bin gɛt wanwɔd ɛn wan at. Nɔbɔdi nɔ bin de se, “Na mi wan gren gɛt mi prɔpati”, bɔt ɔlman bin de sheb wetin i gɛt wit di ɔda pipul dɛn.
Di apɔsul dɛn bin de sho se Gɔd in pawa de wit dɛn wɛn dɛn de tɛl ɔda pipul se Jizɔs bin rayz frɔm di grev. Gɔd bin de blɛs dɛn ɔl.
Dɛn nɔn nɔ bin de krach ed fɔ ɛni tin. Wɛn ɛni wan pan dɛn sɛl in prɔpati, i kin bring di kɔpɔ kam
gi di apɔsul dɛn fɔ sheb am. Di apɔsul dɛn sheb di kɔpɔ gi di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs ɛn ɔlman gɛt wetin du fɔ am.
Na so Josɛf, da Livayt we kɔmɔt Sayprɔs, bin du. Di apɔsul dɛn bin de kɔl am Banabas, dat min “Pɔsin we de kɔrej ɔda pipul”.
I sɛl in grɔn ɛn bring am gi di apɔsul dɛn.
Wan man bin de we bin nem Ana na yas ɛn in wɛf bin nem Safa yra. Dɛn bin sɛl pan dɛn grɔn.
Ana na yas kip sɔm pan di kɔpɔ fɔ insɛf, dɛn i kɛr di ɔda pat go gi di apɔsul dɛn. Safa yra bin no se in man dɔn kip sɔm pan di kɔpɔ.
Pita aks Ana na yas se, “Ana na yas, wetin mek yu gri mek Setan go insay yu at fɔ mek yu lay gi Gɔd in Spirit? Yu dɔn kip sɔm pan di kɔpɔ we dɛn pe yu fɔ di grɔn!
Wɛn yu nɔ bin sɛl di grɔn yet, nɔto yu bin gɛt am, ɛn we yu dɔn sɛl am, nɔto yu gɛt di kɔpɔ? If na so i bi, wetin mek yu du dat? Yu nɔ lay gi mɔta lman, na Gɔd yu lay gi!”
Wɛn Ana na yas yɛri wetin Pita tɔk, i fɔdɔm ɛn day. Ɔl dɛn wan we yɛri wetin bi, fred.
Di man dɛn rap di dedebɔdi, dɔn dɛn go bɛr am.
Wɛn lɛkɛ tri awa so dɔn pas afta dɛn bɛr Ana na yas, in wɛf Safa yra kam na di rum we di apɔsul dɛn bin de, bɔt Safa yra nɔ bin no wetin dɔn bi.
Pita aks Safa yra se, “Na ɔl di kɔpɔ dis we dɛn bin pe una fɔ da grɔn we una sɛl?” Safa yra ansa se, “Yɛs, sa, na ɔl di kɔpɔ dat, sa.”
Pita tɛl am se, “Wetin mek yu ɛn yu man mekɔp fɔ tɛst Gɔd in Spirit? Luk di pipul dɛn we go bɛr yu man tinap na do, na dɛn go bɛr yusɛf!”
Safa yra fɔdɔm wantɛm ɛn day. Di man dɛn kam tek Safa yra go bɛr am klos in man.
Wɛn ɔl dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs Krays ɛn dɛn wan we nɔ bin biliv pan am, yɛri bɔt wetin bi to Ana na yas ɛn Safa yra, dɛn fred bad.
Di apɔsul dɛn bin de du plɛnti wɔnda ful tin fɔ di pipul dɛn. Ɔl dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs Krays kin mit lɛkɛ fambul na di ples we dɛn kɔl Sɔlɔmɔn in Vira nda.
Dɛn pipul we nɔ bin biliv pan Jizɔs bin fred fɔ de wit dɛn, bɔt dɛn bin de tɔk gud bɔt dɛn.
Ɛn mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul bin de kam jɔyn to di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs Krays.

Wɛn dɛn si di wɔnda ful tin dɛn we di apɔsul dɛn bin de du, pipul kɛr dɛn sik pipul go na trit ɛn mek dɛn ledɔm na dɛn bed, so dat we Pita de pas, in shado go go pan sɔm di sik pipul dɛn ɛn mek dɛn wɛl.
Plɛnti pipul kɔmɔt ɔlɔbɔt na dɛn tɔng we de klos Jerusɛlɛm, dɛn bring sik pipul ɛn dɛn pipul we gɛt dɛbul kam to di apɔsul dɛn ɛn di apɔsul dɛn mɛn dɛn ɔl.
Di edman pan dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, ɛn in kɔmpin Sadyusi dɛn, jɛlɔs di apɔsul dɛn bad wan.
So dɛn ol di apɔsul dɛn ɛn put dɛn na jel.
Bɔt di Masta in enjɛl kam na nɛt ɛn opin di get na di jel we di apɔsul dɛn bin de, dɛn di enjɛl pul di apɔsul dɛn kɔmɔt na di jel ɛn tɛl dɛn se,
“Una go bak na Gɔd in Os go tɛl di pipul dɛn bɔt di nyu layf we una dɔn gɛt.”

Di apɔsul dɛn du wetin di enjɛl tɛl dɛn fɔ du. Wɛn do klin di apɔsul dɛn go na Gɔd in Os ɛn bigin tɛl di pipul dɛn bɔt Gɔd. Di edman pan dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn in kɔmpin dɛn kɔl mitin wit di Ju bigman dɛn na di Ju gran kot; dɛn sɛn go na di jel fɔ mek dɛn bring di apɔsul dɛn kam mit dɛn.
Bɔt wɛn di gyad dɛn rich na di jel, dɛn nɔ mit di apɔsul dɛn de. So di gyad dɛn tɔn bak go ɛn tɛl di bigman dɛn se,
“Wɛn wi rich na di jel, wi mit di sɛl lɔk gud ɛn di wɔda dɛn tinap de gyad di get dɛn; bɔt wɛn wi opin di get dɛn ɛn luk insay, wi nɔ si wan gren pɔsin sɛf de!”
Wɛn di bigman pan dɛn wan we bin de gyad Gɔd in Os ɛn di edman pan dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin yɛri wetin bi, dɛn kɔnfyus ɛn bigin wɔndrin wetin bi to di apɔsul dɛn.
Na in wan man kam tɛl dɛn se, “Una luk ya! Dɛn pipul we una bin put na jel, de na Gɔd in Os de tɔk bɔt Gɔd.”
So di bigman dɛn go mit di apɔsul dɛn na Gɔd in Os ɛn bring dɛn kam bak, bɔt dɛn nɔ bin fos dɛn fɔ kam bikɔs dɛn bin de fred se di pipul dɛn we di apɔsul dɛn de tɔk to bɔt Gɔd, go ston dɛn.
Dɛn kɛr di apɔsul dɛn go mek dɛn tinap bifo di Ju gran kot, dɔn di edman pan dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin aks dɛn kwɛshɔn.
I se, “Wi nɔ bin dɔn wɔn una se una nɔ fɔ tɔk to ɛnibɔdi bɔt dis man? Una dɔn mek ɔlman na Jerusɛlɛm yɛri bɔt am ɛn una want mek pipul blem wi fɔ we dɛn kil am.”
Pita ɛn in kɔmpin dɛn ansa dɛn se, “Wi fɔ du wetin Gɔd tɛl wi fɔ du, wi nɔ gɛt fɔ du wetin mɔta lman tɛl wi fɔ du.
Wɛn una bin nel Jizɔs na di krɔs ɛn kil am, da Gɔd we wi gra npapa-papa dɛn bin de pre to, bin mek Jizɔs rayz frɔm di grev.
Gɔd dɔn mek Jizɔs sidɔm na in raytan fɔ bi wi Masta ɛn wi Sevyɔ, so dat i go gi di Izrɛl pipul dɛn chans fɔ chenj ɛn Gɔd go padin dɛn fɔ dɛn sin.
Wi, we na in apɔsul dɛn, ɛn Gɔd in Spirit, de mek pipul no bɔt dɛn tin ya. Gɔd dɔn gi dɛn pipul we de du wetin i tɛl dɛn fɔ du, in Spirit.”
Wɛn di bigman dɛn na di Ju gran kot yɛri wetin di apɔsul dɛn tɔk, dɛn vɛks sote dɛn bin want mek dɛn kil di apɔsul dɛn.
Gameliɛl, wan Faresi we bin de lan pipul di Ju Lɔ, na bin bigman na di Ju gran kot ɛn pipul bin rɛspɛkt am. I tinap na di kot ɛn tɛl di ɔda bigman dɛn mek dɛn pul di apɔsul dɛn na sɛl fɔs.
Dɔn i bigin tɔk to di pipul dɛn na di Ju gran kot. I se, “Mi pipul dɛn na Izrɛl, una tink gud bifo una du ɛni tin to dɛn man ya.
Una mɛmba wan man we bin nem Tiudɔs we bin kam se in na bigman ɛn we bin gɛt lɛkɛ fo ɔndrɛd pipul we de ɛp am. Dɛn kil am, dɔn dɛn pipul we bin de fala am rɔnawe; so Tiudɔs in wok nɔ go bifo.
Wɛn dat dɔn, wan Judas, we bin kɔmɔt Galili, bin de da tɛm we dɛn bin de rayt ɔl di pipul dɛn nem dɔng. Insɛf bin gɛt bɔku pipul biɛn am. Dɛn kil insɛf ɛn ɔl dɛn pipul we bin de biɛn am, rɔnawe.
Na ɔl dis mek a de wɔn una naw mek una nɔ ambɔg dɛn man ya, una lɛf dɛn, bikɔs ɔl wetin dɛn mekɔp ɛn di wok we dɛn de du, go pwɛl, if nɔto Gɔd sɛn dɛn.
Bɔt if dɛn de du wetin Gɔd want, una nɔ go ebul pwɛl di wok we dɛn de du, na Gɔd una go de fɛt!”
Ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin de jɔj na di Ju gran kot tek Gameliɛl in wɔd. Dɛn mek di gyad dɛn bit di apɔsul dɛn ɛn wɔn dɛn nɔ fɔ tɔk bɔt Jizɔs wɛn dɛn de tɔk to di pipul dɛn, dɔn dɛn lɛf dɛn, mek dɛn go.
Di apɔsul dɛn bin gladi bad wɛn dɛn de kɔmɔt na di Ju gran kot bikɔs dɛn bin no se Gɔd pik dɛn fɔ sɔfa fɔseka Jizɔs.
Dɛn kin de go na Gɔd in Os ɛn dɛn kin de go na pipul dɛn os fɔ lan dɛn Gɔd in wɔd ɛn fɔ tɛl dɛn di Gud Nyus bɔt Jizɔs Krays.

Da tɛm de, as mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul de biliv pan Jizɔs Krays, sɔm cham-mɔt bin kam. Dɛn Ju pipul we kɔmɔt Gris bin de grɔmbul se dɛn Ju pipul we bɔn na Jerusɛlɛm nɔ de gi dɛn Ju uman we kɔmɔt Gris we dɛn man dɔn day, wetin dɛn fɔ gi dɛn ɛvri de.

So, di twɛlv apɔsul dɛn kɔl mitin wit ɔl dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs ɛn se, “I nɔ go gud fɔ mek wi, we na Jizɔs in apɔsul dɛn, lɛf fɔ tɛl pipul bɔt Gɔd ɛn kam bigin gi dɛn uman we dɛn man dɔn day ɔl wetin dɛn fɔ gɛt.
Na dat mek wi want una fɔ pik sɛvin pipul pan unasɛf, we wi go mek du dis wok. Una fɔ pik pipul we una ɔl rɛspɛkt, dɛn fɔ gɛt Gɔd in Spirit ɛn dɛn fɔ sabi bɔt tin dɛn gud.
Wi, we na di apɔsul dɛn, go jɛs de fɔ pre ɛn fɔ tɛl pipul bɔt Gɔd.”

Ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin go dis mitin gri wit wetin di apɔsul dɛn tɔk. So dɛn pik Sti vin, we na man we bin biliv Gɔd ɛn Gɔd in Spirit bin de insay am. Dɛn pik Filip, Prɔkorɔs, Nikenɔ, Taymɔn, Pami nas, ɛn Nikolɔs we bin kɔmɔt Antiɔk ɛn bin gri fɔ bi Ju.
Ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin de na di mitin kɛr di sɛvin man dɛn we dɛn pik go sho di apɔsul dɛn. Di apɔsul dɛn put dɛn an pan di sɛvin man dɛn ed, dɛn pre fɔ dɛn ɛn blɛs dɛn.
Na dat mek Gɔd in wɔd go ɔlsay ɛn mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul biliv pan Jizɔs na Jerusɛlɛm, ɛn plɛnti pan dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin gri fɔ biliv pan Jizɔs Krays.
Sti vin na bin man we gɛt Gɔd in blɛsin ɛn Gɔd in pawa we mek i ebul du plɛnti big wok we ɔlman si.

Bɔt sɔm pipul na di Ju mitin os we dɛn bin de kɔl “fri pipul” nɔ bin gri wit Sti vin. Dɛn na bin Ju pipul we kɔmɔt Sayrini ɛn Alɛgza ndria, ɛn sɔm ɔda Ju pipul dɛn we kɔmɔt Sili shya ɛn wan smɔl ples we dɛn kɔl Eshya.
Bɔt Gɔd in Spirit gi Sti vin plɛnti sɛns, so dat wɛn i tɔk nɔbɔdi nɔba gɛt natin fɔ se.
Di Ju pipul dɛn pe sɔm pipul fɔ lay pan Sti vin. Dɛn se, “Wi yɛri dis man de tɔk kyalɛs tɔk bɔt Mozis ɛn Gɔd.”
Dɛn sem Ju pipul ya put wɔd na di pipul dɛn yes, dɔn dɛn put wɔd na dɛn bigman ɛn dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn yes, fɔ mek dɛn ol Sti vin. Dɛn go grip Sti vin, drɛg am go na di Ju gran kot.
Dɛn fɛn pipul fɔ lay pan am; di pipul dɛn se, “Dis man kin tɔk bad bɔt Gɔd in Os ɛn di Lɔ we Gɔd gi Mozis.
Wi dɔn yɛri i de tɔk se Jizɔs, da man we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt, go brok Gɔd in Os kam dɔng ɛn i go chenj ɔl wetin Mozis bin lan wi gra npapa-papa dɛn we wi de du tide.”
Ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin sidɔm na di Ju gran kot bin de luk Sti vin insay in yay, ɛn dɛn si se in fes bin tan lɛkɛ enjɛl fes.
Di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin aks Sti vin se, “Ɔl wetin dɛn pipul ya dɔn tɔk, na tru?”
Sti vin ansa se, “Mi papa dɛn ɛn mi brɔda dɛn, a want mek una lisin mi! Gɔd we gɛt pawa pas ɔl bin sho insɛf to Ebraam wɛn Ebraam bin tap na Mɛso po te mya. Dat bin bi bifo Ebraam go tap na Aran.
Gɔd tɛl Ebraam se, ‘Ebraam, lɛf yu fambul dɛn ɛn kɔmɔt na yu kɔntri, go na wan kɔntri we a go tɛl yu fɔ go tap.’
So Ebraam kɔmɔt Kaldia go tap na Aran. Afta Ebraam in papa day, Gɔd tɛl Ebraam fɔ kɔmɔt Aran, kam na dis kɔntri we una de naw.

Gɔd nɔ bin gi Ebraam ples fɔ de we go bi in yon; i nɔ gi am lili ples sɛf, bɔt i prɔmis am se in go gi am ples, ɛn da ples de go bi Ebraam in yon prɔpati ɛn da prɔpati de go bi Ebraam in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn yon, wɛn Ebraam dɔn day. Ebraam nɔ bin bɔn pikin yet wɛn Gɔd tɛl am dat.

Gɔd bin tɛl Ebraam se, ‘Ebraam, dɛn go tek yu gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn mek slev, ɛn dɛn go kɛr dɛn go na ɔda kɔntri ɛn di pipul dɛn na di ɔda kɔntri go du yu gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn bad. Yu gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn go bi slev fɔ fo ɔndrɛd ia.
Bɔt a go jɔj di pipul dɛn we tek dɛn mek slev. Da tɛm de yu gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn go kɔmɔt pan slev layf ɛn dɛn go kam na Jerusɛlɛm fɔ kam pre to mi.’

Gɔd tɛl Ebraam se Ebraam fɔ sakɔmsayz in bɔy pikin di de we mek et de afta i bɔn. Di sakɔmsayz we Ebraam go sakɔmsayz am go sho se Gɔd bin dɔn mek agrimɛnt wit Ebraam. So di de we mek et afta Ayzik bɔn, Ebraam sakɔmsayz am; ɛn di de we mek et afta Jekɔb bɔn, Ayzik sakɔmsayz am; ɛn Jekɔb insɛf sakɔmsayz in twɛlv pikin dɛn we na wi gra npapa-papa dɛn, we bigin di twɛlv trayb na di Ju neshɔn.
“Wi gra npapa-papa dɛn bin jɛlɔs Josɛf, dɛn brɔda, ɛn dat mek dɛn sɛl am fɔ mek i go bi slev na Ijipt; bɔt Gɔd bin de wit Josɛf.
Gɔd bin de ɛp Josɛf ɔltɛm we i de pan trɔbul. Wɛn dɛn kɛr Josɛf go bifo di king na Ijipt, Gɔd blɛs Josɛf ɛn gi am sɛns; so di king mek Josɛf bi gɔvna na Ijipt ɛn i mek am di edman fɔ in os.
Tɛm bin de we bad bad angri kam na Ijipt ɛn Kenyan. Di angri mek plɛnti pipul dɛn sɔfa ɛn wi gra npapa-papa dɛn nɔ bin ebul fɛn tin fɔ it.
So wɛn Jekɔb yɛri se it de na Ijipt i sɛn in pikin dɛn we na wi gra npapa-papa dɛn go de fɔ go fɛn it, dat na bin di fɔs tɛm we dɛn go de.
Di sɛkɛn tɛm we dɛn go na Ijipt, Josɛf mek in brɔda dɛn no udat i bi, ɛn di king kam sabi Josɛf in brɔda dɛn.
Josɛf sɛn mɛsej to in papa, Jekɔb, fɔ mek i kam mit am ɛn i sɛn se Jekɔb fɔ bring ɔl in fambul dɛn we na bin sɛvi nti fayv pipul.
Jekɔb go na Ijipt, ɛn na de in ɛn ɔl in pikin dɛn de sote dɛn ɔl day.
Dɛn kɛr dɛn dedebɔdi go bɛr dɛn na Shɛkɛm na di grev we Ebraam bin bay to Amɔ in bɔy pikin dɛn.
“Wɛn di tɛm bin dɔn de rich fɔ mek Gɔd du wetin i bin dɔn prɔmis Ebraam, di pipul dɛn na Ijipt bin de plɛnti mɔ ɛn mɔ.
Ɔda king we nɔ bin sabi Josɛf, bigin rul na Ijipt.
Dis nyu king ya tek adva ntej pan wi pipul dɛn ɛn i mek wi pipul dɛn sɔfa bad. I fos wi gra npapa-papa dɛn fɔ trowe dɛn pikin na do, mek di pikin dɛn go day.
Da sem tɛm de, na in Mozis bɔn; na bin fayn pikin. Wɛn Mozis bin jɛs bɔn, in mama ɛn papa bin ayd am na os tri mɔnt.
Wɛn dɛn go lɛf Mozis na do, di king in gyal pikin tek Mozis ɛn mɛn am lɛkɛ in bɛlɛ-bɔn pikin.
Dɛn tren Mozis lɛkɛ dɛn Ijipt pikin; na man we bin sabi tɔk ɛn we bin sabi wok.
“Wɛn Mozis bin dɔn ol fɔti ia, i mekɔp fɔ go luk in pipul dɛn na Izrɛl.
Wɛn i de go, i mit wan Ijipt man de bit wan Izrɛl man, so i go fɛt fɔ di Izrɛl man ɛn i kil di Ijipt man.
Mozis bin min se in pipul dɛn go no se Gɔd sɛn am fɔ kam ɛp dɛn ɛn pul dɛn kɔmɔt pan slev layf, bɔt dɛn nɔ bin no dat.
Wan ɔda de Mozis mit tu Izrɛl man dɛn de fɛt. Wɛn i go fɔ pat dɛn tu, i tɛl dɛn se, ‘Mi pipul dɛn, una lɛf fɔ fɛt bikɔs una tu na brɔda. Wetin mek una de fɛt una kɔmpin?’
Bɔt di man we bin de bit in kɔmpin tɛl Mozis se, ‘Udat aks yu fɔ rul wi?
Yu want fɔ kil mi lɛkɛ aw yu kil da Ijipt man trade?’
Wɛn Mozis yɛri wetin di man tɔk, i rɔnawe kɔmɔt Ijipt go sidɔm na wan kɔntri we nem Midian. Mozis bɔn tu bɔy pikin de.
“Wɛn fɔti ia bin dɔn pas, wan enjɛl go mit Mozis na da ay il we nem Mawnt Saynay. Di enjɛl bin de insay di faya we bin de kɔmɔt pan wan smɔl tik.
Wɛn Mozis si dat, i wɔnda; i go klos fɔ go luk gud, na de i yɛri Gɔd, di Masta in vɔys de tɔk to am se,

‘Na mi na da Gɔd we yu gra npapa-papa dɛn bin de pre to, na mi na di Gɔd we Ebraam bin de pre to, na mi na di Gɔd we Ayzik bin de pre to, ɛn we Jekɔb bin de pre to.’ Wɛn Mozis yɛri dat, i tri mbul, i fred fɔ es in yay ɔp, luk.
Gɔd, di Masta tɛl am se, ‘Pul yu sus kɔmɔt na yu fut, bikɔs da ples de we yu tinap na ples we dɛn dɔn put wansay fɔ mi.
A dɔn si di waala we mi pipul dɛn de pan na Ijipt. A dɔn yɛri we dɛn de pini bikɔs dɛn de sɔfa ɛn a dɔn kam dɔng naw fɔ kam pul dɛn pan dɛn waala. So kam, mek a sɛn yu go Ijipt.’

“Di sem Mozis we dɛn nɔ bin want, we dɛn aks se, ‘Udat mek yu rula ɛn jɔj?’ Na in Gɔd sɛn fɔ bi rula ɛn fɔ go pul pipul dɛn pan waala, ɛn na di enjɛl we go mit Mozis na di faya we bin de kɔmɔt pan di smɔl tik, na in Gɔd yus fɔ ɛp Mozis.
Mozis du plɛnti wɔnda ful tin dɛn we mek i ebul pul in pipul dɛn kɔmɔt na Ijipt, insay di wata we nem Rɛd Si, ɛn pul dɛn kɔmɔt na di dɛzat we dɛn bin de fɔti ia.
Na da sem Mozis de tɛl di Izrɛl pipul dɛn se, ‘Gɔd go tek wan pan una mek prɔfɛt lɛkɛ aw i du mi ɛn una go lisin to da prɔfɛt de.’

Na Mozis bin de wit di Izrɛl pipul dɛn we bin de gɛda na di dɛzat; ɛn na in bin de wit di enjɛl we tɔk to am pantap da ay il we nem Mawnt Saynay, ɛn na in bin de wit wi gra npapa-papa dɛn. Na in Gɔd gi in mɛsej, we go de sote go, fɔ gi wi.
“Bɔt wi gra npapa-papa dɛn nɔ bin du wetin Mozis tɛl dɛn fɔ du, dɛn bin tɔn dɛn bak pan am ɛn dɛn bin want go Ijipt bak,
dɛn tɛl Erɔn se, ‘Duya, mek sɔm gɔd dɛn fɔ wi we go de bifo wi wɛn wi de go; as fɔ Mozis we bring wi kɔmɔt Ijipt wi nɔ no wetin dɔn apin to am.’
Dɛn mek kaw pikin fɔ de pre to ɛn sakri fays tin to am; dɛn kin ɔltɛm gladi fɔ di tin we dɛn mek.

Dɛn, Gɔd tɔn in bak pan di Izrɛl pipul dɛn; i lɛf dɛn mek dɛn de pre to dɛn tin we de na ɛvin, lɛkɛ sta ɛn mun so, lɛkɛ aw dɛn rayt na da buk we dɛn prɔfɛt rayt, se ‘Una, dɛn Izrɛl pipul ya, di fɔti ia we una bin de na di dɛzat nɔto fɔ mi una kil dɛn bif ɛn sakrifays dɛn.
Una bin tot di bafa we dɛn kip da gɔd we nem Mɔlɔk ɛn di sta we una mek we fiba una gɔd, Refan in sta; una mek dɛn tin ya fɔ pre to dɛn; a go mek dɛn kɛr una go fawe pas Babilɔn sɛf.’
“Wɛn wi gra npapa-papa dɛn bin de na di dɛzat dɛn bin gɛt da bafa we sho se Gɔd bin de wit dɛn. Na da bafa de Gɔd bin dɔn tɛl Mozis fɔ mek, ɛn Mozis fala di patan we Gɔd bin dɔn sho am.

Wi gra npapa-papa dɛn we bin de fɔs, day lɛf di bafa gi dɛn ɔda wan we tot am wɛn dɛn bin de go wit Jɔshwa, ɛn dɛn tek di kɔntri na dɛn ɔda neshɔn dɛn an we Gɔd bin drɛb go ɔda say bifo Jɔshwa ɛn di pipul dɛn bin rich de. Di bafa bin de na da kɔntri de, te di tɛm we Devid bin de rul.
Gɔd bin sati sfay wit Devid fɔ wetin i du, so Devid beg Gɔd fɔ alaw am fɔ bil os fɔ am; in we Jekɔb bin de pre to.
Bɔt na King Sɔlɔmɔn bil di os fɔ Gɔd.
“Bɔt Gɔd we de oba ɔl di wɔl, ɛn we gɛt pawa pas ɔl nɔ tap insay dɛn os we mɔta lman mek; lɛkɛ aw di prɔfɛt bin rayt, wɛn i se,
‘Gɔd di Masta se, “Na ɛvin a sidɔm de rul, na pan di wɔl we mɔtalman de, a put mi fut. So uskayn os yu want bil fɔ mi? We di ples we a go blo?
Nɔto mi mek ɔl dɛn tin ya?” ’
“Una na tra nga yes pipul! Gɔd nɔ de na una at, una nɔ de lisin to Gɔd in mɛsej! Una jɛs tan lɛkɛ una gra npapa-papa dɛn: unasɛf nɔba gri fɔ du ɛni tin we Gɔd in Spirit tɛl una fɔ du.

Ɛni prɔfɛt bin de we una gra npapa-papa dɛn nɔ mek sɔfa? Dɛn kil ɔl dɛn prɔfɛt we Gɔd sɛn to in pipul dɛn. Dɛn prɔfɛt ya bin de tɔk se Gɔd in Savant we de du wetin rayt ɔltɛm, go kam. Naw, una dɔn sɛl am ɛn una dɔn kil am.
Na una Gɔd gi in Lɔ we enjɛl dɛn bring kam gi una bɔt una nɔ du wetin di Lɔ se!”
Wɛn dɛn bigman na di Ju gran kot yɛri wetin Sti vin tɔk, dɛn vɛks bad.
Bɔt Gɔd in Spirit bin de wit Sti vin, i luk ɔp na ɛvin, i si Gɔd in layt de shayn ɛn i si Jizɔs tinap na Gɔd in raytan.
Sti vin tɛl di pipul dɛn se, “A si di klawd opin ɛn a si Mɔta lman Pikin tinap na Gɔd in raytan!”
Di pipul dɛn bigin ala; dɛn tek dɛn an sɛt dɛn yes. Dɛn ɔl grap rɔn go mit am.
Dɛn pul Sti vin kɔmɔt na di big tɔng, dɔn dɛn bigin ston am. Dɛn pul dɛn klos we dɛn wɛr pantap gi wan man we nem Sɔl fɔ ol.
Wɛn dɛn bin de ston am, Sti vin pre se, “Masta Jizɔs, tek mi layf!”
I nil dɔng na grɔn ɛn pre lawd wan se, “Papa Gɔd, padin dɛn pipul ya fɔ wetin dɛn dɔn du!” Wɛn i pre dɔn, na in i day.

Sɔl gladi we dɛn kil Sti vin. Frɔm di de we dɛn kil Sti vin, na in dɛn Ju bigman dɛn bigin mek dɛn pipul we bin biliv Jizɔs Krays, sɔfa bad wan. Dɛn ɔl rɔnawe kɔmɔt Jerusɛlɛm. Sɔm go Judia, sɔm go Same ria. Na di apɔsul dɛn nɔmɔ bin lɛf na di tɔng.
Na sɔm pipul we bin biliv Gɔd, bɛr Sti vin; dɛn kray fɔ am bita wan.
Sɔl bigin fɔ mek dɛn pipul we bin biliv Jizɔs, sɔfa. I kin go frɔm os to os go fɛn dɛn, man ɛn uman, ɛn drɛg dɛn go na jel.
Dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs we bin rɔnawe kɔmɔt Jerusɛlɛm, go ɔlsay de tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus bɔt Jizɔs.
Filip go tɛl di pipul dɛn na Same ria bɔt di Mɛsaya.
Di pipul dɛn bin gladi fɔ yɛri wetin Filip tɛl dɛn ɛn si di wɔnda ful wok dɛn we i du.
Dɛn dɛbul kin ala lawd wan we dɛn de kɔmɔt insay pipul. Plɛnti pipul we nɔ bin ebul waka, bigin waka.
So di pipul dɛn na Same ria gladi bad.
Wan man bin de na Same ria we bin nem Saymɔn we bin de ple majik, ɛn mek di pipul dɛn wɔnda. I tɛl dɛn se in na pɔsin we kin du ɔltin.
