Dat bin mek ɔlman na di tɔng rɛspɛkt am jɛntri man, po man, bigman, lili pikin dɛn ɔl bin rɛspɛkt am. Di pipul dɛn se, “Saymɔn dɔn tɔn to da gɔd we dɛn kɔl ‘Big Pawa.’ ”
I bin dɔn te we Saymɔn de mek pipul wɔnda pan di majik we i de ple.
Bɔt wɛn di pipul dɛn, man ɛn uman, biliv wetin Pita tɛl dɛn bɔt Gɔd in rul ɛn bɔt Jizɔs Krays, dɛn mek Filip baptayz dɛn.
Saymɔn, insɛf, we bin de ple majik, biliv pan Jizɔs Krays. Wɛn Filip dɔn baptayz am, i bigin fala Filip go ɔlɔbɔt. Di wɔnda ful wok dɛn we Filip bin de du mek Saymɔn wɔnda.
Wɛn di apɔsul dɛn na Jerusɛlɛm yɛri se dɛn pipul we de na Same ria dɔn biliv Gɔd in wɔd, dɛn sɛn Pita ɛn Jɔn go to dɛn.
Wɛn Pita ɛn Jɔn rich Same ria, dɛn pre fɔ di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs fɔ mek Gɔd in Spirit kam insay dɛn,
bikɔs Gɔd in Spirit nɔ bin dɔn kam insay dɛn yet. Filip bin jɛs baptayz dɛn na Masta Jizɔs in nem nɔmɔ.
Pita ɛn Jɔn put dɛn an pan di pipul dɛn ed ɛn pre fɔ dɛn, ɛn Gɔd in Spirit kam pan dɛn.
Wɛn Saymɔn si se Gɔd in Spirit kam pan di pipul dɛn we biliv Jizɔs wɛn Pita ɛn Jɔn put dɛn an pan dɛn ed, i pul kɔpɔ fɔ pe Pita ɛn Jɔn
ɛn tɛl dɛn se, “Una gi mi dis kayn pawa ya so dat wɛn a put mi an pan ɛnibɔdi in ed, Gɔd in Spirit go kam pan da pɔsin de.”
Pita ansa am se, “Yu ɛn yu kɔpɔ go go na ɛl, bikɔs yu tink se yu kin bay wetin Gɔd dɔn gi wi.
Yu nɔto wan pan wi ɛn Gɔd si se yu at nɔ de fɔ am.
Lɛf fɔ du di bad we yu de du ɛn pre mek Gɔd padin yu fɔ wetin yu dɔn mekɔp.
A si se yu gɛt bad at ɛn sin dɔn tɔn yu to slev.”
Saymɔn tɛl Pita ɛn Jɔn se, “Duya, una beg Gɔd fɔ mi, mek wetin una tɔk nɔ bi to mi.”

Wɛn Pita ɛn Jɔn dɔn tɛl pipul wetin Gɔd dɔn du ɛn wetin i bin stil de du fɔ dɛn, ɛn wetin Gɔd in wɔd se, dɛn tɔn bak de go Jerusɛlɛm; dɛn bin de tɛl di pipul dɛn we dɛn de mit na dɛn vilej na Same ria di Gud Nyus.
Gɔd sɛn in enjɛl to Filip, di enjɛl tɛl Filip se, “Filip, grap, fala da rod na di dɛzat we go frɔm Jerusɛlɛm te rich Geza.”

So Filip grap ɛn go na di ples we Gɔd tɛl am fɔ go. Da sem tɛm de, wan bigman we kɔmɔt Itio pia bin de pas na di sem rod, i bin de go na in os. Di Itio pia man na bin di bigman fɔ dɛn pipul we de luk di Itio pia kwin in prɔpati dɛn. I bin kɔmɔt pre na Jerusɛlɛm ɛn i bin de go Itio pia bak; i bin sidɔm na in chariɔt.
Gɔd in Spirit tɛl Filip se, “Filip, go klos da man we de na in chariɔt.”
Filip go mit di bigman we kɔmɔt Itio pia, i yɛri di man de rid wan say pan wetin di prɔfɛt Ayzaya bin rayt. So Filip aks am se, “Yu ɔnda stand wetin yu de rid?”
Di bigman we kɔmɔt Itio pia ansa am se, “Aw a go ɔnda stand wetin a de rid wɛn pɔsin nɔ de fɔ ɛksplen am to mi?” I tɛl Filip fɔ kam sidɔm na in chariɔt.
Di say we i bin de rid na in dis: “I bin tan lɛkɛ ship we dɛn de kɛr go fɔ go kil. I bin tan lɛkɛ ship pikin we nɔ kin kray wɛn dɛn de kɔt in ia. I nɔ bin se fing.
Dɛn bin du am tin we mek i shem ɛn i nɔ bin gɛt pɔsin fɔ tɔk fɔ am. Nɔbɔdi nɔ go ebul fɔ tɔk bɔt in granpikin-pikin dɛn, bikɔs dɛn dɔn pul am kɔmɔt na dis wɔl.”
Di bigman we kɔmɔt Itio pia aks Filip se, “Duya udat di prɔfɛt Ayzaya bin de tɔk bɔt? Na bɔt insɛf ɔ bɔt ɔda pɔsin?”
Na in Filip tɛl am udat di prɔfɛt bin rayt bɔt, i tɛl am di Gud Nyus bɔt Jizɔs.
As dɛn de go, dɛn rich wan ples we gɛt wata. Di bigman we kɔmɔt Itio pia tɛl Filip se, “Luk wata naya, wetin mek yu nɔ go baptayz mi?” [
Filip ansa am se, “A go baptayz yu if yu biliv pan Jizɔs wit ɔl yu at.” Di bigman ansa am se, “A biliv; a biliv se Jizɔs Krays na Gɔd in Pikin.”]
Di bigman we kɔmɔt Itio pia mek in chariɔt tinap. Dɛn tu go insay di wata ɛn Filip baptayz am.
Wɛn dɛn kɔmɔt insay di wata, di Masta in Spirit kɛr Filip go, di bigman we kɔmɔt Itio pia nɔ si Filip igen. Di bigman gladi wɛn i de go na in os.
Wɛn dat dɔn, Filip fɛn insɛf na wan tɔng we nem Ezotɔs; wɛn i kɔmɔt de i bigin tɛl ɔl dɛn pipul na ɔl dɛn tɔng di Gud Nyus te i rich Siza ria.
Da sem tɛm de, Sɔl bin stil de mek Jizɔs in apɔsul dɛn sɔfa, ɛn i bin want kil dɛn. I go to di bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin

go aks am fɔ gi am pepa we go sho se i gɛt pawa fɔ go insay di Ju mitin os na Damaskɔs, so dat if i mit ɛnibɔdi we de waka aw di Masta se pipul fɔ waka, i go ol di pɔsin, man ɔ uman, kɛr am go bak na Jerusɛlɛm.
Sɔl bin de na rod de go Damaskɔs; as i de rich klos di tɔng, wantɛm, na in brayt layt lɛkɛ laytin we kɔmɔt na di klawd shayn pan am.
I fɔdɔm na grɔn, i yɛri vɔys de tɛl am se, “Sɔl, Sɔl, wetin mek yu de fɛt mi?”
Sɔl se, “Udat na yu, sa?” I yɛri we di vɔys ansa am se, “Mi na Jizɔs, na mi yu de fɛt.
Grap na grɔn ɛn go insay di tɔng, pɔsin go mit yu de ɛn tɛl yu wetin yu fɔ du.”
Di man dɛn we bin de go wit Sɔl tinap, dɛn nɔ tɔk wan wɔd. Dɛn yɛri di vɔys we bin de tɔk, bɔt dɛn nɔ si nɔbɔdi.
Sɔl grap ɛn opin in yay, bɔt i nɔ ebul si natin. So di man dɛn we bin de wit am go ol in an ɛn kɛr am go Damaskɔs.
Sɔl de tri de, i nɔ de si, i nɔ de it, ɛn i nɔ de drink wata.
Wan man bin de na Damaskɔs we na bin Jizɔs in lanin bɔy, i bin nem Ana na yas; Gɔd sho am sɔntin. I si di Masta ɛn i yɛri di Masta de kɔl am, “Ana na yas!” I ansa se, “Masta, luk mi naya, sa.”
Di Masta tɛl am se, “Rɛdi, go na da trit we dɛn kɔl Tret Trit; go insay wan man we nem Judas in os ɛn aks fɔ Sɔl we kɔmɔt na wan tɔng we nem Tasɔs. Yu go mit i de pre ɛn
a dɔn sho am wan man we nem Ana na yas we kam insay in os ɛn put in an pan in ed ɛn pre fɔ mek i go bigin si bak.”
Ana na yas tɔk se, “Masta, plɛnti pipul dɔn tɛl mi bɔt dis man ɛn bɔt di bad we i dɔn du yu pipul dɛn we de na Jerusɛlɛm.
Naw di bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin dɔn gi Sɔl pepa we gi am pawa fɔ kam na Damaskɔs ɛn ol ɛnibɔdi we de pre to yu.”
Di Masta tɛl Ana na yas se, “Go, a dɔn pik Sɔl fɔ mek i wok fɔ mi. I go mek dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju ɛn dɛn king ɛn dɛn pipul na Izrɛl sabi mi.
Misɛf go sho Sɔl plɛnti tin we i go sɔfa fɔ mek ɔda pipul sabi mi.”

So Ana na yas go; i go insay di os ɛn put in an pan Sɔl in ed ɛn pre fɔ am. I se, “Mi brɔda Sɔl, di Masta, Jizɔs we tɔk to yu wɛn yu bin de na rod de kam naya, sɛn mi to yu. I sɛn mi fɔ kam pre fɔ yu mek yu go si bak ɛn fɔ mek Gɔd in Spirit kam insay yu.”
Wantɛm, sɔntin we tan lɛkɛ fish skel fɔdɔm kɔmɔt pan Sɔl in yay. Sɔl ebul fɔ si bak, i tinap. I nɔ te igen, na in dɛn baptayz am.
Sɔl it ɛn i gɛt trɛnk bak. Sɔl bin tap wit Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn na Damaskɔs bɔt i nɔ bin te de.
I go na di Ju mitin os ɛn bigin fɔ tɔk bɔt Jizɔs. I se, “Jizɔs na Gɔd in Pikin.”

Ɔl dɛn pipul we bin yɛri wetin Sɔl de tɔk, wɔnda; dɛn se, “Nɔto dis man bin de kil dɛn pipul na Jerusɛlɛm we bin de kɔl Jizɔs in nem? I nɔ bin kam naya fɔ ol dɛn pipul we de kɔl Jizɔs in nem ɛn kɛr dɛn go bak to dɛn bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin?”
Aw Sɔl bin de tɔk bɔt Jizɔs mek mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul biliv pan Jizɔs. Wɛn i pruv se Jizɔs na di Mɛsaya, di Ju pipul dɛn na Damaskɔs kɔnfyus.
I nɔ tu te, di Ju pipul dɛn mek mitin ɛn dɛn mekɔp fɔ kil Sɔl.
Pipul tɛl Sɔl wetin di Ju pipul dɛn mekɔp fɔ du am. De ɛn nɛt di Ju pipul dɛn kin de wet na di tɔng dɛn get fɔ kil Sɔl.
Bɔt wan nɛt, dɛn pipul we bin biliv wetin Sɔl bin de tɔk bɔt Jizɔs, put Sɔl na blay ɛn pas am oba di wɔl we de rawnd di tɔng.
Sɔl go na Jerusɛlɛm ɛn tray fɔ miks wit Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn. Di lanin bɔy dɛn nɔ bin biliv se Sɔl insɛf bin dɔn bi Jizɔs in lanin bɔy. Dɛn bin stil de fred am.
Banabas ɛp Sɔl, i kɛr am go to di apɔsul dɛn. I tɛl dɛn se Sɔl si di Masta na rod ɛn di Masta tɔk to am. Banabas tɛl dɛn se Sɔl nɔ bin fred fɔ tɔk bɔt Jizɔs wɛn i de tɔk to di pipul dɛn na Damaskɔs.
Sɔl bin de wit di apɔsul dɛn ɛn i fala dɛn go ɔlsay na Jerusɛlɛm; i nɔ bin de fred fɔ tɛl pipul bɔt di Masta.
Sɔl bin de tɔk ɛn agyu ɔltɛm wit dɛn Ju pipul we de tɔk Grik langwej ɛn dɛn pipul ya bin de tray fɔ kil am.
Wɛn di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs yɛri se dɛn want kil Sɔl, dɛn kɛr am go Siza ria ɛn frɔm de, dɛn mek i go Tasɔs.

Da tɛm de, nɔbɔdi nɔ mek dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs Krays na Judia, Galili, ɛn Same ria sɔfa igen. Gɔd in Spirit bin de ɛp dɛn fɔ mek mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul biliv pan Jizɔs. Ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs bin de du wetin Gɔd want ɛn dɛn bin rɛspɛkt di Masta.
Pita bin de go ɔlsay go fɛn Gɔd in pipul dɛn, ɛn wan de i go luk Gɔd In pipul dɛn we bin de na Lida.
Wɛn Pita bin de na Lida, i mit wan man we nem Inias we nɔ bin ebul waka, i bin dɔn ledɔm na bed et ia.
Pita go to Inias ɛn tɛl am se, “Inias, Jizɔs Krays dɔn mɛn yu. Grap ɛn mek yu bed.” Inias grap wantɛm.
Ɔl dɛn pipul we de Lida ɛn Sherɔn si we Inias grap, so dɛn biliv pan di Masta.
Wan uman bin de na Jɔpa we bin nem Tabita. (Dɛn Grik pipul de kɔl am Dɔkas we min, bif we dɛn kɔl dia.) Dis uman ya bin biliv pan Jizɔs ɛn ɔltɛm i kin de du gud ɛn i kin de ɛp dɛn po pipul.
Di tɛm we Pita bin de na Jɔpa, Tabita bin sik, dɛn i day. Dɛn was in bɔdi ɛn dɛn le am na rum na wan garɛt.
Jɔpa bin de klos Lida. Wɛn di lanin bɔy dɛn yɛri se Pita de na Lida, dɛn sɛn tu man dɛn go kɔl am, mek i kam wit dɛn wantɛm.
So Pita rɛdi go mit dɛn. Wɛn i rich, dɛn kɛr am go na di rum. Ɔl dɛn uman we dɛn man dɔn day, bin gɛda na di os. Dɛn bin de kray ɛn dɛn bin de sho Pita di klos dɛn we Dɔkas bin dɔn so.
Pita mek ɔl di pipul dɛn go na do, dɔn i nil dɔng ɛn pre. I tɔn to di dedebɔdi ɛn se, “Tabita, grap!” Tabita opin in yay, grap ɛn sidɔm wɛn i si Pita.
Pita ol in an ɛn es am ɔp mek i tinap. Pita kɔl ɔl dɛn pipul we bin biliv Gɔd ɛn dɛn wan we dɛn man bin dɔn day; i sho dɛn Tabita layf wan.
Di nyus bɔt wetin bi prɛd ɔlsay na Jɔpa. Dat mek plɛnti pipul biliv pan di Masta.
Pita bin tap na Jɔpa fɔ sɔm tɛm wit wan man we de wok pan bif kanda, i bin nem Saymɔn.
Wan man bin de na Siza ria we bin nem Kɔnilyɔs, na bin kapten fɔ dɛn soja man na Rom. Dɛn bin de kɔl dɛn soja man ya “Itali Soja man Dɛn”.
Kɔnilyɔs ɛn di pipul dɛn na in os bin fred Gɔd. I bin de du plɛnti gud fɔ ɛp dɛn Ju pipul we po ɛn i kin de pre to Gɔd ɔltɛm.
Wan santɛm, bay dɛn tri oklɔk, Gɔd sho Kɔnilyɔs sɔntin. I si Gɔd in enjɛl gud gud wan; di enjɛl kɔl am, i se, “Kɔnilyɔs!”
Kɔnilyɔs skyad ɛn luk di enjɛl ɛn se, “Wetin yu want, sa?” Di enjɛl se, “Gɔd dɔn yɛri dɛn pre we yu kin de pre, i dɔn si di gud wok we yu dɔn du fɔ dɛn po pipul, ɛn i dɔn ansa yu.
Sɛn go Jɔpa naw fɔ wan man we nem Saymɔn Pita.
Saymɔn Pita de to Saymɔn we de wok dɛn bif kanda we in os de klos di waf.”
Wɛn Gɔd in enjɛl we bin de tɔk to Kɔnilyɔs dɔn go, Kɔnilyɔs kɔl tu pan in bɔy dɛn, wan soja man, ɛn in raytan man we kin pre to Gɔd.
I tɛl dɛn wetin bi, dɔn i sɛn dɛn go Jɔpa.
Di ɔda de wɛn dɛn pipul ya bin de na rod de go ɛn dɛn bin dɔn rich klos Jɔpa, Saymɔn Pita go pantap di os we flat fɔ pre lɛkɛ aw dɛn Ju pipul kin du. Na bin santɛm.
Pita bin angri ɛn i bin jɛs want it. Wɛn di pipul dɛn na di os de rɛdi di it, i tan lɛkɛ slip kech Pita.
Aw Pita sɛt in yay, na de i si ɛvin opin ɛn sɔntin we fiba big bedshit de kam dɔng te i rich na grɔn.
Ɔl kayn fofut tin, ɔl kayn snek ɛn ɔl kayn bɔd bin de na di bedshit.
Pita yɛri vɔys de tɛl am se, “Pita, grap; kil ɛni tin ɛn it am!”
Pita ansa se, “Masta, nɔ, sa; wan de a nɔ it tin we wi Ju pipul dɛn tink se dɔti ɛn we nɔ fayn fɔ it.”
Di vɔys tɔk igen se, “Ɛni tin we Gɔd se klin, yu nɔ fɔ se i dɔti.”
Pita yɛri di vɔys tri difrɛn tɛm, na in di big bedshit go bak na ɛvin.
Di tin we Pita si mek i wɔnda ɛn i bin want no wetin dat min. Da sem tɛm de, dɛn pipul we Kɔnilyɔs sɛn bin dɔn rich na di os we Saymɔn Pita de ɛn dɛn bin tinap na di get.
Di pipul dɛn we Kɔnilyɔs sɛn, kɔnk na di do ɛn aks if dɛn gɛt tre nja de we nem Saymɔn Pita.
Di tin we Gɔd sho Pita bin mek Pita de wɔnda stil ɛn i bin stil want fɔ no wetin dat min, na in Gɔd in Spirit tɛl am se, “Tri man dɛn de luk fɔ yu.
So grap go mit dɛn ɛn nɔ fred fɔ fala dɛn go bikɔs na mi sɛn dɛn.”
So Pita grap go dɔng go mit dɛn. I se, “Na mi dis we una de luk fɔ, wetin mek una kam?”

Dɛn ansa se, “Na Kapten Kɔnilyɔs, da bigman fɔ dɛn soja man dɛn na Itali, sɛn wi to yu. Na gud man we fred Gɔd ɛn ɔl di Ju pipul dɛn rɛspɛkt am bad. Gɔd bin sɛn enjɛl to Kɔnilyɔs fɔ mek i kɔl yu fɔ go na in os, mek i go yɛri wetin yu gɛt fɔ tɛl am.”
Pita kɔl di man dɛn go insay di os ɛn i mek dɛn slip de, da nɛt de. Wɛn do klin, Pita wit di tri man dɛn, ɛn sɔm pan dɛn Gɔd pipul na Jɔpa lɛf fɔ go to Kɔnilyɔs na Siza ria.
Wɛn i rich Siza ria di ɔda de, Kɔnilyɔs bin de wet dɛn, i bin dɔn kɔl in fambul dɛn ɛn in padi dɛn.
Wɛn Pita want go insay di os, Kɔnilyɔs kam mit am ɛn butu ol in fut.
Pita tɛl am se, “Grap, mi na mɔta lman.”
Pita bin de tɔk to Kɔnilyɔs wɛn dɛn de go insay di os. I mit plɛnti pipul de.
I tɛl di pipul dɛn se, “Unasɛf no se wi Ju Lɔ tɛl wi se wi nɔ fɔ kip kɔmpin wit pipul dɛn we nɔto Ju ɔ miks to dɛn sɛf. Bɔt Gɔd dɔn sho mi se a nɔ fɔ se mi kɔmpin mɔta lman nɔ fit fɔ miks to wi.
Na dat mek, we yu sɛn kɔl mi a nɔ se nɔ; a kam. Kɔnilyɔs, mek a aks yu sɔntin, wetin mek yu sɛn kɔl mi?”
Kɔnilyɔs ansa se, “I dɔn tek fo dez naw, bay dis tɛm, tri oklok santɛm, a bin de pre na mi os. Wantɛm, wan man we wɛr klos we de shayn kam tinap bifo mi.
Di man se, ‘Kɔnilyɔs, Gɔd dɔn yɛri di pre we yu de pre ɛn i dɔn si du gud wok we yu dɔn du fɔ dɛn po pipul. I dɔn ansa yu.
Sɛn kɔl wan man we nem Saymɔn Pita, i de na Jɔpa; i de na wan Saymɔn we de wok dɛn bif kanda, in os we de klos di waf.’
Na dat mek a sɛn kɔl yu wantɛm. I gud we yu kam. Wi kam naya fɔ yɛri wetin di Masta dɔn tɛl yu fɔ tɛl wi. Gɔd de ya wit wi.”
Pita se, “Fɔ tru, Gɔd nɔ de luk ɛnibɔdi bɛtɛ pas in kɔmpin.
Gɔd go mek ɛnibɔdi we rɛspɛkt am ɛn du wetin i want, bi in yon.
Una no di mɛsej we Gɔd bin sɛn to di Ju pipul dɛn na Izrɛl, i tɛl dɛn di Gud Nyus se na Jizɔs Krays we na ɔlman Masta, go mek dɛn kam to Gɔd fɔ mek dɛn ɔl gɛt kol at.
Una no wetin dɔn bi na Judia. Da big wok de bin bigin na Galili afta Jɔn bin dɔn tɔk se di pipul dɛn fɔ lɛf fɔ du di bad tin dɛn we dɛn de du ɛn kam mek i baptayz dɛn.

Una no se Gɔd bin gi Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt in Spirit ɛn in pawa. Jizɔs bin de go ɔlɔbɔt de du gud fɔ pipul ɛn i mɛn ɔl dɛn wan we bin gɛt dɛbul insay dɛn. I bin ebul du ɔl dɛn tin ya bikɔs Gɔd bin de wit am.
Na wi si ɔl wetin Jizɔs du na Judia ɛn Jerusɛlɛm. Una no se dɛn nel Jizɔs na di krɔs fɔ mek i day.
Bɔt Gɔd mek i rayz frɔm di grev di de we mek tri, afta i day. Jizɔs sho insɛf to wi.
I nɔ sho insɛf to ɔlman! Na to wi nɔmɔ, we Gɔd dɔn pik fɔ si am, i sho insɛf. Afta Jizɔs rayz frɔm di grev, wi bin it ɛn drink wit am.
I tɛl wi fɔ tɛl ɔlman di Gud Nyus. I tɛl wi igen fɔ tɛl ɔlman se Gɔd dɔn pik am fɔ jɔj ɔl dɛn pipul we dɔn day ɛn ɔl dɛn wan we nɔ day yet.
Ɔl dɛn prɔfɛt bin tɔk bɔt Jizɔs se if ɛnibɔdi biliv pan am, Gɔd go padin da pɔsin de fɔ di bad tin dɛn we i du, bay di pawa we de na Jizɔs in nem.”
Pita bin stil de tɔk, na in Gɔd in Spirit kam pan ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin de lisin wetin i de tɔk.
Dɛn Ju pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs we bin kɔmɔt Jɔpa fala Pita kam, bin wɔnda wɛn dɛn si se Gɔd gi dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju, in Spirit.
Dɛn yɛri dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju de tɔk difrɛn difrɛn langwej dɛn ɛn prez Gɔd. Na in Pita tɔk se,
“Gɔd dɔn gi dɛn pipul ya in Spirit lɛkɛ aw i bin dɔn gi wisɛf. Ɛnibɔdi go se dɛn nɔ fɔ baptayz?”
Pita se mek dɛn kɔl Jizɔs Krays in nem we dɛn de baptayz dɛn. Di pipul dɛn mek Pita tap to dɛn lili bit.
Di apɔsul dɛn ɛn ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs na Judia yɛri se dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju biliv Gɔd in wɔd.
Dɛn Ju pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs tɔk pan Pita bikɔs i go Jerusɛlɛm.
Dɛn se, “Pita go to dɛn pipul we nɔ sakɔmsayz ɛn it wit dɛn.”
So Pita tɛl dɛn ɔl wetin bi frɔm fɔs to las. I se,
“A bin de pre na wan tɔng we nem Jɔpa, na in Gɔd sho mi sɔntin. A si sɔntin we tan lɛkɛ big bedshit de kam dɔng. Di bedshit bin tay na di fo kɔna dɛn wit rop. I kɔmɔt ɔp na ɛvin kam dɔng klos mi.
Wɛn a luk gud insay di bedshit, a si ɔl kayn tin dɛn fofut tin, dɛn tin lɛkɛ snek ɛn kondo, ɛn ɔl kayn bɔd dɛn.
A yɛri vɔys de tɛl mi se, ‘Pita, grap; kil ɛni tin ɛn it am!’
Bɔt a ansa se, ‘Masta, nɔ, sa; wan de a nɔ it ɛni tin we dɔti ɔ we nɔ fayn fɔ it.’
Di vɔys tɔk bak se, ‘Ɛni tin we Gɔd dɔn se klin, yu nɔ fɔ se i dɔti.’
Di vɔys tɔk dis sem tin tri tɛm, na in ɔltin lɔs go bak na ɛvin.
Di sem tɛm we dis tin bi, tri man dɛn we kɔmɔt Siza ria, kam na di os we wi bin de.
Gɔd in Spirit tɛl mi mek a nɔ fred fɔ fala dɛn go. Siks pipul na Jɔpa we bin biliv pan Jizɔs fala mi go Siza ria na Kɔnilyɔs in os.
Kɔnilyɔs tɛl mi se Gɔd sɛn wan enjɛl to am we tɛl am se, ‘Sɛn, kɔl wan man we nem Saymɔn Pita. I de na Jɔpa.
I go kam tɛl yu aw yu ɛn ɔl yu fambul dɛn go sev.’
As a bigin fɔ tɔk so, Gɔd mek in Spirit kam pan dɛn pipul ya lɛkɛ aw i bin kam pan wi fɔstɛm.
Dat mek a mɛmba wetin di Masta bin se, ‘Jɔn baptayz una wit wata bɔt Gɔd go baptayz una wit in Spirit.’
Na tru se Gɔd dɔn gi dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju di sem Spirit we i gi wi wɛn wi biliv pan Masta Jizɔs Krays. Udat na mi fɔ tɛl Gɔd se a nɔ go du wetin i tɛl mi fɔ du?”

Wɛn dɛn yɛri wetin Pita tɔk, dɛn lɛf fɔ grɔmbul. Dɛn bigin prez Gɔd, dɛn se, “Gɔd dɔn gi dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju chans fɔ mek dɛn lɛf fɔ du dɛn bad tin we dɛn bin de du, so dat dɛn kin gɛt layf we go de sote go.”

Wɛn dɛn bigman na Jerusɛlɛm kil Sti vin ɛn mek dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs Krays sɔfa, di pipul dɛn skata ɔlɔbɔt. Sɔm go Fini shya, sɔm go Sayprɔs, sɔm go Antiɔk. Bɔt na to dɛn Ju pipul dɛn nɔmɔ dɛn bin de tɔk bɔt Jizɔs.
Sɔm pan di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs bin de na Sayprɔs, sɔm bin de na Sayrini. Dɛn kɔmɔt Sayprɔs ɛn Sayrini go tap na Antiɔk ɛn dɛn tɛl dɛn Grik pipul dɛn bɔt di Masta, Jizɔs.
Gɔd in pawa bin de pan dɛn, dat mek plɛnti pipul biliv pan Jizɔs ɛn tek Jizɔs fɔ dɛn Masta.
Wɛn di nyus bɔt wetin bin de bi na Antiɔk rich Jerusɛlɛm, di pipul dɛn we bin biliv Jizɔs sɛn Banabas go luk wetin de bi.
Wɛn Banabas rich Antiɔk ɛn si aw Gɔd de blɛs di pipul dɛn, insɛf gladi. I tɛl dɛn mek dɛn fala di Masta wit ɔl dɛn at.
Banabas na bin gud man; Gɔd in Spirit bin de insay am ɛn i bin biliv Gɔd. Dat mek plɛnti pipul biliv pan di Masta.
Banabas go Tasɔs fɔ go luk fɔ Sɔl.

Wɛn i si Sɔl, i bring am kam na Antiɔk. Banabas ɛn Sɔl te na Antiɔk. Dɛn bin de mit wit di chɔch pipul dɛn fɔ lan dɛn, di pipul dɛn kin plɛnti. Antiɔk na di fɔs ples we dɛn bigin kɔl dɛn pipul we biliv pan Jizɔs, Kristiɛn.
Da sem tɛm de, sɔm prɔfɛt dɛn bin kɔmɔt Jerusɛlɛm go Antiɔk.
Wan pan dɛn prɔfɛt ya bin nem Agabɔs. Gɔd in Spirit bin tɛl am fɔ tɔk bɔt di bad angri we bin gɛt fɔ kam na wɔl. Dis bad angri bin kam da tɛm we Klɔdiɔs bin de rul na Rom.
Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn gri fɔ ɛp dɛn Kristiɛn na Judia.
Dɛn gi Banabas ɛn Sɔl kɔpɔ fɔ kɛr go fɔ dɛn pipul na Jerusɛlɛm.
Wɛn ɔl dɛn tin ya bin de bi, na in King Ɛrɔd Agripa bigin mek dɛn Kristiɛn dɛn sɔfa bad bad.
I mek dɛn tek sɔd kil Jems we na bin Jɔn in brɔda.
Wɛn di king si se di Ju pipul dɛn gladi fɔ wetin i du, i du ɔda bad tin; i mek soja man dɛn ol Pita. Ɔl dis bi di tɛm we dɛn bin gɛt wan Ju ɔlide we dɛn kin it bred we nɔ gɛt yist.

Wɛn dɛn ol Pita, dɛn put am na sɛl. Dɛn mek sikstin soja man dɛn de gyad am; di soja man dɛn bin de fo-fo we dɛn de gyad am. Ɛrɔd Agripa bin mekɔp fɔ lɛ dɛn jɔj Pita wɛn di Ju ɔlide we nem Pasova dɔn.
Wɛn Pita bin de na sɛl, di Kristiɛn dɛn bin de pre fɔ am tra nga wan.
Di nɛt bifo di mɔnin we Ɛrɔd bin mekɔp fɔ mek dɛn jɔj Pita, Pita bin de slip midul tu soja man dɛn. Dɛn bin tay am wit tu chen ɛn ɔda soja man dɛn bin tinap na di get de gyad di ples.
Wantɛm, di Masta in enjɛl bɔs kam insay di sɛl ɛn brayt brayt layt shayn ɔlsay na di sɛl. Di enjɛl shek Pita in sho lda fɔ wek am. I se, “Pita, mekes grap!” Di chen dɛn pan Pita in an kɔt kɔmɔt.
Di enjɛl tɛl Pita se, “Wɛr yu klos, tay yu bɛlt, ɛn wɛr yu sus. Kam lɛ wi go.” Pita du ɔl wetin di enjɛl tɛl am fɔ du.
Pita fala di enjɛl kɔmɔt insay di sɛl. I nɔ bin no se na tru tin di enjɛl de tɛl am, i bin min se in de drim.

Pita ɛn di enjɛl pas di gyad dɛn na di fɔs get, dɛn pas di sɛkɛn gyad dɛn na di ɔda get. Wɛn Pita ɛn di enjɛl rich na di big ayɛn get, di get opin fɔ insɛf. Pita ɛn di enjɛl kɔmɔt na do. Dɛn ɔl tu bin de waka go dɔng di trit; wantɛm, di enjɛl lɔs lɛf Pita in wan gren.

Pita kechɔp se i nɔ bin de drim ɛn ɔl wetin bi na tru tin. I se, “A no naw se na tru tin dis we bi! Na di Masta sɛn in enjɛl fɔ kam pul mi kɔmɔt na Ɛrɔd in an ɛn fɔ mek di Ju pipul dɛn nɔ ebul du ɔl dɛn bad tin we dɛn bin want du mi.”
Wɛn Pita no wetin bi, i go na Meri in os. Dis Meri ya na bin Jɔn Mak in mama. Pita mit plɛnti pipul de pre na di os.
I nak na di do; wan uman we nem Roda we bin de wok de, kam fɔ opin di do.
Wɛn i yɛri Pita in vɔys, i so gladi, i rɔn go bak, i fɔgɛt fɔ opin di do. I go tɛl di ɔda pipul dɛn se na Pita de nak.
Di pipul dɛn se, “Roda, yu dɔn kres!” Bɔt i pin se na tru. Di pipul dɛn se, “Na Pita in enjɛl.”
Pita bin stil de nak; wɛn dɛn opin di do, dɛn wɔnda fɔ si Pita.
Pita mek sayn wit in an to dɛn fɔ mek dɛn sɛt mɔt, dɔn i tɛl dɛn aw di Masta pul am kɔmɔt na sɛl. Bifo Pita go, i tɛl di Kristiɛn dɛn fɔ tɛl Jems ɛn di ɔda Kristiɛn dɛn we nɔ bin de, wetin bi.
Wɛn do klin, di gyad dɛn bigin de wɔri bad, dɛn bigin de aks dɛn kɔmpin se, “Wetin apin to Pita?”
King Ɛrɔd Agripa tɛl dɛn fɔ go fɛn Pita, bɔt dɛn nɔ si am, so i kwɛshɔn di soja man dɛn we bin de gyad Pita, dɔn i mek dɛn kil dɛn. Wɛn dat dɔn, King Ɛrɔd kɔmɔt Judia go tap na Siza ria.

Ɛrɔd bin vɛks bad pan dɛn pipul na Taya ɛn Saydɔn, so di pipul dɛn na dɛn tu tɔng de gɛda wan ples fɔ go tɔk to am. Di fɔs tin we dɛn du, dɛn mek wanwɔd wit di bigman we de luk ɔl di king in prɔpati. Dis man ya bin nem Blastɔs. Dɛn go to Ɛrɔd go beg am mek dɛn ɔl gɛt wanwɔd, bikɔs di it we dɛn bin de it bin de kɔmɔt na di kɔntri we Ɛrɔd bin de rul.
Ɛrɔd pik wan de we i drɛs wit di klos dɛn we king de wɛr. I go sidɔm na di chia we i kin sidɔm pan fɔ rul, dɔn i bigin tɔk to di pipul dɛn we bin gɛda.
Di pipul dɛn ala se, “I nɔ de tɔk lɛkɛ mɔta lman, i de tɔk lɛkɛ wan gɔd!”
Di Masta in enjɛl kam put sik pan Ɛrɔd bikɔs i nɔ rɛspɛkt Gɔd; wɔrɔm it in bɔdi ɛn i day.
Di Kristiɛn dɛn go ɔlɔbɔt de tɔk Gɔd in wɔd ɛn dat mek mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul biliv pan Gɔd.
Banabas ɛn Sɔl kɛr di kɔpɔ go gi di chɔch bigman dɛn na Jerusɛlɛm. Wɛn dɛn de tɔn bak, dɛn kɛr Jɔn Mak go Antiɔk.
Di chɔch na Antiɔk bin gɛt sɔm prɔfɛt dɛn ɛn sɔm ticha dɛn. Dɛn na bin Banabas, Simyɔn we dɛn bin de kɔl Blak Pɔsin, Lushyɔs we bin kɔmɔt Sayrini, Manɛn we na in ɛn di gɔvna Ɛrɔd gro, ɛn Sɔl.
Wan de wɛn dɛn bin de pre ɛn fas, Gɔd in Spirit tɛl dɛn se, “Una put Banabas ɛn Sɔl wansay bikɔs a dɔn pik dɛn fɔ du spɛshal wok fɔ mi.”
Di chɔch pipul dɛn na Antiɔk fas ɛn pre. Dɛn put an pan Banabas ɛn Sɔl dɛn ed fɔ blɛs dɛn, dɔn dɛn sɛn dɛn go.
Gɔd in Spirit bin sɛn Banabas ɛn Sɔl go na wan tɔng we nem Silu shya. Dɛn tek bot go na wan ples we de midul wata we nem Sayprɔs.
Wɛn dɛn rich na wan tɔng we nem Sala mis, dɛn go na di Ju mitin os go tɛl di pipul dɛn bɔt Gɔd. Dɛn bin kɛr Jɔn Mak go fɔ ɛp dɛn.
Dɛn pas na Pefɔs; dɛn mit wan maji kman de we bin nem Ba-Jizɔs. Na Ju man we bin de kɔl insɛf prɔfɛt.
Ba-Jizɔs na bin di gɔvna in padi. Di gɔvna bin nem Sajiɔs Pɔlɔs, na man we bin gɛt sɛns. Di gɔvna sɛn kɔl Banabas ɛn Sɔl, bikɔs i bin want yɛri Gɔd in wɔd.
Ɛli mas (na so dɛn Grik pipul bin de kɔl Ba-Jizɔs) ambɔg Banabas ɛn Sɔl. I tray fɔ mek Gɔvna Sajiɔs Pɔlɔs tap fɔ biliv pan Gɔd.
Gɔd in Spirit bin de insay Sɔl, we in ɔda nem na Pɔl, so i grap go mit Ɛli mas, di maji kman; i luk am ping,
ɛn tɛl am se, “Yu na Setan in pikin, yu nɔ lɛk ɛni tin we gud. Na bad ful yu at. Wetin mek yu want pul pipul dɛn kɔmɔt na di Masta in tret rod?
Di Masta dɔn put in an pan yu naw; yu go blɛn ɛn yu nɔ go ebul si di san sɛf sote di tɛm we Gɔd dɔn mak fɔ opin yu yay.” Wantɛm Ɛli mas in yay dak, i bigin waka de fɛn udat go ol in an waka wit am.
Di gɔvna biliv pan Jizɔs gud wan wɛn i si wetin bi. Ɔl di tin we dɛn lan am bɔt di Masta mek i wɔnda.
Pɔl ɛn in kɔmpin dɛn kɔmɔt Pefɔs, dɛn tek big bot go na Paga we de Pamfi lya. Jɔn Mak lɛf Pɔl ɛn Banabas dɛn na Paga tɔn bak go Jerusɛlɛm.
Pɔl ɛn Banabas kɔmɔt Paga, go Antiɔk we de Pisi dya. Wɛn di de fɔ pre ɛn blo rich, dɛn go na di Ju mitin os.

Wɛn di pipul dɛn dɔn rid di Lɔ we Gɔd bin gi Mozis ɛn wetin dɛn prɔfɛt bin rayt, di bigman dɛn na di Ju mitin os sɛn pɔsin fɔ go tɛl Pɔl ɛn Banabas dis mɛsej ya: “Wi brɔda dɛn, wi want mek una tɔk to di pipul dɛn if una gɛt ɛni wɔd fɔ kɔrej dɛn.”
Pɔl tinap; i mek sayn to di pipul dɛn fɔ sɛt mɔt, dɔn i se, “Mi Ju pipul dɛn ɛn una we nɔto Ju, una ɔl we fred Gɔd; una lisin wetin a de tɔk!
Wɛn wi Izrɛl pipul dɛn bin de na Ijipt, di Gɔd we wi pipul dɛn de pre to pik wi gra npapa-papa dɛn ɛn blɛs di Izrɛl neshɔn. Na bay Gɔd in pawa mek di Izrɛl pipul dɛn kɔmɔt pan slev layf.
Di fɔti ia we di Izrɛl pipul dɛn bin de na dɛzat, Gɔd bin bia wit dɛn ɛn gi dɛn ɔl wetin dɛn fɔ gɛt.
Gɔd mek dɛn pul sɛvin neshɔn kɔmɔt na da kɔntri we nem Kenyan, dɔn i mek dɛn sheb di ples gi di Izrɛl pipul dɛn.
Na fo ɔndrɛd ɛn fifti ia i tek bifo ɔl dɛn tin ya bi. “Wɛn dat pas, Gɔd mek difrɛn difrɛn jɔj dɛn rul di Izrɛl pipul dɛn te di tɛm we prɔfɛt Samyɛl kam.
Afta dat, di Izrɛl pipul dɛn aks Gɔd fɔ pik king fɔ dɛn. Gɔd pik Sɔl we na bin Kish in pikin, ɛn wan pan Bɛnja min in fambul dɛn. King Sɔl rul Izrɛl fɔti ia.
Wɛn Gɔd pul Sɔl kɔmɔt na pawa, i pik Devid fɔ bi king na Izrɛl. Gɔd tɔk bɔt Devid se, ‘A dɔn pik Devid, Jɛsi in pikin, fɔ bi una king; a gladi fɔ am bikɔs i go du ɔl wetin a want am fɔ du.’
Na wan pan Devid in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn we nem Jizɔs, Gɔd pik fɔ sev in Izrɛl pipul dɛn. Na dat Gɔd bin dɔn tɔk se go bi.
Bifo Jizɔs bigin in wok, Jɔn go ɔlsay na Izrɛl de tɛl pipul mek dɛn lɛf fɔ du di bad tin dɛn we dɛn de du ɛn mek dɛn kam mek i baptayz dɛn.

Bifo Jɔn dɔn di wok we Gɔd sɛn am fɔ kam du, i aks di pipul dɛn se, ‘Udat una tink se a bi? Mi nɔto di pɔsin we una de luk rod fɔ. Da pɔsin de go kam wɛn a dɔn du di wok we Gɔd sɛn mi fɔ kam du. A nɔ fit sɛf fɔ lus di sus we i wɛr.’
“Mi pipul dɛn we de wɔship Gɔd, una we na Ebraam in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn ɛn una we nɔto Ju; Gɔd mek dɛn kam tɛl wi bɔt aw i de sev pipul.

Dɛn pipul na Jerusɛlɛm ɛn dɛn bigman nɔ bin no se na in de sev wi ɛn dɛn nɔ bin sabi wetin dɛn kin de rid di de fɔ pre ɛn blo, we dɛn prɔfɛt bin dɔn rayt. Bɔt wɛn dɛn kɔndɛm Jizɔs, dɛn mek wetin dɛn prɔfɛt bin dɔn rayt bɔt am kam bi tru.
Jizɔs nɔ bin du natin bad we fɔ mek dɛn kil am, bɔt di pipul dɛn tɛl Paylet fɔ kil am.
Wɛn di pipul dɛn dɔn du ɔl wetin dɛn prɔfɛt bin rayt bɔt am, dɛn pul am pan di krɔs, bɛr am insay wan ston grev.
Bɔt Gɔd mek i rayz frɔm di grev.
Jizɔs sho insɛf plɛnti tɛm to dɛn pipul we fala am kɔmɔt Galili go Jerusɛlɛm, ɛn dɛn pipul ya bin de tɛl ɔda pipul dɛn na Izrɛl bɔt am.
Wi kam ya fɔ tɛl una di Gud Nyus bɔt wetin Gɔd bin se i go du fɔ wi gra npapa-papa dɛn.
I dɔn du am fɔ wi we i dɔn mek Jizɔs rayz bak wit layf. Dɛn rayt na di sɛkɛn Sam se, Gɔd se, ‘Yu na mi Pikin; a dɔn bi yu Papa tide.’
Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk bɔt Jizɔs in day wan se, wɛn Gɔd mek Jizɔs rayz frɔm di grev, i nɔ go day igen. Gɔd se, ‘A go gi una di tru blɛsin we na mi nɔmɔ de gi, we a bin prɔmis Devid.’
Gɔd tɔk ɔda say se, ‘Yu nɔ go gri mek yu yon savant we de du ɔl wetin yu gi am fɔ du day ɛn rɔtin.’
Wɛn Devid dɔn du wetin Gɔd bin want am fɔ du, i day. Dɛn bɛr am klos in gra npapa-papa dɛn ɛn in bɔdi rɔtin.
Bɔt di wan we Gɔd mek rayz frɔm di grev nɔ bin rɔtin.

Mi pipul dɛn, a want mek una no se na fɔseka Jizɔs mek dɛn de tɛl una se Gɔd go padin una fɔ di bad tin dɛn we una de du. A want mek una no se ɛnibɔdi we biliv pan am, Gɔd go mek da pɔsin de tap fɔ du di bad tin dɛn we i de du, ɛn dat na wan tin we di Lɔ we Gɔd bin gi Mozis nɔ ebul du.
Una tek tɛm, mek wetin dɛn lɔntɛm prɔfɛt bin tɔk, nɔ bi to una.
Di prɔfɛt dɛn bin se, ‘Una we de laf wetin Gɔd dɔn tɔk, una go luk, una go wɔnda, ɛn una go day! A go du big wok we una go si, ɛn ilɛk dɛn tɛl una di minin sɛf, una nɔ go biliv.’ ”
Wɛn Pɔl ɛn Banabas bin want kɔmɔt na di Ju mitin os, di pipul dɛn tɛl dɛn fɔ kam ɔda de we dɛn de pre ɛn blo, fɔ tɛl dɛn mɔ bɔt wetin dɛn bin jɛs tɔk bɔt.

Wɛn dɛn ɔl kɔmɔt na di Ju mitin os go na dɛn os, plɛnti Ju pipul dɛn fala Pɔl ɛn Banabas go, wit plɛnti pipul we nɔto bin Ju bɔt we bin gri fɔ tɔn to Ju. So Pɔl ɛn Banabas kɔrej dɛn fɔ mek dɛn abop pan Gɔd we gud to ɔlman ɛn we lɛk ɔlman ilɛk sɛf dɛn nɔ fit fɔ mek i lɛk dɛn.
Di ɔda de we dɛn pre ɛn blo, ɔlman na di tɔng go fɔ yɛri Pɔl ɛn Banabas wɛn dɛn de tɔk bɔt di Masta.
Wɛn di Ju pipul dɛn si ɔl di pipul dɛn na di Ju mitin os, dɛn jɛlɔs Pɔl ɛn Banabas. Dɛn se na lay Pɔl de lay ɛn dɛn tɔk bad bɔt am.

Pɔl ɛn Banabas nɔ fred fɔ tɔk; dɛn se, “Wi bin gɛt fɔ tɛl una dɛn Ju pipul bɔt Gɔd bifo wi tɛl dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju. We una nɔ gri biliv pan am, una dɔn kɔndɛm unasɛf se una nɔ fit fɔ gɛt layf sote go. Na dat mek wi de tɛl dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju bɔt Gɔd naw.
Di Masta dɔn tɛl wi se, ‘A dɔn put una lɛkɛ lamp fɔ dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju. Na una a go yus fɔ sev ɔlman na di wɔl.’ ”
Wɛn dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju yɛri dat, dɛn gladi ɛn dɛn prez di Masta fɔ wetin i tɛl dɛn. Dɛn pipul we Gɔd bin dɔn pik fɔ gɛt layf sote go, biliv pan Jizɔs Krays.
Di Masta in wɔd prɛd ɔlsay na di kɔntri.

Bɔt di Ju pipul dɛn put wɔd na di bigman na di tɔng dɛn yes, dɔn dɛn put wɔd na dɛn big uman we nɔto bin Ju we fred Gɔd, dɛnsɛf yes. So dɛn du Pɔl ɛn Banabas bad bad tin dɛn ɛn drɛb dɛn kɔmɔt na di tɔng.
Di apɔsul dɛn shek di dɔti kɔmɔt na dɛn fut fɔ sho se dɛn nɔ go gɛt natin fɔ du wit di pipul dɛn na di tɔng igen, dɔn dɛn go Aykonyɔm.
Dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs we bin de na Antiɔk bin gladi ɛn Gɔd in Spirit bin kam pan dɛn.

Di sem tin bi na Aykonyɔm. Wɛn Pɔl ɛn Banabas bin de na Aykonyɔm, dɛn go na di Ju mitin os; bay aw dɛn tɔk to di pipul dɛn plɛnti Ju pipul ɛn plɛnti pipul we nɔto bin Ju we kɔmɔt Gris, biliv pan Jizɔs.
Bɔt dɛn Ju pipul we nɔ bin gri fɔ biliv pan Jizɔs put wɔd na dɛn pipul we nɔto bin Ju dɛn yes ɛn dɛn du di Kristiɛn dɛn bad.

Di apɔsul dɛn bin de lɔng na Aykonyɔm. Di apɔsul dɛn nɔ bin de fred fɔ tɛl di pipul dɛn bɔt di Masta ɛn di Masta sho se na tru tin di apɔsul dɛn bin de tɔk wɛn dɛn se i gud, ɛn i gi dɛn pawa fɔ du plɛnti wɔnda ful wok.
Di pipul dɛn na di tɔng bin sheb; sɔm pipul bin de fɔ di Ju pipul dɛn ɛn sɔm bin de fɔ di apɔsul dɛn.
So dɛn pipul we nɔto bin Ju, dɛn Ju pipul, ɛn dɛn yon bigman dɛn mek bagin fɔ du di apɔsul dɛn bad ɛn fɔ ston dɛn.
Wɛn di apɔsul dɛn yɛri dat, dɛn rɔnawe go ayd na wan kɔntri we nem Laykao nia. Di tɔng dɛn we dɛn go na Listra, Dabi, ɛn dɛn tɔng we de klos de.
Dɛn bin de tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus wɛn dɛn de na dɛn tɔng ya.
Wan man bin de na Listra we nɔ bin ebul waka. In fut dɛn bin day frɔm we in mama bɔn am.
I bin sidɔm de lisin we Pɔl de tɔk. Pɔl bin no se di man biliv se Gɔd go mek i wɛl, so i luk di man ping,
ɛn i tɔk lawd wan se, “Tinap tret wan!” Di man grap ɛn bigin waka ɔlɔbɔt.
Wɛn di pipul dɛn si wetin bi, dɛn bigin ala na di Laykao nia langwej se, “Dɛn gɔd dɔn tɔn to mɔta lman ɛn dɛn dɔn kam to wi!”
Dɛn kɔl Banabas “Zus” ɛn dɛn kɔl Pɔl “Amis” bikɔs na Pɔl bin de tɔk.
Di man we de mek sakri fays to da gɔd we nem Zus kɛr kaw ɛn flawa go na di get. In ɛn di pipul dɛn bin want mek sakri fays. Di ples we pipul dɛn bin de pre to Zus bin de klos di get na di tɔng.

Wɛn Banabas ɛn Pɔl yɛri se di pipul dɛn want mek sakri fays, dɛn chɛr di klos we dɛn bin wɛr pantap. (Na so dɛn Ju pipul kin du fɔ sho se dɛn nɔ gri wit wetin de bi.) Dɛn rɔn go na di ples we di pipul dɛn we bin de pre to Zus bin gɛda. Dɛn ala tɛl di pipul dɛn se,

“Wi pipul dɛn, wetin mek una de du dɛn tin ya? Wi na mɔta lman lɛkɛ unasɛf! Wi kam naya fɔ tɛl una di Gud Nyus fɔ mek una lɛf fɔ du dɛn tin ya we go mek una day, ɛn kam to Gɔd we gɛt layf sote go. Na Gɔd mek dis wɔl, di klawd, di wata, ɛn ɔltin we de na di wɔl.
Fɔs tɛm Gɔd bin de lɛf pipul to dɛnsɛf.
Bɔt stil i bin de sho ɔlman udat i bi bay di gud we i kin du fɔ dɛn ɔl. Gɔd kin gi una ren. Di ren kin fɔdɔm frɔm di klawd, ɛn mek wetin una plant bia wɛn di tɛm rich, so dat una go gladi.”
Pan ɔl we di apɔsul dɛn tɛl di pipul dɛn, dɛn wɔd ya, i bin tra nga fɔ mek dɛn tap dɛn, mek dɛn nɔ mek di sakri fays.
Sɔm pan di Ju pipul dɛn bin kɔmɔt Antiɔk ɛn sɔm bin kɔmɔt Aykonyɔm. Dɛn tɔk sote di pipul dɛn gri fɔ du wetin dɛn want. Dɛn ston Pɔl ɛn drɛg am kɔmɔt na di tɔng bikɔs dɛn bin min se i dɔn day.
Bɔt wɛn dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs go mit am, i grap, dɛn i go bak na di tɔng. Di ɔda de Pɔl ɛn Banabas go Dabi.
Pɔl ɛn Banabas tɛl di pipul dɛn na Dabi di Gud Nyus ɛn dɛn mek plɛnti pipul biliv pan Jizɔs. Dɛn kɔmɔt Dabi go Listra, dɛn go Aykonyɔm, dɔn dɛn go Antiɔk we de na Pisi dya.

Pɔl ɛn Banabas kɔrej di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs ɛn dɛn tɛl dɛn mek dɛn biliv pan Jizɔs mɔ ɛn mɔ. Pɔl ɛn Banabas tɛl di pipul dɛn se, “Ɔlman we biliv pan Jizɔs gɛt fɔ sɔfa plɛnti na dis wɔl fɔ mek dɛn go de ɔnda Gɔd in rul.”
Wɛn dɛn dɔn fas ɛn pre to Gɔd, dɛn pik sɔm bigman dɛn na ɔl dɛn chɔch fɔ du di wok, dɛn lɛf dɛn na di Masta, we dɛn biliv, in an.
Wɛn dɛn dɔn waka ɔlsay na Pisi dya, dɛn go Pamfi lya.
Dɛn tɛl di pipul dɛn na Paga di Gud Nyus, dɔn dɛn go Ata lia.
Dɛn kɔmɔt Ata lia, dɛn tek big bot go Antiɔk, na da tɔng de, di pipul dɛn put Pɔl ɛn Banabas na Gɔd an mek i ɛp dɛn fɔ du di wok we i gi dɛn fɔ du, we dɛn bin de du.
Wɛn dɛn rich Antiɔk, dɛn gɛda ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs ɛn tɛl dɛn ɔl wetin Gɔd mek dɛn du ɛn aw Gɔd mek dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju biliv pan Jizɔs.
Pɔl ɛn Banabas bin de lɔng wit dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs.
Sɔm pipul kɔmɔt Judia go Antiɔk. Dɛn go tɛl di pipul dɛn na Antiɔk se, Gɔd nɔ go sev dɛn pas dɛn sakɔmsayz bikɔs na dat di Lɔ we Gɔd gi Mozis se.

Pɔl ɛn Banabas nɔ bin gri wit di tin we dɛn pipul ya bin de lan di pipul dɛn na Antiɔk, so dɛn bigin agyu tra nga wan wit di Judia pipul dɛn bɔt dat. Dɛn gri fɔ mek Pɔl ɛn Banabas ɛn sɔm ɔda Kristiɛn dɛn na Antiɔk go Jerusɛlɛm fɔ tɔk bɔt dat to di apɔsul dɛn ɛn dɛn bigman na di chɔch.

Di chɔch mɛmba dɛn sɛn Pɔl ɛn Banabas go. Wɛn Pɔl ɛn Banabas bin de pas na Fini shya ɛn Same ria, dɛn tɛl di chɔch pipul dɛn se dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju dɔn biliv Gɔd. Dis nyus mek ɔl di Kristiɛn dɛn gladi bad.
Wɛn Pɔl ɛn Banabas rich Jerusɛlɛm, di chɔch pipul dɛn, di apɔsul dɛn ɛn di chɔch bigman dɛn gladi fɔ si dɛn, ɛn Pɔl ɛn Banabas tɛl dɛn ɔl wetin Gɔd ɛp dɛn fɔ du.
Bɔt sɔm pan dɛn pipul we de na di Faresi grup se, “Dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju fɔ sakɔmsayz ɛn du di tin dɛn we Mozis in Lɔ se dɛn fɔ du.”
Di apɔsul dɛn ɛn di chɔch bigman dɛn mit fɔ tɔk bɔt dat.
Wɛn dɛn dɔn tɔk dɔn, na in Pita tinap fɔ tɔk. I se, “Mi pipul dɛn, una no se Gɔd bin dɔn pik mi lɔntɛm fɔ go tɛl dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju dis Gud Nyus so dat dɛn go yɛri am ɛn biliv pan di Masta.
Bɔt Gɔd we no mɔta lman at, dɔn gri fɔ gi dɛn in Spirit lɛkɛ aw i bin gi wi in Spirit.
Gɔd sho se wi ɛn dɛn na di sem ɛn bikɔs dɛn biliv, i pul bad kɔmɔt na dɛn at.
So wetin mek wi want du di tin we go mek Gɔd vɛks? Wetin mek wi de kam put lod pan dɛn pipul we dɔn biliv pan di Masta, da lod we wi gra npapa-papa dɛn nɔ bin ebul tot, da lod we wisɛf nɔ ebul tot?
Lɛkɛ aw wi biliv se Masta Jizɔs sɔri fɔ wi ɛn sev wi, na di semwe dɛnsɛf biliv se Masta Jizɔs sɔri fɔ dɛn ɛn sev dɛn.”
Nɔbɔdi na di mitin nɔ se fing wɛn dɛn yɛri wetin Banabas ɛn Pɔl de tɔk bɔt ɔl di wɔnda ful wok dɛn we Gɔd mek dɛn du fɔ dɛn pipul we nɔto bin Ju.
Wɛn Banabas ɛn Pɔl dɔn tɔk dɔn, na in Jems se, “Mi pipul dɛn, a want mek una lisin mi!
Saymɔn jɛs tɛl una bɔt aw Gɔd dɔn sho se i kia bɔt dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju ɛn i dɔn kɔl dɛn fɔ bi in yon pipul.
Wetin di prɔfɛt dɛn bin tɔk, na in de bi so; dɛn bin se,
‘Gɔd se, Wɛn dɛn tin ya dɔn bi, a go kam bak ɛn bil Devid in os we bin dɔn fɔdɔm. Pan ɔl we i bin dɔn pwɛl ɔltogɛda, a go bil am bak.
Ɔl dɛn ɔda pipul ɛn dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju we dɔn bi mi yon, go fɛn di Masta.
Na di tin dis we di Masta bin dɔn tɔk, ɛn i dɔn mek wi no dat lɔntɛm.’ ”
Pantap dat, Jems se, “A tink se wi nɔ fɔ mek tin tra nga fɔ dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju we dɔn gri fɔ tɔn to Gɔd.
Bɔt una lɛ wi rayt tɛl dɛn se dɛn nɔ fɔ it ɛni tin we pipul dɔn sakri fays to dɛn gɔd, dɛn nɔ fɔ liv fri layf, dɛn nɔ fɔ it bif we gɛt blɔd pan am, ɛn dɛn nɔ fɔ it blɔd.
I dɔn te we dɛn de rid di Lɔ we Gɔd gi Mozis, dɛn de go ɔlsay fɔ tɛl pipul wetin Mozis bin tɔk.”

Di apɔsul dɛn, di bigman dɛn na di chɔch, ɛn ɔl di chɔch mɛmba dɛn gri fɔ pik sɔm pipul na di chɔch we dɛn fɔ sɛn wit Pɔl ɛn Banabas go na di Antiɔk chɔch. Di chɔch pipul dɛn pik Judas we dɛn bin de kɔl Basa bas, ɛn Saylas. Dɛn tu man ya, na bin pipul we di chɔch mɛmba dɛn rɛspɛkt.

Di chɔch pipul dɛn gi dɛn lɛta fɔ kɛr go; dɛn rayt na di lɛta se, “Wi, di apɔsul dɛn ɛn dɛn chɔch bigman, we na una brɔda dɛn, de sɛn adu to una dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju ɛn we biliv pan Jizɔs, we tap na Antiɔk, Sirya, ɛn Sili shya.
Wi yɛri se sɔm pipul we kɔmɔt to wi naya de mek tin tra nga fɔ una ɛn dɛn de kɔnfyus una wit di tin we dɛn de tɔk. Nɔto wi sɛn dɛn.
So wi gri fɔ sɛn sɔm pipul to una wit Pɔl ɛn Banabas, wi padi dɛn we wi lɛk bad wan.
Sɔm pipul bin want kil Pɔl ɛn Banabas bikɔs dɛn de wok fɔ wi Masta Jizɔs Krays.
Wi sɛn Judas ɛn Saylas fɔ tɛl una wetin wi dɔn rayt.
Gɔd in Spirit nɔ want mek wi put mɔ lod pan una ɛn wisɛf nɔ want du dat, bɔt una fɔ kip dɛn Lɔ ya:

una nɔ fɔ it ɛni bif we dɛn dɔn sakri fays to dɛn yon gɔd, una nɔ fɔ it bif we gɛt blɔd pan am, una nɔ fɔ it blɔd, ɛn una nɔ fɔ liv fri layf. I go gud if una nɔ du dɛn tin ya we wi dɔn rayt to una. Una mekes, o!”
Di pipul dɛn we dɛn sɛn go Antiɔk, gɛda ɔl di chɔch mɛmba dɛn, dɛn gi dɛn di lɛta.
Wɛn di pipul dɛn na Antiɔk rid di lɛta, dɛn gladi fɔ di mɛsej we kɔrej dɛn.
Judas ɛn Saylas dɛnsɛf na bin prɔfɛt; dɛn tek plɛnti tɛm fɔ tɔk to di pipul dɛn ɛn dɛn kɔrej dɛn fɔ biliv mɔ.
Dɛn bin te lili bit na Antiɔk. Di chɔch mɛmba dɛn na Antiɔk blɛs dɛn bifo dɛn lɛf dɛn mek dɛn go bak to di pipul dɛn we sɛn dɛn. [
Bɔt Saylas bin mekɔp fɔ tap na Antiɔk.]
Pɔl, Banabas, ɛn plɛnti ɔda pipul bin te lili bit na Antiɔk de lan di pipul dɛn ɛn tɛl dɛn wetin di Masta se.
I nɔ bin tu te, na in Pɔl tɛl Banabas se, “Lɛ wi go fɛn dɛn pipul we wi bin dɔn tɛl di Masta in mɛsej, lɛ wi go luk aw dɛn de du.”
Banabas bin want mek dɛn kɛr Jɔn Mak go,
bɔt Pɔl bin tink se i nɔ go gud fɔ mek dɛn go wit Jɔn Mak bikɔs i nɔ bin de wit dɛn sote dɛn dɔn di fɔs patrol. I bin tɔn bak, i lɛf dɛn na Pamfi lya.
Pɔl ɛn Banabas bin gɛt cham-mɔt so ɔlman go in yon we. Banabas go wit Jɔn Mak, dɛn tek big bot go Sayprɔs.
Pɔl tek Saylas. Bifo dɛn go, di chɔch mɛmba dɛn na Antiɔk lɛf Pɔl ɛn Saylas na di Masta in an.
Pɔl go ɔlsay we chɔch de na Sirya ɛn Sili shya fɔ kɔrej di chɔch mɛmba dɛn.
Pɔl go sote i rich Dabi ɛn Listra. I mit wan Kristiɛn man na Listra we bin nem Timoti. In mama na bin Ju uman we bin biliv pan di Masta, bɔt Timoti in papa na bin Grik man.
Ɔl di Kristiɛn dɛn na Listra ɛn Aykonyɔm bin de tɔk gud bɔt Timoti.
Pɔl bin want Timoti fɔ go wit dɛn, so i mek dɛn sakɔmsayz Timoti, bikɔs ɔl di Ju dɛn na dɛn ples de, bin no se Timoti in papa na Grik man.
Wɛn Pɔl ɛn Timoti bin de go na dɛn tɔng, dɛn bin de tɛl di chɔch pipul dɛn wetin di apɔsul dɛn ɛn di bigman dɛn na Jerusɛlɛm se ɛn dɛn bin de tɛl di pipul dɛn di rul dɛn we dɛn fɔ kip.
So dat mek di chɔch pipul dɛn biliv mɔ ɛn mɔ ɛn plɛnti ɔda pipul bigin de go chɔch ɛvri de.
Pɔl ɛn in kɔmpin dɛn go ɔlsay na Fri jya ɛn Galeshya bikɔs Gɔd in Spirit nɔ gri mek dɛn tɔk Gɔd in mɛsej na wan smɔl ples we dɛn kɔl Eshya.
Wɛn Pɔl ɛn in kɔmpin dɛn rich na di bawndri we de na Mishya, dɛn bin want go na Biti nya bɔt Jizɔs in Spirit nɔ gri mek dɛn go de.
So dɛn go insay Mishya, dɔn dɛn go Troas.
Da nɛt de, Gɔd sho Pɔl wan Masi do nya man we bin de beg Pɔl se, “Duya, kam ɛp wi na Masi do nya.”
Wɛn Pɔl si wetin Gɔd sho am, na in wi rɛdi fɔ go Masi do nya. Wi bin shɔ se na Gɔd tɛl wi fɔ go de go tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus.
Wɛn wi kɔmɔt Troas, wi tek big bot go tret na Samo tres, dɔn di ɔda de, wi go Nia polis.
Wi lɛf Nia po lis go Fili pay. Fili pay na wan big Roman tɔng we de na Masi do nya; wi bin tap de tu tri de.
Wɛn di de fɔ pre ɛn blo rich, wi kɔmɔt na di tɔng go klos di riva. Wi bin min se ples lib de we di Ju pipul dɛn kin pre. Wi sidɔm ɛn bigin tɔk to sɔm uman dɛn we bin gɛda de.

Wan pan di uman dɛn we bin de lisin bin nem Lidia, i bin kɔmɔt na da tɔng we nem Taya tira. Na uman we bin de sɛl dɛn dia klos. Na uman we bin fred Gɔd ɛn di Masta mek i lisin gud wetin Pɔl tɔk, ɛn i biliv am.
Dɛn baptayz Lidia ɛn ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin de na in os. I kɔl wi go na in os ɛn tɛl wi se, “Ɛnti una si se a dɔn biliv pan di Masta gud, una kam tap to mi.”
Wan de we wi bin de go na di ples we dɛn Ju pipul kin pre, wan slev titi kam mit wi. Dis titi bin gɛt dɛbul we bin de mek i ebul tɛl pipul wetin go bi.
I fala wi ɛn Pɔl de ala se, “Dɛn man ya na Gɔd we pas ɔl, in savant dɛn! Dɛn kam fɔ sho una aw una go sev!”

Di titi kin de du dis sem tin ɛvri de. I du am sote Pɔl tɔmɛnt. Pɔl tɔn to di slev titi ɛn tɛl di dɛbul we bin de insay am se, “Dɛbul, bay Jizɔs Krays in pawa, kɔmɔt insay dis titi ya!” Da sem tɛm de, di dɛbul kɔmɔt insay am.

Wɛn di pipul dɛn we bin gɛt di slev titi no se di titi nɔ go ebul mek mɔni fɔ dɛn igen, dɛn go grip Pɔl ɛn Saylas drɛg dɛn go bifo di bigman dɛn na di tɔng; di bigman dɛn bin de na di ples we pipul kin mit.
Di pipul dɛn kɛr Pɔl ɛn Saylas go bifo di bigman dɛn na di kot. Dɛn tɛl di bigman dɛn se, “Dɛn man ya na Ju pipul ɛn dɛn de ambɔg dɛn pipul na dis tɔng.
Dɛn de lan wi dɛn tin we wi Roman lɔ se wi nɔ fɔ du. Wi na Roman pipul ɛn wi nɔ go gri fɔ du wetin dɛn man ya de tɛl wi fɔ du.”
Di pipul dɛn bigin bit Pɔl ɛn Saylas. Di bigman dɛn mek di soja man dɛn chɛr Pɔl ɛn Saylas dɛn klos ɛn bit dɛn.
Wɛn dɛn dɔn bit dɛn dɔn, di bigman dɛn tɛl di gyad fɔ lɔk Pɔl ɛn Saylas gud na sɛl fɔ mek dɛn nɔ rɔnawe.

Wɛn di bigman dɛn dɔn tɛl di gyad dat, di gyad go ib Pɔl ɛn Saylas na di sɛl we de insay insay di jel; dɔn i put dɛn fut insay dɛn ebi wud we gɛt ol insay fɔ put fut ɛn we de lɔk. Na dɛn dɛn bin de tek fɔ pɔnish bad pipul.
Pɔl ɛn Saylas bin de pre ɛn sing to Gɔd; na bin midul nɛt. Di pipul dɛn we bin de na dɛn ɔda sɛl bin de yɛri we Pɔl ɛn Saylas de pre ɛn sing to Gɔd.
Wantɛm, di grɔn bigin tri mbul bad bad wan; ɔl di jelos sɛf bigin shek. Ɔl di sɛl do dɛn opin ɛn di chen dɛn lus kɔmɔt pan ɔl di jelman dɛn.
Wɛn di gyad wek ɛn si se di sɛl dɛn opin, i min se ɔl di pipul dɛn na di sɛl dɛn dɔn rɔnawe go, so di gyad tek in sɔd fɔ kil insɛf.
Bɔt Pɔl ala big big wan se, “Nɔ kil yusɛf. Wi ɔl de naya!”
Di gyad kɔl pipul fɔ mek dɛn bring lamp kam. Di gyad bin de tri mbul wɛn i rɔn go insay di sɛl, i fɔdɔm na Pɔl ɛn Saylas dɛn fut.
I pul Pɔl ɛn Saylas kɔmɔt na dɛn sɛl ɛn aks dɛn se, “Wetin a fɔ du mek a go sev, sa?”
Dɛn ansa am se, “Biliv pan di Masta, Jizɔs, ɛn yu ɛn ɔl di pipul dɛn na yu os go sev.”
Dɛn tɛl di gyad ɛn ɔl di pipul dɛn na in os ɔl wetin di Masta se.
Na bin midul nɛt, bɔt di gyad pul Pɔl ɛn Saylas kɔmɔt na dɛn sɛl ɛn i was dɛn wund. Dɛn baptayz di gyad wantɛm wit ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin de na in os.
I kɛr Pɔl ɛn Saylas go na in os ɛn gi dɛn it. Ɔl di pipul dɛn na di os bin gladi bad bikɔs dɛn bin biliv pan Gɔd.
Wɛn do klin, di Roman bigman dɛn tɛl di gyad dɛn se, “Una pul dɛn man ya na sɛl mek dɛn go.”
So di gyad tɛl Pɔl se, “Di Roman bigman dɛn sɛn se mek a lɛf una so una kam na do ɛn mek Gɔd go wit una!”

Pɔl tɛl dɛn se, “Di Roman bigman dɛn nɔ jɔj wi fɔ no if wi du bad bɔt dɛn bit wi bifo ɔlman ɛn wi na Roman pipul! Dɛn ib wi na sɛl, bɔt naw dɛn want mek wi go mek nɔbɔdi nɔ no? Wi nɔ de go! Na di Roman bigman dɛnsɛf fɔ kam pul wi na sɛl bifo wi go kɔmɔt naya.”
Di gyad dɛn go tɛl di Roman bigman dɛn wetin Pɔl ɛn Saylas tɔk. Wɛn dɛn yɛri se Pɔl ɛn Saylas na Roman pipul, di bigman dɛn fred.
So dɛn go beg Pɔl ɛn Saylas, dɛn pul dɛn kɔmɔt insay di sɛl, ɛn dɛn mek dɛn kɔmɔt na di tɔng.
Wɛn Pɔl ɛn Saylas kɔmɔt na di sɛl, dɛn go na Lidia in os. Dɛn mit ɔda Kristiɛn dɛn de, so dɛn kɔrej dɛn bifo dɛn go.
Pɔl ɛn Saylas go Amfi po lis, dɛn go Apo lo nia, dɔn dɛn rich Tɛsalonayka. Ju mitin os bin de na Tɛsalonayka.

Pɔl go na di Ju mitin os, as na so i kin du ɔltɛm. Pɔl tek tri pan dɛn de we dɛn Ju pipul de pre ɛn blo, fɔ ɛksplen wetin rayt na Gɔd in Buk. I tɛl dɛn se di Mɛsaya bin gɛt fɔ sɔfa ɛn day ɛn rayz frɔm di grev. Pɔl se, “Dis Jizɔs ya we a de tɛl una bɔt na in na di Mɛsaya.”
Sɔm pipul biliv wetin Pɔl ɛn Saylas tɛl dɛn ɛn jɔyn wit dɛn. Plɛnti dɛn Grik pipul biliv ɛn tɔn to Gɔd, ɛn sɔm pan di bigman dɛn wɛf sɛf biliv ɛn tɔn to Gɔd.

Bɔt di Ju pipul dɛn bin vɛks we plɛnti pipul jɔyn wit Pɔl ɛn Saylas, so dɛn gɛda dɛn trit pipul fɔ mek nɔys. Di Ju pipul dɛn ɛn di trit pipul dɛn kɔnfyus di tɔng ɛn dɛn ston Jesɔn in os. Dɛn bin de fɛn Pɔl ɛn Saylas fɔ mek dɛn kam bifo di pipul dɛn na trit.
Bɔt we dɛn nɔ fɛn dɛn, dɛn drɛg Jesɔn ɛn sɔm Kristiɛn dɛn go bifo di bigman dɛn na di tɔng. Di Ju pipul dɛn ɛn di trit pipul dɛn bin de ala se, “Dɛn man ya de ambɔg ɔlsay! Dɛn dɔn kam naw na wi tɔng,
ɛn na Jesɔn bin kip dɛn na in os. Dɛn nɔ de kip di lɔ we di king na Rom gi wi, dɛn de se ɔda king de we nem Jizɔs.”
Wɛn ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin gɛda ɛn di bigman dɛn na di tɔng yɛri wetin di Ju pipul dɛn ɛn di trit pipul dɛn de tɔk, dat bring trɔbul na di tɔng.
Di bigman dɛn mek dɛn bel Jesɔn ɛn di ɔda Kristiɛn dɛn bifo dɛn lɛf dɛn mek dɛn go.
Wɛn nɛt kam, di Kristiɛn dɛn mek Pɔl ɛn Saylas go na Biria. Wɛn dɛn rich de, dɛn go na di Ju mitin os.

Di pipul dɛn na Biria bin gladi fɔ yɛri di mɛsej we Pɔl tɛl dɛn, pas di pipul dɛn na Tɛsalonayka. Dɛn bin gladi fɔ lisin wetin Pɔl de tɔk, ɛn dɛn rid wetin rayt na Gɔd in Buk fɔ si if na tru Pɔl bin de tɔk.
Plɛnti Ju pipul dɛn bin biliv pan Jizɔs; sɔm dɛn pipul ya na bin Grik, man ɛn uman.
Bɔt wɛn dɛn Ju pipul na Tɛsalonayka yɛri se Pɔl de tɛl di pipul dɛn na Biria Gɔd in mɛsej, dɛn go de go put wɔd na di pipul dɛn yes fɔ mek dɛn ambɔg Pɔl.
Di Kristiɛn dɛn mek dɛn kɛr Pɔl go wantɛm to sɔm pipul we bin tap klos di wata. Timoti ɛn Saylas bin lɛf na Biria.
Di pipul dɛn we go lɛf Pɔl, go wit am sote dɛn rich Atɛns. Wɛn dɛn de tɔn bak, Pɔl tɛl dɛn fɔ go tɛl Timoti ɛn Saylas fɔ kam mit am kwik.
Wɛn Pɔl bin de wet fɔ Timoti ɛn Saylas, i bin vɛks we i si se di pipul dɛn bin gɛt plɛnti gɔd na di tɔng.
So i kin go na di Ju mitin os fɔ go tɔk to dɛn Ju pipul we bin de pre to Gɔd ɛn dɛn pipul we nɔto bin Ju we bin de pre to Gɔd. Ɔltɛm i kin go na di ples we pipul kin gɛda fɔ tɔk to dɛn.

Pɔl kin tɔk to dɛn ticha we dɛn kɔl Ɛpi kyu rian ɔ Stoik. Sɔm kin se, “Wetin dis man ya we nɔ sabi buk de tray fɔ tɔk?” Sɔm kin se, “I tan lɛkɛ se i de tɔk bɔt dɛn gɔd we ɔda pipul gɛt.” Di pipul dɛn bin de tɔk dat bikɔs Pɔl tɛl dɛn bɔt Jizɔs ɛn i tɛl dɛn se pipul we dɔn day go rayz frɔm dɛn grev.
So di pipul dɛn ol Pɔl kɛr am go na di kot we de mit na Ario pagɔs il. Dɛn tɛl Pɔl se, “Wi want fɔ no bɔt dis nyu tin we yu de lan wi.
Sɔm dɛn tin we yu de tɔk, wi nɔ yɛri dɛn wande ɛn wi want fɔ no wetin dɛn min.”
Bikɔs ɔl dɛn pipul we bɔn na Atɛns ɛn dɛn wan we na tre nja kin lɛk fɔ go sidɔm de, dɛn kin lɛk fɔ yɛri bɔt ɛni nyu tin ɛn tɔk bɔt am.
Pɔl tinap bifo di kot we kin de mit na Ario pagɔs il. I bigin tɔk to di pipul dɛn se, “Una gɛt big rɛspɛkt fɔ plɛnti gɔd.

We a de waka na una tɔng, a bin de luk na ɔl di ples dɛn we una de pre to una gɔd; na de a si wan ples we una rayt pan ston se, ‘Fɔ di gɔd we wi nɔ no’. Di gɔd we una de pre to, we una nɔ no, na in a kam tɛl una bɔt naw.
Gɔd we mek di wɔl ɛn ɔltin we lib de, na di Masta fɔ ɛvin ɛn dis wɔl, ɛn i nɔ tap na os we mɔta lman bil fɔ pre to am.
Gɔd nɔ nid ɛni tin we mɔta lman de gi am bikɔs na in de gi ɔlman layf ɛn ɔltin we i want.
Gɔd bin mek wan fambul fɔs ɛn na pan da wan fambul de, ɔl di pipul dɛn na dis wɔl kɔmɔt. Bifo Gɔd mek dɛn, i bin dɔn mak di tɛm we dɛn fɔ de na wɔl ɛn di ples we dɛn fɔ de.
Gɔd du dis fɔ mek mɔta lman go tray fɔ fɛn am lɛkɛ aw blɛnyay pɔsin kin du wɛn i de fɛn sɔntin, ɛn sɔntɛm dɛn go fɛn am. Ɛniwe i de klos wi ɔl;
sɔm pipul bin dɔn rayt se, ‘Na Gɔd de gi wi layf, na in de mek wi ebul waka ɛn na in de mek wi ebul du ɔltin!’ Ɛn sɔm pan una pipul dɛn we dɔn rayt buk, se, ‘Wi na Gɔd in pikin dɛn.’
We wi na Gɔd in pikin dɛn, lɛ wi mɛmba se mɔta lman nɔ go ebul tek gold, silva, ɔ ston mek Gɔd.
Gɔd nɔ de blem pipul fɔ di tɛm we dɛn nɔ bin no wetin i bin want mek dɛn du; bɔt naw Gɔd de tɛl ɔlman na wɔl fɔ mek dɛn lɛf fɔ du di bad tin dɛn we dɛn de du.

Gɔd dɔn put tɛm we i go jɔj ɔlman ɛn nɔbɔdi nɔ go kɔmplen se Gɔd nɔ jɔj am tret. Gɔd dɔn pik di wan we go jɔj ɔlman. Gɔd dɔn mek wi shɔ bɔt dis tin, we i mek di wan we i pik, rayz frɔm di grev, fɔ mek nɔbɔdi nɔ go dawt.”
Wɛn di pipul dɛn yɛri Pɔl de tɔk bɔt pɔsin we rayz frɔm di grev, sɔm laf Pɔl, bɔt sɔm se, “Wi go want fɔ yɛri yu bak wɛn yu de tɔk bɔt dis sem tin.”
So Pɔl kɔmɔt na di kot.
Sɔm pipul biliv wetin Pɔl tɔk so dɛn jɔyn wit am. Dɛn na bin Dayo ni shyɔs we na bin mɛmba na di kot we kin mit na Ario pagɔs il, wan uman we nem Dama ris, ɛn sɔm ɔda pipul.
Wɛn Pɔl kɔmɔt Atɛns, i go Kɔrint.

Pɔl mit wan Ju man we bin nem Akwila. Akwila bin bɔn na wan kɔntri na Rom we nem Pɔntɔs. Akwila ɛn in wɛf Prisila bin jɛs kɔmɔt Itali bikɔs di king na Rom we nem Klɔdiɔs bin pas lɔ we mek dɛn drɛb ɔl dɛn Ju pipul kɔmɔt na Rom. So Pɔl go luk Akwila ɛn Prisila.
I bin tap to dɛn, ɛn dɛn ɔl bin de wok wan ples. Na tɛnt Pɔl bin de mek we i bin de sɛl fɔ gɛt mɔni fɔ manej in layf. Na di sem wok Akwila dɛn bin de du.
Pɔl kin go na di Ju mitin os ɔl dɛn de we fɔ pre ɛn blo go tɔk to dɛn Ju ɛn dɛn Grik pipul, ɛn tray fɔ sho dɛn se na tru wɔd in de tɔk.
Wɛn Saylas ɛn Timoti rich Masi do nya, Pɔl lɛf fɔ mek tɛnt, i tek ɔl in tɛm de tɛl pipul wetin Jizɔs se, ɛn ɛksplen gud se Jizɔs na di Mɛsaya.

Di pipul dɛn nɔ bin gri tek wetin Pɔl tɛl dɛn ɛn dɛn bin de tɔk bad bɔt am, so Pɔl shek in klos pan dɛn fɔ sho se in nɔ gri wit dɛn. I tɛl dɛn se, “Una fɔ blem unasɛf fɔ wetin go bi to una if Gɔd kɔndɛm una! Nɔto mi go gɛt di blem; frɔm tide a de lɛf una; a de go tɛl dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju bɔt Gɔd.”
So, Pɔl lɛf di Ju pipul dɛn; i go tap to wan man we nɔto bin Ju, i bin nem Taytiɔs Jɔstɔs; na pɔsin we bin fred Gɔd. In os bin de klos di Ju mitin os.

Di edman na di Ju mitin os we bin nem Krispɔs bin biliv pan di Masta. Krispɔs ɛn di pipul dɛn we bin de na in os, ɛn plɛnti ɔda pipul we bin de na Kɔrint yɛri wetin Pɔl tɔk; dɛn biliv am ɛn mek i baptayz dɛn.
Wan nɛt, Gɔd sho Pɔl sɔntin; i tɛl am se, “Nɔ fred, yu nɔ fɔ taya fɔ tɔk di mɛsej we a tɛl yu fɔ tɔk,
bikɔs a de wit yu. Nɔbɔdi nɔ go ebul fɔ du yu bad. Plɛnti pipul na dis tɔng de fɔ mi.”
Pɔl tap na di tɔng wan ia ɛn siks mɔnt de lan di pipul dɛn wetin Gɔd se.
Di tɛm we Galio na bin di Roman gɔvna na Gris, ɔl di Ju pipul dɛn gɛda, dɛn ol Pɔl ɛn kɛr am go kot fɔ mek di gɔvna jɔj am.
Dɛn tɛl di gɔvna se, “Dis man de tray fɔ lan wi pipul dɛn bɔt di Ju dɛn Gɔd ɛn dat mek dɛn nɔ de kip wi Roman lɔ.”
Pɔl bin want tɔk, na de Galio tɛl di Ju pipul dɛn se, “If Pɔl bin du ɛni bad tin, a bin fɔ lisin una.
Bɔt we una jɛs de tɔk bɔt wan wan wɔd dɛn, difrɛn, difrɛn nem dɛn, ɛn una yon Ju Lɔ, a nɔ go jɔj am. Una go jɔj am to unasɛf.”
I drɛb dɛn kɔmɔt na di kot.
Dɛn ol Sɔsti nis we na bin di edman na di Ju mitin os ɛn bit am bifo di kot. Bɔt dat nɔ shek Galio.

Pɔl bin de wit di Kristiɛn dɛn na Kɔrint, i bin te de. Pɔl, Akwila, ɛn Prisila dɛn kɔmɔt Kɔrint go Sirya; na bot kɛr dɛn go. Bifo Pɔl lɛf fɔ go, i prɔmis Gɔd fɔ du sɔntin na Sɛnkria so i kɔt in ia na in ed lɛkɛ aw dɛn Ju pipul kin du wɛn dɛn prɔmis Gɔd fɔ du sɔntin.
Wɛn dɛn rich Ɛfisɔs, Pɔl lɛf Akwila ɛn Prisila na di tɔng, i go na di Ju mitin os fɔ rizin wit di Ju pipul dɛn.
Dɛn beg Pɔl fɔ de lɔng wit dɛn, bɔt Pɔl nɔ gri.
Wɛn Pɔl want go, i tɛl dɛn se, “If Gɔd gri, a go kam bak to una.” So i go tek bot ɛn kɔmɔt na Ɛfisɔs.
Wɛn Pɔl rich Siza ria, i pas na Jerusɛlɛm fɔ tɛl di Kristiɛn dɛn adu, dɔn i go Antiɔk.
I nɔ te na Antiɔk. I go ɔlsay na Galeshya ɛn ɔlsay na Fri jya fɔ kɔrej di Kristiɛn dɛn mek dɛn go biliv pan Krays mɔ ɛn mɔ.
Wan Ju man we bin nem Apɔlɔs bin go Ɛfisɔs. I bin bɔn na Alɛgza ndria. Na man we bin sabi tɔk ɛn i bin sabi wetin rayt na di Ju Lɔ buk.
Dɛn bin dɔn lan am bɔt di Masta in We. Apɔlɔs bin gladi fɔ tɔk bɔt Jizɔs ɛn di tin dɛn we i bin de lan di pipul dɛn na bin tru, bɔt na aw Jɔn de baptayz nɔmɔ i bin sabi.
Apɔlɔs nɔ bin de fred fɔ tɔk to di pipul dɛn na di Ju mitin os. Wɛn Prisila ɛn Akwila yɛri wetin Apɔlɔs tɔk, dɛn kɛr am go na dɛn os ɛn dɛn tɛl am mɔ bɔt Gɔd yon We.

Wɛn Apɔlɔs bin want fɔ go Gris, di Kristiɛn dɛn na Ɛfisɔs kɔrej am ɛn dɛn rayt lɛta to di Kristiɛn dɛn na Gris se, “Duya, una mek Apɔlɔs no se una gladi fɔ mit am wɛn i kam.” Wɛn Apɔlɔs rich Gris, i mit pipul we biliv pan Jizɔs fɔ we Gɔd gud to dɛn ɛn Apɔlɔs ɛp dɛn fɔ no mɔ bɔt Gɔd.
Apɔlɔs bin de pul gud pɔynt dɛn na Gɔd in Buk fɔ sho di Ju pipul dɛn, na di ples we dɛn ɔl bin gɛda, se Jizɔs na di Mɛsaya.
Di tɛm we Apɔlɔs bin de na Kɔrint, Pɔl waka insay dɛn kɔntri te i rich Ɛfisɔs; na de i mit sɔm Kristiɛn dɛn.
Pɔl aks dɛn se, “Frɔm we una bi Kristiɛn, Gɔd in Spirit dɔn kam pan una?” Di Kristiɛn dɛn ansa Pɔl se, “Wi nɔ yɛri bɔt Gɔd in Spirit wande.”
Pɔl aks dɛn igen se, “Wetin una bin biliv bifo dɛn baptayz una?” Dɛn ansa Pɔl se, “Wi bin biliv wetin Jɔn tɔk bɔt baptayz.”
Pɔl se, “Wɛn Jɔn de baptayz pɔsin, i kin tɛl am mek i lɛf fɔ du di bad tin dɛn we i de du; i tɛl di Izrɛl pipul dɛn fɔ biliv di Wan we go kam wɛn in dɔn go. Na Jizɔs i bin de tɔk bɔt.”
Wɛn di pipul dɛn yɛri wetin Pɔl tɔk, dɛn gri mek i kɔl Masta Jizɔs in nem wɛn i de baptayz dɛn.
Pɔl put in an na dɛn ed ɛn Gɔd in Spirit kam pan dɛn. Di pipul dɛn bigin tɔk dɛn langwej we dɛn nɔ lan ɛn dɛn tɔk wetin Gɔd tɛl dɛn fɔ tɔk.
Na lɛkɛ twɛlv pipul so bin baptayz.

Pɔl bin de na Ɛfisɔs tri mɔnt ɛn ɔl da tɛm de i kin de go tɔk to di pipul dɛn na di Ju mitin os, i nɔba fred. I kin agyu wit dɛn bɔt Gɔd in rul ɛn tray fɔ sho dɛn se di tin dɛn we i de tɔk bɔt Gɔd in rul na tru.

Sɔm pan di pipul dɛn bin tra nga yes, dɛn nɔ bin biliv pan Krays, dɔn dɛn kin de tɛl di ɔda pipul dɛn bad tin bɔt di We, we di Masta se ɔlman fɔ liv; so Pɔl lɛf dɛn go. Wɛn i de go, i tek di Kristiɛn dɛn go. Pɔl bigin go na Tayranɔs in skul fɔ lan di pipul dɛn we bin de go de.
I tek tu ia de ɛn dat mek di pipul dɛn na Eshya, di Ju pipul dɛn, ɛn dɛn pipul we nɔto bin Ju yɛri di Masta in mɛsej.
Gɔd mek Pɔl du plɛnti wɔndaful wok we pipul nɔba si wande.
Pipul bin de tek Pɔl in pɔkɛtan ɛn tawɛl dɛn go put dɛn pan sik pipul. Di pipul dɛn kin wɛl ɛn dɛbul kin kɔmɔt insay dɛn.
Sɔm Ju pipul dɛn we bin de go ɔlsay fɔ drɛb dɛbul tray fɔ tek Masta Jizɔs in nem fɔ du dat. Dɛn kin tɛl di dɛbul se, “Dɛbul, a de tɔk to yu, a tek Jizɔs we Pɔl de tɔk bɔt, in nem drɛb yu.”
Wan bigman we bin nem Skeva, we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, bin gɛt sɛvin pikin; na dɛn bin de drɛb dɛbul so.
Bɔt di dɛbul tɛl dɛn se, “A no Jizɔs ɛn a no Pɔl, bɔt udat na una?”
Di man we di dɛbul bin de insay chɛr Skeva in pikin dɛn klos, wund dɛn, ɛn bit dɛn sote dɛn ɔl rɔnawe.
Wɛn ɔl dɛn Ju pipul ɛn dɛn Grik pipul we bin de na Ɛfisɔs yɛri wetin bi, dɛn fred ɛn ɔlman rɛspɛkt Masta Jizɔs in nem.
Plɛnti pan di Kristiɛn dɛn tɔk se dɛn bin dɔn du bad ɛn dɛn tɔk bifo ɔlman bɔt di bad tin dɛn we dɛn bin dɔn du.
Plɛnti pan dɛn pipul we bin de ple majik bring dɛn majik buk wan ples ɛn bɔn dɛn mek ɔlman si. Wɛn dɛn kɔnt di kɔpɔ we dɛn tek bay ɔl di buk dɛn, i rich fifti tawzin silva kɔpɔ.
Ɔl di wɔnda ful tin dɛn we bi, mek di Masta in wɔd prɛd ɔlsay, ɛn mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul biliv pan Masta Jizɔs Krays.
Wɛn ɔl dɛn tin ya dɔn bi, Pɔl mekɔp fɔ go na Masi do nya, Gris, ɛn Jerusɛlɛm. Pɔl se, “Wɛn a dɔn waka na ɔl dɛn ples de, a gɛt fɔ go na Rom insɛf.”
Pɔl sɛn Timoti ɛn Irastɔs we bin de ɛp am go Masi do nya, ɛn in lɛf na Eshya.
Da sem tɛm de, big fɛt bin bi na Ɛfisɔs, ɛn na we Pɔl tɔk bɔt di Masta in We mek di fɛt bi.
Wan man we bin nem Dimi triɔs bin de tek silva mek plɛnti tin dɛn. I tek silva mek di gɔd we nem Ati mis. In os in ɛn in wokman dɛn bin de mek plɛnti kɔpɔ.
So Dimi triɔs kɔl ɔl in wokman dɛn ɛn dɛn ɔda pipul we bin de du di sem wok; i tɛl dɛn se, “Mi pipul dɛn, una no se na dis wok de mek wi jɛntri.
Una dɔn si ɛn una dɔn yɛri fɔ unasɛf wetin bra Pɔl de du. I se dɛn gɔd we mɔta lman de mek, nɔto tru gɔd ɛn plɛnti pipul we de na Ɛfisɔs ɛn di pipul dɛn ɔlsay na Eshya dɔn biliv wetin i tɛl dɛn.
Naw a nɔ jɛs de tɔk bɔt wi wok, a de tɔk bɔt da wi big gɔd we nem Atimis, in os; i nɔ go min natin igen ɛn in pawa go pwɛl. Dɛn pipul na Eshya ɛn pipul ɔlsay na wɔl nɔ go pre to am igen!”
Wɛn di pipul dɛn yɛri wetin Dimi triɔs tɔk, dɛn ɔl vɛks ɛn ala big wan se, “Ati mis, da gɔd we de na Ɛfisɔs, gɛt pawa!”

Di fɛt prɛd ɔlsay na di tɔng. Di pipul dɛn we bin de fɛt ol Geyɔs ɛn Ari stakɔs. Dɛn tu man ya na bin Masido nya pipul we bin de waka wit Pɔl. Dɛn kɛr dɛn tu go na di ples we di pipul dɛn na di tɔng kin de gɛda.
Pɔl bin want de bifo di pipul dɛn wɛn dɛn de go, bɔt di Kristiɛn dɛn nɔ gri fɔ mek Pɔl du dat.
Sɔm pan dɛn bigman na Eshya we na bin Pɔl in padi dɛn, sɛn go beg Pɔl mek i nɔ go na di ples we di pipul dɛn kin gɛda.
Da tɛm de, ɔl di pipul dɛn bin kɔnfyus; sɔm bin de ala wan tin, ɔda wan dɛn de ala ɔda tin bikɔs dɛn nɔ bin no wetin mek dɛn gɛda de.

Sɔm pipul bin de blem Alɛgza nda fɔ di fɛt bikɔs na in di Ju pipul dɛn bin put bifo. Alɛgza nda mek sayn to di pipul dɛn fɔ sɛt mɔt bikɔs i bin want ɛksplen to dɛn se in ɛn in padi dɛn nɔ no bɔt di fɛt.
Wɛn di pipul dɛn no se Alɛgza nda na Ju, dɛn tek tu awa de ala se, “Ati mis, da gɔd we de na Ɛfisɔs, gɛt pawa!”

Na di Meyɔ ebul mek di pipul dɛn sɛt mɔt. Di Meyɔ se, “Mi pipul dɛn na Ɛfisɔs, ɔlman no se na dis tɔng ya rɛspɔnsi bul fɔ di os we dɛn de pre to Ati mis ɛn di ston we pipul de pre to we fɔdɔm kɔmɔt ɔpklawd pan di tɔng.
Nɔbɔdi nɔ go se wi de lay. Una sɛt mɔt ɛn una tink bifo una du ɛni tin.
Una dɔn bring dɛn man ya kam ya. Dɛn nɔ tif natin na di os we Ati mis de ɛn dɛn nɔ tɔk natin bad bɔt wi gɔd.
If Dimi triɔs ɛn in wokman dɛn gɛt plaba wit ɛnibɔdi, di kot de ɛn di bigman de. Mek dɛn go le kɔmplen di de we dɛn bigman kin tɔk kes.
Bɔt if dɛn want ɔda tin, mek di bigman dɛn na tɔng kɔl ɔl di pipul dɛn ɛn du wetin wi lɔ se.
A de fred se dɛn go ol wi fɔ wetin wi dɔn du so tide. Di Roman pipul dɛn go se na strayk wi dɔn strayk. Wi nɔ go ebul tɔk wetin mek wi du di tin we wi dɔn du so.”
Wɛn i dɔn tɔk dɔn, i tɛl ɔlman fɔ go.
Wɛn di fɛt na Ɛfisɔs dɔn, Pɔl kɔl di Kristiɛn dɛn wan ples fɔ kɔrej dɛn ɛn tɛl dɛn se in de go. I lɛf dɛn go Masi do nya.
I go ɔlsay na Masi do nya de tɔk plɛnti fɔ kɔrej di Kristiɛn dɛn, dɔn i go Gris.
Pɔl tek tri mɔnt de. I bin want go Sirya bɔt i yɛri se di Ju pipul dɛn de mek bagin fɔ kech am so i go bak na Masi do nya.

Di pɔsin we fala Pɔl go na Sɔpata we kɔmɔt Biria. Sɔpata na bin Pirɔs in pikin. Di ɔda pipul dɛn we bin go wit Pɔl na Ari stakɔs ɛn Sikundɔs, we kɔmɔt Tɛsalonayka; Geyɔs we kɔmɔt Dabi; Timoti; ɛn Taychikɔs ɛn Trɔfimɔs we kɔmɔt Eshya.
Dɛn bin go wet wi na Troas.
Wɛn da Ju ɔlide we dɛn kin it bred we nɔ gɛt yist, dɔn, wi tek big bot na Fili pay. Na fayv de wi tek bifo wi rich Troas ɛn wi mit di ɔda pipul dɛn de. Na wan wik wi de na Troas.
Di fɔs de na di wik, wi gɛda wan ples fɔ it. Pɔl tɔk to di pipul dɛn na Troas sote midul nɛt bikɔs i bin gɛt fɔ go di ɔda de.
Plɛnti lamp bin de na di rum we wi bin de ol di mitin. Di rum bin de na wan garɛt.
Wan yɔngman we bin nem Yutikɔs bin sidɔm na di winda. Pɔl bin de tɔk wɛn slip kech Yutikɔs. I slip go, na in i fɔdɔm kam dɔng na grɔn. Di os na bin tri stori os. Yutikɔs bin dɔn day wɛn dɛn go es am.
Bɔt Pɔl go mit Yutikɔs, i ledɔm pan am ɛn grip am, dɔn i se, “Una nɔ wɔri, i gɛt layf!”
Pɔl go bak na di garɛt, i sheb di bred ɛn ɔlman it. I tɔk to di Kristiɛn dɛn sote do klin, bifo i lɛf dɛn go.
Di pipul dɛn we bin de lisin Pɔl fala Yutikɔs wɛn i de go na in os ɛn dɛn ɔl gladi.
Wi tek big bot we kɛr wi go Asɔs, Pɔl bin se na Asɔs i go kam na di bot, bikɔs i bin want waka go Asɔs.
Wɛn Pɔl mit wi na Asɔs, i kam na di bot, dɛn wi go Miti lini.
Wi kɔmɔt de; di ɔda de wi rich na wan tɔng klos Kiɔs, di nɛks de wi go Samɔs, dɛn di ɔda de wi go Maylitɔs.

Pɔl nɔ bin mek di big bot tap na Ɛfisɔs bikɔs i nɔ bin want wes tɛm na Eshya. I bin de tray fɔ rich Jerusɛlɛm fɔ mit ɔp di tɛm we di Kristiɛn dɛn de mɛmba Pɛntikɔst, di de we Gɔd bin gi dɛn in Spirit.
Wɛn Pɔl bin de na Maylitɔs, i sɛn mɛsej go Ɛfisɔs fɔ mek di chɔch bigman dɛn kam mit am na Maylitɔs.
Wɛn di chɔch bigman dɛn rich Maylitɔs, i tɛl dɛn se, “Una no aw a bin de du frɔm di de we a rich Eshya.
Una no se a nɔ bin de bost we a de wok fɔ di Masta. Plɛnti tɛm dɛn Ju pipul kin mek mi at pwɛl ɛn a kin sɔfa wɛn dɛn kin de mek bagin fɔ du mi bad.
Una no se a dɔn tɛl una ɔltin we fɔ ɛp una. A bin de lan una na di ples we ɔlman kin gɛda, ɛn a bin de lan una na una yon os.
Una no se a bin de tɛl dɛn Ju pipul ɛn dɛn Grik pipul fɔ lɛf fɔ du dɛn bad tin we dɛn bin de du ɛn kam to Gɔd ɛn biliv pan wi Masta Jizɔs.
Naw, a de go Jerusɛlɛm fɔ du wetin Gɔd in Spirit tɛl mi fɔ du. A nɔ no wetin dɛn go du mi wɛn a rich de.
A no se ɛni say we a go, Gɔd in Spirit de tɛl mi se dɛn go sɛn mi go jel ɛn dɛn go mek plɛnti trɔbul mit mi.
A nɔ tek mi layf mek natin, bɔt a want dɔn ɔl di wok we di Masta, Jizɔs gi mi fɔ du. Dis wok ya na fɔ tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus bɔt aw Gɔd gud ɛn aw i lɛk mɔta lman.
“A dɔn go to una ɔl fɔ tɛl una bɔt Gɔd in rul ɛn a no se una nɔ go si mi igen.
So tide a de tɛl una se una fɔ blem unasɛf if Gɔd kɔndɛm una mek una day.
Una no se a nɔ kin ayd natin wɛn a de tɛl una ɔl wetin Gɔd go du.
Una tek tɛm aw una liv ɛn una kia fɔ Gɔd In pipul dɛn na di chɔch lɛkɛ aw pipul we de mɛn ship kin kia fɔ dɛn ship, bikɔs Gɔd in Pikin day fɔ mek dɛn bi Gɔd yon pipul.
A no se wɛn a lɛf una go, sɔm pipul we nɔ go de tɔk tru go kam to una. Dɛn go du una lɛkɛ aw dɛn bad wulf kin du ship.
Tɛm de kam we sɔm pan unasɛf go de tɔk bad fɔ mek di Kristiɛn dɛn kɔmɔt na di chɔch ɛn fala una.
Una fɔ de wach fɔ dɛn pipul ya we de lay ɛn una fɔ de mɛmba aw a sɔfa de ɛn nɛt fɔ tri ia wɛn a bin de wit una de tɛl una wetin Gɔd se.
“Naw a de lɛf una na Gɔd an ɛn a lɛf in wɔd we de tɔk bɔt aw Gɔd gud, gi una. Gɔd go ɛp una fɔ biliv pan Jizɔs gud gud ɛn I go gi una di blɛsin we i dɔn prɔmis fɔ gi dɛn pipul we biliv pan am.
A nɔ bin put yay pan ɛnibɔdi prɔpati lɛkɛ silva, gold ɛn fayn klos.
Unasɛf no se a wok wit mi an fɔ gɛt ɔl wetin wi fɔ gɛt.
A dɔn sho una se ilɛk aw tin tan una fɔ wok tra nga lɛkɛ mi fɔ ɛp dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt. Una mɛmba wetin Masta Jizɔs insɛf tɔk wɛn i se, ‘Di pɔsin we de gi gɛt blɛsin pas di pɔsin we de gɛt.’ ”
Wɛn Pɔl dɔn tɔk dɔn, di pipul dɛn ɔl nil dɔng ɛn pre.
Dɛn ɔl bin de kray; dɛn go grip Pɔl ɛn kis am na in jɔ fɔ tɛl am gudbay.
Di tin we mek dɛn sɔri pas ɔl na we i tɛl dɛn se dɛn nɔ go si am igen. Dɛn kɛr Pɔl na rod sote i rich na di big bot.
Wɛn wi dɔn tɛl dɛn gudbay ɛn lɛf dɛn, wi tek big bot we kɛr wi go na wan tɔng we nem Kɔs; di ɔda de wi rich Rods, wɛn wi kɔmɔt de, wi go Patara.
Wi mit bot de we bin de go Fini shya, wi go insay di bot, i kɛr wi go.
Wi si Sayprɔs na wi lɛfan, bɔt di bot go sote wi rich Sirya. Dɛn pul lod na di bot na Taya so wi kam dɔng fɔs.
Wi mit sɔm Kristiɛn dɛn de, wi tap to dɛn wan wik. Gɔd in Spirit mek dɛn tɛl Pɔl se i nɔ fɔ go Jerusɛlɛm.
Bɔt wɛn di tɛm rich fɔ kɔmɔt Taya, dɛn ɔl, man, wɛf, ɛn pikin go lɛf wi na rod wɛn wi de go. Wɛn wi rich na di sho, wi ɔl nil dɔng ɛn pre.
Wi tɛl dɛn gudbay. Wi go insay di bot ɛn dɛn tɔn bak go na dɛn os.
Di big bot kɔmɔt Taya go Tɔlɛmis. Wi go tɛl di Kristiɛn dɛn adu ɛn tap to dɛn wan de.
Di ɔda de wi kɔmɔt Tɔlɛmis go Siza ria. Wi go tap to wan man we bin de tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus, i bin nem Filip. Na bin wan pan dɛn sɛvin pipul we dɛn bin pik na Jerusɛlɛm fɔ ɛp fɔ du Gɔd wok.
I bin gɛt fo gyal pikin we nɔ bin mared yet. Dɛn pikin ya na bin prɔfɛt.
Wi bin te na Siza ria ɛn wan prɔfɛt we nem Agabɔs, we kɔmɔt Judia, mit wi de.

I kam to wi, i tek Pɔl in bɛlt ɛn tay in yon tu an ɛn tu fut. I se, “Gɔd in Spirit se, ‘Na so dɛn Ju pipul na Jerusɛlɛm go tay di pɔsin we gɛt dis bɛlt ɛn dɛn go and am oba gi dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju.’ ”
Wɛn wi yɛri dat, wi ɛn di pipul dɛn na di tɔng beg Pɔl mek i nɔ go Jerusɛlɛm.
Bɔt Pɔl aks dɛn se, “Wetin una de du, we una de kray so, una go mek mi at pwɛl? A rɛdi fɔ mek dɛn tay mi ɛn a rɛdi sɛf fɔ mek dɛn kil mi fɔseka Masta Jizɔs.”
Wi nɔ ebul mek i chenj in maynd, so wi lɛf fɔ beg am, wi se, “Mek wetin di Masta want, bi.”
I nɔ tu te, wi pak wi tings dɛn ɛn lɛf fɔ go Jerusɛlɛm.
Sɔm pan di Kristiɛn dɛn na Siza ria fala wi go Jerusɛlɛm. Dɛn kɛr wi go na Nesɔn we kɔmɔt Sayprɔs, in os; Nesɔn na bin wan pan di fɔs Kristiɛn dɛn.
Wɛn wi rich Jerusɛlɛm, di Kristiɛn dɛn gladi fɔ si wi.
Di ɔda de Pɔl fala wi go to Jems, ɛn ɔl di bigman dɛn na di chɔch bin de na di ples.
Wɛn Pɔl dɔn tɛl dɛn adu, i tɛl dɛn se Gɔd pik am fɔ du in wok ɛn i fɔ wok wit dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju.
Wɛn dɛn yɛri wetin Pɔl tɔk, dɛn ɔl prez Gɔd. Dɛn se, “Brɔda Pɔl, yu dɔn si ɔmɔs tawzin Ju pipul na Jerusɛlɛm dɔn bi Kristiɛn ɛn dɛn de kip wi Ju Lɔ gud gud wan.

Dɛn bin dɔn tɛl dɛn bɔt yu, dɛn se yu de lan ɔl dɛn Ju pipul we de na dɛn ɔda kɔntri se dɛn nɔ fɔ de du wetin di Ju Lɔ se; dɛn nɔ fɔ sakɔmsayz dɛn pikin ɛn dɛn nɔ fɔ de du dɛn tin we di Ju dɛn de du we dɛn gra npapa-papa dɛn lan dɛn fɔ du.
Dɛn mɔs no se yu dɔn kam. Wɛl, wetin go apin naw?
Yu fɔ du wetin wi de tɛl yu fɔ du naw. Fo man de ya we bin dɔn prɔmis Gɔd fɔ du sɔntin.

Una ɔl go du dɛn tin we dɛn de du fɔ mek dɛn klin na Gɔd in yay, ɛn yu fɔ pe fɔ dɛn, so dat dɛn go ebul shayn dɛn ed. If yu du dat, ɔlman go no se wetin pipul bin de tɔk bɔt yu nɔ tru, dɛn go no se yusɛf de kip di Lɔ we Gɔd gi Mozis.

Naw a want tɔk bɔt dɛn Kristiɛn we nɔto Ju: wi dɔn rayt lɛta to dɛn se dɛn nɔ fɔ it ɛni tin we dɛn dɔn sakri fays to dɛn gɔd, dɛn nɔ fɔ it bif we gɛt blɔd pan am, dɛn nɔ fɔ it blɔd, ɛn dɛn nɔ fɔ liv fri layf.”

Di ɔda de, Pɔl ɛn di man dɛn du di tin dɛn we fɔ mek dɛn klin na Gɔd yay. Dɔn dɛn ɔl go na Gɔd in Os fɔ mek pipul no di tɛm we dɛn fɔ tap fɔ du dɛn tin we fɔ mek dɛn klin na Gɔd yay, we dɛn go mek sakri fays fɔ dɛn.
Wɛn Pɔl dɛn bin dɔn de bɔt sɛvin de na Gɔd in Os, sɔm Ju pipul we kɔmɔt Eshya si Pɔl insay Gɔd in Os.

Dɛn Ju pipul ya se, “Wi Izrɛl pipul dɛn, una kam ɛp wi! Na dis man de go ɔlsay de lan pipul bad tin dɛn bɔt wi di Izrɛl pipul dɛn, di Lɔ we Gɔd bin gi Mozis, ɛn Gɔd in Os na dis tɔng. Nɔto dat nɔmɔ i dɔn du, naw i dɔn bring Grik pipul dɛn kam insay Gɔd in Os fɔ pwɛl dis ples we na Gɔd yon!”
Di Ju pipul dɛn tɔk dat bikɔs dɛn bin si Trɔfimɔs we kɔmɔt Ɛfisɔs wit Pɔl na di tɔng, so dɛn min se Pɔl kɛr Trɔfimɔs go insay Gɔd in Os.
Dat mek ala-ala prɛd ɔlɔbɔt na di tɔng. Ɔl di pipul dɛn rɔn go gɛda wan ples, dɛn ol Pɔl, drɛg am kɔmɔt insay Gɔd in Os, dɔn dɛn lɔk di do dɛn na Gɔd in Os.
Di pipul dɛn bin de tray fɔ kil Pɔl, na in dɛn sɛn go tɛl di Roman soja man dɛn edman se fɛt de na di tɔng.
Di soja man dɛn edman tek sɔm soja man ɛn sɔm ɔfisa dɛn fɔ go mit di pipul dɛn we bin de fɛt. Di pipul dɛn lɛf fɔ bit Pɔl wɛn dɛn si di soja man dɛn.
Di soja man dɛn edman go mit Pɔl ɛn mek dɛn tay am wit tu chen. Dɛn, i aks dɛn se, “Udat na dis man, wetin i du?”
Sɔm pipul ala wan tin, sɔm ala ɔda tin. Di nɔys bin so plɛnti dat di edman nɔ ebul no wetin bi, so i mek in soja man dɛn kɛr Pɔl go na dɛn barik.
Wɛn dɛn rich na di stɛp, di soja man dɛn bin gɛt fɔ tot Pɔl bikɔs di pipul dɛn bin wayl.
Ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin de fala Pɔl bin de ala se, “Una mek wi kil am!”
Wɛn di soja man dɛn bin want tot Pɔl go insay di barik, na de Pɔl tɛl di edman se, “Duya, mek a tɔk to yu!” Di edman aks am se, “Yu kin tɔk Grik?
So yu nɔto da Ijipt man we bin mek pipul strayk naya, da man we bin kɛr fo tawzin man dɛn we de kil pipul, go na di dɛzat?”
Pɔl ansa am se, “Mi na Ju man ɛn a kɔmɔt Tasɔs we de na Sili shya. Di tɔng we a bɔn nɔto lili tɔng. Duya, gi mi chans lɛ a tɔk to dɛn pipul ya.”
Di edman gi Pɔl chans fɔ tɔk. Pɔl tinap na di stɛp, i mek sayn to di pipul dɛn wit in an; wɛn di pipul dɛn dɔn sɛt mɔt, i tɔk to dɛn na Ibru.
I se, “Mi papa dɛn ɛn mi brɔda dɛn, una lisin mek a tɛl una wetin du una nɔ fɔ kɔndɛm mi!”
Wɛn dɛn yɛri Pɔl de tɔk Ibru, di ples mek yeng.

Pɔl se, “Mi na Ju man, a bɔn na Tasɔs we de na Sili shya. Dɛn mɛn mi na Jerusɛlɛm ɛn Gameliɛl na bin mi ticha. I tek tɛm fɔ lan mi di Lɔ we wi gra npapa-papa dɛn lɛf ɛn a gi misɛf fɔ wok fɔ Gɔd lɛkɛ una we de ya tide.
A bin de biɛn dɛn pipul we de fala dis We sote a mek dɛn kil dɛn. A bin de ol man ɛn uman ɛn mek dɛn jel dɛn.

Di bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn ɔl di bigman dɛn na di Ju gran kot kin tɛl una se na tru a de tɔk. Dɛn bin gi mi lɛta fɔ kɛr go gi mi Ju brɔda dɛn na Damaskɔs. A bin go de fɔ ol dɛn pipul we de fala dis We ɛn tay dɛn bring dɛn kam bak naya fɔ mek di bigman dɛn na di Ju gran kot mek dɛn sɔfa.
“Wan santɛm we a bin de go Damaskɔs, a bin dɔn de rich, na in brayt layt we kɔmɔt ɔpklawd shayn pan mi.
A fɔdɔm na grɔn, dɔn a yɛri wan vɔys de se, ‘Sɔl, Sɔl! Wetin mek yu de fɛt Mi so?’
A se, ‘Udat na yu, Masta?’ Di vɔys ansa se, ‘Mi na Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt, na Mi yu de fɛt.’
Di man dɛn we bin de wit mi si di layt bɔt dɛn nɔ yɛri di vɔys we bin de tɔk to mi.
A se, ‘Masta, wetin a fɔ du?’ Di Masta ansa mi se, ‘Grap, go Damaskɔs, na de dɛn go tɛl yu ɔltin we Gɔd want yu fɔ du.’
Di layt bin mek a blɛn, na mi kɔmpin dɛn ol mi an kɛr mi go insay Damaskɔs.
“Wan man bin de na di tɔng we bin nem Ana na yas, na man we bin fred Gɔd, i bin de du wetin di Ju Lɔ se ɛn ɔl dɛn Ju na Damaskɔs bin rɛspɛkt am.
I kam tinap klos mi ɛn se, ‘Mi brɔda, Sɔl, opin yu yay mek yu si bak!’ Wantɛm mi yay opin ɛn a si am.

I se, ‘Da Gɔd we wi gra npapa-papa dɛn bin de pre to dɔn pik yu fɔ mek yu no wetin i want yu fɔ du, ɛn mek yu go si di wan gren Pɔsin we tret we de wok fɔ Gɔd, ɛn mek yu yɛri in vɔys wɛn i de tɔk to yu.
Yu go de tɛl ɔlman wetin yu dɔn si ɛn wetin yu dɔn yɛri.
Wetin yu de wet naw? Grap, mek dɛn baptayz yu, ɛn pre to di Masta mek Gɔd go pul yu pan di bad tin dɛn we yu de du.’
“A tɔn bak go Jerusɛlɛm ɛn wɛn a bin de pre, Gɔd sho mi sɔntin.
A si di Masta; i tɛl mi se, ‘Go kwik, kɔmɔt na Jerusɛlɛm bikɔs di pipul dɛn naya nɔ go biliv wetin yu de tɛl dɛn bɔt mi.’
A se, ‘Masta, dɛn no se a bin de go na di Ju mitin os go ol dɛn pipul we biliv pan Yu ɛn bit dɛn.
A bin de wɛn dɛn kil Sti vin, da man we bin de tɛl pipul bɔt yu. A bin gri fɔ mek dɛn kil am ɛn na mi bin kip di pipul dɛn we kil Sti vin, dɛn klos.’
Bɔt di Masta tɛl mi se, ‘Go, bikɔs a go sɛn yu to dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju.’ ”
Di pipul dɛn nɔ tɔk natin sote Pɔl tɔk dɔn. Na in dɛn ala se, “Una kɛr am go kil am! Lɛ wi nɔ si am igen!”
Di pipul dɛn bin de ala, shek dɛn klos, ɛn sɛn dɔti ɔp.
Di edman fɔ di Roman soja man dɛn tɛl in soja man dɛn fɔ kɛr Pɔl go na barik, i mek dɛn bit Pɔl fɔ mek i tɔk if na tru wɔd di Ju pipul dɛn de ala tɔk bɔt am.
Bɔt wɛn dɛn want bit am, dɛn tay am; na in Pɔl aks di soja man dɛn edman we bin tinap de se, “Di lɔ tɛl una se una kin bit pɔsin we na Roman wɛn una nɔ jɔj am yet?”
Wɛn di bigman yɛri wetin Pɔl tɔk, i go aks di edman dɛn se, “Wetin una de du so? Dis man na Roman!”
Na de di edman aks Pɔl se, “A want no if yu na Roman.” Pɔl ansa se, “Yɛs, mi na Roman.”
Di edman se, “Na plɛnti kɔpɔ a pe fɔ mek a bi Roman.” Pɔl tɛl am se, “Bɔt mi mama na Roman; mi papa na Roman.”
Di soja man dɛn we bin want bit Pɔl tɔn bak wantɛm. Dɛn edman fred wɛn i no se Pɔl na Roman bikɔs i bin mek dɛn tay am.

Di edman bin want no if ɔl wetin di Ju dɛn bin de tɔk na tru. Di ɔda de i mek in soja man dɛn lus Pɔl, dɔn i kɔl dɛn bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn ɔl dɛn mɛmba na di Ju gran kot fɔ kam mit. Dɛn kɛr Pɔl go bifo dɛn.
P ɔl luk di mɛmba dɛn ɔl ɛn se, “Mi brɔda dɛn, frɔm we a no misɛf sote tide, a nɔ gɛt nɔ dawt na mi at se wetin a de du bifo Gɔd, rayt.”
Di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin we bin nem Ana na yas tɛl di pipul dɛn we bin tinap klos Pɔl fɔ slap in mɔt.
Pɔl tɛl am se, “Gɔd insɛf go slap yu; yu na simɛnt wɔl we dɛn pent mek i tan lɛkɛ se i wayt! Yu sidɔm naya fɔ jɔj mi bay di Lɔ, yu nɔ no se yu de brok di Lɔ we yu tɛl dɛn pipul ya fɔ slap mi?”
Di man dɛn we bin tinap klos Pɔl se, “Na di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, we de wok fɔ Gɔd, yu de kɔs!”
Pɔl ansa dɛn se, “Mi brɔda dɛn, a nɔ bin no se na in na di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin. Gɔd in Buk se, ‘Una nɔ fɔ tɔk bad bɔt di pɔsin we de rul oba una.’ ”

Pɔl si se di pipul dɛn na di Ju gran kot miks; sɔm pan dɛn na bin Sadyusi ɛn sɔm na bin Faresi. Na in i tɔk se, “Mi brɔda dɛn, mi na Faresi, mi fambul dɛn na bin Faresi. Dɛn want fɔ jɔj mi bikɔs a biliv se Gɔd go mek dɛn pipul we dɔn day, rayz frɔm dɛn grev.”
Wɛn Pɔl tɔk dat, di Faresi ɛn Sadyusi dɛn bigin mek plaba, so di pipul dɛn sheb.
Di Sadyusi dɛn se wɛn pɔsin day, i nɔ de rayz igen. Dɛn se enjɛl ɛn spirit nɔ de; bɔt di Faresi dɛn biliv se wɛn pɔsin dɔn day, i de rayz bak ɛn dɛn se enjɛl ɛn spirit de.
Di Faresi ɛn di Sadyusi dɛn bigin ala lawd lawd wan. Dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha we na bin Faresi se, “Wi nɔ si ɛni tin we dis man du we bad! Sɔntɛm na enjɛl ɔ spirit mek Pɔl tɔk lɛkɛ dat!”
Di plaba bin jɛs de big, di soja man dɛn edman fred se pipul go chɛr Pɔl pispis, so i sɛn soja man dɛn fɔ go drɛg am kɔmɔt na di krawd ɛn kɛr am go na barik.
Wɛn nɛt kam, di Masta kam tinap klos Pɔl ɛn se, “Pɔl, nɔ mek yu at pwɛl; lɛkɛ aw yu bin tɛl di pipul dɛn na Jerusɛlɛm wetin yu no bɔt mi, yu go du di sem tin na Rom.”
So wɛn do klin, sɔm Ju pipul dɛn mit ɛn mek bagin. Dɛn swɛ se dɛn nɔ go it ɛn dɛn nɔ go drink natin sote dɛn kil Pɔl.
Di pipul dɛn we gɛda ɛn mek dis bagin bin pas fɔti.
Dɛn go to dɛn bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn di ɔda Ju bigman dɛn; dɛn tɛl dɛn se, “Wi dɔn swɛ se wi nɔ go it ɛn wi nɔ go drink natin sote wi kil Pɔl.
Una ɛn di mɛmba dɛn na di Ju gran kot, sɛn to di soja man dɛn edman mek i bring Pɔl kam. Una fɔm lɛkɛ se una want yɛri mɔ bɔt in kes; wi go dɔn rɛdi ɛn wi go kil am bifo dɛn rich ya wit am.”
Pɔl in sista pikin yɛri bɔt di bagin so i go mit Pɔl insay di barik go tɛl am wetin i yɛri.
Pɔl kɔl wan bigman pan di soja man dɛn, i tɛl am se, “Kɛr dis yɔngman ya go to una edman, i gɛt sɔntin fɔ tɛl am.”
Di bigman kɛr di yɔngman go to di edman, i se, “Da jelman we nem Pɔl, kɔl mi aks mi fɔ bring dis yɔngman ya kam to yu bikɔs i gɛt sɔntin fɔ tɛl yu.”
Di edman ol di man in an, dɛn go na kɔna. I aks am se, “Wetin yu want tɛl mi?”
Di yɔngman se, “Di Ju bigman dɛn dɔn gri se dɛn go tɛl yu fɔ kɛr Pɔl go na kot tumara. Dɛn go fɔm lɛkɛ se dɛn want no mɔ bɔt Pɔl.
Bɔt yu nɔ fɔ lisin dɛn bikɔs dɛn gɛt pas fɔti pipul we dɔn ayd we want kil Pɔl. Dɛn dɔn rɛdi fɔ du dat naw naw, bɔt dɛn de wet fɔ yɛri wetin yu go se.”
Di edman tɛl am se, “Nɔ tɛl nɔbɔdi se yu dɔn tɛl mi dɛn tin ya.” I tɛl di yɔngman fɔ go.

Di soja man dɛn edman kɔl tu ɔda bigman pan di soja man dɛn; i tɛl dɛn se, “Una go rɛdi tu ɔndrɛd soja man, sɛvi nti we de rayd ɔs, ɛn tu ɔndrɛd we de tek lɔng nɛf fɛt, fɔ go Siza ria. Una go lɛf bay nayn oklɔk dis nɛt.
Una fɛn sɔm ɔs dɛn we Pɔl go rayd; una nɔ mek ɛni tin du am sote i rich to Gɔvna Filiks.”
Di soja man dɛn edman rayt dis lɛta:
“Mi, Klɔdiɔs Lisias de rayt to yu sa, Gɔvna Filiks. A de tɛl yu adu, sa!
Dɛn Ju pipul dɛn bin ol dis man ɛn dɛn bin want fɔ kil am. A yɛri se na Roman so a go wit mi soja man dɛn go pul am kɔmɔt na dɛn an.
A bin want no wetin du dɛn ol am, so a kɛr am go to di bigman dɛn na di Ju gran kot.
A fɛnɔt se i nɔ du natin fɔ mek dɛn kil am ɔ fɔ mek dɛn jel am. Dɛn bin ol am fɔseka sɔm Ju Lɔ we dɛn se i brok.
So we dɛn kam tɛl mi se di Ju pipul dɛn de bagin fɔ kil am, na dat mek a sɛn am to yu. A dɔn tɛl di pipul dɛn we bin ol am mek dɛn kɛr di kes go to yu.”
Di soja man dɛn du wetin di edman tɛl dɛn fɔ du. Dɛn kɛr Pɔl go Anti pa tris na nɛt.
Wɛn do klin, di soja man dɛn go bak na barik bɔt dɛn lɛf di wan dɛn we bin de rayd ɔs fɔ kɛr Pɔl go.
Wɛn dɛn rich Siza ria, dɛn kɛr Pɔl go to di gɔvna, ɛn dɛn gi di gɔvna di lɛta.
Di gɔvna rid di lɛta, i aks uspat na di kɔntri Pɔl kɔmɔt. Wɛn i no se na Sili shya i kɔmɔt,
i se, “A go kɔl di kes wɛn dɛn pipul we ol yu kam.” I tɛl di gyad dɛn fɔ put Pɔl na di ples we Ɛrɔd bin bil.

Wɛn fayv de dɔn pas, di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin we bin nem Ana na yas, sɔm bigman dɛn, ɛn wan lɔya we bin nem Tatɔlɔs rich na Siza ria. Dɛn go na di kot go tɛl Gɔvna Filiks wetin Pɔl du.
Dɛn tɛl Tatɔlɔs fɔ tɔk, na in i se, “Gɔvna Filiks, bikɔs yu na bigman we gɛt sɛns, na dat mek di kɔntri gɛt kol at ɔl dis tɛm. Yu dɔn du plɛnti gud wok na di kɔntri so dat bɛtɛ go fala wi.
Wi gladi fɔ wetin yu dɔn du ɛn wi tɛl yu plɛnti tɛnki.
A nɔ want wes yu tɛm so a de beg yu mek yu lisin wetin a de kam tɔk fɔ misɛf ɛn mi kɔmpin dɛn.
Wi dɔn fɛnɔt se dis man ya na pɔsin we de sɛtfaya na di kɔntri, i de mek dɛn Ju pipul strayk ɔlsay na di wɔl ɛn in na di lida fɔ di grup we dɛn kɔl Naza rin.
Wan ɔda tin, sa, dis man ya bin want pwɛl Gɔd in Os bay di wɔd dɛn we i de tɔk. Wi kech am, [ɛn wi bin want jɔj am lɛkɛ aw wi Ju Lɔ se,
bɔt di soja man dɛn edman, Lisias kam jɔg am kɔmɔt na wi an.
Dɔn i tɛl wi fɔ kam tɛl yu di kes.] If yu aks am, yu go no se ɔl wetin wi dɔn tɔk bɔt am na tru.”
Di Ju pipul dɛnsɛf tɔk di sem tin bɔt Pɔl.
Wɛn di gɔvna gi Pɔl chans fɔ tɔk, na in Pɔl se, “A no se i dɔn te we yu de jɔj pipul na dis kɔntri so a gladi we yu gi mi chans fɔ tɔk.
If yu aks, yu go no se, a bin go Jerusɛlɛm fɔ go pre na Gɔd In Os ɛn frɔm di de we a go de, tide mek twɛlv de nɔmɔ.
Di Ju pipul dɛn nɔ bin mit mi de agyu wit ɛnibɔdi na Gɔd in Os, dɛn nɔ mit a de sɛtfaya na di Ju mitin os, ɛn dɛn nɔ mit a de sɛtfaya ɛni say na di tɔng.
Dɛn nɔ go ebul pruv se wetin dɛn de tɔk bɔt mi na tru.

A gri se a de fala di nyu We wɛn a de pre to di Gɔd we wi gra npapa-papa dɛn bin de pre to, pan ɔl we di Ju pipul dɛn se dis We ya nɔ rayt. A biliv ɔl wetin de na di Lɔ we Gɔd bin gi Mozis ɛn ɔl wetin dɛn prɔfɛt bin rayt.
A biliv lɛkɛ aw dɛnsɛf biliv se Gɔd go mek ɔlman, gud ɔ bad, rayz frɔm dɛn grev.
So a de tray ɔltɛm mek mi at klin bifo Gɔd ɛn bifo mɔta lman.
“Afta sɔm ia bin dɔn pas we a nɔ go Jerusɛlɛm, a bin go de fɔ kɛr sɔm mɔni we dɛn gi mi fɔ gi mi Ju pipul dɛn ɛn fɔ mek sakri fays to Gɔd.
Na di sakri fays a bin de mek we sɔm pipul dɛn kam mit mi na Gɔd in Os. A bin dɔn du di tin we fɔ mek a klin na Gɔd yay. Dɛn nɔ mit pipul gɛda to mi ɛn wan ala-ala nɔ bin de.
Bɔt sɔm Ju pipul dɛn we kɔmɔt Eshya bin lib de; mek dɛnsɛf kam tɛl yu if na tru dɛn pipul ya de tɔk bɔt mi ɛn if a du dɛn ɛni tin we bad.
Aks dɛn pipul ya we gɛda so if dɛn bin fɛn ɛni bad tin we a du wɛn dɛn bin jɔj mi na dɛn Ju gran kot.
Wɛn dɛn bin de jɔj mi, dɛn nɔ fɛn natin pas we a tɔk se, ‘Una de jɔj mi bikɔs a biliv se wɛn pɔsin dɔn day, i go rayz frɔm in grev!’ ”
Gɔvna Filiks bin no bɔt di Masta in We so i se, “A go kɔl di kes wɛn di soja dɛn edman, Lisias kam.”
So i tɛl di soja dɛn bigman fɔ go put Pɔl bak na sɛl, bɔt i se mek i nɔ tek Pɔl lɛkɛ jelman ɛn mek i nɔ tap Pɔl in padi dɛn fɔ kɛr wetin i want go gi am.
Tu-tri de pas, na in Filiks ɛn in Ju wɛf we bin nem Dru sila sɛn kɔl Pɔl. Dɛn lisin we Pɔl de tɔk bɔt wetin fɔ biliv pan Krays Jizɔs min.
Wɛn Pɔl tɔk bɔt wetin dɛn min wɛn dɛn se pɔsin gud, aw pɔsin fɔ kɔntrol insɛf, ɛn di de we Gɔd go jɔj ɔlman fɔ di gud ɛn bad we dɛn du, Filiks fred; i se, “Pɔl, go fɔs. A go sɛn kɔl yu ɔda tɛm.”
Filiks bin min se Pɔl go gi am kɔpɔ fɔ mek i fri am. Na dat mek i bin de sɛn kɔl Pɔl plɛnti tɛm fɔ tɔk to am.
Wɛn tu ia dɔn pas, Filiks kɔmɔt na pawa ɛn Pɔsiɔs Fɛstɔs tek in ples. Filiks bin want mek di Ju pipul dɛn lɛk am so i nɔ fri Pɔl bifo i go.
Wɛn Fɛstɔs bi gɔvna, di de we mek fo, i kɔmɔt Siza ria go Jerusɛlɛm.

Dɛn bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn dɛn Ju bigman dɛn go mit Fɛstɔs. Dɛn tɛl am bad tin dɛn bɔt Pɔl. Dɛn bin want mek dɛn bring Pɔl kam bak na Jerusɛlɛm, bikɔs dɛn bin dɔn bagin fɔ kil am na rod.
Fɛstɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Dɛn dɔn kip Pɔl na di jel we de na Siza ria. A nɔ de te naya, a go go de bak.
If Pɔl du una bad, una mɔs kam wit una bigman dɛn mek wi tɔk di kes.”
Fɛstɔs nɔ tek pas tɛn de na Jerusɛlɛm bifo i go bak na Siza ria. Di ɔda de i go kot fɔ jɔj kes; i mek dɛn bring Pɔl kam bifo am.
Wɛn Pɔl rich insay di kot, di Ju pipul dɛn we bin kɔmɔt Jerusɛlɛm go tinap rawnd am. Dɛn tɔk se Pɔl du plɛnti bad tin, bɔt dɛn nɔ bin ebul pruv se na tru dɛn de tɔk.
Pɔl tray fɔ sho se na lay dɛn lay pan am, i se, “A nɔ du ɛni tin we di Ju Lɔ se wi nɔ fɔ du, a nɔ du ɛni tin bad na Gɔd in Os, ɛn a nɔ du ɛni tin we di Roman lɔ se wi nɔ fɔ du.”
Fɛstɔs bin want fɔ mek di Ju pipul dɛn lɛk am so i aks Pɔl se, “Yu go want lɛ dɛn kɛr yu go Jerusɛlɛm, mek a go tɔk di kes de?”
Pɔl ansa am se, “Naya dɛn fɔ jɔj mi bikɔs na di king na Rom in kot dis. Yusɛf dɔn si se a nɔ du di Ju pipul dɛn bad.
