verse_text: Na Gɔd pik Jizɔs fɔ du in wok, ɛn Jizɔs du ɔl wetin Gɔd bin want lɛkɛ aw i bin want mek i du am, lɛkɛ aw Mozis bin du wetin Gɔd bin want am fɔ du fɔ Gɔd in pipul dɛn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: I rayt fɔ mek pipul rɛspɛkt ɛn ɔna Jizɔs pas aw dɛn bin rɛspɛkt ɛn ɔna Mozis, lɛkɛ aw pɔsin de prez di wan we bil os, pas aw i de prez di os insɛf.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na tru se, os nɔ de we nɔto pɔsin bil, bɔt na Gɔd mek ɔltin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mozis na bin wokman we put ɔl in at pan ɔl di wok we i bin de du na Gɔd in Os. I bin de tɛl pipul wetin Gɔd go se bambay.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bɔt Krays na di Pikin we de luk Gɔd, we na di Papa, in Os, ɛn i bin du in wok lɛkɛ aw Gɔd want am fɔ du. Wi we na Gɔd yon pipul, go bi Gɔd in Os, if wi gɛt kɔrej ɔltɛm ɛn put wi at pan ɔl wetin Gɔd prɔmis se in go du fɔ wi.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na dat mek wi fɔ lisin Gɔd in Spirit we de tɛl wi se, “If una yɛri Gɔd in vɔys tide,

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: una lisin am, una nɔ tranga yes lɛkɛ aw una pipul dɛn bin tranga yes lɔntɛm, wɛn Gɔd bin tray dɛn na di dɛzat, dɛn nɔ bin gri mek Gɔd rul dɛn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Gɔd se, Lɔntɛm, wɛn una granpapa-papa dɛn bin de na di dɛzat, dɛn bin de kɔmplen ɛn tray mi plɛnti tɛm fɔ si aw lɔng a go bia wit dɛn, pan ɔl we dɛn si wetin a bin du wɛn dɛn bin de fɔti ia na di dɛzat.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na dat mek a bin vɛks pan dɛn, ɛn a se, ‘Dɛn dɔn pul dɛn at kɔmɔt pan mi, ɛn dɛn nɔ ɔndastand di we we a de du ɔltin.’

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A bin vɛks pan dɛn, so a tek oth se, ‘Dɛn nɔ go kam da say we a de, dɛn nɔ go sidɔm blo!’ ”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mi Kristiɛn brɔda dɛn, una fɔ tek tɛm, so dat nɔn pan una nɔ go gɛt bad at ɛn so nɔ biliv pan Gɔd dat i go tɔn in bak pan Gɔd we gɛt layf sote go.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bɔt una fɔ de kɔrej una kɔmpin dɛn ɔltɛm, so dat sin nɔ go mek ɛni wan pan una ful ɛn mek una tra nga yes. Na dat una fɔ de du ɛvri de, wans nɔmɔ “Tide” na tide.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una fɔ mɛmba se, if wi put wi at pan ɔl wetin Gɔd tɛl wi se in go du lɛkɛ aw wi bin de du di tɛm we wi jɛs bi Kristiɛn, ɛn wi nɔ tap fɔ du dat, wi go gɛt pan ɔl wetin Krays gɛt.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, “If una yɛri Gɔd in vɔys tide, una nɔ tranga yes, lɛkɛ aw una granpapa-papa dɛn bin tranga yes lɔntɛm, we dɛn nɔ bin gri mek Gɔd rul dɛn.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Udat na di pipul dɛn we bin yɛri Gɔd in vɔys, bɔt dɛn nɔ bin gri fɔ mek i rul dɛn? Na ɔl dɛn pipul we na bin slev na Ijipt, we Mozis bin fri.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Udat na di pipul dɛn we Gɔd bin vɛks pan fɔ fɔti ia? Gɔd bin vɛks pan dɛn pipul we bin sin ɛn dɛn bin day na di dɛzat.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Udat na di pipul dɛn we Gɔd bin prɔmis se, nɔ go go na di ples we i de ɛn dɛn nɔ go sidɔm blo? Gɔd bin de tɔk bɔt dɛn pipul we nɔ bin du wetin i tɛl dɛn fɔ du.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: So, wi si se, dɛn nɔ bin ebul go na di ples we Gɔd de, bikɔs dɛn nɔ bin biliv am.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Gɔd bin dɔn prɔmis wi se, wi go go na di ples we i de, ɛn wi go sidɔm blo. Na dat mek wi fɔ tek tɛm, so dat dɛn nɔ go tɛl ɛni wan pan wi se, i nɔ go go de.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Pipul dɔn tɛl wi di Gud Nyus bɔt Gɔd, lɛkɛ aw dɛn bin dɔn tɛl dɛn lɔntɛm pipul we bin de na di dɛzat; bɔt pan ɔl dat wi si se di Gud Nyus we dɛn yɛri, nɔ bin ɛp dɛn, bikɔs dɛn nɔ bin biliv am.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bɔt wi we biliv go go na di ples we Gɔd de ɛn wi go sidɔm blo. I de plen wan na Gɔd in Buk se, “A bin vɛks so a prɔmis se, dɛn nɔ go go na di ples we a de ɛn dɛn nɔ go sidɔm blo.” Gɔd tɔk dat pan ɔl we i bin dɔn du ɔl di wok frɔm di tɛm we i mek di wɔl.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dɛn rayt wan ɔda say na Gɔd in Buk bɔt di de we mek sɛvin de, se, “Di de we mek sɛvin de, Gɔd blo, bikɔs i bin dɔn du ɔl in wok dɔn.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dɛn rayt bɔt di sem tin na ɔda say we Gɔd se, “Dɛn nɔ go go na di ples we a de ɛn sidɔm blo.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na tru se, sɔm pipul go gɛt chans fɔ go na di ples we Gɔd de, ɛn na tru igen se, dɛn lɔntɛm pipul we bin yɛri di Gud Nyus, nɔ bin biliv am, so dɛn nɔ bin go na di ples we Gɔd de.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na dat mek, Gɔd dɔn fiks ɔda de, dat na “Tide”. Afta plɛnti ia dɔn pas, Gɔd mek Devid tɔk dɛn wɔd ya we a jɛs tɔk, we se, “If una yɛri Gɔd in vɔys tide, una nɔ tranga yes.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: If dɛn lɔntɛm pipul bin rich di say we Jɔshwa bin de lid dɛn go, ɛn di ples we Gɔd de ɛn dɛn bin sidɔm blo, Gɔd nɔ bin fɔ tɔk bɔt ɔda de we nɔ kam yet.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wetin Gɔd tɔk sho wi se, tɛm stil de we Gɔd in pipul dɛn go blo lɛkɛ aw Gɔd blo di de we mek sɛvin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: If ɛnibɔdi go na di ples we Gɔd de ɛn sidɔm blo, di pɔsin go lɛf ɔl in wok, lɛkɛ aw Gɔd insɛf lɛf in wok ɛn blo.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na dat mek, wi fɔ tray gud gud wan fɔ go na di ples we Gɔd de ɛn sidɔm blo. Mek wi ɔl naya go na di ples we Gɔd de rul ɛn sidɔm blo, mek nɔn nɔ lɛf we nɔ go go de bikɔs i nɔ du wetin Gɔd want lɛkɛ aw wi gra npapa-papa dɛn bin du we mek dɛn nɔ go de.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wi no se Gɔd in wɔd gɛt layf ɛn i gɛt pawa. In wɔd shap pas sɔd we gɛt tu ɛj. I de go insay insay pɔsin sote i rich di say we in at ɛn in spirit dɛn mit togɛda, lɛkɛ aw sɔd de kɔt bon midul. Na so Gɔd in wɔd dɛn de go insay insay pɔsin in at ɛn sho ɔl wetin lib de.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Natin nɔ de we Gɔd mek we i nɔ de si; natin nɔ de we ayd, we Gɔd nɔ de si; Gɔd de si ɔltin, ɛn na bifo am wi ɔl gɛt fɔ tinap bambay ɛn tɔk ɔl wetin wi bin du na wɔl.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wi fɔ stil biliv di Gud Nyus we wi bin dɔn biliv, bikɔs pɔsin de we na di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, na in dɔn go na di ples we Gɔd de. Na Jizɔs, we na Gɔd in Pikin, na di edman.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin na di wan we wi gɛt we ɔnda stand ɔltin we tra nga fɔ wi, bikɔs insɛf na bin wan pan wi, ɛn ɔl wetin de mit wi fɔ tray wi bin dɔn mit am. Bɔt i nɔ sin wande.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Fɔseka dat, wi nɔ fɔ fred. Lɛ wi kam bifo Gɔd we go sho wi aw i lɛk wi, ɛn we go sɔri fɔ wi, ɛn ɛp wi di rayt tɛm.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ɛni edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, we na mɔta lman, fɔ tinap fɔ mɔta lman bifo Gɔd, so dat i kin mek sakri fays fɔ dɛn sin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bikɔs insɛf na mɔta lman ɛn i kin du tin we nɔ rayt, i kin sɔri fɔ dɛn wan we nɔ du di rayt tin bikɔs dɛn nɔ no wetin rayt.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs insɛf na mɔta lman we kin du tin we nɔ rayt, mek i fɔ mek sakri fays fɔ in yon sin, jɛs lɛkɛ aw i de mek sakri fays fɔ di ɔda pipul dɛn sin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Nɔbɔdi nɔ de mek insɛf edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, na Gɔd nɔmɔ de kɔl pɔsin fɔ du dis kayn wok lɛkɛ aw i bin pik Erɔn lɔntɛm fɔ du di sem kayn wok.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Semwe so, Krays nɔ put insɛf ɔp fɔ mek i bi edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, na Gɔd tɛl am se, “Yu na mi Pikin, a dɔn bi yu Papa tide.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ɛn Gɔd tɔk ɔda say se, “Yu na di wan we de mek sakrifays fɔ pipul sin sote go, yu go du di sem kayn wok we Mɛlkizidɛk insɛf bin du.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wɛn Jizɔs bin de na dis wɔl, i ala lawd ɛn kray wɛn i de pre to Gɔd we ebul sev am, mek i nɔ day. Gɔd yɛri di pre we Jizɔs bin pre bikɔs Jizɔs bin gri fɔ du ɔl wetin Gɔd want am fɔ du.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bɔt ivin we Jizɔs na bin Gɔd in Pikin, di sɔfa we i sɔfa mek i no gud wan wetin i min fɔ du wetin Gɔd se.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn sho se in ebul du ɔltin, i kam bi di wan we de sev ɔl dɛn pipul we de du wetin i tɛl dɛn fɔ du, ɔltɛm.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na dat mek Gɔd pik am fɔ bi edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, lɛkɛ Mɛlki zidɛk.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Plɛnti tin stil de we wi want tɛl una bɔt wetin wi jɛs tɔk, bɔt dɛn tin ya tra nga fɔ ɛksplen to una, bikɔs una nɔ de ɔnda stand kwik.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: I dɔn rich tɛm we unasɛf fɔ bigin lan ɔda pipul bikɔs i dɔn te we una de lan, bɔt pɔsin stil gɛt fɔ lan una di fɔs tin dɛn we una bin dɔn lan bɔt Gɔd in mɛsej. Una fɔ stil drink milk lɛkɛ pikin we de sɔk bɔbi, bikɔs una nɔ du yet fɔ it tin we fɔ cham lɛkɛ big pɔsin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ɛnibɔdi we stil de drink milk, na pikin stil, i nɔ no yet wetin gud ɛn wetin bad na Gɔd in yay.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bɔt pɔsin we de it tin we fɔ cham, na big pɔsin; i dɔn no wetin gud ɛn wetin bad, bikɔs i dɔn lan aw fɔ no wetin gud ɛn bad bay dɛn tin we i de du we rayt na Gɔd in yay.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: So, mek wi lɛf fɔ de tɔk bɔt dɛn tin we wi bin de tɛl una bɔt Krays, fɔstɛm; lɛ wi go bifo ɛn lan dɛn tin we bigman fɔ lan bɔt Krays. Wi tap fɔ lan una dɛn tin we wi bin dɔn lan una fɔstɛm we wi se pipul fɔ chenj ɛn lɛf fɔ du dɛn bad tin we go mek dɛn day, ɛn dɛn fɔ biliv pan Gɔd.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wi nɔ fɔ bigin fɔ tɛl una bak bɔt dɛn tin we wi bin dɔn tɛl una, dat is: una fɔ was unasɛf fɔ mek una klin na Gɔd in yay; una fɔ le an pan pɔsin ed fɔ pre fɔ am; Gɔd go mek dɛn pipul we bin dɔn day rayz frɔm dɛn grev; ɛn Gɔd gɛt fɔ jɔj ɔlman di las de.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mek wi lɛf fɔ tɔk bɔt dɛn tin ya ɛn go bifo; ɛn na dat wi go du, if Gɔd gri.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wi fɔ go bifo, bikɔs pɔsin nɔ go bring dɛn pipul we dɔn tɔn dɛn bak pan Gɔd, kam bak to Gɔd, bikɔs dɛn pipul de bin dɔn no wetin tru bɔt Gɔd, dɛn bin dɔn gɛt dɛn blɛsin we Gɔd de gi, dɛn bin dɔn gɛt dɛn yon pat pan Gɔd in Spirit,

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: dɛn bin dɔn si se Gɔd in mɛsej gud, ɛn dɛn bin dɔn no bɔt dɛn pawa we gɛt fɔ kam.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: If pipul dɔn no ɔl dat, dɔn dɛn stil tɔn dɛn bak pan Gɔd, natin nɔ go bring dɛn kam bak to Gɔd ɛn mek dɛn lɛf dɛn bad tin we dɛn de du, igen, bikɔs dɛn de nel Gɔd in Pikin na di krɔs wan tɛm mɔ ɛn laf am bifo ɔlman.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wɛn plɛnti ren dɔn fɔdɔm pan grɔn, dat kin mek tin gro fɔ dɛn pipul we de mek fam, dat min se Gɔd dɔn blɛs di grɔn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bɔt if na chu kchuk bush ɛn gras nɔmɔ gro, da grɔn de nɔ bɛtɛ igen. Di tɛm dɔn kam klos we Gɔd go kɔs di grɔn ɛn mek faya bɔn ɔltin we lib de ɛn pwɛl di grɔn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mi padi dɛn we a lɛk, bɔt pan ɔl we wi tɔk lɛkɛ aw wi tɔk so sɛf, wi shɔ se una go du bɛtɛ, pas fɔstɛm, so dat Gɔd go sev una.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Gɔd nɔ de du ɛnibɔdi bad, so i nɔ go fɔgɛt di wok we una dɔn du, ɛn i nɔ go fɔgɛt di lɛk we una lɛk am we una bin ɛp una kɔmpin Kristiɛn dɛn, ɛn aw una stil de ɛp dɛn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Di tin we de na wi at we wi want una fɔ du, na fɔ mek una ɔl de tray fɔ du wetin Gɔd want sote una day, ɛn mek una nɔ tap fɔ du am, so dat una go gɛt dɛn tin we Gɔd gɛt fɔ una we una abop fɔ gɛt.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wi nɔ want fɔ mek una lezi, bɔt wi want una fɔ bi lɛkɛ dɛn pipul we biliv pan Gɔd, we de bia, bikɔs dɛn na di wan dɛn, we go gɛt ɔl wetin Gɔd bin dɔn prɔmis fɔ gi in pipul dɛn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Lɔntɛm, wɛn Gɔd bin prɔmis Ebraam, na insɛf yon nem i bin tek oth se in go du wetin i bin prɔmis Ebraam, bikɔs nɔbɔdi nɔ pas am.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Da tɛm de, Gɔd tɛl Ebraam se, “Fɔ tru, a go blɛs yu ɛn a go mek yu gɛt plɛnti plɛnti pikin, gra npi kin, ɛn gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bikɔs Gɔd bin dɔn prɔmis dat, Ebraam nɔ bin dawt, so i gɛt ɔl wetin Gɔd bin dɔn prɔmis se i go gi am.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wɛn pipul de mek prɔmis, dɛn kin tek pɔsin we pas dɛn fɔ swɛ, so di swɛ kin mek pipul nɔ agyu igen.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Gɔd bin want sho dɛn pipul we i go gi wetin i bin dɔn prɔmis, klia wan se, in nɔ go chenj in maynd. Na dat mek i bin tek in nem tek oth se, in go du wetin i bin dɔn prɔmis se in go du.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: So, dɛn tu tin ya, dat na di prɔmis we Gɔd mek ɛn di tin we i tek oth se in go du, nɔ go chenj, bikɔs Gɔd nɔ de lay. Na dɛn tu tin ya mek wi tinap tra nga, so dat wi we dɔn go ayd to Gɔd, go put ɔl wi at pan wetin Gɔd go gi wi bambay.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wetin wi de put ɔl wi at pan tan lɛkɛ anka fɔ wi layf, we de mek wi tinap tra nga. Na fɔseka dat, wi go go insay insay di ples we Gɔd de na ɛvin, ɛn wi go pas di big tik kɔtin we ɛng ɛn kɔba di ples we Gɔd de.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na Jizɔs insɛf fɔs go insay da ples de bifo wi, fɔseka wi; bikɔs in na di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, sote go, ɛn i de du di sem kayn wok we Mɛlki zidɛk bin du.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mɛlki zidɛk na bin king na wan ples we nem Selɛm ɛn na in Gɔd, we pas ɔl, bin pik fɔ mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin. Wɛn Ebraam bin kɔmɔt fɛt na wan wa we i bin kil plɛnti king dɛn, na Mɛlki zidɛk go mit am na rod ɛn blɛs am.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Da tɛm de, Ebraam bin sheb ɔl wetin i siz na di wa, tɛn pat, ɛn i gi Mɛlki zidɛk wan pat. Mɛlki zidɛk min, “King we de du wetin rayt;” ɛn dɛn de kɔl am, “King we de bring kol at,” bikɔs Selɛm, di ples we i bin de rul, min “Kol at.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Pipul nɔ no natin bɔt Mɛlki zidɛk in mama, in papa ɛn in fambul layn. Dɛn nɔ no ustɛm i bɔn ɛn ustɛm i day. So i tan lɛkɛ Gɔd in Pikin: na man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, sote go.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una mɛmba aw Mɛlki zidɛk in pawa bin big. Wɛn Ebraam we na ɔl di Ju pipul dɛn papa bin go fɛt dɛn king, i sheb ɔl wetin i gɛt tɛn pat ɛn gi Mɛlki zidɛk wan pat.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Di Lɔ we Gɔd gi Mozis tɔk bɔt dɛn Ju man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, dat na Livay in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn, we i se, di pipul dɛn na Izrɛl fɔ sheb wetin dɛn gɛt, tɛn pat, ɛn tek wan pat gi Livay in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin. Dat min se dɛn kɔntri man bin de gi dɛn Ju man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, wan pat, pan ɔl we dɛn ɔl na Ebraam in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Pan ɔl we Mɛlki zidɛk nɔ bin kɔmɔt na Livay in fambul layn, Ebraam sheb ɔl wetin i gɛt tɛn pat ɛn gi Mɛlki zidɛk wan pat, ɛn Mɛlki zidɛk blɛs Ebraam we Gɔd bin dɔn prɔmis sɔntin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wi no fɔ tru se, di pɔsin we de blɛs pas di wan we i blɛs.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dɛn Ju man we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin we bin kɔmɔt na Livay in fambul layn ɛn we bin de tek wan pat pan ɛvri tɛn pat, na pipul we bin gɛt fɔ day; bɔt Mɛlki zidɛk we tek wan pat pan di tɛn pat, na pɔsin we nɔ bin day, lɛkɛ aw dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wɛn Ebraam bin sheb wetin i gɛt tɛn pat ɛn gi Mɛlki zidɛk wan pat, i bin jɛs tan lɛkɛ se na Livay insɛf tek wan pat gi Mɛlki zidɛk. (Livay na di gra npapa-papa dɛn fɔ ɔl dɛn Ju man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn we de tek wan pat pan ɛvri tɛn pat pan ɔltin fɔ gi Gɔd.)

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wi no se na so i bi, bikɔs wi no gud gud se, wɛn Mɛlki zidɛk bin go mit Ebraam, i bin jɛs tan lɛkɛ se na Livay, pan ɔl we Livay nɔ bin bɔn yet, bin gi Ebraam di wan pat fɔ gi Mɛlki zidɛk, bikɔs Livay na bin Ebraam in blɔd fambul.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Lɔntɛm Gɔd bin put di Lɔ na Mozis in an fɔ gi di Izrɛl pipul dɛn, da tɛm de sɔm pan Livay in fambul dɛn na bin man dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin na Izrɛl. If dɛn man lɛkɛ Erɔn we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, bin ebul wok fɔ mek ɔl wetin Gɔd want bi, natin nɔ bin fɔ mek ɛni ɔda man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin kam, we go du di sem kayn wok we Mɛlki zidɛk insɛf bin du.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: If Gɔd bin pul dɛn lɔntɛm Ju man we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin kɔmɔt pan dɛn wok, dɔn i put ɔda pɔsin fɔ du di wok difrɛn we, dat sho se di lɔ insɛf go chenj.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wi Masta Jizɔs we dɛn de tɔk bɔt, kɔmɔt na difrɛn fambul; nɔn pan in fambul dɛn nɔ bi man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, wande.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wi no se na Juda in fambul layn wi Masta Jizɔs kɔmɔt; ɛn Mozis nɔ bin tɔk natin bɔt Juda in fambul dɛn wɛn i bin de tɔk bɔt dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin we kɔmɔt na Livay in fambul layn, nɔ bin ebul fɔ mek pipul no Gɔd. Wetin mek wi no dat gud, na we Gɔd sɛn ɔda man, we tan lɛkɛ Mɛlki zidɛk, kam fɔ mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Nɔto fɔseka di lɔ ɛn wetin mɔta lman de du mek i bi man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, na bikɔs i gɛt pawa fɔ de sote go.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, “Yu go bi man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin sote go, yu go du di sem kayn wok we Mɛlki zidɛk bin de du.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: So, Gɔd dɔn put di fɔs lɔ dɛn wansay, bikɔs dɛn nɔ bin gɛt pawa, dɛn nɔ bin ebul fɔ ɛp pipul.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Di Lɔ dɛn we Gɔd bin gi Mozis nɔ bin gɛt pawa fɔ mek ɔltin rayt bitwin mɔta lman ɛn Gɔd. Gɔd dɔn bring pɔsin we pas di Lɔ dɛn we i bin gi Mozis, ɛn na dis pɔsin ya wi abop pan fɔ mek wi kam klos Gɔd.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Pantap dat, Gɔd bin dɔn prɔmis se, Jizɔs go bi man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin sote go, bɔt i nɔ bin prɔmis dat wɛn dɛn bin mek Livay in pikin dɛn bi man dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bɔt wɛn Gɔd mek Jizɔs bi man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, i bin mek prɔmis we i tɛl Jizɔs se, “Gɔd, we na di Masta, dɔn prɔmis se yu go bi man we de mek sakrifays fɔ pipul sin sote go; Mi wɔd nɔ go chenj.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na fɔseka dis prɔmis ya we Gɔd prɔmis, na dat mek Jizɔs bi di pɔsin we sho se fɔ tru di nyu agrimɛnt we Gɔd dɔn mek wit wi, pas di fɔs wan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Di ɔda tin we difrɛn na in dis: di ɔda man dɛn we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin we kɔmɔt na Livay in fambul layn, bin plɛnti bikɔs dɛn kin day, ɛn na ɔda pipul kin kam du di wok we dɛn bin de du.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bɔt Jizɔs difrɛn, i nɔ de day, in layf de sote go. I nɔ de lɛf in wok we na fɔ mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, gi ɔda pɔsin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na dat mek Jizɔs gɛt pawa ɔltɛm fɔ sev dɛn pipul we de kam to Gɔd tru am. Bikɔs i gɛt layf we go de sote go, i de pre bifo Gɔd ɔltɛm fɔ dɛn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: So Jizɔs na di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn i de gi wi ɔl wetin wi fɔ gɛt. I de du wetin rayt ɔltɛm; i nɔ gɛt sin na in layf; sin nɔ gɛt pawa pan am; ɛn i de na in ples we de na ɛvin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dɛn ɔda edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, bin de mek sakri fays ɛvri de fɔseka dɛn yon sin, bifo dɛn mek sakri fays fɔ di ɔda pipul dɛn sin. Bɔt Jizɔs nɔ bin de mek dɛn kayn sakri fays de, bikɔs i bin dɔn mek wan sakri fays nɔmɔ we go de sote go, ɛn na in layf i tek mek da sakri fays de.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dɛn edman we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin we di Lɔ we Gɔd gi Mozis se fɔ pik, na bin mɔta lman dɛn we kin du tin we nɔ rayt. Bɔt wɛn Gɔd prɔmis di prɔmis we tek di Lɔ we i gi Mozis, in ples, i pik in Pikin we dɔn sho se in ebul du ɔltin sote go.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Di tin we wi de kam tɛl una so, impɔtant pas ɔl: Di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, we wi gɛt, na Jizɔs we sidɔm na Gɔd we de rul wit pawa na ɛvin, in raytan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Fɔstɛm, dɛn ɔda man we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin bin de du Gɔd in wok na bafa we mɔta lman bil, bɔt Jizɔs de wok na di ples we Gɔd de, na Gɔd bil da ples de, nɔto mɔta lman.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ɔl dɛn edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, fɔ gi Gɔd wetin dɛn gɛt ɛn dɛn fɔ sakri fays ani mal to Gɔd. Semwe so, di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, we wi gɛt, fɔ gɛt sɔntin we insɛf go gi Gɔd.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: If Jizɔs bin de na dis wɔl te naw, i nɔ bin fɔ bi man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin atɔl, bikɔs dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin we de na dis wɔl de mek dɛn sakri fays ya lɛkɛ aw di Ju Lɔ se.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Di wok we dɛn bin de du bin jɛs tan lɛkɛ pikchɔ we de sho di wok we Jizɔs we na di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, we wi gɛt, de du na ɛvin. Di Bafa na lɛkɛ pikchɔ we sho aw di ples, we Gɔd de, tan. Wɛn Mozis bin rɛdi fɔ bil di Bafa, dat na di ples we dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin bin de du dɛn wok, Gɔd tɛl am se, “Tek tɛm bil ɔltin jɛs lɛkɛ aw a bin sho yu wɛn yu bin de na Mawnt Saynay.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: So wi si se di wok we Jizɔs de du pas di wan we dɛn ɔda man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin de du. Semwe so, di agrimɛnt we Jizɔs mek bitwin Gɔd ɛn mɔta lman bɛtɛ pas di ol wan, bikɔs na Jizɔs in agrimɛnt mek Gɔd mek prɔmis to wi, we bɛtɛ pas di fɔs wan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: If di fɔs agrimɛnt bin du fɔ sev pipul, Gɔd nɔ bin fɔ mek ɔda agrimɛnt.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bɔt Gɔd insɛf si se di pipul dɛn nɔ bin du wetin di fɔs agrimɛnt se, na dat mek i se, “Di tɛm de kam we a go mek ɔda agrimɛnt wit di pipul dɛn na Izrɛl ɛn di wan dɛn na Juda.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dis nyu agrimɛnt ya nɔ go tan lɛkɛ di wan we a bin mek wit dɛn granpapa-papa dɛn, da tɛm we misɛf bin tek dɛn kɔmɔt na Ijipt. Dɛn bin pwɛl di agrimɛnt we a mek wit dɛn, so a bin lɛf dɛn to dɛnsɛf.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wɛn di tɛm rich, na di agrimɛnt dis we a go mek wit di pipul dɛn na Izrɛl: A go mek dɛn no mi lɔ dɛn ɛn mek dɛn nɔ fɔgɛt dɛn. A go bi dɛn Gɔd, ɛn dɛn go bi mi pipul.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Di pipul dɛn nɔ go gɛt fɔ lan dɛn kɔmpin ɔ dɛn brɔda igen se, ‘Una fɔ no Gɔd we na di Masta.’ Bikɔs dɛn ɔl, pikin ɛn bigman, go no mi.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A go sɔri fɔ dɛn ɛn a go padin dɛn fɔ ɔl di sin we dɛn dɔn sin, a nɔ go mɛmba dɛn sin igen.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wɛn Gɔd tɔk bɔt nyu agrimɛnt, dat min se, di fɔs wan dɔn ol. Wi no se ɛni tin we dɔn ol, dɔn dɔn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wɛn Gɔd bin mek di fɔs agrimɛnt wit mɔta lman, di agrimɛnt bin gɛt plɛnti lɔ bɔt aw pipul fɔ pre to Gɔd. Ples bin de we mɔta lman bil fɔ pre to Gɔd.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Di ples na bin Bafa. Di Bafa na bin big ples we dɛn sheb tu, dɛn kɔl di fɔs pat “Di ples we Gɔd de”. Dɛn tin we dɛn bin de kip de, na lamp, tebul, ɛn bred we pipul kin kɛr go put bifo Gɔd.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wɛn yu pas di sɛkɛn big tik kɔtin, wan ɔda pat bin de we dɛn kɔl “Di ples we Gɔd de pas ɛni ɔda ples.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Insay da ples de dɛn bin gɛt smɔl gold tebul we dɛn bin de bɔn insɛns we gɛt fayn smɛl. Di bɔks we di agrimɛnt we Gɔd mek wit mɔta lman de, bin de insay dis sem ples ya. Gold bin kɔba di wan ol bɔks. Insay di bɔks dɛn bin de kip wan gold pɔt we dɛn kin put da tin we dɛn kɔl mana we Gɔd bin de gi dɛn fɔ it. Erɔn in wɔki nstik we lif gro pan, ɛn dɛn tu ston we Gɔd bin rayt in lɔ dɛn pan, dɛnsɛf bin lib de.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Oba di bɔks dɛn bin gɛt sɔm krichɔ we gɛt fɛda fɔ sho pipul se Gɔd de na da ples de. Di krichɔ dɛn fɛda kɔba Gɔd in chia we i sidɔm fɔ padin pipul dɛn sin. Bɔt nɔto naw wi go ɛksplen ɔl dɛn tin ya to una gud.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Afta dɛn dɔn rɛdi di ples lɛkɛ dat, di man dɛn we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin kin go insay di fɔs ples ɔltɛm we dɛn de go du Gɔd in wok.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bɔt na di edman we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, in wan gren kin go insay di sɛkɛn ples we de insay insay, wan tɛm fɔ ia. Na di tɛm dat we i kin tek bif blɔd mek sakri fays to Gɔd fɔseka in yon sin, dɛn i kin mek sakri fays fɔ ɔl di ɔda pipul dɛn sin we dɛn nɔ bin no se na sin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Gɔd in Spirit yus ɔl dɛn tin ya fɔ sho wi klia wan se, wans di fɔs ples na di Bafa stil de, mɔta lman nɔ gɛt rayt fɔ go insay di sɛkɛn ples we Gɔd de.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Di Bafa jɛs de sho wi dɛn tin we de naw, ɛn wetin dɛn tin de min. I sho wi se nɔto wetin pɔsin we de pre de gi ɛn di sakri fays we i de mek to Gɔd de mek ɔltin rayt bitwin in ɛn Gɔd.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ɔl dɛn tin ya na lɔ we tɔk bɔt tin fɔ it ɛn drink ɛn aw fɔ was dɛn tin we go mek pipul klin na Gɔd yay. Ɔl dɛn lɔ ya jɛs de fɔ dis wɔl, ɛn dɛn pawa go jɛs de sote di tɛm rich we Gɔd go chenj ɔltin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bɔt naw we Krays dɔn kam, in na di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn i dɔn bring di gud tin dɛn we wi dɔn gɛt naw. Di ples we i de du in wok bɛtɛ fawe pas di Bafa we de na dis wɔl. Nɔto mɔta lman mek di ples de we Krays de wok, ɛn da ples nɔ de na dis wɔl.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wɛn Krays bin go insay di ples we Gɔd de, na wan tɛm nɔmɔ i go insay de. Nɔto got ɛn mankaw blɔd i bin sakri fays de, na in yon blɔd. Na da blɔd de i tek gi wi layf we go de sote go.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Fɔstɛm dɛn bin de tek got blɔd, mankaw blɔd, ɛn asis we kɔmɔt pan yɔng kaw we dɛn bɔn skata dɛn pan pipul we nɔ klin na Gɔd in yay, fɔ mek dɛn go klin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: If di bif dɛn blɔd bin gɛt pawa fɔ klin pipul, dat min se, Krays in blɔd gɛt pawa pas di bif dɛn blɔd fɔ klin wi at. I tek insɛf we nɔ sin wande, mek sakri fays fɔ wi, ɛn na Gɔd in Spirit we de sote go gi am pawa fɔ sakri fays insɛf. Fɔseka dat, Krays mek wi at klin, so dat wi nɔ go du bad igen we go mek wi day, bɔt wi go sav Gɔd we gɛt layf sote go.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dis sho se na Krays tinap midul Gɔd ɛn mɔta lman, i mek nyu agrimɛnt, so dat dɛn pipul we Gɔd dɔn kɔl fɔ bi in pipul go gɛt dɛn gud tin we Gɔd prɔmis fɔ gi dɛn, ɛn dɛn gud tin de go blant dɛn sote go. Na bikɔs Krays day mek dat go bi, di day we i day mek Gɔd padin in pipul dɛn fɔ di bad we dɛn bin dɔn du, wɛn dɛn bin de ɔnda di fɔs agrimɛnt.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wɛn pɔsin rayt pepa fɔ ɛksplen wetin pipul fɔ du in prɔpati wɛn i day, da pɔsin de fɔ day fɔs bifo di pipul dɛn go du wetin i bin rayt.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Di pepa nɔ min natin if di pɔsin nɔ day yet. Wɛn di pɔsin day, na in di pepa gɛt pawa.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na dat mek di fɔs agrimɛnt we Gɔd bin mek wit mɔta lman nɔ bin gɛt pawa, pas nɔmɔ wɛn pipul kin tek bif blɔd mek sakri fays to Gɔd.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Lɔntɛm, Mozis bin tɛl ɔl di pipul dɛn ɔl di lɔ dɛn we Gɔd se dɛn fɔ fala. Mozis tɛl dɛn ɔl di lɔ dɛn fɔs, dɔn i tek gras we dɛn kɔl “isɔp” ɛn ship ia we dɛn kɔla wit rɛd, dɔk dɛn insay kaw blɔd ɛn insay wata, dɔn i ib ib am ɔlsay pan di Lɔ buk ɛn pan ɔl di pipul dɛn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wɛn i bin de ib ib di blɔd ɔlsay, i se, “Dis na di blɔd we dɛn tek mek di agrimɛnt we Gɔd tɛl una fɔ fala.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Semwe so, Mozis bin ib ib di blɔd pan di Bafa we dɛn bin de mek sakri fays to Gɔd ɛn pan ɔl dɛn tin we dɛn kin yus wɛn dɛn de pre to Gɔd.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Fɔ tru, bay aw di Lɔ se, dɛn tin we dɛn nɔ bin de tek blɔd klin nɔ bin plɛnti. Ɔda we nɔ bin de fɔ padin pɔsin sin, pas fɔ kil bif ɛn tek di blɔd mek sakri fays to Gɔd.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Fɔstɛm, dɛn bin jɛs gɛt fɔ ib ib blɔd pan ɔl dɛn tin ya we de sho wi aw dɛn tin we de na ɛvin, tan, so dat dɛn ɔl go klin na Gɔd yay. Fɔ di tin dɛn we de na ɛvin, i gud fɔ mek pɔsin mek sakri fays we bɛtɛ pas bif sakri fays.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Krays dɔn go insay di ples we Gɔd de na ɛvin. Na dat mek i tinap bifo Gɔd fɔ wi. I nɔ go insay di Bafa we mɔta lman bil, we jɛs de sho aw di ples we Gɔd de na ɛvin, tan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Di Ju edman we kin mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, kin go insay di sɛkɛn ples na di Bafa wan tɛm ɛvri ia; i kin kɛr bif blɔd go insay de, nɔto in yon blɔd. Bɔt na wan tɛm nɔmɔ Krays go na di ples we Gɔd de ɛn sakri fays insɛf to Gɔd. I nɔ du dat pas wan tɛm.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: If nɔto bin so, Krays bin fɔ sɔfa plɛnti tɛm frɔm di tɛm we Gɔd mek di wɔl. Bɔt i dɔn kam di fɔs ɛn las tɛm, naw we di wɔl de dɔn, fɔ sakri fays insɛf, so dat i go pul sin kɔmɔt na wi layf, wan tɛm fɔ ɔl.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na wan tɛm ɔlman gɛt fɔ day, ɛn afta dɛn dɔn day Gɔd go jɔj dɛn fɔ ɔl wetin dɛn bin du.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Krays insɛf day wan tɛm nɔmɔ fɔ fri pipul, mek sin nɔ go gɛt pawa oba dɛn igen. I go kam bak na wɔl di sɛkɛn tɛm, bɔt da tɛm de i nɔ de kam fɔ pul sin kɔmɔt na pipul layf, i de kam fɔ gi dɛn pipul we de wet fɔ am layf we go de sote go na ɛvin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Di Ju Lɔ de sho wi aw dɛn gud tin we gɛt fɔ kam, go tan, bɔt i nɔ ebul sho wi klia wan aw dɛn go tan, fɔ tru. Dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin de mek di sem kayn sakri fays ɛvri ia. Dɛn kayn sakri fays de nɔ gɛt pawa fɔ pul sin kɔmɔt na dɛn pipul we want kam klos Gɔd, dɛn layf.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: If dɛn sakri fays de bin gɛt pawa fɔ pul sin kɔmɔt na pipul layf, pipul nɔ bin fɔ de mek sakri fays igen, bikɔs if dɛn sakri fays de bin de mek dɛn klin sote go, dɛn nɔ bin fɔ stil de se sin de na dɛn layf.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bɔt di sakri fays we dɛn de mek ɛvri ia, de mek dɛn mɛmba di sin we dɛn dɔn sin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wi no se dɛn mankaw ɛn got blɔd nɔ gɛt pawa fɔ pul sin kɔmɔt na pipul layf.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na dat mek lɔntɛm wɛn Krays bin de kam na wɔl, wɛn i de tɔk to Gɔd, i se, “Yu nɔ want bif sakrifays, bɔt yu gi mi bɔdi we a fɔ sakrifays to yu.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wɛn pipul de bɔn bif, lɛkɛ mankaw ɛn got, fɔ gi yu ɔ wɛn dɛn sakrifays dɛn fɔ pul sin kɔmɔt na dɛn layf, yu nɔ de satisfay wit dɛn tin de.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na dat mek a se, ‘Gɔd, luk mi naya, a dɔn rɛdi fɔ du wetin yu want mi fɔ du, jɛs lɛkɛ aw dɛn rayt bɔt mi na di Ju Lɔ buk.’ ”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Di tɛm we Krays tɔk dɛn wɔd ya, di fɔs tin we i tɔk na dis: “Yu nɔ want mek pipul mek sakri fays ɛn bring ɛni tin kam gi yu; semwe so, yu nɔ want mek dɛn bɔn bif fɔ gi yu ɛn yu nɔ want fɔ mek dɛn mek sakri fays fɔ pul sin kɔmɔt na dɛn layf. Dɛn tin de nɔ go sati sfay yu.” Krays tɔk dɛn wɔd ya, pan ɔl we pipul bin de du ɔl dɛn tin de lɛkɛ aw di Ju Lɔ se dɛn fɔ du dɛn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Di sɛkɛn tin we i tɔk, na dis: “Gɔd, luk mi naya, a rɛdi fɔ du wetin yu want mi fɔ du.” Na dat mek Krays put dɛn fɔstɛm sakri fays wansay, ɛn mek in yon blɔd tek dɛn ples.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs Jizɔs Krays want du wetin Gɔd want am fɔ du, mek i sakri fays in bɔdi. Na wan tɛm nɔmɔ i mek da sakri fays de ɛn di sakri fays gɛt pawa ɔltɛm. Na da sakri fays de mek wi at klin. I dɔn mek wi bi Gɔd yon pipul.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin de wok fɔ Gɔd ɛvri de, dɛn de tek kaw ɛn got mek di sem kayn sakri fays ɔltɛm, bɔt dɛn kayn sakri fays de, nɔ ebul pul di pipul dɛn sin kɔmɔt na dɛn layf.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bɔt di sakri fays we Krays mek wan tɛm nɔmɔ, gɛt pawa fɔ pul di pipul dɛn sin kɔmɔt na dɛn layf, wan tɛm fɔ ɔl, ɛn wɛn i dɔn mek di sakri fays dɔn, i go sidɔm na Gɔd in raytan.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: I de wet de sote di tɛm we Gɔd go mek i mas ɔl dɛn pipul we nɔ lɛk am ɔnda in fut.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Di wan gren sakri fays we Krays mek, na in i de tek mek dɛn pipul we i de mek klin ɛn we i de put wansay fɔ du in wok, bi lɛkɛ aw i want dɛn fɔ bi.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Gɔd in Spirit sɛf de sho wi se dɛn tin ya na tru. I tɔk fɔs se,

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: “Di Masta se, ‘Wɛn di rayt tɛm rich, na di agrimɛnt dis we a go mek wit dɛn: A go mek dɛn no mi lɔ dɛn, ɛn a go mek dɛn nɔ fɔgɛt dɛn.’ ”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Gɔd in Spirit tɔk igen se, “A go fɔgɛt bɔt di bad we dɛn dɔn du ɛn aw dɛn dɔn pwɛl mi lɔ dɛn.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ɛnti Gɔd dɔn padin di pipul dɛn sin, dɛn nɔ gɛt fɔ de mek sakri fays igen fɔ mek Gɔd go pul sin kɔmɔt na dɛn layf.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mi brɔda dɛn, fɔseka Jizɔs in blɔd we kɔmɔt pan am wɛn dɛn kil am na di krɔs, wi gɛt maynd fɔ go insay, insay di ples we Gɔd de.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Jizɔs sakri fays in bɔdi fɔ opin rod fɔ pipul fɔ gɛt nyu layf. In bɔdi tan lɛkɛ di tik kɔtin we bin ɛng insay, insay Gɔd in Os fɔ kɔba di ples we Gɔd de. (Da tik kɔtin de bin chɛr frɔm ɔp kam dɔng wɛn Krays day na di krɔs.)

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wi gɛt wan edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, we pas ɔl di ɔda wan dɛn; na in de rul wi we na Gɔd in pipul dɛn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: So, lɛ wi biliv pan Jizɔs Krays gud wan; lɛ wi kam klos Gɔd wit ɔl wi at, bikɔs Jizɔs in blɔd dɔn klin wi at; ɛn wi na pipul we dɔn was wi bɔdi na di klin wata.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una lɛ wi tinap tra nga, ɛn lɛ wi abop se wi go gɛt dɛn tin we wi biliv se Gɔd go gi wi. Una lɛ wi nɔ dawt bikɔs Gɔd dɔn prɔmis se in go du dɛn tin de, ɛn i go du wetin i se, fɔ tru.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una lɛ wi tink aw wi go ɛp wisɛf mek wi go lɛk wi kɔmpin dɛn ɛn du gud to dɛn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una lɛ wi nɔ tap fɔ de mit, lɛ wi nɔ fala dɛn pipul we nɔ de gri fɔ go mitin. Bɔt una lɛ wi de kɔrej wi kɔmpin dɛn, mɔ igen we wi no se di De we wi Masta go kam bak de kam jisnɔ.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wi dɔn no wetin tru, so if ɛni wan pan wi stil de du bad, nɔn sakri fays nɔ de igen fɔ pul di bad tin dɛn we di pɔsin du kɔmɔt na in layf.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: If ɛnibɔdi de du dɛn bad tin de, i fɔ fred, bikɔs Gɔd go jɔj am ɛn se i dɔn du bad, ɛn big big faya go kam bɔn ɔl dɛn pipul we nɔ de du wetin Gɔd tɛl dɛn fɔ du.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: If ɛnibɔdi brok di Lɔ we Mozis gi mɔta lman, ɛn if tu ɔ tri pipul gri se dɛn si am we i de brok di Lɔ, dɛn go kil da pɔsin de, dɛn nɔ go sɔri fɔ am.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una fɔ no se, da pɔsin we nɔ tek in Pikin mek ɛni tin, Gɔd go mɔs pɔnish am tra nga wan; da pɔsin de de se Krays in blɔd we Gɔd tek mek agrimɛnt wit mɔta lman fɔ mek mɔta lman bi in yon, nɔ gɛt pawa; ɛn i fityay Gɔd in Spirit we bring blɛsin kam.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wi no di pɔsin we se, “Na mi gɛt di rayt fɔ pɔnish pɔsin we de du bad, na mi go tɔn di bad gi am bak.” I tɔk igen se, “Gɔd we na di Masta go jɔj in pipul dɛn.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: I go bad fɔ di pɔsin we Gɔd we gɛt layf sote go, go kɔndɛm so.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una fɔ mɛmba aw una bin de du fɔstɛm, wɛn una bin dɔn ɔnda stand Gɔd yon we. Da tɛm de, pan ɔl we una bin de sɔfa bad, una bin bia ɛn tinap tra nga.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Da tɛm de pipul bin de fityay una ɛn dɛn bin de mek una sɔfa bifo ɔda pipul, ɛn tɛm bin de we una bin rɛdi fɔ sɔfa wit ɔda Kristiɛn dɛn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una bin de sɔri fɔ dɛn pipul we de na jel, una nɔ bin de wɔri, bɔt una bin stil gladi ivin wɛn pipul siz una prɔpati, bikɔs una bin no se una gɛt sɔntin we bɛtɛ pas da prɔpati de, we go de sote go.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na dat mek una nɔ fɔ dawt, bikɔs if una biliv Gɔd sote go, i go gi una big blɛsin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una gɛt fɔ bia, so dat una go du wetin Gɔd want, ɛn una go gɛt wetin i dɔn prɔmis una.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, “I nɔ go te, di pɔsin we gɛt fɔ kam, go kam; i nɔ go wes tɛm.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dɛn pipul we de waka tret na layf go gɛt layf we go de sote go, bikɔs dɛn biliv dɛn wɔd ya; bɔt if ɛnibɔdi lɛf fɔ biliv mi bikɔs i de dawt mi, a nɔ go pliz wit am.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wi nɔto dɛn pipul we go tɔn bak ɛn tap fɔ fala Gɔd, so wi nɔ go sev. Bɔt wi biliv Gɔd, so dat i go sev wi ɛn wi go de sote go.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wetin dɛn min we dɛn se pɔsin biliv? If pɔsin biliv, dat min se di pɔsin no se in go gɛt di tin we i put in at pan, ɛn i no se, dɛn tin we wi nɔ de si, de, fɔ tru.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs dɛn lɔntɛm pipul bin biliv Gɔd, mek Gɔd bin sati sfay wit dɛn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs wi biliv Gɔd mek wi ɔnda stand se, na di wɔd we Gɔd bin tɔk na in mek dis wɔl, so dɛn tin we wi de si kɔmɔt frɔm dɛn tin we wi nɔ de si.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs Ebɛl bin biliv Gɔd, mek i mek bɛtɛ sakri fays to Gɔd, pas di wan we Ken mek. Na bikɔs Ebɛl bin biliv Gɔd mek Gɔd se Ebɛl na tret pɔsin. Na we Gɔd tek di sakri fays we Ebɛl mek mek wi no se Gɔd se Ebɛl na tret pɔsin. Pan ɔl we Ebɛl dɔn day, wi stil de lan bɔt wetin i min fɔ biliv Gɔd bay aw in bin biliv Gɔd.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs Inɔk bin biliv Gɔd, mek i nɔ day, Gɔd tek am go na ɛvin wɛn i bin stil gɛt layf. Nɔbɔdi nɔ si am igen, bikɔs Gɔd tek am go ɔp. Dɛn rayt bɔt am na Gɔd in Buk se, we i bin de na wɔl, bifo Gɔd tek am go ɔp, i bin du di tin we mek Gɔd sati sfay.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: If pɔsin nɔ biliv Gɔd, i nɔ go ebul pliz am. Pɔsin lɛkɛ dat nɔ go kam klos Gɔd pas i biliv se Gɔd de ɛn i de du gud to dɛn pipul we de pre to am ɔltɛm.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs Noa bin biliv Gɔd mek i lisin di tɛm we Gɔd wɔn am bɔt dɛn tin we go bi. Pan ɔl we i nɔ bin si di tin dɛn yet, Noa du wetin Gɔd tɛl am fɔ du. I mek wan big bot we in, in wɛf ɛn in pikin dɛn go insay, so di wata we bin kɔba di wɔl nɔ bin du dɛn natin. So di biliv we Noa biliv Gɔd dɔn pruv se di pipul dɛn na di wɔl bin de du bad we dɛn nɔ bin biliv Gɔd. Gɔd tek Noa fɔ bi tret pɔsin bikɔs Noa bin biliv am.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs Ebraam bin biliv Gɔd mek i du wetin Gɔd tɛl am fɔ du wɛn Gɔd kɔl am ɛn sɛn am fɔ go na di ples we i prɔmis fɔ gi am. I grap ɛn go, pan ɔl we i nɔ bin no di ples we i de go.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs Ebraam bin biliv Gɔd mek i bin go na di ples we Gɔd prɔmis fɔ gi am, i bin tap na bafa lɛkɛ tre nja. Na bafa Ebraam, Ayzik ɛn Jekɔb bin tap, bikɔs na to dɛn Gɔd bin mek di prɔmis.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ebraam bin de wet na di bafa fɔ go na di tɔng we Gɔd bin dɔn plan ɛn bil, we tinap tra nga, ɛn we nɔ go fɔdɔm.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs Ebraam bin biliv Gɔd, mek, ilɛk sɛf we in ɛn Sera bin dɔn ol, dɛn ebul bɔn pikin. Ebraam bin biliv se Gɔd na Gɔd we de du wetin i dɔn prɔmis.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Da tɛm de, Ebraam bin dɔn ol, ɛn pan ɔl we i bin lɛf smɔl fɔ mek i day, Gɔd gi am gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn we plɛnti lɛkɛ di sta dɛn na klawd, ɛn lɛkɛ sansan na bich we pɔsin nɔ ebul kɔnt.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ɔl dɛn lɔntɛm pipul ya, we a tɔk bɔt so, bin biliv Gɔd sote dɛn day. Dɛn nɔ bin gɛt ɔl dɛn tin we Gɔd prɔmis dɛn bifo dɛn day, bɔt dɛn bin dɔn si wetin Gɔd go gi dɛn, fawe, ɛn dɛn bin gladi fɔ wetin dɛn si. Dɛn bin no se dɛn na tre nja na dis wɔl.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Di pipul dɛn we tɔk dɛn wɔd ya sho klia wan se dɛn bin de luk fɔ ples we go blant dɛn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dɛn nɔ bin de mɛmba di ples we dɛn kɔmɔt igen. If dɛn bin de mɛmba di ples, dɛn bin fɔ gɛt di chans fɔ tɔn bak go de.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bɔt dɛn bin want ples we bɛtɛ pas dat, dat na di ples we de na ɛvin. So Gɔd nɔ shem wɛn dɛn kɔl am dɛn yon Gɔd, bikɔs i bin dɔn rɛdi ples fɔ dɛn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs Ebraam bin biliv Gɔd, mek, wɛn Gɔd tɛst am, i gri fɔ tek Ayzik, we na bin in wan gren pikin, fɔ sakri fays am to Gɔd. Ebraam bin go fɔ sakri fays Ayzik pan ɔl we Gɔd bin dɔn prɔmis Ebraam

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: se, na Ayzik go bɔn plɛnti pikin dɛn we go bi in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bɔt Ebraam bin biliv se Gɔd ebul mek Ayzik rayz bak, if i day. So, wi kin se, ivin we Ayzik nɔ day, i tan lɛkɛ pɔsin we bin dɔn day, bɔt i rayz bak ɛn fala Ebraam.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs Ayzik bin biliv Gɔd, mek i tɛl Jekɔb ɛn Isɔ se, “Gɔd go blɛs una.” I bin de tɔk bɔt dɛn blɛsin we dɛn go gɛt bambay.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na di sem tin bi fɔ Jekɔb. Na bikɔs Jekɔb bin biliv Gɔd mek i blɛs Josɛf in bɔy pikin dɛn, wan bay wan, wɛn di tɛm we i fɔ day bin dɔn de rich. Na da tɛm de i ling pan in wɔki nstik ɛn prez Gɔd.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs Josɛf bin biliv Gɔd mek, wɛn di tɛm rich we i fɔ day, i tɔk bɔt di tɛm we di Izrɛl pipul dɛn go kɔmɔt Ijipt, ɛn i tɛl dɛn wetin dɛn fɔ du wit in bɔdi.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs Mozis in mama ɛn papa dɛn bin biliv Gɔd, mek dɛn ayd am na os tri mɔnt afta i bɔn. Dɛn si se di pikin fayn, so dɛn nɔ fred fɔ brok di lɔ we di king pas se dɛn fɔ kil ɔl dɛn bɔy pikin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs Mozis bin biliv Gɔd, mek wɛn i dɔn big, i nɔ gri mek dɛn se na di King na Ijipt in gyal pikin bɔn am.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mozis bin tɔk se, i bɛtɛ mek i sɔfa wit Gɔd in pipul dɛn, pas fɔ mek i gladi fɔ du bad we i no se da gladi de nɔ go te.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: I gri se if i sɔfa fɔseka di Mɛsaya we Gɔd go sɛn kam na wɔl, dat bɛtɛ fɔ am, pas fɔ gɛt ɔl di jɛntri we de na Ijipt. I put in at pan di blɛsin we i go gɛt bambay.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs Mozis bin biliv Gɔd mek i kɔmɔt na Ijipt, ɛn i nɔ fred, pan ɔl we di king bin vɛks bad. I nɔ bin gri fɔ tɔn bak, i bin de go lɛkɛ pɔsin we de si Gɔd we mɔta lman nɔ de si.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs Mozis bin biliv Gɔd mek i bigin di Pasova wɛn i tɛl di Izrɛl pipul dɛn fɔ ib ib blɔd pan dɛn do, so dat wɛn di enjɛl we de kil dɛn fɔs bɔy pikin, kam, i nɔ go kil di Izrɛl pipul dɛn yon fɔs bɔy pikin dɛn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs di Izrɛl pipul dɛn bin biliv Gɔd mek dɛn krɔs di big wata we nem “Rɛd Si” lɛkɛ na dray grɔn dɛn de waka pan. Bɔt wɛn di Ijipt pipul dɛn want tray fɔ krɔs am, dɛn ɔl lɛf na di wata.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Semwe so, na bikɔs di Izrɛl pipul dɛn bin biliv Gɔd mek di wɔl we bin de rawnd di tɔng we nem Jɛriko, fɔdɔm. Di wɔl fɔdɔm afta di pipul dɛn dɔn waka sɛvin de rawnd am.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na bikɔs da trit uman we nem Reab bin biliv Gɔd mek i nɔ day di tɛm we dɛn pipul we nɔ du wetin Gɔd tɛl dɛn fɔ du, day, bikɔs i bin gladi fɔ ayd dɛn tre nja we dɛn sɛn kɔmɔt Izrɛl fɔ kam wach di tɔng, na in os.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A fɔ tɔk bɔt dɛn ɔda pipul? Tɛm nɔ de fɔ tɛl una bɔt Gidyɔn, Berak, Samsin, Jɛfta, Devid, Samyɛl, ɛn ɔl dɛn prɔfɛt we bin de tɛl pipul Gɔd in mɛsej.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na we dɛn bin biliv Gɔd mek dɛn bin fɛt wit sɔm ɔda kɔntri dɛn, ɛn dɛn bin ebul win di wa. Dɛn du dɛn tin we rayt na Gɔd in yay, so Gɔd gi dɛn wetin i bin dɔn prɔmis fɔ gi dɛn. Fɔseka di biliv we dɛn biliv Gɔd, i sɛt di layɔn dɛn mɔt mek dɛn nɔ it dɛn;

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: dɛn go ɔt faya we bin de kech big big wan, bɔt natin nɔ du dɛn; ɛn pantap dat, Gɔd pul dɛn kɔmɔt na dɛn pipul dɛn an we nɔ bin lɛk dɛn ɛn we bin want kil dɛn wit sɔd. Dɛn nɔ bin gɛt trɛnk, bɔt Gɔd gi dɛn trɛnk; i gi dɛn pawa ɛnitɛm we dɛn de fɛt na wa, so dɛn ebul mek dɛn soja man we kɔmɔt ɔda kɔntri rɔnawe.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ɛn bikɔs sɔm uman dɛn bin biliv Gɔd, dɛn go mit dɛn yon pipul we bin dɔn day, we rayz bak. Sɔm pipul bin sɔfa plɛnti bad bad tin dɛn we dɛn pipul we nɔ bin lɛk dɛn, du dɛn; dɛn bin sɔfa sote dɛn day, bɔt dɛn nɔ gri dinay Gɔd, pan ɔl we di pipul dɛn we nɔ bin lɛk Gɔd bin want kil dɛn. Ɔl dat na bikɔs dɛn bin biliv se, afta dɛn dɔn rayz frɔm dɛn grev, dɛn go gɛt layf we bɛtɛ pas di wan we dɛn bin gɛt, ɛn da bɛtɛ layf de de na ɛvin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dɛn bin laf sɔm pipul ɛn bit dɛn wit wip; dɛn bin tay sɔm wit chen ɛn put dɛn na jel.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dɛn ston sɔm sote dɛn day, dɛn chap sɔm pipul tu, ɛn dɛn kil sɔm wit sɔd. Dɛn pipul ya we sɔfa so, na bin po pipul we na got ɔ ship kanda nɔmɔ dɛn bin de wɛr. Di pipul dɛn we nɔ bin lɛk dɛn bin mek dɛn sɔfa plɛnti.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dɛn bin de waka waka de ayd na dɛn bush ɛn dɛn il, midul dɛn rɔk ɛn na insay dɛn ol we bin de na di rɔk dɛn, dɛn bin de tap. Dis wɔl nɔto gud ples fɔ pipul lɛkɛ dɛn wan de.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ɔl dɛn pipul ya bin mek Gɔd gladi fɔseka di biliv we dɛn bin biliv am. Pan ɔl dat, dɛn nɔ bin gɛt di tin we Gɔd prɔmis fɔ gi mɔta lman,

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: bikɔs Gɔd bin dɔn plan fɔ du tin we bɛtɛ pas dat fɔ wi. I bin dɔn plan se, in go mek wi ɛn dɛn pipul ya we bin biliv am bi lɛkɛ aw i want wi fɔ bi na ɛvin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Fɔ wi yon pat, ɔl dɛn pipul ya we a jɛs tɔk bɔt de rawnd wi. Dɛn dɔn sho klia wan wetin fɔ biliv Gɔd, min. Na dat mek wi fɔ lɛf ɔl dɛn tin we de mek wi tap fɔ biliv Gɔd; wi fɔ lɛf fɔ du ɛni bad tin we wi de du, we dɔn grip wi tayt; wi fɔ stil rɔn di res we de bifo wi, ɛn wi nɔ fɔ taya na rod.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una lɛ wi luk ɔp to Jizɔs ɔltɛm bikɔs na in de mek wi biliv Gɔd, ɛn ɛp wi fɔ biliv am sote go. I bin dɔn gri lɔntɛm fɔ day na di krɔs, i nɔ tek di shem mek natin, fɔseka di jɔy we Gɔd kip fɔ am. So, i sidɔm naw na Gɔd in raytan, klos di chia we Gɔd sidɔm de rul.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una fɔ mɛmba Jizɔs we bin bia wɛn dɛn bad pipul we nɔ bin lɛk am, mek i sɔfa, so dat una nɔ go taya fɔ biliv pan am ɛn una at nɔ go pwɛl.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una nɔ fɛt sin yet te una day fɔseka dat.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: So una nɔ fɔgɛt Gɔd in wɔd we i tek kɔrej una, wɛn i kɔl una in pikin dɛn. I se, “Mi pikin, wɛn di Masta pɔnish yu, nɔ tek am layt, ɛn nɔ mek yu at pwɛl wɛn i tɔk pan yu.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Bikɔs di pɔsin we di Masta lɛk, na in i de pɔnish, ɛn di pɔsin we di Masta tek fɔ bi in pikin, na in i de bit.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na dat mek una fɔ bia wɛn una de sɔfa fɔseka di bad we una de du, bikɔs di pɔnish we Gɔd de pɔnish una sho se i dɔn tek una lɛkɛ in yon pikin dɛn. Ɛni pikin de we in papa nɔ de pɔnish wɛn i du bad?

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: If Gɔd nɔ de pɔnish una fɔ di bad we una de du lɛkɛ aw i de pɔnish ɔl in pikin dɛn, dat min se una nɔto in tru pikin dɛn, una na pikin dɛn we dɛn bɔn na trit.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wɛn wi papa dɛn na dis wɔl pɔnish wi fɔ di bad we wi du, wi kin rɛspɛkt dɛn. So i go bɛtɛ fawe if wi put wisɛf ɔnda wi Papa we de na ɛvin, so dat wi go gɛt tru layf.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wi papa dɛn na dis wɔl bin de pɔnish wi lɛkɛ aw dɛn fil se rayt, wɛn wi na bin pikin. Bɔt Gɔd de pɔnish wi fɔ ɛp wi, so dat wi go gud lɛkɛ am.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Di tɛm we dɛn kin pɔnish wi, wi nɔ kin gladi, wi kin sɔri. Bɔt tɛm de kam we da pɔnish de go ɛp di wan dɛn we dɛn pɔnish, bikɔs i go mek dɛn lan fɔ du wetin rayt. I go mek dɛn waka tret na layf ɛn de kwayɛt wit dɛn kɔmpin mɔta lman.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una mek una an we wik ɛn una fut we nɔ gɛt trɛnk, tra nga.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una waka na di tret rod, so dat di wan we in fut nɔ tra nga nɔ go fɔdɔm ɛn ambɔg in fut, bɔt in fut go wɛl ɛn insɛf go ebul waka na di tret rod.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una tray mek una nɔ mek plaba wit ɛnibɔdi, ɛn una tray fɔ liv klin layf ɔltɛm, bikɔs nɔbɔdi nɔ go si Gɔd na ɛvin pas in layf klin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una tek tɛm so dat una nɔn nɔ go du tin we go mek i nɔ gɛt Gɔd in blɛsin. Una tek tɛm, semwe so, so dat una nɔn nɔ go tan lɛkɛ plant we na pɔyzin, bikɔs dɛn kayn pipul de de mek trɔbul fɔ ɔda pipul ɛn pwɛl plɛnti layf.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una tek tɛm, mek una nɔ liv fri layf, ɛn una nɔ tek dɛn tin we blant Gɔd lɛkɛ se dɛn nɔ min natin, lɛkɛ aw Isɔ bin du we i sɛl in rayt gi in smɔl brɔda fɔseka wan plet it.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una no se wɛn Isɔ bin want mek in papa blɛs am, in papa nɔ blɛs am. Chans nɔ bin de igen fɔ mek di papa chenj wetin i bin dɔn du, pan ɔl we Isɔ kray fɔ gɛt di blɛsin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una nɔ tan lɛkɛ dɛn lɔntɛm Izrɛl pipul we bin de klos da ay il we dɛn kɔl Mawnt Saynay, we bin si ɔl wetin bin bi de. Dɛn tɛm de, faya bin de kech pan di mawnten, di ples bin dak, layt nɔ bin de, ɛn big big briz bin de blo.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Dɛn yɛri trɔmpɛt blo ɛn vɔys tɔk. Wetin di vɔys tɔk mek dɛn fred bad wan, sote dɛn beg mek di vɔys nɔ tɔk igen,

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: bikɔs wetin di vɔys tɛl dɛn fɔ du pas di pawa we dɛn bin gɛt. Di vɔys se, “If ɛni tin tɔch da ay il de, ilɛk na bif sɛf, mek pipul ston am sote i day.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wetin dɛn si na da ples de mek dɛn fred bad. Mozis insɛf tɔk se, “Di fred mek mi bɔdi tri mbul.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una dɔn rich na da il we dɛn kɔl Mawnt Zayɔn. Una dɔn rich na di tɔng we Gɔd we gɛt layf sote go, de; dɛn kɔl da tɔng de “Jerusɛlɛm we de na ɛvin,” ɛn plɛnti plɛnti enjɛl dɛn we de gladi, gɛda de.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una de wit Gɔd in pikin dɛn we dɔn gɛda na ɛvin. Gɔd bin dɔn rayt dɛn nem na di buk we de na ɛvin. Una dɔn kam bifo Gɔd we de jɔj ɔlman. Una dɔn de wit dɛn pipul we tret na Gɔd yay, dɛn wan we Gɔd dɔn mek dɛn layf bi wetin i fɔ bi.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una dɔn kam to Jizɔs we bin mek di nyu agrimɛnt bitwin Gɔd ɛn mɔta lman. I dɔn mek una no bɔt in blɔd we was wi sin kɔmɔt pan wi. In blɔd pas Ebɛl yon blɔd, bikɔs i de du big wok fɔ wi pas Ebɛl in yon.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na dat mek una fɔ tek tɛm mek una nɔ dɛf una yes we Jizɔs de tɔk to una. Dɛn lɔntɛm pipul nɔ bin gri lisin di pɔsin we bin de tɛl dɛn Gɔd in mɛsej na dis wɔl, so di tin we bin fɔ mit dɛn, mit dɛn, dɛn nɔ ebul pul dɛn ed. If dɛn nɔ ebul pul dɛn ed, aw wi we yɛri di wan insɛf we kɔmɔt ɛvin go pul wi ed, if wi nɔ gri lisin in mɛsej? Di tin we fɔ mit wi mɔs mit wi.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Lɔntɛm, Gɔd in vɔys bin mek di grɔn shek, bɔt naw i dɔn mek wan prɔmis to wi. I se, “A go shek di grɔn wan tɛm mɔ, ɛn a go shek di klawd insɛf.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wɛn Gɔd tɔk se, “wan tɛm mɔ,” dat sho wi se i go mek ɔl dɛn tin we i mek, we nɔ tinap tra nga, nɔ de igen, so dat dɛn tin we nɔbɔdi nɔ ebul shek go de sote go.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: So, una lɛ wi tɛl Gɔd tɛnki, bikɔs di ples we i de rul we wi dɔn gɛt, go de sote go, nɔbɔdi nɔ ebul shek am. Una lɛ wi prez am di we we go mek i gladi, lɛ wi rɛspɛkt ɛn fred am,

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: bikɔs wi Gɔd na faya we de bɔn ɔltin.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una we na brɔda bikɔs una ɔl na Krays in pikin dɛn, una fɔ lɛk una kɔmpin dɛn ɔltɛm.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una nɔ fɔgɛt se, una fɔ mek dɛn tre nja we kam to una tap na una os. Sɔm pipul bin de mek tre nja dɛn tap na dɛn os, bɔt dɛn nɔ bin no se sɔm pan dɛn tre nja ya na enjɛl.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una mɛmba dɛn pipul we de na jel, lɛkɛ se unasɛf de na jel wit dɛn; ɛn una mɛmba dɛn pipul we de sɔfa, ɛn una put unasɛf na dɛn ples.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mek ɔlman rɛspɛkt mared layf, di man we mared nɔ fɔ gɛt ɔda uman ɛn di wɛf nɔ fɔ gɛt ɔda man. Una mɛmba se Gɔd go jɔj dɛn wan we liv fri layf, ɛn i go jɔj ɛni mared uman we kip ɔda man ɛn ɛni mared man we kip ɔda uman.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una nɔ put ɔl una at pan kɔpɔ ɔltɛm, una fɔ sati sfay wit wetin una gɛt, bikɔs Gɔd dɔn se, “A nɔ go lɛf yu, a go de wit yu ɔltɛm fɔ ɛp yu.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na dat mek wi shɔ bɔt wetin wi de tɔk wɛn wi se, “Na Gɔd de ɛp mi ɔltɛm, natin nɔ go mek a fred, bikɔs mɔtalman nɔ gɛt ɛni pawa fɔ du mi bad.”

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una fɔ mɛmba dɛn fɔstɛm pipul we na bin una lida we tɛl una Gɔd in mɛsej. Una fɔ tink bɔt wetin bi na dɛn layf, ɛn unasɛf fɔ biliv Gɔd lɛkɛ aw dɛn bin biliv am.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Jizɔs Krays na di sem yɛstade, tide, ɛn i go bi di sem sote go, i nɔ go chenj.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una nɔ gri mek dɛn nyu tin we pipul de lan una, tɔn una at. Na di gud we Gɔd gud de mek una biliv am, fɔ tru, nɔto dɛn lɔ we tɔk bɔt tin fɔ it; dɛn nɔ min natin, ɛn dɛn nɔ de ɛp dɛn pipul we de fala dɛn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Ples de we Krays dɔn mek sakri fays to Gɔd fɔ wi, bɔt dɛn Ju man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin we de wok na di Bafa, nɔ gɛt rayt fɔ it na di ples we Krays mek in sakri fays fɔ wi.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wɛn dɛn Ju edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin kin mek sakri fays fɔ pul di pipul dɛn sin kɔmɔt na dɛn layf, na di bif dɛn blɔd nɔmɔ dɛn kin kɛr go na di ples na Gɔd in Os we dɛn kɔl “Di ples we Gɔd de pas ɛni ɔda ples.” Pipul nɔ bin de kɛr di bif we dɛn kil go na tɔng, dɛn kin bɔn am na ples we pipul nɔ tap.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na dat mek Jizɔs insɛf nɔ mek dɛn kɛr am go insay di tɔng fɔ kil am, bɔt dɛn bin kɛr am go na ples we pipul nɔ tap, so dat i go tek in yon blɔd pul di pipul dɛn sin kɔmɔt na dɛn layf.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: So, una lɛ wi kɔmɔt insay di tɔng ɛn fala Jizɔs, ɛn bia di shem sɛf we i sɔfa na di krɔs.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Wi nɔ gɛt tɔng we go las sote go na dis wɔl; wi de luk fɔ di tɔng we wi go tap bambay.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Na dat mek wi fɔ prez Gɔd ɔltɛm; di prez we wi de prez Gɔd tru Jizɔs, wɛn wi de tɔk ɔltɛm se in na wi Masta, na di sakri fays we wi de mek to Gɔd.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una nɔ fɔgɛt se una fɔ de du ɔda pipul gud, ɛn una fɔ de gi dɛn pan wetin una gɛt, bikɔs na dɛn kayn sakri fays de, de mek Gɔd gladi.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una du wetin una lida dɛn tɛl una fɔ du ɛn put unasɛf ɔnda dɛn. Dɛn yay de pan una ɔltɛm ɛn dɛn gɛt fɔ tinap bifo Gɔd fɔ tɛl am bɔt dis wok we dɛn de du fɔ una. If una du wetin dɛn tɛl una fɔ du, dɛnsɛf go gladi fɔ du dɛn wok. Bɔt if una nɔ du am, dɛn nɔ go gladi fɔ du di wok, ɛn dat nɔ go ɛp una.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una pre fɔ wi ɔltɛm. Wi no gud wan se wi dɔn du ɔl wetin wi no se wi fɔ du, bikɔs wi bin want du wetin rayt ɔltɛm.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A de beg una mɔ ɛn mɔ fɔ pre fɔ mi, so dat i nɔ go te igen Gɔd go gi mi chans fɔ kam fɛn una bak.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Gɔd we de gi mɔta lman kol at, dɔn mek wi Masta Jizɔs rayz frɔm di grev wit layf ɛn mek i bi di shɛpad we pas ɔl fɔ de wach wi we na in pipul dɛn. Na Jizɔs in blɔd dɔn mek di agrimɛnt, we Gɔd mek wit wi, go de sote go.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A de pre mek Gɔd gi una ɔl dɛn gud tin we una nɔ gɛt, so dat una go yus dɛn gud tin de fɔ du wetin i want una fɔ du. A de pre mek Gɔd mek Jizɔs Krays in pawa wok na wi ɔl at, so dat wi go bi aw i want wi fɔ bi. A de pre mek pipul prez ɛn rɛspɛkt Jizɔs Krays sote go! Emɛn.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mi brɔda dɛn, a de beg una, mek una put una at dɔng fɔ lisin to wetin a de tɛl una fɔ du; na dat mek dis lɛta we a rayt una nɔ lɔng.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: A want mek una no se dɛn dɔn pul wi brɔda Timoti kɔmɔt na jel. If i kam kwik, a go bring am kam wɛn a de kam to una.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Una tɛl ɔl una bigman dɛn na di chɔch ɛn ɔl Gɔd in pipul dɛn de, adu fɔ mi. Wi Kristiɛn brɔda dɛn we kɔmɔt Itali, dɛnsɛf de tɛl una adu.

book_name: GBOO IBU MƆƐ N KO A
verse_text: Mek Gɔd sho una ɔl aw i gud.
Na mi Jems we de wok fɔ Gɔd ɛn wi Masta Jizɔs Krays, de rayt to ɔl Gɔd in pipul dɛn we skata ɔlɔbɔt na wɔl. A de tɛl una ɔl adu!
Mi Kristiɛn pipul dɛn, una fɔ gladi wɛn ɛni waala mit una,
bikɔs una no se dɛn tin de na fɔ tɛst una fɔ no if una biliv Gɔd gud; ɛn if una stil biliv Gɔd, una go ebul fɔ bia ɔltin.
If una ebul bia ɔltin, una go bi lɛkɛ aw Gɔd want una fɔ bi ɛn una nɔ go gɛt ɛni bɔt na una layf.
If ɛni wan pan una want mɔ sɛns fɔ du ɛni tin, mek i aks Gɔd, Gɔd go gi am, bikɔs Gɔd de gi mɔta lman plɛnti tin dɛn ɛn i gladi fɔ du dat.
Bɔt wɛn ɛnibɔdi aks Gɔd fɔ ɛni tin, mek da pɔsin de biliv se Gɔd go gi am wetin i aks fɔ, mek i nɔ dawt. Ɛnibɔdi we de dawt tan lɛkɛ swɛlin na wata we briz de blo, i nɔ stɛdi.
Pɔsin lɛkɛ dat jɛs de chenj chenj in maynd. Da pɔsin de fɔ no se Gɔd nɔ go gi am ɛni tin.
Mek di Kristiɛn we po gladi bikɔs Gɔd dɔn tek am lɛkɛ sɔmbɔdi.
Mek di Kristiɛn we jɛntri gladi bikɔs Gɔd nɔ tek in jɛntri mek natin, bikɔs di jɛntri man go day lɛkɛ dɛn fayn flawa we wi kin si tide, tumara dɛn dɔn lɔs.
Di ɔt san kin bɔn di flawa, ɛn di flawa kin fɔdɔm. Na dɔn ɔl di fayn we di flawa bin fayn kin dɔn so. Semwe so, jɛntri pɔsin go de pan in biznɛs wɛn day go mit am.
Pɔsin we nɔ tap fɔ biliv pan Gɔd wɛn trɔbul mit am gɛt blɛsin, bikɔs if i stil tinap tra nga afta trɔbul dɔn mit am, Gɔd go gi am di tru layf we i bin dɔn prɔmis dɛn wan we lɛk am.
Wɛn ɛni tin mit pɔsin we go mek di pɔsin want fɔ du bad, i nɔ fɔ se, “Na Gɔd mek a want du dis bad ya.” Bikɔs Gɔd nɔ de du bad ɛn i nɔ de du ɛnibɔdi ɛni tin we go mek di pɔsin fil fɔ du bad.
Na di bad we de na pɔsin in at de mek di pɔsin want fɔ du bad.
Na di bad we de na pɔsin at de mek di pɔsin want sin, ɛn wɛn pɔsin sin dat go mek i day.
Mi Kristiɛn pipul dɛn, mek nɔbɔdi nɔ mek una ful.
Na Gɔd nɔmɔ de gi wi ɔl dɛn tin we gud ɛn we mek wi nɔ want ɛni tin mɔ. Na Gɔd mek di san, di mun ɛn di sta dɛn. Gɔd nɔ de chenj, i nɔ de lɛf wi na dak afta i dɔn mek layt shayn pan wi.
Gɔd mek in wɔd we tru gi wi dis nyu layf lɛkɛ aw i want, so dat wi kin pas ɔl dɛn ɔda pipul we i mek we wi dɔn bi in yon pikin dɛn.
Mi Kristiɛn pipul dɛn we a lɛk, una fɔ shap una yes fɔ yɛri wetin pipul de tɔk, bɔt una fɔ tek tɛm tɔk ɛn una at nɔ fɔ de wam kwik.
Bikɔs pɔsin we gɛt wam at nɔ go ebul du di gud we Gɔd want mek i du.
Na dat mek a de tɛl una se, mek una pul ɔltin we bad kɔmɔt na una layf. Una put unasɛf ɔnda Gɔd ɛn mek di wɔd we i dɔn put na una at sidɔm, bikɔs in wɔd gɛt pawa fɔ sev una.
Una fɔ du wetin Gɔd in wɔd se. Pɔsin we jɛs de lisin Gɔd in wɔd nɔmɔ, bɔt i nɔ de du wetin i se, de mek insɛf ful.
Ɛnibɔdi we yɛri Gɔd in wɔd ɛn i nɔ du wetin Gɔd tɛl am, tan lɛkɛ pɔsin we luk insɛf na glas ɛn si aw i tan,
bɔt wɛn i dɔn luk insɛf na di glas, i go in we ɛn fɔgɛt aw i tan wantɛm.

Gɔd in wɔd na di rayt tin fɔ mɔta lman ɛn i de mek mɔta lman fri; ɛnibɔdi we put ɔl in at pan am, we nɔ jɛs lisin am nɔmɔ ɛn fɔgɛt, bɔt i de du wetin i se, Gɔd go blɛs ɔl wetin da pɔsin de put in an pan.
If ɛnibɔdi tink se in de fala Gɔd ɛn i nɔ de tek tɛm wɛn i de tɔk, i de mek insɛf ful. Na fɔ natin di pɔsin de fala Gɔd.

Pɔsin we de fala Gɔd fɔ de ɛp dɛn pikin we nɔ gɛt mama ɛn papa ɛn dɛn uman we dɛn man dɔn day. I fɔ tek tɛm mek dɛn bad pipul na wɔl nɔ mek insɛf bigin du bad. Na so Gɔd we na di Papa want pɔsin we de fala am fɔ tan.
Mi pipul dɛn we biliv pan wi Masta Jizɔs Krays we de rul wit pawa, una nɔ fɔ trit wan pɔsin fayn pas in kɔmpin bay aw una si di pɔsin.
If tu pɔsin kam na una mitin, wan wɛr gold ring ɛn i jɛntri, i wɛr fayn klos; di ɔda wan po, i wɛr chɛr chɛr klos,
una nɔ fɔ tɛl di pɔsin we drɛs fayn se, “Duya, kam sidɔm bifo ya!” dɛn una tɛl di poman se, “Go, tinap yanda!” ɔ “Go, sidɔm na grɔn!”
If ɛnibɔdi du dat, i dɔn du bad we i de luk se wan pɔsin bɛtɛ pas in kɔmpin. Di tin we mek i de du dat nɔ fayn.

Mi kɔmpin Kristiɛn dɛn we a lɛk, a want mek una yɛri mi! Dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt natin na dis wɔl, Gɔd dɔn pik dɛn fɔ biliv wi Masta Jizɔs Krays ɛn fɔ mek dɛn go na ɛvin we i de rul; dɛn jɛntri na Gɔd in yay. Na dat Gɔd dɔn prɔmis fɔ du fɔ ɔl dɛn wan we lɛk am.
Wetin mek una nɔ tek dɛn po pipul mek ɛni tin? Na dɛn jɛntri pipul de mek una tan lɛkɛ slev ɛn na dɛn de drɛg una go bifo dɛn jɔj.
Na dɛn jɛntri pipul nɔ gɛt rɛspɛkt fɔ Jizɔs Krays in nem. Ɛn na di nem dat we Gɔd dɔn tek fɔ mek una bi in yon pipul.
Una de du di rayt tin if una de fala Gɔd, we de rul wi in lɔ we rayt na in Buk se, “Una fɔ lɛk una kɔmpin, lɛkɛ aw una lɛk unasɛf.”
Bɔt if una trit wan pɔsin fayn pas in kɔmpin mɔta lman bay aw di pɔsin luk, una dɔn sin, ɛn di lɔ go kɔndɛm una, se una dɔn du bad.
If pɔsin de du ɔl wetin Gɔd in Lɔ se, bɔt i brok wan pan di lɔ dɛn, i dɔn brok ɔl di ɔda lɔ dɛn na Gɔd in yay.

Gɔd we se, “Yu nɔ fɔ kil pɔsin,” na di sem Gɔd se, “Yu nɔ fɔ lɛf yu mared man ɔ wɛf go fɛn ɔda pɔsin na trit.” If yu nɔ lɛf yu mared man ɔ wɛf go fɛn ɔda pɔsin na trit, bɔt yu kil yu kɔmpin mɔta lman, na Gɔd yay, yu dɔn brok ɔl di lɔ dɛn.
Una tek tɛm wetin una de tɔk ɛn wetin una de du, bikɔs wan de Gɔd go tek di lɔ, dat na in wɔd, we de fri ɔlman, jɔj wi.

If pɔsin nɔ de sɔri fɔ in kɔmpin mɔta lman ɛn padin am wɛn i du am bad, Gɔd nɔ go sɔri fɔ da pɔsin de ɛn padin am wɛn i go jɔj am. Bɔt pɔsin we de sɔri fɔ in kɔmpin mɔta lman ɛn padin am, Gɔd insɛf go sɔri fɔ insɛf ɛn padin am wɛn i de jɔj am.
Mi Kristiɛn pipul dɛn, i nɔ min natin if pɔsin se in biliv Gɔd bɔt ɔl wetin i de du nɔ sho se i biliv Gɔd. If pɔsin biliv Gɔd ɛn i nɔ de du ɛni tin we sho se in biliv am, dat nɔ go sev am.
If una kɔmpin Kristiɛn nɔ gɛt tin fɔ it ɛn tin fɔ wɛr,
ɛn wan pan una tɛl am se, “Go, mek bɛtɛ fala yu ya, a op se yu go fɛn tin fɔ it ɛn klos fɔ wɛr,” bɔt i nɔ gi am ɔl wetin i want fɔ in bɔdi, dɛn wɔd de nɔ min natin!
Wɛl, na so i fɔ bi wɛn pɔsin biliv Gɔd. If i jɛs tɔk nɔmɔ se in biliv Gɔd, bɔt i nɔ du ɛni tin fɔ sho se in biliv Gɔd, di biliv we da pɔsin de se in biliv Gɔd, nɔ min natin!

Sɔntɛm pɔsin go se, “Wan pɔsin biliv Gɔd, bɔt ɔda wan de du dɛn tin we sho se i biliv Gɔd.” A go ansa da pɔsin de se, “Aw pɔsin go sho se in biliv Gɔd if a nɔ si di tin dɛn we i de du fɔ sho se i biliv Gɔd? Wetin a de du go sho una se a biliv Gɔd.”
So, una biliv se na wan gren Gɔd de. Una rayt! Bɔt dɛn dɛbul dɛnsɛf no se Gɔd de, na dat mek dɛn de fred am ɛn tri mbul bifo am.
Una we nɔ de gri fɔ ɔnda stand! If una biliv Gɔd, bɔt una nɔ de du dɛn tin we sho se una biliv Gɔd, di biliv we una se una biliv Gɔd, nɔ min natin.
Una mɛmba Ebraam we na wan pan wi gra npapa-papa dɛn; wetin mek ɔltin bin rayt bitwin in ɛn Gɔd? Na bikɔs i bin tek in pikin Ayzik fɔ go sakri fays am.
Una nɔ si se wetin Ebraam du sho se i bin biliv Gɔd? Una nɔ si se Ebraam bin biliv Gɔd bikɔs i du wetin Gɔd tɛl am fɔ du?
Di tin we Gɔd in wɔd bin dɔn tɔk kam bi tru. I bin se, “Ebraam biliv Gɔd ɛn Gɔd kɔl am pɔsin we de waka tret.” Pipul kɔl am Gɔd in padi.
So una si, nɔto aw pɔsin biliv Gɔd nɔmɔ de mek ɔltin rayt bitwin in ɛn Gɔd, bɔt na dɛn tin sɛf we i de du.
Reab, da trit uman, na pɔsin we bin ayd dɛn tre nja ɛn mek dɛn pas ɔda rod fɔ go usay dɛn bin kɔmɔt; na dat mek ɔltin rayt bitwin in ɛn Gɔd.
Lɛkɛ aw pɔsin kin day wɛn in spirit nɔ de insay am igen, semwe so, pɔsin we se in biliv Gɔd ɛn i nɔ de du dɛn tin we sho se i biliv am, nɔ biliv Gɔd at ɔl.
Mi kɔmpin Kristiɛn dɛn, una we fɔ bi ticha nɔ fɔ plɛnti. Una mɛmba se Gɔd go jɔj wi we de tɛl ɔda pipul wetin dɛn fɔ du tra nga wan pas aw i go jɔj dɛn ɔda pipul.
Wi ɔl de du tin we nɔ rayt. Ɛnibɔdi we nɔba tɔk tin we nɔ rayt na pɔsin we nɔba du tin we nɔ rayt. I ebul kɔntrol ɔl pat pan in bɔdi.
Wi kin put wan lili ayɛn na ɔs in mɔt fɔ mek i du wetin wi want am fɔ du.
Dɛn big ship sɛf we de na wata, pan ɔl we dɛn big big briz kin want kɛr dɛn go, na lili tin we dɛn put ɔnda di ship de kɔntrol dɛn ɛn mek dɛn go ɛni say we di paylɔt want mek dɛn go.
Semwe so, wi mɔt na smɔl tin na wi bɔdi, bɔt i kin du plɛnti big big tin. Na lili faya, lɛkɛ di faya we kin kɔmɔt wɛn pɔsin krach machis, de mek big big bush bɔn.

Wi mɔt tan lɛkɛ faya. Soso bad ful insay wi mɔt ɛn we wi mɔt na wan pat pan wi bɔdi, i de mek ɔl wi bɔdi bad. Wi mɔt de pwɛl wi frɔm di tɛm we wi bɔn sote wi day. Dɛn bad tin we de kɔmɔt na wi mɔt kɔmɔt to Setan na ɛl.
Mɔta lman ebul kɔntrol ɔl kayn bif na bush, ɔl kayn bɔd, ɔl kayn snek ɛn ɔl kayn fish,
bɔt nɔbɔdi nɔ de we ebul kɔntrol in mɔt; wi mɔt na tin we nɔ de sɛt, wi de tek am tɔk bad tin. Dɛn bad tin ya na lɛkɛ pɔyzin, dɛn de kil.
Tɛm de we wi kin tek wi mɔt tɛl wi Masta ɛn wi Papa tɛnki, bɔt ɔda tɛm wi kin tek di sem mɔt kɔs mɔtal man we Gɔd mek lɛkɛ insɛf.
Na dis sem mɔt ya wi de tek fɔ tɛl Gɔd tɛnki ɛn fɔ kɔs. Mi kɔmpin Kristiɛn dɛn, i nɔ fɔ bi so.
Una nɔ go gɛt wata we tes fayn ɛn wata we tes bad na di sem wɛl.
Mangro tik nɔ go bia brɛfrut. Lɛm tik nɔ go bia ɔri nch. Semwe so, frɛsh wata nɔ go kɔmɔt na sɔl wata.

Uswan pan una de we gɛt sɛns ɛn we ɔnda stand plɛnti tin? Mek i waka tret ɛn du gud ɛn wɛn i de du gud, mek i nɔ prawd ɛn mek i du ɔltin wit sɛns; na dat go sho se in na pɔsin we gɛt sɛns ɛn i de ɔnda stand.
If una de jɛlɔs ɔda pipul ɛn una gɛt bad at fɔ dɛn ɛn una jɛs de mɛmba unasɛf nɔmɔ, una nɔ fɔ bost se una gud ɛn una gɛt sɛns, bikɔs if una du so, una nɔ de tɔk tru.
Nɔto Gɔd gi mɔta lman dis kayn sɛns ya, na dis wɔl yon sɛns ɛn na Setan gi mɔta lman.
Ɛni say we pipul de jɛlɔs dɛn kɔmpin ɛn dɛn want ɔltin fɔ dɛnsɛf, una nɔ go fɛn wanwɔd de; na soso bad lib de.

Di sɛns we Gɔd de gi, na pɔsin wit klin at i de gi, na di fɔs tin dat. Pɔsin we gɛt da kayn sɛns de nɔ de mek plaba, i nɔ de ambɔg, i de du tin saful saful, ɛn i lɛk fɔ ɛp pipul; i gɛt sɔri at ɛn i de du plɛnti plɛnti gud; ɔl in at de fɔ Gɔd, i nɔ ipo krit.
Dɛn pipul we de mek pis, tan lɛkɛ fama we de plant sid. Di pis we dɛn de mek tan lɛkɛ di sid we fama plant. Dis sid ya go bia plɛnti gud na pipul dɛn at.
Wetin mek una de fɛt ɛn mek plaba ɔltɛm? Dɛn tin we de insay una at we de fɛt fɔ mek una nɔ de wit Gɔd, na dɛn de mek una fɛt ɛn mek plaba ɔltɛm.

Wɛn una want sɔntin una nɔ gɛt am, na dat kin mek una kil una kɔmpin. Wɛn una put yay pan sɔntin una nɔ gɛt am, na dat kin mek una mek plaba ɛn fɛt una kɔmpin. Una nɔ gɛt wetin una want bikɔs una nɔ aks Gɔd fɔ gi una.
Sɔntɛm una kin aks Gɔd fɔ sɔntin ɛn Gɔd nɔba gi una, bikɔs di rizin we mek una aks nɔ rayt. Una aks fɔ dɛn tin we fɔ mek una nɔmɔ sati sfay.
Una tan lɛkɛ uman we nɔ tret wit in man! Una nɔ no se wɛn una lɛk dɛn tin we de na wɔl, dat go mek una nɔ lɛk Gɔd? Ɛnibɔdi we want dɛn tin na wɔl dɔn bi pɔsin we nɔ lɛk Gɔd.
Una min se na fɔ natin Gɔd in Buk se, “Gɔd in Spirit we i put insay wi, want wi fɔ insɛf nɔmɔ?”
Bɔt di blɛsin we Gɔd gi wi pas di bad we de na wi at. Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, “Gɔd nɔ de gri mek dɛn prawd pipul gɛt dɛn yon we, bɔt i de blɛs dɛn wan we nɔ prawd.”
So, una fɔ put unasɛf ɔnda Gɔd. Una tinap fɔ fɛt Setan, i go rɔnawe go lɛf una.
Una kam klos Gɔd ɛn i go kam klos una. Una dɛn sina, una lɛf fɔ sin. Una dɛn ipo krit, una pul dɛn bad tin kɔmɔt na una at.
Una fɔ mɛmba dɛn bad we una dɔn du; ɛn una fɔ sɔri ɛn kray fɔ dɛn. Una fɔ lɛf fɔ laf, una fɔ sɔri ɛn kray; una nɔ fɔ gladi, una fɔ sɔri.
Una put unasɛf ɔnda Gɔd, una nɔ mek prawd, Gɔd go lif una ɔp.

Mi Kristiɛn pipul dɛn, una lɛf fɔ tɔk bad bɔt una kɔmpin mɔta lman. Ɛnibɔdi we tɔk bad bɔt in kɔmpin ɔ jɔj am, da pɔsin de de tɔk bad bɔt Gɔd in Lɔ, ɛn i de jɔj Gɔd in Lɔ. If una jɔj Gɔd in Lɔ, dat min se una nɔ de fala Gɔd in Lɔ.

Na Gɔd wan gren gɛt pawa fɔ gi pipul Lɔ, na in wan gren gɛt pawa fɔ jɔj, na in wan gren gɛt pawa fɔ sev pipul mek dɛn nɔ day, ɛn na in gɛt pawa fɔ mek pipul day. Udat na una fɔ de jɔj una kɔmpin mɔta lman?
Una lisin wetin a de kam tɛl una, una we de tɔk se, “Tide ɔ tumara wi go go na da tɔng yanda ɛn tap de fɔ wan ia. Wi go tre din, ɛn mek plɛnti mɔni.”
Bɔt una nɔ no wetin go bi to una tumara. Una layf tan lɛkɛ fɔg we kin de wan minit, di ɔda minit i dɔn lɔs.
Wɛn una want tɔk, una fɔ se, “If Gɔd gri, wi nɔ go day ɛn wi go du dis tin ya ɔ wi go du da tin de.”
Bɔt una de mek prawd ɛn bost bɔt unasɛf. Fɔ bost na sin.
So, ɛnibɔdi we no wetin i fɔ du ɛn i nɔ du am, da pɔsin de dɔn sin.
Una we jɛntri, una lisin wetin a de tɛl una naw. Una kray bita wan ɛn sɔri fɔ di waala dɛn we de kam mit una.
Ɔl di plɛnti plɛnti tin dɛn we una gɛt dɔn rɔtin ɛn dɛn arata dɔn it una klos dɛn.
Una silva ɛn gold dɔn rɔsti. Di rɔsti we una silva ɛn gold dɔn rɔsti, na in go kɔndɛm una ɛn i go it una bɔdi lɛkɛ aw faya kin du. Na da kayn jɛntri de una dɔn gɛda fɔ di tɛm we Gɔd go jɔj mɔta lman.
Una nɔ pe dɛn pipul we de wok na una fam ɔl wetin dɛn fɔ gɛt. Dɛn dɔn le kɔmplen ɛn Gɔd we na di Masta we pas ɔl, dɔn yɛri dɛn.
Una dɔn gɛt ɔl dɛn fayn fayn tin we una want na wɔl, ɛn una dɔn du ɔl wetin una lɛk fɔ du. Ɔl dɛn tin ya mek una tan lɛkɛ ɔg we dɔn fat rɛdi fɔ mek dɛn kil am.
Una dɔn kɔndɛm dɛn pipul we nɔ du una natin; dɛn nɔ se fing, ɛn una dɔn kil dɛn.
Mi kɔmpin Kristiɛn dɛn, una fɔ bia sote di Masta kam. Una mɛmba aw dɛn pipul we de mek fam kin bia wet sote di tɛm rich fɔ pik wetin dɛn bin plant.
Semwe so, unasɛf fɔ bia wet. Una nɔ mek una at pwɛl bikɔs di tɛm dɔn de rich we wi Masta Jizɔs Krays fɔ kam bak.
Mi kɔmpin Kristiɛn dɛn, una nɔ fɔ kɔmplen bɔt una kɔmpin, so dat wɛn Gɔd jɔj una, i nɔ go kɔndɛm una. Di Jɔj we go jɔj wi dɔn kam klos, i tinap na domɔt.
Mi kɔmpin Kristiɛn dɛn, una mɛmba dɛn prɔfɛt we bin de tɔk Gɔd in mɛsej, dɛn bin sɔfa plɛnti, bɔt dɛn bia; na so unasɛf fɔ bia.

Wi se Gɔd blɛs dɛn bikɔs dɛn bia. Una no aw Job bin bia lɔng wɛn i bin de sɔfa, ɛn una si aw Gɔd kam blɛs am. Ɔl dat fɔ mek una no se fɔ tru, Gɔd de sɔri fɔ wi wɛn wi de sɔfa, ɛn i de sɔri fɔ wi pan ɔl we wi du tin we fɔ mek i vɛks.

Mi kɔmpin Kristiɛn dɛn, a want tɛl una wan ɔda tin we pas ɔl wetin a bin dɔn tɛl una. Wɛn una prɔmis fɔ du sɔntin, una nɔ fɔ swɛ. Una nɔ swɛ to Gɔd, una nɔ swɛ wit ɛni tin na dis wɔl. If una gri fɔ ɛni tin, una fɔ se, “Yɛs;” if una nɔ gri, una fɔ se, “Nɔ,” so dat wɛn Gɔd go jɔj una, i nɔ go kɔndɛm una.
If ɛni wan pan una de sɔfa, mek i aks Gɔd fɔ ɛp am. If ɛni wan pan una gladi, mek i sing ɛn prez Gɔd.
If ɛni wan pan una sik, mek i kɔl dɛn bigman na chɔch mek dɛn pre fɔ am. Wɛn dɛn de pre, mek dɛn tek ɔyl tɔn lili bit pan di pɔsin ɛn aks wi Masta Jizɔs Krays fɔ mɛn am.
If dɛn biliv se Gɔd go du wetin dɛn de pre fɔ, di sik pɔsin go wɛl. Gɔd go mek i wɛl gud gud, ɛn pantap dat, if di pɔsin bin dɔn du bad, Gɔd go padin am.
Na dat mek, una fɔ tɛl una kɔmpin Kristiɛn di sin dɛn we una dɔn sin ɛn una fɔ pre mek Gɔd mek una wɛl. Wɛn pɔsin we de waka tret bifo Gɔd pre, da pre de gɛt pawa ɛn Gɔd go ansa am.
Ila yja na bin mɔta lman lɛkɛ wisɛf. I pre wit ɔl in at fɔ mek ren nɔ kam ɛn tri ia ɛn siks mɔnt wan ren nɔ fɔdɔm.
Wɛn i pre bak ren kam ɛn ɔltin bigin gro bak.
Mi kɔmpin Kristiɛn dɛn, if ɛni wan pan una sli pul ɛn kɔmɔt na Gɔd in rod, bɔt sɔmbɔdi bring am kam bak,
una fɔ no se, di pɔsin we bring wan sina kam bak na Gɔd rod ɛn ɛp am mek i lɛf fɔ du bad, dɔn sev da pɔsin de ɛn Gɔd go padin am fɔ plɛnti ɔda bad tin dɛn we i du.
Mi Pita, we na Krays in apɔsul, de rayt to una we Gɔd dɔn pik, we skata ɔlɔbɔt na Pɔntɔs, Galeshya, Kapa do shya, Eshya ɛn Bitinya, we de lɛkɛ tre nja na ɔl dɛn kɔntri ya.

Na Gɔd, we na wi Papa, dɔn pik una, lɛkɛ aw i bin dɔn plan, ɛn Gɔd in Spirit dɔn mek una bi Gɔd yon pipul, so dat una go du wetin Jizɔs Krays tɛl una fɔ du, ɛn di day we Jizɔs Krays day na di krɔs go mek una klin na Gɔd yay. A de pre mek Gɔd sho una aw i gud ɛn mek i gi una kol at mɔ ɛn mɔ.
Lɛ wi tɛl Gɔd, we na Masta Jizɔs Krays in Papa, tɛnki! Bikɔs Gɔd sɔri fɔ wi, i mek Jizɔs Krays rayz frɔm di grev fɔ gi wi nyu layf, na dat mek wi abop fɔ gɛt layf we go de sote go,
ɛn so, wi abop fɔ gɛt di wɔnda ful blɛsin dɛn we Gɔd bin dɔn prɔmis in pipul dɛn ɛn we i kip na ɛvin fɔ una. Dɛn blɛsin ya nɔ de pwɛl, dɛn nɔ de chenj ɛn dɛn go de sote go.
Bikɔs una biliv pan Gɔd, Gɔd go kip una wit in pawa, so dat una go gɛt da layf we go de sote go, we dɔn rɛdi naw ɛn we Gɔd go gi una di de we i go jɔj ɔlman.
Dis fɔ mek una gladi pan ɔl we ɔl kayn waala de mek una sɔfa naw; bɔt i nɔ go te igen we una go sɔfa.

Dɛn waala ya na fɔ tray una fɔ si if una biliv Gɔd gud wan, lɛkɛ we dɛn kin put gold na faya fɔ tray am fɔ si if i gud, ɛn gold na tin we de pwɛl. Di biliv we una biliv Gɔd bɛtɛ fawe pas gold, so Gɔd go tray una fɔ si if una biliv pan am gud, ɛn una nɔ go tap fɔ biliv pan am. If una biliv Gɔd gud gud, di de we Jizɔs go kam mek ɔlman si am, Gɔd go prez una, i go mek una gɛt rɛspɛkt ɛn i go mek una de wit am sote go.
Pan ɔl we una nɔ si Jizɔs yet, una lɛk am. Pan ɔl we una nɔ de si am naw, una biliv pan am; so una gladi bad ɛn una nɔ ebul tɔk sɛf bɔt di gladi we una gladi, bikɔs
di biliv we una biliv Gɔd dɔn mek una gɛt layf we go de sote go na ɛvin.
Dɛn prɔfɛt we bin dɔn tɔk bɔt dis gud tin ya we Gɔd dɔn gi una, bifo i gi una, bin tek tɛm fɔ dig fɔ no bɔt dis layf ya we go de sote go na ɛvin, we Gɔd de gi dɛn wan we biliv pan Krays.
Wɛn Krays in Spirit we bin de insay dɛn bin tɔk bɔt aw Krays bin gɛt fɔ sɔfa ɛn di wɔnda ful tin dɛn we bin gɛt fɔ apin afta dat, di prɔfɛt dɛn bin tray fɔ no ustɛm dɛn tin de go bi ɛn aw dɛn go bi.

Gɔd sho dɛn prɔfɛt ya se nɔto fɔ ɛp dɛnsɛf dɛn de wok, bɔt na fɔ ɛp una. Di wok we dɛn de du na we dɛn de tɔk bɔt dɛn tin we una dɔn yɛri, we dɛn wan we de tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus dɔn tɔk. Na Gɔd in Spirit we Gɔd sɛn kɔmɔt ɛvin, na in mek dɛn pipul ya ebul tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus. Na dɛn tin ya dɛn enjɛl dɛnsɛf go lɛk fɔ ɔnda stand.
Na dat mek una fɔ mekɔp una maynd fɔ du wetin una gɛt fɔ du, una fɔ kɔntrol unasɛf ɛn una fɔ put ɔl una at pan di blɛsin we Jizɔs Krays go gi una di tɛm we i go sho insɛf to ɔlman.
Una fɔ du ɔl wetin Gɔd tɛl una fɔ du, una nɔ fɔ fala una at fɔ du dɛn bad tin we una bin lɛk fɔ du di tɛm we una nɔ bin no di Gud Nyus bɔt Jizɔs Krays yet.
Bɔt una fɔ du ɔl wetin una de du lɛkɛ aw Gɔd yon pipul de du dɛn, jɛs lɛkɛ aw Gɔd, we kɔl una fɔ du in wok, nɔ de du ɛni tin bad.
Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, Gɔd se, “Una nɔ fɔ gɛt natin fɔ du wit ɛni tin we bad lɛkɛ we misɛf nɔ gɛt natin fɔ du wit ɛni tin we bad.”
Wɛn una de pre ɛn una se, “Papa,” una de kɔl Gɔd, we de jɔj ɔlman di sem we, bay di wok we ɔlman de du, so ɔl di tɛm we lɛf fɔ una na dis wɔl, una fɔ ɔna am, pan ɔl wetin una de du.
Unasɛf no se nɔto tin lɛkɛ silva ɛn gold we de pwɛl, dɛn tek pe fɔ pul una kɔmɔt pan di yuslɛs layf we una gra npapa-papa dɛn bin liv ɛn we unasɛf bin liv;
bɔt na Krays in yon blɔd dɛn tek pe fɔ una, Krays we na lɛkɛ Ship we nɔ gɛt bɔt.
Bifo Gɔd mek di wɔl, i bin dɔn pik Krays fɔ du di wok we i fɔ du na wɔl, ɛn naw, we plɛnti tɛm nɔ lɛf igen, Krays dɔn kam fɔ ɛp una.
Krays dɔn mek una biliv pan Gɔd, we mek i rayz frɔm di grev ɛn ɔna am; na dat mek una trɔs Gɔd ɛn abop se i go du wetin i dɔn prɔmis se in go du.
Naw we una de fala dɛn tru tin we dɛn lan una bɔt Jizɔs Krays, we mek una dɔn lɛf fɔ du bad, ɛn mek una layf dɔn klin, ɛn mek una lɛk una kɔmpin Kristiɛn dɛn fɔ tru, una fɔ lɛk dɛn naw wit ɔl una at.
Gɔd in wɔd we de gi layf ɛn we de sote go dɔn mek una gɛt nyu layf; i tan lɛkɛ se, una dɔn bɔn bak, ɛn di wan we mek una bɔn bak go de sote go; i nɔ tan lɛkɛ di wan we bɔn una di fɔs tɛm, we mɔs day.
Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, “Mɔtalman na lɛkɛ gras, ɛn ɔl wetin fayn pan am jɛs tan lɛkɛ dɛn flawa we de gro pan gras. Di gras go wida ɛn di dray flawa dɛn go fɔdɔm na grɔn,
bɔt di Masta in wɔd go de sote go.” Dis wɔd ya na di Gud Nyus bɔt Jizɔs we dɛn bin tɛl una.
So una fɔ lɛf ɔl dɛn bad tin we de na una layf: una fɔ lɛf fɔ lay, una fɔ lɛf fɔ mek ipo krit, una fɔ lɛf fɔ jɛlɔs una kɔmpin ɛn una fɔ lɛf fɔ tɔk bad bɔt dɛn.

Una fɔ tan lɛkɛ bebi we jɛs bɔn, we want milk ɔltɛm; na so unasɛf fɔ want fɔ yɛri Gɔd in wɔd, ɔltɛm; i go mek una gro if una drink am ɔltɛm, dat min se una go no mɔ ɛn mɔ bɔt Gɔd ɛn una go gɛt layf ya we go de sote go na ɛvin.
Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, “Una dɔn no aw Gɔd gud.”
Una kam to di Masta, na in na di ston we de gi layf; mɔta lman bin tink se i nɔ gud, bɔt Gɔd pik am bikɔs i no se i gud.

Una fɔ tan lɛkɛ ston we gɛt layf ɛn una fɔ mek Gɔd tek una bil di os we in Spirit de bil, na de una go mek sakri fays to Gɔd. Una go de du Gɔd in wok nɔmɔ, dat na fɔ de mek dɛn sakri fays we Gɔd in Spirit tɛl una fɔ mek, we go mek Gɔd sati sfay fɔseka di wok we Jizɔs Krays dɔn du.

Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, Gɔd se, “A dɔn pik wan gud gud ston we go bi di ston we impɔtant pas ɔl ɛn a go put am na da tɔng we dɛn kɔl Zayɔn; da ston de na di Masta; ɛnibɔdi we biliv pan am nɔ go disapɔynt.”

Dis ston ya de ɛp una we biliv am gud gud wan, bɔt fɔ dɛn wan we nɔ biliv am, dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, “Di ston we dɛn pipul we de bil nɔ tek mek natin, na in dɔn kam bi di wan we impɔtant pas ɔl di ɔda wan dɛn.”
Dɛn rayt ɔda say na Gɔd in Buk se, “Na di ston dis we go mek pipul bɔk dɛn fut ɛn fɔdɔm.” Dɛn pipul ya bin bɔk dɛn fut bikɔs dɛn nɔ bin biliv se Gɔd in wɔd na tru; na so Gɔd bin dɔn plan fɔ dɛn.

Bɔt una na lɛkɛ wan neshɔn, Gɔd dɔn pik una, una na pipul we de mek sakri fays to Gɔd ɛn we de wok fɔ Gɔd we na una King; una na neshɔn we dɔn gi unasɛf to Gɔd, una na Gɔd in yon pipul dɛn we i pik fɔ tɔk bɔt di wɔnda ful wok dɛn we i de du. Na Gɔd pul una kɔmɔt na dak bring una kam na in wɔnda ful layt.
Tɛm bin de we una nɔto bin Gɔd yon pipul dɛn, bɔt una dɔn bi in pipul dɛn naw; tɛm bin de we una nɔ bin no aw Gɔd gud, bɔt naw una dɔn no aw i gud we i dɔn sɔri fɔ una.

Mi padi dɛn, una we de lɛkɛ tre nja na dis wɔl ɛn lɛkɛ pipul we nɔ kam fɔ tap lɔng naya, a de beg una mek una nɔ jɛs de fala una at fɔ sati sfay una bɔdi bikɔs wetin una bɔdi want nɔto dat una spirit want.

Di we we una liv wit dɛn pipul we nɔ no Gɔd fɔ fayn, so dat wɛn dɛn go de tɔk se una de du bad, dɛnsɛf go si se una dɔn du gud wok, fɔ tru, ɛn dat go mek, di de we Gɔd go kam fɔ jɔj di wɔl, dɛn go prez Gɔd.
Fɔ di Masta in sek, una fɔ put unasɛf ɔnda ɛnibɔdi we de oba una na dis wɔl ɛn du ɔl wetin dɛn want una fɔ du, dat na di pɔsin we de oba ɔl dɛn ɔda rula,
ɛn dɛn gɔvna we i pik fɔ de pɔnish dɛn pipul we de du bad ɛn fɔ prez dɛn wan we de du gud.
Gɔd want mek una du di rayt tin, so dat dɛn fulish pipul we nɔ sabi natin go sɛt dɛn mɔt.
